1b1(rgyud): rnyog pa zhes byu ga/'phags smyan ras gzugs da phyug phyuga'argyu/
1b2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi na mkha'i mthil na
1b3(rgyud): rab tu bzhugs te/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
1b4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi
2b1(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang /rdzu 'phrul
2b2(rgyud): gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa semyos can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar
2b3(rgyud): byed pa dang /tshe dang /nad med pa dang /dbang phyug dang /yid kyi shing rta yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i rnyog sngags dang /
2b4(rgyud): gau srang sngags kyi gzhi/sems can thams cad lo phan pa'i ched du ba shad kyis/de legs pa ro nyon la legs par yid
2b5(rgyud): la gyis shig/ngas pa sha do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lig so zhes so//de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams
2b6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
3a1(rgyud): ma na no/nga sa sod dang pa ga da nananan pa nang
3a2(rgyud): 'dul bar byed pa/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ngoskor bar byed pa/nyan thos dang rlung sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung
3a3(rgyud): bar byed pa/lha dang mi rnams su skye bar byed pa/sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed po/dbul ba dang nad kyis btab
3a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rnyog sngags dang
3a5(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol//
3a6(rgyud): de bzhini gshogs pa rnams thams cad don med par gsungs par byed pa ma lags ni/bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i
3b1(rgyud): sems dang /bdag cag dang /sems can thams cad la rjesu brtse ba nye bar bzung nas de gsung du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
3b2(rgyud): pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas rnam par dag pa'i yul la 'dra zer
3b3(rgyud): rnam par 'phro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod
3b4(rgyud): spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun tu bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong gos yongasu bskor ba nyid kyis
3b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas po 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang
3b6(rgyud): ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gis bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na/bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rje su zhugs te/
3b7(rgyud): gang du de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon
4a1(rgyud): lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyi thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer
4a2(rgyud): gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal te//kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag
4a3(rgyud): rnams kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig/de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa
4a4(rgyud): spyan gdangs nas/'di'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon par phyogs te ga naso de nas kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
4a5(rgyud): gyi khams chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub
4a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po spyan ris gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to//de nas sems dpa' chen po do stan las longs nas/bcom
4a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
4b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso //bcom ldan 'das dgong gas nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgu tsam pa yang dag pa rgyugasu
4b2(rgyud): s+yAs sa sh+ye rlab pa 'idzin pa der so skye bcom ldan 'das mi mad kyi khams de dang/ ldan ma pa la bsti ba dang /rgyug la ni bsnyen pa
4b3(rgyud): ba dang /rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang /dkyil 'khor gyi tshu ga'i rnyog pa dang /gsung ba'i rus ris kyi chog dang /de sa
4b4(rgyud): ni rig mas kya da pa du sbyin dus sacan nas da kyi ma sa gas//
4b5(rgyud): ldan sa de bzhin ga shi sa du kyi rgyu bsem sems pa rkyen byed sa di sakyi 'du/
4b6(rgyud): sa tshig rjes ldan snru sh+tha/ ltagan dade rgyung mi
4b7(rgyud): sa ma shes skyed pa //de nas pa bcom ldan 'das de na ga shegs pa 'o ga tu midangs kyi tshus sa 'i se myed kyi 'i sag
5a1(rgyud): dbang phyug la bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang //
5a2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi rigs dang /gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /phyag rgya dang /
5a3(rgyud): ras ris kyi cho ga dang /sbyin sreg dang /bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/rin po che snang
5a4(rgyud): ba'i le'u rab 'byam/'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang /gsang sngags la 'jug par byed po ston pa/mthar thug
5a5(rgyud): par zin pa dang /nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang /dam tshig rab 'byam gyi le'u dang /'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/sangs rgyas
5a6(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /'phags pa nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pa dang /spyod pa mthar thug pa
5a7(rgyud): gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la yang /'di la rjesu yi rang ba kho na'o//sems dpa' chen po//da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shog/shAkya thub pa'i
5b1(rgyud): dru ru de la mngon du phyugs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnamag di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyur//'di la yang rtsa ba'i rog sngagasu 'gyur ba ni//na mo rat+na trA yA ya/na ma a ma d+hA tA/
5b2(rgyud): /te thA ga d+hA ya~M/an+d+ra t+ye sam+b+haH bud d+hA ya/nAmra Ar+yA a ba lo ki tai shwarA yA/bi d+ha satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/nI maM b+h+r-i g+h+ra bad+d+haM Ar+yAt+tA d+hA ma~M/bid+h+waM satwA ya/tad+yaSh+TA/
5b3(rgyud): rai raM dzA kA d+harmA nr-i t+ya t+te/d+hu r-i tu tA re/shAn+taM d+harmA nI t+ya te/d+hu r-I An b+hi lA b+ha/d+harma nir+yA taM/tut+tA raM tu re tu re d+hi ni/tra sa ni tra sa ni/oM hwA nau/mai hi nI/dzam+b+ha nI/s+yAm+b+ha ni/br-im+b+ha/tsan+da
5b4(rgyud): pra be he l-i hi li/tsau li tsi li/be ma gau s+t+r-i ma nI/kur+t+ti kur+t+ti mahA kut+k+r-i/d+ha ra d+hur/d+hAn pA ni tA re/hu ru hu ru/ku ru ku ru/a haM yA ya/tsin+ta yAM mi ts+tshin+na d+hi ma ku ru swA
5b5(rgyud): d+hA ya swAhA/'di ni sems dpa' chen pa khyod kyi 'phags me sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs shing /gsung bar
5b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba te/khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar 'gyur ro//mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/shAkya thub pas rjesu gnang ba'o//
5b7(rgyud): 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba yang /na ma rat+na trayU ya/na ma Ar+ya ba lo ke ti shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+d+he sad+d+ha ya/ma hA satwA ya/twA tudz+nyA ra tu ra~M swAt+ma//'di la nye ba'i snying pa
6a1(rgyud): /yang /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na maHsarba bud+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
6a2(rgyud): dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes gnang nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i byang chub kyi snying po kun tu thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya
6a3(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang /steng dang /'og dang /thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad du thams cad
6a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to//rgyal ba'i sras po legaso leg so//gang khyod
6a5(rgyud): kyi ting nge 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi nus te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa sau bcu
6a6(rgyud): lnga rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyems par 'jug par mi nus//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams
6a7(rgyud): kyis thabs gcig byams pa dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcigs
6b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems can thams cad kyis lhas thams cad byed ma/rig sdug sa bzhin rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyes
6b2(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci yang mi gsung bar gyur to//thams
6b3(rgyud): cod du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzegs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid spro sems
6b4(rgyud): kyis rig sngags gsung bar gyur to//na maHsarba bud d+ha nI/oM giH'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
6b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sta nu ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/skyes bu stobs ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa la brkyang ba'am/brkyang
6b6(rgyud): ba las bskum pa dang so gol tog pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed 'dzums pa skad cig ce maM b+his ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
6b7(rgyud): khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de/steng gi na mkha' mothil du nor bu rin po
7a1(rgyud): chen po las sor 'khod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po skad 'khod nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar
7a2(rgyud): byas nas rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin ras
7a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas rnam par phyi ba dang /rin po che'i gdugs du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag
7a4(rgyud): tu khyab pa dang /lha'i gos dang /dar gyi rgyan gyis mdzes par spras pa dang /lha'i me tog dang /ba dan dang /rgyal mtshan dang /phreng ba dang /rin po che g.yer kha'i dra ba
7a5(rgyud): btsongs pa/sgra snyan pa 'khrol pa 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/lha'i dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma'i char 'bebs par
7a6(rgyud): byed pa/mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo char smad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo //de nas
7a7(rgyud): gau nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pa spu zing zhes byed//lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa mthong nas skrag cing /snying 'drar
7b1(rgyud): twe'on te 'byor pa yongasu nyams sam pa zhes phan tshun ring thabasu skad mthon pos smra bar brtson zhing /'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das yongasu skyobs shig/shAkya thub
7b2(rgyud): pa yongasu skyobs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to//mu 'jigs shig/me 'jigs shig/'di ni byang chub sems
7b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzegs dbang phyug/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal
7b4(rgyud): zhing bsnyen bkur bar 'dod do/don chen po spyod pa dang /rig sngags kyi tshig /chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yang nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ong so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
7b5(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis
7b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la//phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la//spyod pa'i don kun srub pa po//phyag 'tshal skyes bu
7b7(rgyud): gtso khyod la//don med thams cad bzlog pa po//phyag 'tshol skyes bu seng gi khyod//ngan song tha mos cad 'joms pa po//dpa' bo chen po khyed phyag 'tshol/bsod nams dri
8a1(rgyud): ni mtha' yas pa//phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyod//srid gsum 'dra ma ni rnam sbyong ba//phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad+ma khyod//sdug bsngal thams cad
8a2(rgyud): rnam grol byed//thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshalo//gdung ba thams cad logs 'dul byed//zhi ba khyod l-i phyag 'tsha lo//sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po//thams cad khyed
8a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//bkra shrIs kun gyi bkra shis pa//bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshalo//chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs//sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal//
8a4(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid//spros pa med pa'i rnam pa ni//yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po//de bzhin gshegs pa khyod phyag 'tshol//shes dang shes bya'i dngos po
8a5(rgyud): kun//legs par byas shing yang dag thos//theg gsum lam dang myang 'das la//rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas po//kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tsha lo//zhes yi
8a6(rgyud): go'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcomo ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas/'di skad ces kyang gsol te//bcom ldan 'das
8a7(rgyud): 'di nas gang gi'i klu brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
8b1(rgyud): du gyur pa der/bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/
8b2(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/tshe dpag tu med pa bzhugs te/de chos ston par
8b3(rgyud): mjed pa ni/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/yongasu dag pa/yongasu byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/yang
8b4(rgyud): dag par ston par mdzad cing de 'di ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzod//rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi spyod pa rnams dang /byang chub sems
8b5(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod dang /lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i lam dang /skyob pa dang /gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang /bde ba dang /shin tu mthar thug pa dang /shin
8b6(rgyud): tu yongasu mthar gtugs pas sems can thams cad la ston te/bcomo ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdzod pas rje su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang /nye ba 'di
8b7(rgyud): 'das te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba chung ngam/ldang ba yang ngam/bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/
9a1(rgyud): bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongasu 'dri bar byed do/'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo //gang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i snying ma'i dus gang du bcom ldan 'das
9a2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i sku de yang ches ston par mdzad cang rjes rtogs par bya ze'i skye ba le lam gsum gyi byung grol dang /ste dang mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed der mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar/
9a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal pa med pa'i sems can gyi cho gos srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug par
9a4(rgyud): 'jug par byed gtan du grub pa dang /bde ba'i rjesu mthun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar ro//bcom ldan 'das
9a5(rgyud): 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung
9a6(rgyud): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul du shes par 'dod pa'am/thug kyi spyad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang /sems
9a7(rgyud): dpa' shes par 'dod pa 'am/mtha' dag nges par ston pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams kyis kyang brjod par yang ga la nus/gang yang de bzhin pa
9b1(rgyud): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa sdus pa dang /so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas chos nyid du lta bar bya ste/mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong ba dang /ring por mi thogs
9b2(rgyud): dar spyod pa smra bar 'dod pa'am/yon tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis/bdag gis ni ma yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
9b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sprul te/rin po che chen po pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa l-i blta bzhin du bzhugs
9b4(rgyud): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyis
9b5(rgyud): rjesu 'brangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar gyi dri bo sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'i don du nye bar
9b6(rgyud): tshogs pa rnams la tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /ka la bing ka dang /ku ta ra dang /bi ta nas bsgrubs pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangasu grags po'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9b7(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/sems dpa' chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas thams
10a1(rgyud): cad kyi byin brlabs sgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad don yang dag par thob par byed pa dang /rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig thams
10a2(rgyud): cad dang /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa dang /phyag rgya dang /dkyil 'khor dang /rtog pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /tshe dang /nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang /bsam pa
10a3(rgyud): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang /sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga'i rgyud dang /shes pa dang shes bya dus kyi mthar nub pa dang /rgyal srid dang /zhing 'das pa dang /
10a4(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba mdor bsdus pa las/sems can thams cad kyis bsdam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang /rang gi yon tan 'byung ba/gsang
10a5(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa'i mthar 'jug par byed pa/sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/mi snad ba dang na mkhar 'gro bar byed pa/rkang pa rab tu brgyus pa/yid bzhungs par
10a6(rgyud): byid pa/'chugs par byed pa/sa 'og tu rab tu 'jug par byed pa/mngon par spyod par byed pa/don thams cad thob pa/'bras bu dang bcas pa gnod sbyin dang gnod
10a7(rgyud): sbyin ma dang /ci bgyi dang /sha za dang /'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/byis pa dang /rgan po dang /lang tsho ji ltar gnas bzhin du gnas par byed pa ste/mdor bsdus
10b1(rgyud): nalas thams cad byed bya/yid kyi shing na thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/rgyas pa can dang /zhi ba can gyis las rab tu byed pa/ji lta ji ltar las rab tu sbyar bar bya bzhin pa/byung
10b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sngo snod dang ldan pa phal po che rtog pa chen po rin po che'i le'u rab 'byams ngas rjesu gnang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/dag pa'i sems can reg
10b3(rgyud): sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don/chos kyi mdzod/skye bo mang po la phan pa'i ched dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du/lha dang mi rnams dang /sems can thams cad la ston
10b4(rgyud): cig/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bskul bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer/
10b5(rgyud): snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can du ma gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /sangs
10b6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi snang bas ji srid 'og min gyi srid pa nas ji srid mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar gyi sems can gang la la sdug bsngal gyi shin tu gdungs
10b7(rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'gro ba rnams zhi ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas thams cad bcom
11a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bskul nas slar yang 'od zer de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor nub par
11a2(rgyud): gyur to//'di la gzhan shar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung
11a3(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bskul bas sgrub pa 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun tu gsal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sman
11a4(rgyud): gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
11a5(rgyud): pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sau la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
11a6(rgyud): dang /ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
11a7(rgyud): pa bai DUr+ya'i snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de lta bu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongasu bskor ba mtha' yas shing
11b1(rgyud): mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sgrol mI d+ha'i chos na gnas pa'i dban/
11b2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang gsang
11b3(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa nges par ston pa'i tshi gi don gyi le'u pha 'byam gsungs pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston par mdzad do//de bzhin du lho dang /nub
11b4(rgyud): dang /byang go phyogs rnamasu/phyogs bral rnamasu zhes pas/steng dang /'og dang thad ka thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu snang bar byas nas sangs
11b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu thams cad du yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad dpa' bkong bar byas te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
11b6(rgyud): dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid lta bar 'dod pa/
11b7(rgyud): mchog gi rig pa'i rjesu spyod pa sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi le'u rab 'byam de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa yang gsal bar byed 'dod pas so sor
12a1(rgyud): 'dod par gyur to//'d-is ste/lan bzang dang /rin chen 'drang po dang /brtul zhugs bzung po dang /spyan bzang po dang /dga' ba bzang po dang /ts+tshas n+d+ha /
12a2(rgyud): dang /dngos grub 'char bzed dang /thams cad 'phags dang /chos 'phags dang /rin chen 'phags dang /rin chen dngol dang /lhun po'i dpal dang /bsam gyis rmi
12a3(rgyud): khyab pa'i dpal dang /'od byed dpal dang /rab snang dpal dang /snang ba'i dpal dang /don thams cad kyi dpal dang /lag na thams cad rin chen dang /gtsug na nor bu
12a4(rgyud): dong /lag ni rin chen dang /leg na lhun po'i rmyil mtshan dang /rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang /rin chen snying pa dang /ye shes snying po dang /don bsam gyis mi khyam
12a5(rgyud): pa'i snying po dang /chos 'phags snying po dang /mchod sbyin tog dang /tog bzang po dang /mthas yas tog dang /'od zer tog dang /dri med tog dang /ma lus tog da //
12a6(rgyud): namakha'i tog dang /rin chen tog dang /'brug sgra dbyings dang /rnga bo che'i dA ro'i rgyal po dang /mtha' yas gsal ba'i ye shes rgyal po dang /mun pa mun nag thams
12a7(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang /rnam par ga yeng ba thams cad 'jom pa'i rgyal po dang /spyod pa thams cad phul du byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang /'jig rten
12b1(rgyud): dang ba rgya lnga po dang /phul du byung ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /rnam par gsol ba'i rgyal po dang /mo g.yo ba'i rgyal po dang /hom+bu'i rgyal po dang /thams cad gsal ba yang dag pa
12b2(rgyud): gas po'i rgyal po dang /rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /dngos po med par yang dag por 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /phyogs lhag pa'i rgyal po dang /rang /
12b3(rgyud): dngos po med par snang ba dang /bsod nams snang ba dang /kun tu lta ba snang ba dang /'od dpag med dang /dpag yod snang ba dang /spyan bzang snang ba dang /legs 'byung snang
12b4(rgyud): dang /mtha' yas snang ba dang /mi tshugs snang ba dang /ma sbyar ba dang /'og min dang /dri med dang /me dang snang ba dang /blo gris dang /rtogs pa dang /bde ba dang /bde ba'i mu khyed dang /
12b5(rgyud): mu khyud kyi tog dang /'dod pa'i lha dang /lha'i lha dang /lte ba rgyas pa dang /'jig rten zhi ba dang /nye ba'i 'tshe ba lta sa dang /rdob rgyu dang sgrub pa dang /dkar por grags pa dang
12b6(rgyud): lha rab tu bzod dka' la gdul dka' ba dang /gsal dka' ba dang /ring du song ba dang /ring por len dang /ring por gnas dang /many+dzu zhi bri ba'i mun pa dang /mkha' snang dang /
12b7(rgyud): kun nas snang dang /snang mi ni dang /khyu mchog dang /kun nas snang ldan dang /nges par mnyam pa dang /rgya chen po dang /shin tu ngas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /dri ma mthar thug par /
13a1(rgyud): mnyam pa'i mtshan ma bzang po dang /kar po dang /oM la~M ka mi dang /thu chung dang /ka' bas 'tsho ba dang /bde bar 'tsho ba dang /legs par skyes pa dang /du
13a2(rgyud): ba'i tog dang /mchod sbyin tog dang /dkar po'i tog dang /tog bzang po dang /dbyig gi tog dang /nor dgag tu med pa dang /pha chen po dang /do shal phyed pa dang /dzo
13a3(rgyud): rten grags pa dang /kun tu grags pa dang /chen por grags pa dang /mchog tu grags pa dang /skyes pa dang /snang ba dang /ci bgyi dang /mnyam par byed pa dang /'jig rten
13a4(rgyud): byed pa dang /snang ba byed pa dang /nyin mor byed pa dang /'byung bar byed pa dang /de na thams cad byed pa dang /grub par byed pa dang /'od byed pa dang /kun tu gsal bar byed
13a5(rgyud): pau dang /rnga bo che'i dbyings dang /sgra dbyung so dang /dbyangs bzang dang /mtha' yas dbyangs dang /tog gi dbyings dang /'byung ba'i thub pa dang /gle ser thub dang /log
13a6(rgyud): par dad sel dang /'od srung dang /gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyob dang /rnam par gzigs dang /shAkya thub po zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang /sangs rgyas
13a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gzhan mang po rnams kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshon po kun tu snang bar byas nas pad+ma'i gdan la so sor bzhugs par gyur to//de ltar byang chub
13b1(rgyud): soms dpa'i tshogs de rnams kyang bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/phyag na rin chen dang /phyag na rdo rje dang /phyag na bzang po dang /num kha'i phyag dang /mtha' yas phyag dang /sa'i phyag dang /snang
13b2(rgyud): ba'i phyag dang /shin tu dri med dang /bzang po brtsegs po dang /mang po brtsegs pa dang /nor bu brtsegs pa dang /rin chen brtsegs pa dang /an brtsegs pa dang /rin chen glang po
13b3(rgyud): dang /kun nas glang po dang /spos kyi glang po dang /bzang 'gro dang /dri ma dang bral bar 'gro ba dang /'jig rten 'gro ba dang /mdzes par 'gro ba dang /mtha' yas 'gro ba dang /mtha'
13b4(rgyud): yas blags pa dang /legs grags dang /dri ma dang bral bar grags pa dang /'gro bar grags pa dang /dri med glegs pa dang /grags pa'i mgon po dang /mgon med kyi mgon
13b5(rgyud): por gyur pa dang /'jig rten mgon po dang /kun nas mgon po dang /rgyun bshes kyi bu dang /mtha' yas bshes kyi bu dang /kun tu bshes kyi bu dang /byams ma'i bu dang /
13b6(rgyud): mig bzang gyi bu dang /phyag 'tshal bshes kyi bu dang /t+ka Sha tI'i bu dang /'bras pa shes kyi bu dang /rIn chen bshes kyi bu dang /skyabs gsum bshes kyi bu dang /theg
13b7(rgyud): gsum bshes kyi bu dang /mthu bsgyings dang /shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /yid 'ong ldan dang /chos kyi dbang phyug dang /dngos po med pa'i dbang phyug dang /kun nas dbang
14a1(rgyud): klu /'ag tan dang phyug dang /spyo dang smyogs dang du dang /pogs gtsugs dang phyug da/rnam gzigs dpang phyug dang /
14a2(rgyud): dren phyu/mchod pa zang po dang /drug klo padebang rkyen dang /nga pa'i dbang phyug dung/ rjes dang /cher bzang ba dang /mcho
14a3(rgyud): bzed po dang /grags ldan dang /nyi ma'i 'di dang /rab tu skyes pa la gnas pa dang /zla ba'i dang phyug dang /saM b+ha'i zla ba dang /zla ba nyid dang /mtha' yas dngul da /rgyun
14a4(rgyud): rgyu dang la dang /'dzeg rten dpal dang /namakha'i dpal dang /na mkha'i kun sbyang dang /nim pa'i mdzod dang /sa'i dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen blo dang /sa'i myi
14a5(rgyud): skyob pa med pa dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /kun tu bzang po dang /bzung skyong dang /nong brdung dang /legs par kun sdud dang /lo thog kun 'gyed pa'i
14a6(rgyud): namakha' dang /nam pa'i snying po dang /do ni kun rtogs pa dang /thams cad 'byung dang /ldog bya min pa dang /mi ldog pa dang /dran seng bzid dang /rnam par bsgyud me dang /
14a7(rgyud): /shes rnam 'grel dang /gnang thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thongs /
14b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyod yul du sgrol ma'i gru la bzhugs par gyur to//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gan
14b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i don mtha' yas pa sgrib po sems can mtha' yas pa dag gi bsam pa rnam par 'jug par byed pa'i lam la rab tu gan su 'jug pa'i bya ba
14b3(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig sngags kyi gzhi d+hA su 'dzin par byed pa sman gyi cha byed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams dang /mdab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /gnod sbyin do/
14b4(rgyud): srin po dang /nor bu dang /sngags dang rin po che'i rgyal po dang /sems can dang /sems can ma yin pa grangs med pa thams cad kun du 'jug cing sems can gyi spyod pa'i rje sa 'jug
14b5(rgyud): rnams dang /bsam pa ji lta bas sems can 'dul ba de lta bu'i rje su 'jug pa rnams dang /de dag so so'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang /reg pa'i rgyal po'i
14b6(rgyud): bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos nges par 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang /pad+ma dang /rdo rje dang 'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad la kun tu 'jug pa'i dam
14b7(rgyud): tshig gi rim pa las 'da' bar mi bya bar tshig gi lam la rab tu gnas par byed cing /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par byed pa rnams te/'di lta ste/gtsug tor mngon snga
15a1(rgyud): //'phags pa dang /gu gA sa / mngon par 'phags pa dang /lo ma mtha' yam+b+ha dang /lo ma brgya pA dang /gtsug tor rgyal ba dang /mngon par 'phags pa
15a2(rgyud): btsu ka tor dang /pad+ma'i 'od zer dang /ser gyi 'od zer dang /'od zer dA/ra po dang /gtsug tor bkod pa dang /gsor gyi phung po dang /dkar po'i phung po dang /gzi brjid phung po
15a3(rgyud): dang /nor du'i phung po dang /kun nas phung ba dang /rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang /'byung ba'i phung po dang /bden pa'i phreng ba dang /dngos po med pa'i phung po dang /mye nir ba
15a4(rgyud): de nin nyid kyi phung ba ste/ rnams dang /gzhan yid gtsug tor b+hi d+hA ba chos kyi dpyis mtha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa semyas can+da rnams lci bsam pa ji lta
15a5(rgyud): bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yongasu bskong bar byed pa/skye bo thams cad kyi yid kyi bsam po rtogs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis kyang mi nus pa'i gtsug tong
15a6(rgyud): rgyal ba ni mkha'i mthar theg pa brjod pa pasam gyis ste khyob pa'i stobs dang /pha rol gnon pa'i bdag nyid chen po lta bur ston par 'dod pas mtha' dag rgyus par bshad pa
15a7(rgyud): las mdor bsdus nas bsten par bye ste/rigs pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis 'dus pa bshad par bya ba 'di lta ste/mdzad pa dang /smin ma dang /spyan dang /rdzi ma dang /snyan dang /
15b1(rgyud): mgrin pa dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /snying rje dang /byams pa dang /brtse ba'i tshim pa dang /shes rab dang /'od zer dang /sems dpa' dang /'od zer dri ma med dang /chos gos te 'di rnams
15b2(rgyud): dang /gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal po mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas spros pa rnams 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed dang /chos kyi 'khor
15b3(rgyud): lo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims cha dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang /de
15b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i many+dzu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /de bzhin gshegs/
15b5(rgyud): pa'i tog dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ste 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags gsung ba rnams te/rigs pa'i rgyal po dang /rgyal mo dang /ci bgyi
15b6(rgyud): dang /bran pho dang /bran mo dang /phro nya dang /pho nya mo dang /gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /sems can sems can min pa so sor khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i chos
15b7(rgyud): kyi sprin nges par spros pa/ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis rgyu 'thun pa bye ba brgya stong phrog tshad med pas yongasu bskor ba/rig pa'i tshe gos thams cad gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug
16a1(rgyud): /bzhin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul der rigs bzang por lhag par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to//rnyog pa
16a2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bcu gnyis dang /phyag drug pa dang /phyag bzhi pa dang /hA la dz+wA la dang /de ni yod zhags pa dang /rta mgrin dang /mgrin pa
16a3(rgyud): mtha' yas dang /mgrin pa sngon po dang /mgrin pa bzang po dang /mgul bzang dang /mgrin dkar dang /mgron sngon dang /'jig rten mgrin pa dang /rnam par gzigs
16a4(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug dang /'od zer stong 'dud dang /rnam par grags pa'i yid dang /pad+ma'i phyag dang /yid kyi shing rta dang /tshig 'byin pa po dang /rab tu bzhed pa dang /sgra
16a5(rgyud): bzangs dang /sgra mtha' dang /rgyu skar dang /rgyu skar rgyal po dang /zla ba'i bu dang /skal bzang dang /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /mtha' yas rnam
16a6(rgyud): rgyul dang /lha les rnam rmyi la dang /'dod pa phrin mogus byed dang /legs par 'dul ba dang /'dul ba pa zhes pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal po chu
16a7(rgyud): skyes gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams kyis chos kyi sprin gyi rgyu 'thun par mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gyur pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig du ma'i rig pas
16b1(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal mo du ma dang /'jig rten dbang phyug dang su'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par spros pa du ma rnams la 'di lta ste/sgrol ma dang /bsam pa'i sgrol ma dang
16b2(rgyud): gar ma dang /khro gnyer can ma dang /oM nud+d+hA nI dang /lo TI dang /sa thob par byed pa dang /dri ma dang /bral ba dang /dkar mo dang /dkar shaMm me dang /dkar sham chen mi dang /
16b3(rgyud): gos dkar mo dang /'jig rten gos ma dang /dri med gos ma dang /byang chub yon lag gi gos ma dang /chu skyes gos ma dang /stobs bcu gos ma dang /grags ldan ma dang /longs
16b4(rgyud): spyod ldan ma dang /longs spyad tshe ldan ma dang /ur+d+ha kA dang /Shal+yA kr-I dang /dri med mthar byed ma dang /dri bral mthar byed ma dang /kun tu mthar byed ma dang /sdug bsngal mthar byed
16b5(rgyud): mo dang /'byung po mthar byed ma dang /dpal mo dang /dpal chen mau dang /mthar dpal dang /stod pa'i dpal dang /'jig rten dpal dang /rnam par grags pa'i dpal dang //
16b6(rgyud): 'jig rten yum dang /kun tu yum dang /sangs rgyas yum dang /srin mo dang /skal ldan shing rta ma dang /shing rta bzang mo dang /shing rta ldan mra dang /klu 'dul ma dang /'dul
16b7(rgyud): byed ma dang /'byung po ldan ma dang /dpag med mo dang /longs spyod stobs ma dang /'gugs byed ma dang /'od zer rmad byung me dang /ro bzeng mo dang /tshang ldan ma dang /rab tu
17a1(rgyud): 'bum dang /mchod ldan ma dang /'gram m+b+ha dang /kun tu 'gram m+b+ha dang /skar+ya 'odam dang /zla ba ma dang /zla ba ldan ma dang /rma bya ma dang /nags ldan ma
17a2(rgyud): dang /nor sbyin ma dang /chang ldan ma dang /'jig rten ldan ma dang /'od 'phro sngon ma dang /sbyong du chen mo dang /tshe ldan ma dang /legs pa de rgyas byed ma dang /legs par dge ma
17a3(rgyud): dang /dbyig sbyin ma dang /dpel mo dang /dgra ldan ma dang /nad mthar byed ma dang /nad thams cad gso byed ma dang /nad med lha mo dang /grags byed ma dang /dbang byed ma dang /
17a4(rgyud): myur byed ma dong /bde sbyin ma dang /bkra shis ma dang /bkra shis thob byed dga' ma dang /zla ba bzang mo dang /zla ba ldan ma zhes bya ba 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang rig pa
17a5(rgyud): rgyal mo ri khrod lo ma tsan dang /dug sol ma dang /yid las byung ba la sogs pa rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa thams
17a6(rgyud): cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag pa skyes pa yid las byung ba rnams te pho nya dang /pho nya mo dang /bran po dang /phan mo dang /ci bgyid ding /ci brgya
17a7(rgyud): mo dang /gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /srin po dang /srin mo dang /sha za dang /sha za mo pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig le rjesu 'jug pa gsang sngags rnam par spyod pa
17b1(rgyud): rnams gang gis 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa bdag pa'i sems can nges par 'khod pa des rab tu gnas par byed pas rab tu gnas te rang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu
17b2(rgyud): pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nye bar legs der gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi
17b3(rgyud): rig pa'i cho ga la bos por gyur te/'dir 'dus par gyur pa/khyed rnams ni rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor khro bo'i rgyal po dang /rgyal mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis pho nya
17b4(rgyud): mo chen mo dran pa tsam nyid kyis rig pa'i cho gas thams cad 'dus pa rnams 'di lta ste/rig pa mchog dang /rig pa bzang po dang /legs par grub pa dang /dpung bzang dang /
17b5(rgyud): sde bzang dang /lha mthar byed dang /so bzang dang /gad ba bzang po dang /rdo rje'i sde dang /rdo rje'i mtha' dang /rdo rje'i lhag pa dang /rdo rje'i dpung pa dang /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /rdo rje'i
17b6(rgyud): bden dang rdo rje'i spyod yul dang /rdo rje mgo bo 'chang dang /rdo rje mche ba dang /dge pa'i rdo rje dang /rdo rje'i spu dang /rdo rje mchod pa dang /rdo rje du ma dang /rdo rje go cha dang /rdo rje mgrin pa dang
17b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsung ba dang /rdo rje lte ba dang /rdo rje mtha' dang /rdo rje gur dang /rdo rje ra ba dang /rdo rje mtshon cha dang /rdo rje gzhu dang /rdo rje mda' dang /rdo rje lcags mda' dang /rdo rje mtshan
18a1(rgyud): ma dang /rdo rje dgyes pa dang /rdo rjes 'og dang /rdo rje 'jigs spyan dang /rdo rje nor mtha' dang /rdo rje khro bo dang /chu'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang /'byung po'i
18a2(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang /khro bo chen po'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang /dbang phyug chen po'i yid du 'ong ba'i de ro dang /sbyin pa'i bu'i yid du 'ong da ro dang /rig pa tha~Md
18a3(rgyud): kyi yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang /drug po dang /shin tu drag po dang /'phen pa dang /nye bar 'phen pa dang /rtag tu 'phen pa dang /'dul ba'i mtha'i 'phen pa dang /shin tu
18a4(rgyud): rnam bkod 'phen pa dang /'tshol bar 'phen pa dang /stobs dang /stobs po che dang /legs 'byung gsod byed dang /b+h+r-i gi ri TI dang /khro bo dang /khro bo chen po dang /
18a5(rgyud): mi rgas pa dang /mi gnyid pa dang /gdung ba'i dbyangs dang /klu'i mtha' dang /dbyug chu dang /dra byug pa sngon po dang /lus sbyin dang /lus dmar rdo dang /rdo rje'i
18a6(rgyud): dbyug pa dang /sprin dang /sprin chen dang /nag po dang /nag po brtsegs pa dang /sna tshogs nad dang /thams cad 'phen pa po dang /'dung dang /'dud chen po dang /
18a7(rgyud): nyam thag pa dang /nyam thag pa chen po dang /dus mthar byed pa dang /gnod sbyin nag po dang /drag po dang /drag po'i gzugs dang /rtse gsum kha gdengs pa dang /
18b1(rgyud): mda' bo che dang /be tson rab 'joms dang /za ba sdud pa'i dpa' bo dang /dus kyi mtha' nyi ma dang /srog 'phrog pa dang /sgra 'joms pa dang /zhe sdang mi 'dzin pa dang /'khyil pa
18b2(rgyud): dang /'khyil ba min pa dang /mtha' yas 'khyil ba dang /khrag 'khyil pa dang /dpung pa dang /dpung ba chen po dang /gdug pa'i nad chen po dang /me dpal dang /mdze tha~Md
18b3(rgyud): las rgyal ba dang /'bros pa dang /rnam par 'bros pa po dang /de bzhin rnam 'bros dang /za ba po dang /tshim med 'tshol ba/zhes pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang rig pa'i
18b4(rgyud): rgyal po khro bo chen po rnams kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gdul ba dang /skrod pa dang /gzhig pa dang /dgag pa dang /gsod pa dang /rnam par 'joms pa
18b5(rgyud): dang /pha dang /zas rnams gter bar byed pa dang /zhi ba can dang /rgyas pa can dang /mngon spyod can gyi las rnams shin tu sbyor bar byed pa po rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig
18b6(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma rnams kyis yongasu bskor ba/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges pa
18b7(rgyud): sems pas rang gi rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje'i rigs skyong ba la phyag 'tshal te gnang ba nos nA rang gi rigs la gnas par byed cing gnas pas rang rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to//
19a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phul ba'i pho nya mo rig pa'i rgyu la khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yongasu bskor ba yang rang chos kyi dbyings nam/
19a2(rgyud): rang bzhin spros pa med pa la dmigs naso gnas der 'dus par gyur pa 'di lta ste/'og pag me dang /'og pagam bzang mo dang /lu gu rgyud ma dang /rdo rje 'od dang /rdo rje'i rtse/
19a3(rgyud): ma dang /rdo rje'i smin ma dang /rdo rje'i spyan dang /rdo rje'i lte baM dang /rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang /rdo rje sbyin ma dang /rdo rje mo ma dang /rdo rje khab mo dang /rdo rje khu tshu ma da /rdo rje
19a4(rgyud): kyu ma dang /rdo rje ral gri ma dang /rdo rje thog ma dang /rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /sA la ldan ma dang /sA la be+e ri TI me dang /mchog tu byed ma dang /'dod ldan ma dang /rdo rje 'dod
19a5(rgyud): ldan ma dang /'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang /mthong can ma dang /mthing ldan ma dang /mthong ba chen mo dang /rtse mo'i gos ma dang /phug len ma dang /phug ldan ma dang /phug
19a6(rgyud): gnas ma dang /sgo gnas ma dang /'dod pa rdo rje ma dang /yid mgyogs ma dang /mi 'pham mgyogs ma dang /myur mgyogs ma dang /spyan bzang ma dang /chang gnas ma
19a7(rgyud): dang /rung ba ma dang /bung ba las byung ba ma dang /mchod sbyin grub ma dang /rlung ma dang /gang ba'i gos ma dang /smug bzang ma dang /hoN+Da ni dang /bsdigs mdzub ma dang /
19b1(rgyud): pho nya mo dang /pho nya bzang mo dang /mA ma ki dang /g.yon pa ma dang /gzugs can ma dang /rgyal ma dang /rnam par rgyal ma dang /gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /dge logs ma dang /
19b2(rgyud): bzhad ldan ma dang /bzhad pa'i rdo rje me dang /'jig rten ldan ma dang /grags ldan ma dang /rdo rje ldan ma dang /ma dul mo dang /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed ma dang /dbyug ma
19b3(rgyud): ma dang /dbyug pa chen mo dang /snyan par smra ba ldan ma dang /skal bzang nyid ldan ma dang /doni ldan ma dang don chen ldan ma dang /gong ma sreg ma dang /dkar mo dang /shin tu sbrul
19b4(rgyud): ma dang /shin tu dri med ma dang /dril bu ma dang /ral gri ma dang /rtse gsum kha gdengs ma dang /khams ma dang /rgyal byed ma dang /gos ma dang /phyag 'tshal ma dang /ming tsan
19b5(rgyud): ma dang /gsang ba me dang /dbyug 'byin ma dang /btu ni shing ma dang /pho nya mo thams cad dbang byed ma zhes pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang pho nya mo tshon mo//po nya mo du ma'i tshogs
19b6(rgyud): kyis yongasu bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid du 'dus par gyur to//ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu 'thun pa yongasu sgom pa'i yid las byung ba gzungs ma du ma'i gdug
19b7(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams tshar gcod cing chad pas gcod pa 'di lta ste/rdo rje'i mo rab tu rmongs par byed pa'i gzungs ma dang /ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs ma
20a1(rgyud): dang /rin chen rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs ma dang /sa 'dzin ma dang /logs par brtsegs ma dang /chad pa'i gzungs ma dang /char gcod pa'i gzung
20a2(rgyud): ma dang /dgug pa'i gzungs ma dang /dpung brgyan ma dang /dpung rgyan ldan ma dang /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang /rin chen ne mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang /'jig rten
20a3(rgyud): mo'i dpung rgyun ma dang /ba dan rtse mo'i dpung brgyan ma dang /gsum 'khyil ma dang /'jig rten 'khyil ma dang /spyod 'khyil ma dang /nyi ma'i bu 'khyil ma dang /'byung po kun
20a4(rgyud): 'khyil ma dang /tog ldan ma dang /rin chen ldan ma dang /nor bu rin tshun btsug ma dang /byang chubo yan lag gi stobs dang ldan ma dang /mtha' yas tog dang /kun tu rtog
20a5(rgyud): dang /rin chen tog dang /rnam par grags pa'i tog dang /'byung po thams cad kyi ga dang /mi 'pham ldan ma dang /gos shin tu dri med ma dang /gdong drug ma do'i/
20a6(rgyud): bral mya dang /'jig rten grags ma zhes pa 'di dag dang /gzhan yang gzungs ma brgya stong phrag bye ba du mas yo su bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid du 'dus par
20a7(rgyud): myur to//sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan sangs rgyas kyis
20b1(rgyud): rnam ra spangs pa na rang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gse ru lta bu dang /tshogs dang spyad pa rnams sems can rnams kyis don mdzad pa ni cang mi gsung bar gyur pa lhag par gnas pas/
20b2(rgyud): chos kyi tshul yang dag par ston pa/de 'khor ba'i rje su 'jug pa rtag tu yid skyo bo rgyu la snying rje chen po spangs shing ma 'dres pa'i sems kyi bag chags kyis yongasu bsgos pa/sngon byung
20b3(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed pa/yong su bsgos pa'i sems nges sa gcig dang /sa gnyis dang /sa gsum dang /ji srid byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i bar la yid mo 'jug pa/'khor bas
20b4(rgyud): yid skyo zhing /'jigs shing 'jigs pa dang ldan pa de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus par gyur to//spros dri len dang /kun nas skye mched dang /kun tu 'od dang /tsan+dan
20b5(rgyud): dang /dus dang /mu khyud dang /nye ba'i mu khyud dang /'chi bltas dang /nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /logs bzang po dang /rnga bo che dang /nye ba'i rnga bo che dang /'jig rten grags pa dang /'jig
20b6(rgyud): rten 'od dang /rgyal byed dang /rdul med dang /nye ba'i rdul dang /cha shas dang /nye ba'i cha shes dang /mtshan ma dang /mtshan me bzang po dang /nyin mor byed pa dang /legs byed 'od
20b7(rgyud): ldan dang /'od byed dang /'jig rten byed pa dang /rnam thos dang /legs thos dang /mdzes sdug dang /legs 'dzin mtha' dang /dul mdzes dang /mtha' yas mtha' dang /sred
21a1(rgyud): mama' dang /rtog dkur po dang /mtshan ma'i rtog dang /rtog pa nye ba'i tog dang /rgyal dang /pad+ma'i bla ma dang /pad+ma'i 'byung dang /rang 'byung dang /skyes pa dang /
21a2(rgyud): yid bong dang /yid las byung dang /dbang chen dang /brtsegs par grags pa dang /bum pa dang /mtho' dag spyan dang /bde byed dang /phan byed dang /zhi ba dang /zhi ba'i yid dang
21a3(rgyud): chos dang /nye ba'i chos dang /rnam par snang byed dang /me tog dang /legs sngo dang /dpal ldan dang /gnyen los thag reng byed pa dang /bzod par dka' ba dang /gser dang /dri
21a4(rgyud): med tog dang /zla ba dang /nye ba'i zla ba dang /sde bzang dang /legs par sbyangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /'dod pa dang /nye dbong dang /nor lha zhes pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang
21a5(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhol gyis mi lang ba smon pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i rang bzhin spros pa med cing 'dus ma byas pa
21a6(rgyud): theg pa 'bring lo rab tu zhugs shing nges par gtan te gnas pa rjesu chags pa dang /khong khro ba dang bral ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa dang thabs
21a7(rgyud): gcig tu bzhugs par gyur to//nyan thos brgya stong phrag bye ba du mas yongasu bskor ba'i nyen thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig pa 'di lta ste/'od srung chen po dang /chu
21b1(rgyud): rlung 'ong srung dang /gA ya 'od srung dang /lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /b+hA ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /shA ra /
21b2(rgyud): buM dang /shA ri'i bu chen po dang /sna tshogs mdzes dang /rab 'byor dang /rab 'byor chen po dang /ba lang bdag dang /ka t+ya'i bu dang /ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang /nye bar 'khor dang /
21b3(rgyud): bzang ldan dang /ka pi na dang /dga' bo dang mdzes dga'o dang /nyo dga' dang /rna bo bye ba ri ba dang /'jig rten 'byung ba dang /mtha' yas 'byung ba dang /yid 'ong ba dang /nye ba
21b4(rgyud): yid 'ong ba dang /dga' ldan dang /nye ba'i dga' ldan dang /ma 'gags pa dang /rtsa ba kun tu gang ba dang /nye bar gang ba dang /rgyal dang /nam so dang /ru ru dang /grag po'i bu dang /
21b5(rgyud): ru ru'i bu dang /ku ru dang /lngas rtsan dang /nye ba'i lngas rtsen dang /dus dang /mnyam pa'i dus dang /lha 'dzin dang /sgra gcan 'dzin dang /ljang sngo dang /nye ba'i ljang sngo dang /bsam
21b6(rgyud): bya dang /dga' ba sems pa po dang /'char ka dang /nye ba'i 'char ka dang /dpal ldan dang /ka dwa'i bu dang /gyad kyi bu dang /nyer rdzas ldan dang /dum bu dang /rgyal ba dang /1
21b7(rgyud): rgyal dang /rgyal chen po dang /kun tu rgyal dang /'bod pyod dang /gags sbyin dang /grags ldan dang /nor can dang /nor gyi rgya mtsho dang /nye ba'i nor can dang /pe'i rdzi'i bu
22a1(rgyud): la ka dang /'bras bu dang /nye ba'i 'bras bu dang /mtha' yas 'bras bu dang /'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /gzhon nu dang /gzhon nu 'od srung dang /cher
22a2(rgyud): sbyin dang /bcu drug sde pa'i dga' byed dang /nye ba'i dga' byed dang /yon por yo ba dang /rgyal ba'i zhags pa dang /dbugs 'byin chen po dang /be'u'i bu dang /ku ru kul+le dang
22a3(rgyud): gro zhin skyes rna ba byi ba ri ba dang /khrag pha rol gyi mthar byed pa dang /gang ga'i bu dang /ri'i rna ba can dang /nye ba'i ze ba dang /dbyar can dang /snang ba dang /mdzes par snang ba dang /
22a4(rgyud): dpel spos dang /'jig rten sbas pa dang /bla ma sbas pa dang /snang ba la dga' ba dang /zhi bye dang /byis pa dang /nye ba'i byis pa dang /bye ba nyi shu pa dang /mgon med sbyin dang /
22a5(rgyud): nye ba'i 'jug pa dang /ldog pa dang /smyo byed dang /kun tu 'od dang /mtsho bzang dang /legs pa dang /rab sad dang /legros 'ongs dang /nyer 'ongs dang /nyer 'gro dang //
22a6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'gro dang /sdug bsngal mthar byed dang /bskal pa bzang po dang /chen po bzang ldan dang /don spyod pa dang /pha chen po dang /'gro ldan dang /rgyal skyong dang /rgyal
22a7(rgyud): dang /gsal ldan dang /nye ba'i gsal ldan dang /sman chen po dang /gzi brjid chen po dang /lha mtshams dang /sgrub byed dang /tshogs can dang /tshangs pa bzang po dang //
22b1(rgyud): mdzes ma bzang dang /'jig rten bzang dang /mnyam pa dang /yang dag gzhal ba zhos pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rnam par grol ba'i ro'i ro myong ba/
22b2(rgyud): theg pa gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa//theg pa chung ngu'i lam kun tu thob pa/'khor ba las bros pa//rnam par zlar po'i lam gsum gyi bsam gtan bsam lo tshangs pa'i/
22b3(rgyud): gnas bzhi'i spyod lam la snyoms par zhugs pa/legs par mnyam par bzhag pa/legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/legs pa'i tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
22b4(rgyud): dbyings la mnyam par 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid spros pa med pa blo gros can rnams thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sa bcu
22b5(rgyud): pa'o bar ma chad pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gnasu gnas pa dang thibs gcig tu de rnams kyang der kun tu 'khod par gyur to//nyan thos ma chen mo mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la
22b6(rgyud): rab tu mnyam par 'jug pas rab tu zhugs pa du ma rnams kyang /'dus ma byas kyi lam gyi theg pa la dmigs pa dag cing 'dod chags dang bral ba kun nas snang ba kun tu thob pa
22b7(rgyud): sbyin par bya ba'i zhing ga yon tan 'dzin cing rnam par skyong ba bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/'jig rten mchog gi bdag mo lhas mchod pa bsod nam
23a1(rgyud): k+Sha zhing /rkang gnyis pa dang /rkang gzhi pa dang /rkang mangs dang /rkang med kyi sems can thams cad kyi mchog gi bdag mo rnams la 'di lta ste/grAdas/
23a2(rgyud): 'dzin ma dang /brags sbyin ma dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo chenu mo dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo legs skyes ma dang /dga' mo dang /sbom dga' mo dang /mdzes dga' ma dang /
23a3(rgyud): sems pa mo dang /mdzes ma dang /mtha' yas ma dang /yid kyi shing rto ma dang /rgyal ldan ma dang /dpal mo dang /nye ba'i dpal mo dang /lha mo dang /legs lha mo dang /
23a4(rgyud): legs dpal ma dang /dpal ma dang /rab spyod ma dang /rab dga' mo dang /snyan par sgyu ma dang /snar ma ma dang /yul 'khor srung ma dang /srung ma dang /rje bo ma dang
23a5(rgyud): phun tshogs ma dang /lus can ma dang /pad+ma mo dang /dga' ma dang /ral pa ma dang /nye ba'i ral pa mi dang /kun nas ral pa ma dang /'byung ba ma dang /snang ldan ma dang /
23a6(rgyud): yid 'gyogs ma dang /sgra ldan ma dang /khyab 'jug len ma dang /khyab 'jug ldan ma dang /yid bzangs ma dang /yid myangs ma dang /dpal ldan ma dang /sdug bsngal
23a7(rgyud): mthar thug ma dang /las sbyin ma dang /los 'bras ma dang /rnam rgyal ma dang /rgyal ldan ma dang /nor bdag ma dang /nor sbyin ma dang /chos sbyin ma dang /legs sbyin
23b1(rgyud): ma dang /rab rna ma dang /a mra ma dang /grags pa 'jug ma dang /yid ldan ma dang /rab bzhad ma dang /srid gsum mthar byed ma dang /'khor gsum mthar byed ma dang /sdug bsngal
23b2(rgyud): ba mo dang /yid 'byung ma dang /laM ma gsum pa dang /pad+ma'i lo ma dang /pad+ma ldan ma dang /pad+ma'i 'od ma dang /dka' bzlog rkang spyod ma dang /dka' bzlog rkang spyod ldan mi dang /'dab
23b3(rgyud): gsum ma dang /'dab bdun ma dang /ut+pa la'i mdog ma zhes pa 'di dag dang /gzhan yang granas brtan ma chen mo//nyan thos ma chen mo rnams/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
23b4(rgyud): drung du phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur te//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu mthong bar 'dod
23b5(rgyud): nas 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te chos nyan pa'i phyir dang /sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub pa la brtson par 'dod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bcom
23b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas lhag pa'i bsam pa rig pa dang /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin namakha'i ngo bo sems can gyi khams gsum las yang
23b7(rgyud): dge par 'das pa mkhyen nas sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi don gyi spyod pa la so sor soms shig/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
24a1(rgyud): du mngon par 'dod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan pa/sngangs kyi spyod pa'i don yang dag par thob pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshig dang /zhi ba
24a2(rgyud): tshig dang /thar pa'i tshig dang /rtog pa'i sgrub pa dang /rnam par rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid thob par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu kun gyi stobs dang /bdud
24a3(rgyud): kyi stobs thams cad zil gyi gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskams shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu
24a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs par gyur to//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag
24a5(rgyud): tu/ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang dag par rab tu g.yos de snang ba chen po gsal bar byas nas/rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
24a6(rgyud): skyed pa ston par gyur cing /rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang gsungs par gyur te//rtog pa'i sngags rnams kyi sngags du ma/thun mong pa cig gis rim pa las ma
24a7(rgyud): 'dob par 'byung ba ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha maM a b+hA ba// b+ha gse mung+ge/tA nAM na maHpra t+ye ka bud rgya Ar+ya shA ba kI nAM/na mo be d+hi satwA nAn/da sha b+hU mi pra mi
24b1(rgyud): pre tASh+Tha te sha raN+Da bo d+hA saHnAM/maH s+yAt+ka nAM/mAhA sar+b+banAM/t+yAd+yaH/oM kha kha//ShA ho/duSh+Ta sat+kA/da ma ka aste/mu sa la bA rA shu/prA sho/hasta/tsat+ta mu
24b2(rgyud): Sh+ThAHdz+haiM raN/g+hAr+dz+dza gats+tsha/mahA bin+d+ha/bits+tshin tA kaM/bkr-i trU na ma sarba b+hU ta/b+hU ya~M kai raM/in+dan+ta/dA sanA da nA~M/b+hAg+h+na tsin+dan d+h+waMs ni/kuru g+hu dz+ra sarbaM kar+g+hASh+Tha
24b3(rgyud): ts+tshin+dats+tshan+da/bin+naHn+te/sar+ya mudrA/ U/R+ShA/b+h+ye d+h+waMH/ni rmaHnaM/sarba duSh+Ta/br-i be sha yaM/mair+d+halAM rad+b+h+yAM/ba~M dA si tadz+nyAM baM tAnAM d+h+waM ka rai ku ru ku r+tha ma
24b4(rgyud): k+ShaR+She/de ha da ha/bats+tsha pa tsaM/mA bi lam+ba sa me ya ma nu s+the hUM hUM phaT/s+pho Ta ya spr-i Ta ya/sarba U shwA pa raM pu ra ka/te tre b+ha ga bAn/kauny+tsi rA ya sa ma ma/saH
24b5(rgyud): ing+ku s+yA d+ha ya swA hA//'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol mo'i khro bo chen po sgrol mas gnon pa zhes bya ba gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed cing thob par byed pa/
24b6(rgyud): dbang po dang gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'gugs par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin na sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs mya
24b7(rgyud): thag tu sems can thams cad nyam thag cing 'dzeg so sgeg ste yid skyo zhing sgreng gas par gyur nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po
25a1(rgyud): ma gtags bsgrubs gzhan med/skyob pa gzhan med/dpung gnyan gzhan med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar lhags par gyur to//de nas
25a2(rgyud): gang la las la spyod pa dang /mtha' la spyod pa dang /brtan pa dang /g.yo ba dang /mngal skyes dang /sgong skyes dang /dred ga sher skyes dang /brdzes te skyes pa sems can gyi
25a3(rgyud): grangasu gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa na rnam par gnas po skyed dang /'og dang /thad ka dang /phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams skad cig de da
25a4(rgyud): yud tsam de la gab pa rnams khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos skad cig la 'drar bkug par gyur to//khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub byar gyur pa 'dri 'dod chags dang ma bral bar gyur pa
25a5(rgyud): rnams kyis mdun du bzlas par mi bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ram/skam par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//de tshig byin gyis brlabs nas/sangs rgyas kyi
25a6(rgyud): sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nAm/dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan snga ru bzlas brjod
25a7(rgyud): bya'i/las gzhon gyi ched du'am/gang yang rung ba der klog par mi bya ste/ci'i phyir na ltas ngan chen po dang /mya ngan chen po dang /bdag nyid nye bar 'joms par 'gyur
25b1(rgyud): ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig ni thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yo
25b2(rgyud): shes kyi spyod pa sgrub cing rjesu 'jug pa sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa/chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par byed pa/sems can gyi khams ma lus pa mya ngan las 'das///
25b3(rgyud): pa thob par byed pa/bstan pa med par bstan pa dang /lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /dkon mchog gi gdung rgyan mi 'chad pa dang /sngags kyi spyod pa gsal bar
25b4(rgyud): byed pa dang /thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thugs kyis bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa dang /bgegs chen po rnam par gzhig pa dang /gdug pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa dang
25b5(rgyud): bdag gi stobs mngon par 'phel ba dang /gzhan gyi stobs bzlog par byed pa dang /rengs pa dang /ltung ba dang /nyams dgad 'chos pa dang /skems pa dang /dga' ba dang /rang
25b6(rgyud): gi sngags kyi spyod pa gsal bar byed pa dang /tshe dang /nad med pa dang /rang gi dbang phyug mngon par 'phel ba dang /myur du las rje su sgrub pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje
25b7(rgyud): chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /de dag gi rgyu mtshan dang /rgyu la thams cad du rtog go ma dang /rnam par rtog ge ba
26a1(rgyud): dang bral ba'i sems kyis smraso//de nas klu dang /klu chen po dang /gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin chen po dang /srin po dang /srin pa chen po da /sha za dang /sha za tshan/
26a2(rgyud): po dang /srul po dang srul po chen po dang /lus srul po dang /lus srul po chen po dang /me mo dang /ma ma chen mo dang /grul bum dang /grul bum chen mo dang /gcan zan dang /

26a4(rgyud): gzhibs pa dang /gzhibs pa chen po dang /gnon pa dang /gnon po chen po dang /byis pa dang /byis pa chen po dang /bram pa dang /bram pa chen po dang /nad dang /nad chen po
26a5(rgyud): rje byed dang /rjed byed chen po dang /gdon dang /gdon chen po dang na mkha' mi dang /na mkha' ma mo chen mo dang /gzugs can ma dang /gzug can mtshan mo dang /
26a6(rgyud): gzugs ngan me dang /gzugs ngan ma chen mo dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /grib gnon dang /grib gnon chen po dang /spad gting dang /srad gting chen po dang /
26a7(rgyud): kyi dang /ci gyi chen po dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /gnod sbyin mtshan mo dang /sha za mo dang /sha za mo chen ma dang /rims nad dang /rims nad chen po dang /
26b1(rgyud): rims nyin gcig pa dang /rims nyin gcig pa chen po dang /rtag pa'i rims dang /rims mi zad pa rnams dang /rtag pa las byung ba'i rims dang /yud tsam pa dang /rlung las/
26b2(rgyud): gyur pa dang /mkhris pa lnga gyur pa dang /bad kan las gyur pa dang /'dus pa las gyur pa dang /gcong dang gcong chen po dang /grub pa dang /grub pa chen po dang /sbyor ldan dang /
26b3(rgyud): sbyor ldan chen po dang /drang srong dang /drang srong chen po dang /mi 'am ci dang /me 'am ci chen po dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /lto 'phye chen po chen po dang /dri Ta dang /dri za chen po dang /

26b5(rgyud): gter chen po dang /sa dang /sa chen po dang /shing dang /shing chen po dang /'dab chags dang 'dab chags chen po dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal po chen po dang /brgya byin dang /dbang po chen
26b6(rgyud): po dang /nor lha'i bu dang /sgra sgrogs dang /'byung po'i bdag po dang /dbang ldan dang /gshin rje dang /tshangs pa dang /tshangs pa chen po dang /nyi ma'i bu dang /nor sbyin dang /yul 'khor
26b7(rgyud): srung dang /'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /lus ngan po dang /gang ba bzang po dang /nor bu bzang po dang /lnga rtsen dang /rmugs 'dzin dang /rengs 'dzin dang /kuSh+ma 'dzin dang
27a1(rgyud): ljang sngo dang /skra ljang sngo dang /seng ge dang /'phrog ma dang /dga' byed dang /nor byed dang /chu'i dbang po dang /'jig rten dbang po dang /nye ba'i dbang po dang /gsang ba dang /
27a2(rgyud): gsang ba chen po dang /g.yo ba dang /g.yo byed dang /chu stod dang /rtag pa'i ri dang /kha ba'i ring ngo //ri chen po dang /mig brtsegs pa dang /mgo bo gsum bzhes pa 'di rnams dang /
27a3(rgyud): gzhan yang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor te/byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
27a4(rgyud): bskyed pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyi du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to//gang yang srin po'i rgyal po chen po srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
27a5(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bkug pa 'di lta ste/bros pa dang /'bros byed dang /rnam par 'ju byed dang /gzer gyi rna ba dang /bum pa'i rnam dang /kun nas rna
27a6(rgyud): ma dang /gshin rje dang /rnam par 'jigs byed dang /'jig su rung ba dang /drag po dang /shin tu drag po dang /mi zad pa dang /sdig ldan dang /dbang po rgyal dang /'thab pa
27a7(rgyud): dang /legs par 'thab pa dang /mdung dang /mdung rtse gsum dang /mgo bo gsum pa dang /mgo bo mtha' yas pa zhes pa yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to//gang
27b1(rgyud): yang shin dang /mtshan po dang /nan chen po b+h+yob klu zhug pad+ma snang thA/dums ngas bskor ba rnams kyad 'angaHste/'du gcod dang /nye zung garjod dug na/

27b4(rgyud): semis pa'i rje 'phrum gyi skyabs paskyed pos dkrug pa 'ang/dga' dri dang/ dga' blo nga/zla ba dang /nye ba'i ba dang /no ts+tshas kyi bu dang /mtha'o las dang /'dzinapa
27b5(rgyud): dang /bdU dang /'a chen po dang /dung mye dang /rlung dang /du myed ma dang /stabs kyi sna dang /rigs ldan dang /brdzun pa'i babyung ba dang /ma pa sbyin dang /rdo rje dang

27b7(rgyud): sbyin dang /'o ma'i chung dang /sago ma med dang /rgya mtsho dang /nye ba'i rgya mtsho zhes pa 'di rnams dang gzhin yang klu'i rgyal po chen po klu brgya stong phrag du mas ying su bskor ba da
28a1(rgyud): /chos mnyan pa'i phying 'khor gyi dkyil rga cha rkun par dang 'dus shing 'dug par gyur//glang yang drang srong dang dUng srong chen po de rnams 'angs
28a2(rgyud): rgyun shes kyi d+h+rU dang /gnas 'jog dang /gau'ut+ta m+b+ha dang /skal ldan shIng rta dang /d+hu d+hu nr-i dang /a ga ngas dang /a ma s+t+rai dang /su lwa s+t+rai dang /ri byi dang /rgyas pa de gnag pa
28a3(rgyud): gau tam nag po myi dang /ma'i rgyud dang /hrI gi ma hU~M t+tha med sar+g+haM dang /myong po pa dang /thub pa dang / mchog dang /baM saMm+b+ha la ni dang /rdzobs logs smras
28a4(rgyud): dgra d+ha dang /rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang /paM s+phu li dang /pi sre la b+ha bI dang /glog mkhyung pa dang /bdud meda' zhes pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang drang srong chen po bad+yA/

28a6(rgyud): byeng chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan cing d+he su yi rang bar 'dod pas 'dod pa'i khod par gyur te//gang yang ste 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de rnams kying 'khor gyi
28a7(rgyud): gcir chen pa der rab tu zhezhes shing la yod par gyur pa 'di lta ste/b+hai rad+ha dang /shu dr-i d+ha dang /marbe r+d+ha dang /'od nar dang /'od zer 'bir ba zhos pa'o//gang yang na
28b1(rgyud): mkha' lding gi rgyal po de rnams kyang na mkha' lding brgya stong phrag du ma nas yongasu bskor te 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa 'di lta ste/'dab bzang dang /'dab dkar dang /klu dang /rang
28b2(rgyud): 'gro dang /'dab bzang skyes dang /yid mgyogs dang /klu 'joms dang /rnam 'dud bu dang /b+ha ra dA dza dang /dge mtshan dang /dge mtshan chen po dang /'dab chags rgyal po ste/de
28b3(rgyud): rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus par gyur to//gang yang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po mi 'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas bskor ba de rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ljon pa dang
28b4(rgyud): nye ba'i ljon pa dang /lags pI ljon pa dang /mtha' yas ljon pa dang /'jig rten ljon pa dang /ljon pa gsal po dang /brang rgyas dang /brang rgyas chen po dang /yid kyi ge zi
28b5(rgyud): brjid dang /gzi brjid chen po dang /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /rnam par sgrogs pa dang /dbyangs bzang po dang /yid 'ong dang /sems bskyed par byed pa dang /smyo byed dang /dan d+hA ta
28b6(rgyud): dang /btang snyoms pa dang /snying rje dang /snying rje med pa zhes pa 'di rnams dang /gzhan yang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po stong phrag gis yongasu bskor ba rnams chos mnyan pa'i
28b7(rgyud): phyir 'dus par gyur to//de bzhin du mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /tshangs pa chen po dang /kun tu 'od gsal dang /rab tu 'od gsal ba dang /dga' ba'i 'od dang /
29a1(rgyud): bsod nams dod dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min dang /'og bzang dang /'jig rten mtha' dang /yang med pa'i skye mchod dang /

29a7(rgyud): bskor ba 'gros rnam pa sna tshogs dang /nor rnam pa sna tshogs dang /lha dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i lha ma yin de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /byang chub
29b1(rgyud): seMmasna ba'i rnam 'phrul lta ba dang /phyug bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dor 'dus par gyur to//gang yang gna' dang /gza' chen po'i 'jig
29b2(rgyud): rten gyi don du spyod pa bar snang la spyod pa la 'di lta ste/nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /mig dmar dang /lhag pa dang /phur bu dang /pasangs dang /sbyin pa dang /sgra gcan dang /sa
29b3(rgyud): 'gul dang 'jug rings dang /thog gis 'joms pa dang /skar ma dang /rgyal mtshan dang /drag po dang /du ldan dang /du bye dang /rdo rje dang /drang srong dang /cher dang /nye ba'i char dang
29b4(rgyud): don nyams dang /nges par nyams dang //dgod pa'i mtha' dang /mASh+Ti dang /riSh+Ti dang /dga' ma dang /'jig rten mtha' dang /zad pa dang /rnam par ltung byed dang /mi ltung ba dang /tog/

29b6(rgyud): gsum pa dang /lu b+hU dang /ro tra dang /brtan pa dang /nyams byed dang /stobs ldan dang /drag po dang /skya rengs dang /rnam par dgod pa dang /'chi ltas min pa dang /skyes byed dang /
29b7(rgyud): sde dang /nye sde dang /gzhin nu dang /rtse byed dang /dgod byed dang /sems par byed pa dang /theng po dang /gzugs ngan zhes pa ste gza' chen po de rnams kyang brgya stong phrag du ma
30a1(rgyud): 'khyod dang ts+tshas pa sa m+b+ha sa b+h+yan rgyas dran ngas rgyas dang ma nas dor 'khor du dus shong 'khod par gyur to//da nasar+m+masgra na mkha'/
30a2(rgyud): la 'gro zhing rjesu 'brang ba brgya stong du mas yongasuM bskor po 'di lta ste/tha skar dang /bra nye dang /smin drug dang /sna me dang /mgo dang /lag dang /nam so dang /rgyal dang /
30a3(rgyud): skahA dang /mchu dang /gre dang /deb gnyis dang /mi bzhi dang /nag pa dang /sa ri dang /sa gA dang /lha mchi mas dang /snron dang /snrubs dang /chu stong dang /chu smad dang /gro
30a4(rgyud): bzhin dang /mo gru dang /mon gre dang /khrum stod dang /khrums smad dang /nam gru dang /lha mo dang /byi bzhin dang /slar yang 'byung ba dang /skar 'od dang /oMng+ga d+ha dang /
30a5(rgyud): rgyu skar ldan ma dang /nye byar sbu gu dang /nyi ba'i bu dang /'jig rten rab mchog dang /rab mchog ldan mA dang /dpal ldan dang /'jig rten mgon po dang /chung ldan dang
30a6(rgyud): rgyal po thob pa dang /nor ldan dang /rgyu'i nor zhes pa de ltar rgyu skar rgyal po dri rnams rgyu skar be rgyu stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor te/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis berlab
30a7(rgyud): kyis gnas gtsang ma'i gan su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to//khyim sum cu rtsa drug la 'di lta ste/lug dang blang dang /'khrig pa dang /
30b1(rgyud): kA kaT dang /seng go dang /bu mo dang /srung dang /sdig pa dang /gzhu dang /chu sbyin dang /bum pa dang /nya dang /spre'u dang /nyo ba'i bum pa dang /gser bum dang /ral bri dang /glang po
30b2(rgyud): che dang /me he dang /lha dang /mi dang /dge mtshan dang /dri za dang /'jig rten dgongs pa dang /rgyal ba'i mchog dang /gzi brjid dang /nam mkha' dang /grib ma dang /sa gzhi dang /mun
30b3(rgyud): ba dang /rdul dang /nye ba'i rdul dang /sdug bsngal dang /bde ba dang /thar pa'i byang chub dang /rang byang chub dang /nyan thos dang /dmyal ba'i rig 'dzin dang /gzi brjid chen po
30b4(rgyud): dang /gzi brjid che ldan dang /byol sing dang /yi dgas dang /lha ma yin dang /sha dang /sho za dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'byung po thams cad pa dang /phyogs kyi
30b5(rgyud): glang po dang /steng 'gro dang /thams cad 'gro dang /rnam bya dang /rnal 'byor 'gro dang /rab tu gnas pa dang /mchog dang /'bring dang /tha ma zhes pa 'di rnams dang /khyim chen po
30b6(rgyud): khyim brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor ba 'di rnams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa gang na ba der nye bar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal de
30b7(rgyud): ring rang gi gan su 'khod par gyur to//gang yang gnod sbyin chen mo gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag phye bas bskor ba 'di lta ste/mig bzang me dang /smin ma bzang mo dang /skra bzang
31a1(rgyud): ma dang /dbyangs snyan ma dang /blo gros bzang mo dang /dbyig ldan ma dang /mig bkra ma dang /bsam rdzogs ma dang /gsang ba ma dang /'og pag ma dang /'og pag
31a2(rgyud): bzang mo dang /pad+ma'i dus ma dang /mi 'jigs ma dang /mi 'jigs sbyin mdong /rgyal ma dang /rnam par rgyul ma dang /nem gru can ma dang /kra ldan ma dang /sgra mtha' ma dang /
31a3(rgyud): rlung ma dang /yid 'phrog ma dang /yid ldan ma dang /me tog ldan mo dang /me tog grong gnas ma dang /sor sgyu ma dang /'phrog ma dang /dpa' mo ldan ma dang /dpa' mo dang /
31a4(rgyud): dpa' bzang ma dang /sna bzang ma dang /'od ldan ma dang /lha mdzes ma dang /ro bzang ma dang /gsang mcho go ma dang /brjod pa la gnas ma dang /mya ngan meng ma dang /snang bar
31a5(rgyud): mdzes ma dang /'od ldan ma dang /phul byung ldan ma dang /gzugs ldan ma dang /gzugs mdzes mra dang /dkar min dang /zhi bya ma dang /phra mo mo dang /snga ma dang /dga'
31a6(rgyud): byed ma dang /nye bar dge' byed ma dang /'jig rten 'das ma zhus pa ste/gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'di rnams gnod sbyin ma brgya stong phrag du mes yongasu bskor ba de rnams
31a7(rgyud): kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal te/'khod par gyur to//gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du mas
31b1(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal te 'dus par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/rgyan pa mo dang /phyag dar gyi sha za mo dang /drug mo shA za mo dang /
31b2(rgyud): ta la la'i sha za mi dang /'bar ba'i sha za mo dang /thal ba za mo dang /shal zab mo dang /'dzin dka' ma dang /'khrul byed mo dang /rmongs byed ma dang /sgrogs byed ma dang /
31b3(rgyud): skyed byed ma dang /'jig rten mthar gnas ma dang /thal ba'i mtha' can ma dang /'thung gcod ldan ma dang /mang po ma dang /gdul dka' ma dang /e la mau dang /mtshan ma can
31b4(rgyud): mo dang /du ba'i mtha' can ma dang /du ba ma dang /du ba bzang mo ma zhes pa sha za mo chen mo 'di rnams shu za mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor ba rnams kyang 'khor
31b5(rgyud): 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der rab tu bzhugs par gyur to//gang yang ma mo dang /ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rje suM spyod cing sems can la rnam par 'tshe bar
31b6(rgyud): byed pa gtor ma dang phreng ba nyid sdud par byed pa la 'di lta ste/tshangs ma dang /dbang phyug chen mo dang /khyab 'jug ma dang /gzhon nu mo dang /rgan byang ma dang /phag mo dang /dbang
31b7(rgyud): mo dang /gshin rje ma dang /me maM dang /nyi ma'i bu mo dang /'jig rten bar ma dang /chu lha mo dang /dbang ldan mo dang /rlung lha mo dang /gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang /zhal rgyan pa
32a1(rgyud): mo dang /dge mtshan ma dang /dge mtshan ma chen mo dang /srul mo dang /lus srul mo dang /skem byed mA zhes pa ma mo chen mo 'di rnams ma mo brgya stong phyag du
32a2(rgyud): mas yongasu bskor ba de rnams 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig tu 'don cing 'khod par gyur to//de bzhin du mi dang mi ma yin pa/
32a3(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma dang /sems can dang sems can ma yin pa ji srid dmyal ba chen po monar med pa nas/srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar skabs 'diro thams cad na mkha'i dkyil du gsal
32a4(rgyud): bar gyur te//sems can gyi tshogs kyi srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod pa med par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkyen
32a5(rgyud): gyis sems can thams cad kyis spyi bo na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs pa yang dag par mthong bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
32a6(rgyud): shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal to//sems can dag gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i
32a7(rgyud): don rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na shed cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
32b1(rgyud): dpra' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjesu gnang bas/nA mkha'i rang bzhin gyis rgyan bkod pa rdo rje sdug cing sla ba'i brgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge
32b2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de thams cad dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mir rdo rje'i rang bzhin rgyu
32b3(rgyud): chen por lhag par gnas par gyur to//der gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /dri za dang /rlung lha dang /sha za de rnams dang /mdor bsdus na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sem
32b4(rgyud): dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal yas khang de rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta'ur yang dag par rab tu gnaso//'khod par gyur pa rnams phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba medo//de nas sems
32b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po de 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas/khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa la bos par gyur to//kye kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
32b6(rgyud): 'dus pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad bsrungs shig/bsrungs shig/dbang du gyis shig/gdug pa rnams zul cig/zhi ba rnams
32b7(rgyud): sad par gyis shig/ma dad pa rnams dad par gyis shig/ji srid pa'i rig sngags dang /gsang sngags spyod pa rje su sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya chen po de nyid kyi rig
33a1(rgyud): sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chang ba de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la bsrungs shig/de skad ces smras pa
33a2(rgyud): dang /khra bo'i rgyal po chen po'i bka' mnos nas/rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs yongasu brtags te sems can thams cad bsrung bar bya ba'i don dang /brtan par bya ba'i
33a3(rgyud): don du bkod pa chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa khro bo brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor ba phyogs bzhi kun nas de ltar steng dang 'og dang thad da/
33a4(rgyud): skra drag po 'don bzhin pas rab tu gnas par gyur to//de nas sems can de rnams zhi ba nyid kyi yid dang ldan pas yang dag par 'jug pa'i bka' las mi 'da' bar gyur te/
33a5(rgyud): sgra 'di lta bu yang thos par gyur to//gang dam chi go 'di 'da' bar byed pa 'di dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/byang chub sems
33a6(rgyud): dpe'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' de rang gi rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa chos gcig
33a7(rgyud): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par gyur to//gcig po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par
33b1(rgyud): yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba'o//chos gnyis po dag la rab tu gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/gnyis po dag gang zhe na byang
33b2(rgyud): chub kyi sems yongasu mi gtong ba dang /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do//chos gsum rnams kyi rang gi gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don nges par brtan pa yongasu rdzogam
33b3(rgyud): por 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/sems can yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang /rang gi gsang sngags yongasu mi gtong
33b4(rgyud): ba nyid//chos bzhi yang dag par ldan na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/rang gi gsang sngags rdzogs pa yongs
33b5(rgyud): su mi gtong ba nyid dang /gzhan gyi gsang sngags nye bar gcad pa min pa nyid dang /sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang /snying rje chen po sgom
33b6(rgyud): po'i sems te chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro//chos lngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la yang dag par
33b7(rgyud): 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul bsten pa nyid dang /bas mtha'i dgon pa bsten pa nyid
34a1(rgyud): dang /sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang /'jig rten pa'i sngags la me lta ba nyid dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /spyod pa la gnas par byed
34a2(rgyud): pa nyid de/chos lnga po 'di dag gis sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur//chos drug ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dngos grub yongasu rdzogs par
34a3(rgyud): 'gyur te/drug gang zhe na/dkon mchog gsum la dang pa nye bar gcad pa med pa nyid dang /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang /skyo ba med pa'i
34a4(rgyud): sems nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yongasu tshol zhing dge ba'i phyir yongasu mi spong ba nyid de/chos drug po 'di ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang /gsang sngags kyi
34a5(rgyud): dngos grub la yang dag par kun tu 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur ro//chos bdun rnams ni/rig sngags grub pa'i cho ga dang /gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la rje su 'jug par byed pa nying/
34a6(rgyud): du 'gyur te/bdun gang zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zab mo sgom pa dang /zlos pa dang /nyan pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /'dri bar byed pa dang /byang
34a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pas dus gsum du ston pa dang /nges par sdom pa dang /bzlas pa dang /sbyin sreg dang /sgro bcad dang /dka' thu bo la ma thogs pa
34b1(rgyud): dang /blogs dang /dran pa dang /shes rab dang /brtan pa dang du len par byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang thag pa chen pa/chos zab ma'i tshul la yang dag par rab tu 'jug
