34b2(rgyud): pa'i tshul dang /rang gi gsang sngags dang /sngags dgug pa dang /srung ba dang //sgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang /snying rje chen po dang /byams pa chen po dang /btang snam
34b3(rgyud): chen po dang /dga' ba chen po yongasu sgom par byed pa las dang /sems can gyi khams dang /chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa/gnyi su med/
34b4(rgyud): pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu tshal ba las dang /sems can thams cad yongasu ma gtong la theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa las techos bdun po
34b5(rgyud): 'di rnams ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//chos brgyad ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyis dngos grub yang dag par
34b6(rgyud): 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur te/brgyad gang zhe na/mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dad pas ngo mtshar bar sems par 'dod pa nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i 'bras bu
34b7(rgyud): rdzu'i phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa the tshom med pa las dang /phyin ci ma log pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa las bla ma la gus pa las dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa/
35a1(rgyud): rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang rgyu dang spyod pa nye bar bstan pa mi slu bar 'dzin cing bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba las dang /dngos grub kyi zhing gnas dang /
35a2(rgyud): gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang /ser sna dang /go nyid dang /rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed pa/rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas
35a3(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang /mdor bsdus na dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te bgegs thams cad
35a4(rgyud): rab tu sel bar byed pa las dang /byang chub kyi rgyud gnon par byed pa dang /longs spyod chen po dang /dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang /dbang che bar glu/
35a5(rgyud): pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'brel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste/
35a6(rgyud): chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyuraro//grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing dkon
35a7(rgyud): mchog gsum la lhag par mos pa mtshig tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pas yid sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams
35b1(rgyud): mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur//de lus gzhan du rtogs par bya ba ma yin no//rnam par rtog pa med
35b2(rgyud): pa'i yid du gyur pas nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bye ba yi no//de nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang
35b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams 'di skad du brjod par byed de/kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi spyod
35b4(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i don bya ba'i chos kyi tshul lo rab tu 'jug pa'i rje su 'thun pa'i chos ston cig legaso//leg so//e ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams sna tshogs pa'i chos
35b5(rgyud): snyan pa'i rjesu 'jug por byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba legs par gsungaso//rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyur//yid la byed par 'gyur
35b6(rgyud): ba dang /g.yul du yang thog mar glang po che'i steng du 'jig par 'gyur ba dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 'gyur ba de la
35b7(rgyud): bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par bgyi/phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi/glebs bam du bris nas rang
36a1(rgyud): gi khyim du 'joms par 'gyur ba'i/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/rgyal po chen po'am/rgyal mo chen mo 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma'am
36a2(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen mo 'am/srung ba chen po dang longs spyod chen po dang /tshe ring por 'gyur ba dang /nad med pa dang /rtag tu longs spyod 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o//
36a3(rgyud): de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to//theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi spyod po nges par bstan pa las/ral
36a4(rgyud): pa gyen rdzas kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul gyi le'u rab 'byams las/bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog
36a5(rgyud): pa las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i//
36a6(rgyud): 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor lo gzigs nas/sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rje su 'jug cing kun tu lta bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//byang
36a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lta ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas
36b1(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba'i 'od zer byung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar bya bar byas nas sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas 'khod
36b2(rgyud): par gyur te//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes dog pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/sems dpa' chen po'i dam
36b3(rgyud): tshig la rngosu 'jug pa las bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa khyed kyis tshogs gang du sems can rnams
36b4(rgyud): yang dag par rjesu zhugs nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dos pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yang dag par thob pa dang ldan pa khyod smros shig smros shig/gsang
36b5(rgyud): nga'i bdag po gnod sbyin dbang pos de skad smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud
36b6(rgyud): gsungs pa/rig sngogs thams cad yang dag par bskol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos
36b7(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing /sor mo'i rtse mo dor rig pa'i rgyal po bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste phyung nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i
37a1(rgyud): 'khor b+he dkyil 'khor de snang ba tshon sa kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzags//
37a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis khro ba'i rgyal po sbrul mas non pa'i snying po las thams cad po/dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang /gshegs su gsol pa dang /zhi ba can dang /rgyas pa
37a3(rgyud): can dang /mngon spyod can dang /mi snang ba dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang /rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang /dgug pa dang /rnam par sdang ba dang /dbang du byed pa
37a4(rgyud): da /dri dang phreng ba dang /mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de/mdor na ji ltar sbyar ba de bzhin/de lta de ltar sgrub par bya ba bzhin pa ni yi ge
37a5(rgyud): gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'o//de gang zhe na/oM AHhUM/'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po las thams cad
37a6(rgyud): pasti dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /gsang sngags spyod pa thams cad lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed
37a7(rgyud): /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa bteganas/khro ba'i spyi bar bzhag ste 'di skad ces sdug pa
37b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams danangasu gsol/gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul
37b2(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po de bskor nas btang bar gyur to//khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma
37b3(rgyud): thab tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams cher bcad cing bkug nas
37b4(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dag pa'i sems can la yang dag par bcug ste/gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can bdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'ab
37b5(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs par gyur nas gnas par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yong 'khor gyi dkyil
37b6(rgyud): 'kho ra la gzigs nas sems can khyed cag thams cad nyan cig/gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de la khro ba'i rgyal pos tshar gcod parad+ma 'gyur te/gang
37b7(rgyud): phyir nasangs rgyas pam ldan 'das rnams kyis dam tshigan 'drar byung bya ba ma man pan phy-i //ga sngagapa dang /gas sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsong chen ji ster byang chu
38a1(rgyud): soms dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin ngos par bstan pa 'chad par byed do//de logs par nyon la legs par yid la zungs zhig dang
38a2(rgyud): ngas bshad do//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mai a mi tA tA ya/ta thA grA tA ya/er+ha te sa myak+saM bud d+hA yaM/na ma Ar+yA bo lo ki twe shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ye/nA mo b+ha ga hA
38a3(rgyud): N+yai/Ar+yA tA rA yaM/bo d+hi sad+g+ha ya/mahA satwA ya/t+yad+ya nA/rai dzA ke d+harma nIr+yA tAM/tI r-i trUMt+tA raM/shAn+ta d+harma nIr+yaM te/tA re e nai b+hIlA bya d+harma nir+yA ti tut+tA re tu re ti ni/trA sa ni/
38a4(rgyud): bid+d+ha si ni/oM ha nI/mo h+ye ni/dAm+b+ha nA~M/s+yAm+b+ha ni/pr-i b+haM/tsun+ta pra b+h+yo hi li hI l-i/bi la~M bi le be ga gA ma~M ni/kur+t+ti mahA kut+ti/d+hu ra d+ha ra d+ha na pa te/t+tA re hu ru hu ru/klu
38a5(rgyud): ku ru~M/aH/ya~M ya/ mi tsat+ta taM ma~M ku ru swA hA/grogs kyi dag 'dri ni nga'i bcom ldan 'das myi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rog sngags las thams cad byed ma/srid
38a6(rgyud): lo gsum gyi chos nye bar phyug gcong ba/ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog par byed ma'o//phyug r+b+he yang 'dir rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes pa rnam par grags pa de la rab
38a7(rgyud): sbyar bar 'gyuraro//dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/mya ngan las 'das pa'i da pa thob par byed gzhi'i thams cad byed pa/sangs rgyas mngon sum du/
38b1(rgyud): mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/rang nyid nga'i grags po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bos nye bar gnas pa pa
38b2(rgyud): pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed/gang dang gad dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad mthar byed pa/'jigs pa chen po rnams yongasu sbyor bar byed pa ste/bzlas pas lha mos kyang ci
38b3(rgyud): dgos de gang zhe na//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+ha yo mahA sad+d+ha ya/tA re tut+tA ri swAhA/phyag rgya yad 'dir ut+pa la zhes rnam par grags/
38b4(rgyud): ba longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o//'dir nye de'i snying por gyur pa yang mchog tu dpal dang ldan pa'i dag byed chen po ste/na mo rat+na tA yA la/na ma
38b5(rgyud): sarba bud d+ho bo d+hi satwA nA/oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/phyag rgya yang 'di rA pud+ma'i breng ba zhes rnam par grags par 'gyur te/sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o//'dir mchog
38b6(rgyud): gi snying por gyur pa yang /na maHsarba bud d+he nAM/oM gI/'di ni snying po'i mchog ti mdor bsdu na bya ba thams cad la yon tan chen po rgyas pa ste/yon tan mur thug par
38b7(rgyud): brjod pa ni dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang ma nuso//phyag rgya yang 'dir brtson 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu
39a1(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa'o//'dir spyan drang ba'i rig sngagasu gyur pa yang /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/oM he he b+ha ga ba ti bi shU rU pi Ni sarba ba la/b+hA Shi ta/rmA
39a2(rgyud): bo d+hinA A yA ni/b+ha ga ba ti/krI T+Ta ut+pa la d+ha ni/ma ma shud d+hA ya/tiSh+Tha tiSh+TaM/sa ma ya me nu sma ra/oM pr-i ti ha ta/shA sa na hUM/mA baM lim+ba ku ru ku ru phaT s+t+wa~M hA/'di
39a3(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang ba'i rig sngags te/sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa
39a4(rgyud): nyan thos dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /sha za dang /srin po dang /'byung
39a5(rgyud): po thams cad kyi ying yin//tsan+dan gyi tshul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi dang /de bzhin du steng dang /'og dang /thad ka thams cad du gtor ba
39a6(rgyud): bya'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma dang /'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi gsang snga/
39a7(rgyud): 'di yin te/'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur//na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/oM pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/oM d+hu ru d+hu ru/
39b1(rgyud): mad+has na/ma m+b+ha maShaSh+TA/tiSh+Ta sa ma ya ma nu m+ba raswA hA/bdug pa'i rig sngags te/tsan d+han d+hang /zur bum dang /ga bung gcig du byas nas bdug 'dabul bar byad//de nas
39b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byin pa rnams rnaMs kyi 'drug pas yid ma nas/drug sa 'gyur//di phyog r+b+ha po gyur pa dang /
39b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhi ba ste/spyan drang ba'i rig sngags la yang phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng po bzang po 'di nyid do//sangs rgyas
39b4(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /sems tsun thams cad byon pa la yang ma tshwad yon dbul bar bya ste/go pUr dang /tsan+dan dang /grur gum chu dang sbyar nas
39b5(rgyud): tI'i mye tog dang /m+b+ha laM kA ga sar pa dang /'byar gyi me tog dang /b+ha non+na kA dang /bcu'i dang /rgyu smos rnamos te 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i mai to d+h+r-i ga ma~M/dus ji lta ba'o/
39b6(rgyud): me tog gam+b+ha/dri ba zang ba'i me tog rnams dang bsgos nas sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o//na maHsarba bu d+hAnAM/a b+hU tiHta sha sau rbAr+g+haM/d+hA d+hA n+ti
39b7(rgyud): kar+m+ma Naik+Sh+ma bi shUd+b+ha ba d+hu ra Ni ar+g+haM b+hi ti ts+tsha sa ma ya sa ma ya ma nu smar/tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA dai bi twAd+hISh+TA na/mad+h+ye pra be sha ya~M br-i be sha ya/sarba Tut+t+ra/oM nu ki ng+ka//gr-its+tsha hrIhU~M/
40a1(rgyud): hU~M/am+ba bid+hA ra Ni swA hA/phyag rgya 'dir gang ba zhes blugs te/sems can thams cad kyis rjesu 'jug cing brtun pa'o//'dir dri'i rig sngags
40a2(rgyud): gyur pa yang /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/na maHsa mair+yA g+h+nAn+d+ha a bi b+hA ki ta shri ye ta thA gA tA ya/tad+ya thA gAn+te gan+d+he tAde gAn+d+ha mam ra me pra tIts+tsha pradz+nyAts+tsha tre/gtas pa nI nur+ya
40a3(rgyud): NaM swA hA/'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba yang /lo ma zhes bya ba gsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o//'dir me tog gi sngagasu gyur pa yang /na maN+Da sarba bud/
40a4(rgyud): d+hA bo d+hi satwA nAM/a pra tI ha te shA sa nA nAM/na maHsaM ku suM me ta rA dz+nyA s+ya/ta thA ga tA s+ya/tad+ya thA/ku suM me ku su me ku su mA dz+yo ku su mI sU ro b+h+ra si/ku su mA ba ti swA hA/
40a5(rgyud): bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya'o//rmad byung bsam mi khyab pa'i sku//sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas nas//yang dge rdzogs
40a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i//gtor ma'i rig sngags rab 'chang byed//na maHsarba bud d+he bo d+hi satwA nAM oM pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nI/tad+ya thA/he hau b+ha ga ba ti mahA satwe sarbe bud d+ha
40a7(rgyud): a ba lau ki te/mA bi laM ba i dam pa la gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-itsA pa ya hUM hUM hUM sarba ra ra Ta phaT swA hA/lha bshos 'dis dbul bar bya ste/'byung ba thams cad pa'i gtor mar/
40b1(rgyud): gyu/ d+hun m+b+ha g+sa//bdug rnams cad na du //rnam sgyun du chu sa d+d+ha hA/sar+b+ba m+b+ha Ats+tshak+Sha na rmA
40b2(rgyud): nA moHsA man+ta dz+yo ti gats+tsha oM bo b+ha sa br-i yA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/tad+ye thI/he ho b+haM ga d+hAn dz+yo ti rasmai sha ta swA hA sraM/br-i ti man+te ta shwa rA ri/ba~M kur ba bi kur ba mai t+te bo d+hi sar+b+ba
40b3(rgyud): dz+nye yo d+ho ta m+bu d+ho/R+Sha khun+b+ha/a bi lo ki ya/u bi lo ka ya~M/maN+Da laM sarba satwA nA~M s+thA hA/mar me'i rig sngags te/'dis mar me dngul bar bya'o//phyag rgya ni kha bye
40b4(rgyud): zhes sems can tham sa ca rnam par snang bar byed pa'o//na maHsa man+ta b+hung dz+nyA na/ sAn+nanAM/d+he/dz+wal dz+wa la/dz+wa la yai dz+wA la yo n+d+ra hU~M bod+d+ha kat+ta ra
40b5(rgyud): ga swAt+mA/me'i bya ba byed pa'i rig sngags 'gyur ro//'dir yang phyag hU~M ni/kha sbyor zhes de'i 'jig rten grog sa//sems can kun 'od kyi gas la byed//byang chub sem
40b6(rgyud): dnga'i blo ldan dang //thul ba mchog gi sngon gsungs pa'o//de nas yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan rab gzigs dbang phyug gi/byang chub mo lam dpa'
40b7(rgyud): phyen ni rdo rje la smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni//gsang chen dang bcas shing mchog tu gsong ba yin te/bu khyod la ngani drag pa'i mtha'//mi
41a1(rgyud): bzang pa'i rag su grags//sngags rnams thams cad gang kho na//mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya'o//rgyu ba'i gdu gu rjes grags pa//rdo rje bad+ma'i rigs/
41a2(rgyud): dag kyang //de ni nges par gzhig don du//rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod//na maHsar+b+ba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/a pre ti ha ta shA sa nA nI/oM ka re ka ra/ku ru ku ru/ma ma
41a3(rgyud): kIR+R-i dzoH/dza~M D+ha/sarba da hA hu/sarba badz+nyA binA sha ka/mU d+ha r+thAkadz+nyAM ban+na ta kanA mat+ta Shi tre ti rA bi no ba tsa pa nA sarba duSh+TAM ma hA ga na pa tidz+nyA ban+d+ha ta ka ra/ban+ti n+ti/sarbapraH
41a4(rgyud): waM mASha b+hU dz+r-iShAT tsau raNadu tram+b+ha nA ya b+hid+d+ha de ban ni l+ye ts+tsha ba lAm bam+b+ha pa la bo d+hA ShI d+d+hi maN+Da la mad+h+ye drA N-i shrI ya sA ma nu sbyar hU~M d+hI ts+tshi la phaT yai swAt+tha/gas
41a5(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgril ma'i yan lagazhal drug pa zhes bya bo khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad rnam par 'dzums pa po/
41a6(rgyud): 'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ma rungs pa'i bgegs rnams lta ci smos 'di
41a7(rgyud): bklags pa tsam gyis srung po chen po byas par 'gyur//'dir phyag rgya yang rigs chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te bo gegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o//khro ba'i rgya la
41b1(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi snying po ni//ma hrIHSh+T+r-iHbkr-i tA nan hU~M sarba sha d+d+he s+thAm+b+ha ya phaT phaT swAt+ma/sngags 'dis dgra thams cad gzer chen po'i nang dang /yang rims nyin cig pas
41b2(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur//rtag tu bzlas pas je srid snang bar byams pa nyid du mi 'gyur/yad ni snyeng 'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/bzlas pa zin byi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur
41b3(rgyud): zhing 'ching byer mi 'gyur//dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa 'i bya'i/zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yino//phyag rgya mdung chen po yang sbyar bar bya'o//'dir nye
41b4(rgyud): pa'i snying por gyur pa yang /oM hrIHkA lA rU pi hUM khaM swA d+ha/sau ma'i mdod chen yang sbyar bar bya'o//gdug pa thams cad l-i gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyuraro//mchog gi stong
41b5(rgyud): bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig po zhes bya ba ni hUM 'di na las thams cad byed pa ste/phyag rgya mdung chen po yang sbyang bar bya'o//dung
41b6(rgyud): khrol thams cad zlog par byed po 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni los thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/dkyil 'khor gyi
41b7(rgyud): dbus su bzlas pas grub pa'i dus su yang /khyad par 'byung bar 'gyuraro//gshegasu gsol ba'i sngagasu gyur pa yang /na maHsarba bud d+ha nA~M/a pra ti ta ta shAs
42a1(rgyud): nAnA/tad+ya thA/dza ya dz+nyA ya/su dza ya/mahA ku ru Ni kA bA shA r+yA pA ni/gats+tsha gats+tsha swa ba nAM/sarba bad d+hA swa bi sar+N+Na yA/sa pa ri b+hA raM/swa b+hA bA nA tsA nu prA
42a2(rgyud): sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/sar+b+bAr+tha swa mo sid+d+haM tu/be d+h+ya sa dAHmaM no ra thaM tsa maM pau ri pU ra yaM swA ha~M/'di ni gshegasu gsel ba'i sngags te las thams cing la sbyar
42a3(rgyud): bar bya'o//phyag rgya bzang po'i gad na zhes grogs pa ste/'dis gad na yang sbyin par bya'o//yid kyis lan bdun bzlas pas thams cad gshegasu gsol/'jog
42a4(rgyud): rkyen dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang /sngags rnams nyid la yang sngags kyi dngos grub dang /dam tshig dang /bzlas pa dang /dus dang /nges
42a5(rgyud): par sdom pa rnams la yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams la kun tu gzigs te/'khor gyi
42a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po la rang gi rnyog pa'i tsho gas sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs par gyur tA//na maHsarba bud d+ha naM/a pA ti ha tA ga tI nAM oM ni Ti swA hA/'di ni
42a7(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjesu spyod pa'i sgra tsan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa/las thams cad pa ste ngamatshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po dug gi las thams cad la kun tu
42b1(rgyud): sbyar du//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/a pra tih+na ta shA sa nAn+tha/oM ne Te/'di ni nye bar spyod pa'i sgra can mA zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa ste/phyag rgyu ni kha bye ba zhes pa
42b2(rgyud): gza'i lngas thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//na maHsaM mAn+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha tau shA sa nA nAM/oM ni/rig pa 'di ni sdong bu can zhes bya ba spyod pa'i dag bya'i los thams cad
42b3(rgyud): byed pa ste/phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdon gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dgug par bya ba le sbyar ro//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a tsin+tar+m+ma tau rU pi nAM/oM Sh+TaM swA hA/mkha' 'gro/
42b4(rgyud): mo kun 'joms pa yi//phyag rgya sbubs can yang dag sbyar//byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yi//rig sngags thod pi cad zhes bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi pad+ma nyid//
42b5(rgyud): rab bsngags lha yi gzugs can ma//na maHsa man+to bud+d+hA nA~M/a pra ti ha ta ga ti/tsA ra NaM/tad+ya thA/oM ba ra de swAh+ma/phyag rgya ut+pa la nyid ni//dpal gyi bdag
42b6(rgyud): nyid da spyan la sbyar//gzugs mnga'achang ba'i lha mo nI//myur du longs spyod rabo sgrub pa'o//na maHsa man+te bud d+hA nAM/oM tsin+nar+N+No tA rU pi Ni oM su ri swA hA/phyag rgya mdung dang /
42b7(rgyud): yang dog ldan//rims rnams thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/a tsin+nad+b+ha ta ru pi Na i tu r-i swA hA/bsam pa'i sgrol ma ldan pa zhes/rab sngags
43a1(rgyud): lus rnams thams cad pa//dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag ldan//bgegs rnams 'joms byed ma la d+hu r+ya//na maHsa man+ta bud d+han+ta/u tsi d+yA b+hU tA r+yA pir+N+Na/
43a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/oM ba lo ki ni swA hA//rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba//'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed//bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa//pad+ma phyag rgyas sbyar b.re bya//ni maHsa man+ta
43a3(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM/a tsi t+yat+tA ta rU pau NaM/tad+ya thA/oM br-i sh+tse/bai shwa sa b+ha be bi shwa rU pi NaM ka ha ka ha A bi sha A bi sha sA ma yA ma nu smA ra ru rU tiSh+ThA swA hA//rig pa brtson 'grus chen
43a4(rgyud): mo ni//'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste//snying po phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid//sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/sna tshogs zhes bya yang dag bsgrags//na maHsa
43a5(rgyud): man+ta bud d+ha nAM/oM tsin+d+rAd+hA ta ru pi NaM/twAd+ya thA/oM shwe te prA ba su swAn+d+ha/pad+ma'i gdan gyis rnam par dgod//las rnams thams cad byed pa'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/A pra
43a6(rgyud): tri haM ta ga taM prA ti ri NaM/tad+ya thA/oM shUHrig pa 'di ni dpal mo che//'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste//phyag rgya kha sbyor ldan pa yi//rgyal srid chen po rab sbyin
43a7(rgyud): byed//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/sarba sad+d+hi b+ha ya pra dA yi kA/tad+ya thA/oM a dzi te ku mA ra rU pi NI/oM ti IM gats+tsha ma mo ka ra yaM ku ru swA hA/mi thub ma zhes rnam
43b1(rgyud): gas pa//'anon nu bad na la byung ba//'a / rgyur ldan pa sos//dag rnams thams pa brgyun pa da//namaHsa man+ta da /na/yA smA /tAn+darmA tu
43b2(rgyud): /b+h+yad+d+ha si s+yA hU~M/a d+heH/sring mthon zhes rna mi grags pa//byang chub sems dpa sa 'gyun/sa rnams mtha' dag yangs/sems ca
43b3(rgyud): byed pa//mang po tuM bu ru zhes grags//'di rnams kyis ni rje su spyod//gru mi bzhon pa mnyam zhon nus//rgya mtsho la ni nges par gnas//khu tshur phyag rgyas rnam par dag /
43b4(rgyud): ngosam pa thams cadr-i Sh+T+r-i s+thA rdzogs byed//na mnas mun na/ d+hI b+hUd+d+hAnA/tad+hathA/A~Mk+Sham+b+ha ri ma d+ha ma k+ki/man hU~M sa.oMhU~Msa~M nAd+d+he t+tam+bA m+b+ha na
43b5(rgyud): sha/sA shwas+t+ra nI raHg+h+ri r+b+heka nr-i la~M dAni br-i'i/d+d+ha/prA d+his ma n+ta s+t+rai ra/d+hA maSh+TA maM/b+h+ra ma ya dz+nyA ma ya d+h+yas hU~M suMm+me la san
43b6(rgyud): me ku ru kuR+shathi tsitra dwI pa~M d+hA ra NI/tISh+Tha tiSh+Tha/d+hI d+h+waM sarba bud d+hA nA dz+nyAM twe swAhA/sems can rje su 'dzin byed pa'o//byang chub sems dpas bshad pa ni//sa rnams ma
43b7(rgyud): kun nas no//rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos//sems can kun le pheM ni don dang //gdug pa'i sems can bzlog byed pa//bdag gi rig pa rtag tu grag/rtag tu srung bar yongs
44a1(rgyud): grags//srung ba ltos 'gro de nyid kyi//'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshon//snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi//bya chub sems dpa' don du
44a2(rgyud): gsungs//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//byis pa rnams la phan den du//gang las sems can spyod gsungs pa//'bre ba rnams la rnam spyod ldan//phyag rgya dbyug
44a3(rgyud): srog shing ldan//bdag nyid chen pos sbyar nas ni//tshangs pa la sogs 'gugs byed na//mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos//gzhon nu'i sems su ma lus pa'i//rtog pa 'di ni
44a4(rgyud): bsdus nas su//srin po rnams su grags pa yi//rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bstan//sems can rjes bzung 'dod pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bshad//yig gsu
44a5(rgyud): zhes bya'i snying po 'di//rig sngags 'di ni yang dgu bshed//sems can kun la phan don du//nye bar longs spyod 'gugs pa'i mchog/phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni//
44a6(rgyud): rnam bstod las rnams thams cad pa'o//oM hU~M dzAHrig sngags 'di ni mdor bsdus nas//mi rnams 'bras bu byed pa yin//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/sa ma ti tam+b+had+d+hi /
44a7(rgyud): oM dri kri ta gra ha hU~M phaT swAhA//nye ba'i snying po 'di yang ni//phyag rgya dgra sta yang ngag ldan//de bzhin 'byung po 'gugs par byed//de bzhin bze' dang mamar ba tsa//
44b1(rgyud): thams cad phyug rgyus rgyas btab pa//bkod na 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur//'byung po rnams ni rnam skrag byed//bdug pa zhugs pa rnam par grol//'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
44b2(rgyud): ma sgrol ma'i pho nya mo chen mo las thams cad pha rol pa gcig ma zhes bya ba rje su spyod pa las thams cod pa ste bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed de//'byung po thams cad/
44b3(rgyud): skrag par byed pa dang /'gugs par byed pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pra te ha ta shA
44b4(rgyud): s+yA nA rAM/ta k+Sha/oM prah+ma su prah+ma br-ih+ma/bar+tha se shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste//byang chub sems dpasau bshad pa yin//'byung po zhi ba rab tu thob//skad
44b5(rgyud): cig nyid las skyil bar 'gyur//phyag rgya pad+ma yang dag ldan//myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur//mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams la//srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod//'di ni mdor
44b6(rgyud): bsdub brjod pa ste//cho ga 'di ni mdor bsngos pa'o//na maHsa man+t+ri bud d+hA nAM/a pra tI ha tA shA sI nA nAM/tad+ya thAM/a~M ga ru Di ba tA na tsakra pA nA tsai tur b+hu dza d+h+r-i d+h+waM/sa ma ya ma nu swa
44b7(rgyud): ra/bo d+hi satwa ad+b+ha pa ya ti swA hA/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pas//zhi ba'i don ni myur du byed//'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig byed//khyab 'jug gzugs
45a1(rgyud): kyis lus can yin//phyag rgya'i 'khor lor yang dag ldan//brtan pa'i don ni yang dag byed//gang 'di khyab 'jug rgyud du ni//cho ga rgyas par bstan pa de//
45a2(rgyud): sems can kun gyi sgrub byed de/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin//ne maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pra tiM ha ta shA sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/ma hA ma he/shA ra b+hU tA d+hi pa ti bri Sha b+ha/
45a3(rgyud): d+h+we dza pra laM badzaM Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri NI/si ta b+hasma d+hu sa ra ta/mUrti sa aM phaT phaT bo d+hi satwA ad+hAM pa ya ti s+yA hA/sems cane rnams la phan 'dod pas//sngags 'di bdag gis rab tu
45a4(rgyud): brjod//mdung gi phyag rgya mnyam par ldan//'byung po thams cad rnams 'jig pa/'di yang bstan pa'i tshi ga 'di//sems can sa stengs gnas pa la//sngon ni zhi ba'i rgyud du bstan//
45a5(rgyud): yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba//zhi ba'i rgyud kyis kyang brjod do//na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/au sha ku ni pa ta ta pak+Shi Na/sha ka kha kha khA hi
45a6(rgyud): khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Tha bo d+hi satwA Adz+nyo pa ya ti swAhA/sngags 'di brtson 'grus chen po ste//na mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags//gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi
45a7(rgyud): mchog/gdengs ko can gyis gdug rnams 'joms//phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan//phung khrol mi bzod bcas pa 'joms//brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug rnams ni//gso bar//
45b1(rgyud): byed par the tsom med/gdul bya'i sems can la brtse bas//byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bka'//nA mkha' rdzing dgyi gzugs kyis spyod//'drab chags rgyal po 'od chen ldan//dzA skad
45b2(rgyud): na mkha' lding rgyud du//bstan par cho ga rgyas de rnams//sems can kun la phan pa 'chung /bdag gis kyang ni brjod pa yin//mkha' ldeng mngon por brjod rgyud du//khro bo'i rgyal
45b3(rgyud): po ma bstan na//gdengs can dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir//'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu//ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags//de rnams cho ga dper brjod pa//gdul bya'i
45b4(rgyud): sems can don du ni//de lta de ltar rnam par spyod//gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang //rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang //de rnams cho ga rab 'byam 'dir//snga ma kho nar gsungs
45b5(rgyud): pas in//ji ltar ma ma rnam mang po//byis pa 'bad pas srung byed pa//de bzhin byis mtha'a'i blo can la//nga ni rig sngags gzugs kyi rgyu//stobs bcu ldan pas sngon gsungs pa
45b6(rgyud): da lta'ang nga mi bstan pa yin//sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa//rtogs pas rab gsungs 'od chen po//rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs pa//stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras kyis
45b7(rgyud): gsungs//rmad byung bsam mi khyab gzugs can//spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin ras gzegs dbang
46a1(rgyud): phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas dam tshi ba thams cad yang dag par
46a2(rgyud): bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//gang du ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas sems can ma lus pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod pa'i yid son thams cad la rab
46a3(rgyud): tu gle nas pa gyurar+ya to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po gnas rnam par bkra ba'i phyag
46a4(rgyud): ni rin po che'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /
46a5(rgyud): spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /sa bcu dang ldan pas bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang /dkyil 'khor de bri ba'am 'drir 'jug
46a6(rgyud): por mi nus na/so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dogs/'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i gnas la gnas pa
46a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' tshon pos gzigs nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang /
46b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rgyal tshab du mngon par dbang bskur zhing dam tshig thob pa thams cad dang /spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa
46b2(rgyud): dang /zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cod spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par
46b3(rgyud): rgyu 'thun pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dog par shes par gyur to//so so'i skye bo thams cad/
46b4(rgyud): kyis de yid kyis dmigs par mi nus na/bri ba'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
46b5(rgyud): phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen pol ngam chog la rjesu rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la sbas pa/gogs po dag nyon cig/'di ni de bzhin goshegs pa rnams dang /
46b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang 'da' bar mi bya ba'i ngom tshig yin na/sems can rnams dang /'phags pa gzhan rnams kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas yang
46b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen pos phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag po la smras pa/kye rgyal ba'i sras/mi las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung ba ni nges par bstan to//mi rnams
47a1(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das na yang dag du sems can rnams yang dag par zhugs nas/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
47a2(rgyud): pa'i rig pa dang /sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pa phyag na rdo rjeso/byang chub sems dpa' sems//
47a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/kye rgyal po'i sras gang da lta dus la bab par shwe na gsungs shig gsungs shig/shAkya sid+d+hi 'jig rten mgon//
47a4(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan 'das pa na//mi rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing //sems can saM stings khyod dkyil 'khor//mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten no//sngags kyo dngos grub rab
47a5(rgyud): tu skye//mi shes cho ga nyams pa'am//dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na//tshangs pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang //rig sngags dngos grub mi 'gyur ro//sngags la mngon par
47a6(rgyud): mi brtson dang //dam tshig bstan pa mi mthong na//rnam pa du mAr 'bad byas kyang //rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur//dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na//brgya byin gyis kyang
47a7(rgyud): rab 'bad las//reg pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na//sa snying mi rnams smos ci dgos//dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes//spyod pa'i las rnams sgrub pa ste//'jig
47b1(rgyud): rten pa dang 'phags pa'i sngags//bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du//rab zhugs las rnams thams cad byed//byang chub sem
47b2(rgyud): dpa' bstan pa la//de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag/de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab par gyur to//kyo kye sems
47b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ros gzegs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungaso//dang po re shig cha 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam nag
47b4(rgyud): pa tsa na nA ma/sa ga can gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs la rab tu bsdogs pa'i nyi ma dang /gza' bzang po bltas te/rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi
47b5(rgyud): ches gcig dang /zla ba nye ba 'am/dus gzhan la dbyar gyi zla ba spangs te/snga dros rab tu gnas par bya'o//grong khyer chen po la rten pa 'am/gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob
47b6(rgyud): dpon rang nyid gnas pa rA te/rgya mtshor 'jug pa'am/chu klung las rton pa 'am/rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye bar grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ro ha cang yang mi
47b7(rgyud): ring /ha cang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/nyi ma bdun nam/zla phyed du mtha' gcig tu bsrung ba 'am/nye bor gnas na so so sor gnas par bya'o//
48a1(rgyud): dang gnas de rnamasu yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang /gyom dang /thal ba dang /sol ba dang /phub ma dang /thod pa dang /ruso pa dang /rus pa gnas
48a2(rgyud): dang bal ba/shin tu yongasu sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogasu/srog chags med pa'i chu la/ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan+dan dang /ga pur dang /gur gum gyi chas khro bar
48a3(rgyud): rgyal po sbrel mas non pa steng phrag brgyad kyis mngon par bsdigs pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po yang dag par ldan pas/sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi
48a4(rgyud): rnamasu mngon par gtor zhing snying dang 'og dang thad ka dang phyogs bral rnamasu yang kun nas gtor bar bya'o//de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/
48a5(rgyud): khru bcu gnyis sam/khru brkyang bya ste/de la chen po ni khru bcu drugo/bar ma ne khru bcu gnyis//chung ngu ni khru brgya do//dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'di//thams cad
48a6(rgyud): gzigs pas gsungs pa yin//rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste//bar ma longs spyod 'phel bar byed//chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshig ni//las rnams kun byed zhi ba
48a7(rgyud): yin dede la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o//de la sa'i phyogs der khru gnyis tsam brkos la/der rdo ba dang /sol ba dang /thal ba dang /
48b1(rgyud): rung dang /skya la sogs pa dang /srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko byar bya'o//gnod pa med pa dang /nye bar 'tshe ba med pa der
48b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//ri'i rtse mo dang /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i chu ngogs rnams yang gang rab tu 'bod pa chen pos shin tu so sor brtags te shin tu gtsang zhing srog chags med par
48b3(rgyud): byas nas bri bar byaso//sna'i phyogs deng slar yang srog chags med pa'i tshul pa'i rnam lnga bsres pas chu klung gi 'bram gyis gtsang ma 'am/srog 'khar gyi
48b4(rgyud): sa gang du srog tshogs med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o//bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o//
48b5(rgyud): seng ldang gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnamasu gdab par bya'o//tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i rgyal
48b6(rgyud): pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor grub gzhi pa'i rnar dkri bar bya'o//de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas/nang du yang zur bzhi'i rnam par
48b7(rgyud): bya'o//dbus kyi nang na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sleb dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa'am/rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//phyag rgya chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis
49a1(rgyud): gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid srung bar byas te/bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste/dkyil 'khor
49a2(rgyud): la g.yasu bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug na/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te dkyil 'khor de kun
49a3(rgyud): nas gru bzhi'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o//de nyid kyi phyi rol tu zhag gcig bsrung bar gnas pas rab tu gnas par bya'o//de la 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sngon spyad pa
49a4(rgyud): rnams byas te/rang gi reg pa dang /sngags dang rgyud la mkhas pa'i mkhan pos sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir theg pa chen po la lhag par mos pas zhag gi cig/
49a5(rgyud): bsnyung brir gnas pas grogs bzang po dang yang dog par ldan pa/bstan bac+doMs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba mthong bas tshon lnga'i phye ma zhi ba po 'bar bas legs par sbyang
49a6(rgyud): byas nas/rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang snying pos mngon par bsngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbusu gdab par bya'o//pha rol du yang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan spang ba dang
49a7(rgyud): rto babs bzhis rgyan pa dang /chu shing gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za zhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa dang /rnga'i tsha dang /rdzang
49b1(rgyud): dang /dung gi sgra nges par sgrogs pa'i sa'i phyogasu bsgrags par bya'o//ngos bzhar rjesu 'thun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i sgra chos mnyan par bya'o//phyogs bzhi rnams theg pa chen pa
49b2(rgyud): mdo sde'i glegs bam bklag par bya'o//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogasu bklag par bya'o//'phags pa zla ba sgron mo'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su'o//'phags
49b3(rgyud): bsdang po bkang pa byang phyog su'o//'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o//da ltar glegs bam klog po po med na mang sde bzhi pa klog par rtogs pa'i gang zhig chos smra ba po la
49b4(rgyud): cha se mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas/tsan+d+ra dan dang /ga bur dang /gu gum rnam par bsgres pa'i me tog dkar po dra
49b5(rgyud): rnam pa la rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas te/dkyil 'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o//mngon par bkram nas phyi rol du byung ste/zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas
49b6(rgyud): bsten pa gnyis sam/gsum/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/gso sbyong nye bar gnas pa bsnyen pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhas pa de grogs sam/slob ma des khas blangs par
49b7(rgyud): tu gzhug par bya'o//gang rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis gtsu go tar bcing bar byas nas/de nas gsing dang /dngul dang /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs po'i go 'phangs rnam par bkra zhing
50a1(rgyud): 'bar la mdzes pa'i zangs kyi bye ma zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyod chen pa dang ldan zhing /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams 'dir gzhug par bya'o//
50a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las nges par byang chub la bzhol ba yin na/sngags rtsubo par byed pa lta ci smras/shAkya skyes mchog mya ngan 'das//sems can bsod nams chu
50a3(rgyud): rnams la//'di lta'i longs sbyong ga la yod//cho ga 'di ni bstan par bya//byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ldan//skye bo bkren pa gzigs nas ni//cung zhing mdor bsdus dkyi
50a4(rgyud): 'khor ni//mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin//'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i bye ma shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga pa 'bar bas/dkar po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /nag pa
50a5(rgyud): dang /ljang ku'i kha dog tu kha bsgyur la/sngar bzhag pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te rtsa ba'i rig pas
50a6(rgyud): phye ma la phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o//gzhan zhib sgrub pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu lho shar gyi phyogs las kyi cho ga mthong bas me thab bya'o//khru gnyis
50a7(rgyud): kyi tshad la dpangs khru gang tsam khor khor yug tu pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam par shing pA la sha'i yaM shing rnams kyis me rab tu sbar te/shing dpal 'bras kyi yam shing mtha
50b1(rgyud): gang tsam gyi tshad la rlan dang bcas pa/zho dang sbrang rtsa dang /mar la btags pa rnams kyis rtsa ba'i snying pos sam/phyag rgya dang /rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis me lha spun drang bar bya'o//spyan
50b2(rgyud): drangs nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyis rig pa'am/rtsa ba'i reg pa'i snying pos slar yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis
50b3(rgyud): gtsug tar gcing zhing yo byad tshogs par byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa 'am slob ma byed du gzhug go/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas
50b4(rgyud): da /byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid lo byas nas sngar brjod pa'i bdug pa'i rig pas srego/thal mor sbyor ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
50b5(rgyud): byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas nas phye ma blangs te/gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing /ri mo mkhan mkhas pas rdzo
50b6(rgyud): par bya'o//che ga 'di dag gis dang po kho nar re shig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyis mchog dang ldan pa rin po che seng+ge'i khi la bzhugs pa/
50b7(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun tu bri'o//dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjesu sgrub pa pos bdag nyid srung ba'i tshi ga dang /
51a1(rgyud): rig pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/dkyipa 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og tu gtor bar bya'o//de
51a2(rgyud): nus khrus byas nas me thab dang nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang sbra dang /srung ba'i cho ba byas te rtsa bo'i rig pos gur gum dang /bsres pa'i mar gyi bsrogs blugs
51a3(rgyud): stong phyag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid du gnas par bya'o//yungs kar dkar po la khro bo'i rgya la po sgrol
51a4(rgyud): mas non pa'i sngags brgya rtsi brgyad du mngon par bsngags te/mngon par bsngags nas khaM phor kha sbyor du bzhag par bya'o//bgegs kyi rnam par
51a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams du ma dang /nga ro drag po dang /rlung dang /char dang /yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ongs pa mthong na/khros pas yungs kar gyi
51a6(rgyud): sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas bgegs rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro//mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang ba nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur
51a7(rgyud): ba'am/nus pa med par 'gyur po 'am/'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro//de nas rje su sgrub pa pos de nyid du ku sha'i khres
51b1(rgyud): lats+tsheb 'dug nas zhu ba'i rgyal ba sgral mas non pas bzlas pa spyod cing gnas par gyu//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sa bcom ldan 'das sh+tsa/thub pa sku gzugs
51b2(rgyud): g.yas kyi ga zhi gsu rang sangs rgyas gnyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs par bya'o//de'i 'og tu nyan thos chen pa gnyis chos nyan par bya'o//
51b3(rgyud): rnams kyis 'ang g.ya su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba pad+ma'i gdan la bcu
51b4(rgyud): pi phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams nas/g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o//de'i yang g.ya su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/phyag g.yas pas
51b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ral po'i cod pan+d+ha 'chang ba/dngol dkar ba'i nabaza' bsgoms pa/dngu la'i
51b6(rgyud): stod g.yogs bla gos bsnams pa/thal ba nag po'i thig le gsum byas pa'o//de bzhin du brtan pa dang /khre gnyer can ma yang /rang rang gi gdan la rang rang gi spyod lam
51b7(rgyud): duganas shing nye bar bzhigs pa yang bya'o//de rnams kyi g.ya su bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin ma dang /gtsug
52a1(rgyud): rgyal mo yang bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sede'i bcu drug bya ba la/'di lta ste/kun tu bzang po dang /sa'i snying po dang /na mkha'i mdzod dang /sgrib pa thams
52a2(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba dang /ngan song sbyong dang /byams pa phyag na rdo ya bo thogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha bzhin pa dang /dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang /dri ma mang
52a3(rgyud): pa'i tog dang /nor bzang dang /zla 'od dang /dri ma med par grags pa dang /nad thams cad gas par byed pa dang /chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal paM dang /'jig rten/
52a4(rgyud): 'gro ba dang /blo gros chen po dang /mngon par 'dzin pa zhes pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
52a5(rgyud): 'bri'o//reg pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang /reg pa'i rgyal mo dang /pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang /phyag rgya rnams lung las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin dang /gnas ji lta ba
52a6(rgyud): bzhin du bri'o//mtha'i gnasu yang gru bzhi'i rnam par gnas bzhag par bya'o//pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang /rig pa'i lha gang gis dran pa yang gnas nga rnams
52a7(rgyud): su bzhag par bya'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yos kyi gzhig su rang sangs rgyas na mkha' dang /yongasu zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ngo //de bzhin du
52b1(rgyud): shar du khaM bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhog su rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan dang /grub pa zhes pa
52b2(rgyud): gzhan gnyis kyang kun tu bri'o//de rnams kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po 'od srung chen po dang /kat+ya ni dang gnyis kun tu bri'o//de rnams kyi yang gzhog su 'phags pa phyag na rdo
52b3(rgyud): rjes ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs su snang ba rab tu zhi ba'i gzugs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/phyag g.yas rnga yab thogs pa/g.yon pas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa'o//rdo rje khu
52b4(rgyud): tshu ra dang /rdo rje lcags kyu dang /rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /dpung bzang dang /rdo rje sde rnams cha khyod ji lta ba dang /mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bgai Da rnams 'joms pa'o//rig pa'i
52b5(rgyud): rgyal po dang /rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /gzugs dang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams ji ltar dran pa bzhin du bri'o//de rnams kyis yang g.yon du gru bzhi'i
52b6(rgyud): rnam par rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bri bar bya'o//bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa de rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o//dri rnams kyi steng
52b7(rgyud): du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /bcom ldan 'das ma ma mA ke kun tu bri ste rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu zhi ba'i las//de rnams kyi yang steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad
53a1(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/phyag rgya btsongs pa rang rang gi 'khar los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugasu kun tu bre ste/gsor mdog dbang
53a2(rgyud): po rab tu zhi ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la cung zad pa lta ba sbyin pa rnams 'di lta ste/gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang /gtsug
53a3(rgyud): tor mngon par 'phags pa dang /gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang /rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /gzi brjid
53a4(rgyud): phung po dang /gtsug tor mthon po zhes pa ste/gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams kun tu bri'o//'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/g.yas phyogasu
53a5(rgyud): ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i gtsod poni 'chang ba/phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pos phreng ba 'dzin pa/phyag g.yon pas spyi blugs
53a6(rgyud): 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa kun tu bri'o//'jug po'i sgo'i g.yon phyogasu ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las
53a7(rgyud): rgyal ba bri bar bya ste/rab tu zhi ba'i lus ra'i po'i cod pan 'chang ba/phyag gi yon dbyug gu dang /ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa/phyag g.yas pas bgrang phreng bzung nas
53b1(rgyud): / sar rang skyon par byed pa/bzhon cung bang srog nyir can 'jug pa'i stsol mngon par gro sa pa smyan du rnaM//se bye na na
53b2(rgyud): phreng ba sgo 'khrugs pa de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das mi rig pa'i rgyal me chen mo ha cang mi skem ha cang mi sgom pa'i lus su gnas pa/
53b3(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba'i sgra/gzugs mdzes shing cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin/phyag g.yon pas ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/phyag g.yas pas de la 'bras bsnams pa/byis pa'i rgyan du
53b4(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/rin po che'i cad pan 'ching ba/mr-i tig ge phreng shes mo chad pyir thogs po b+h+yas pe/dAr le'i steng g.yogs brlabs pa/dar gyen bzis smang g.yogs pa/kun nas
53b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/pad+ma'i gangan la nye bar bzhugs pa/khro bo'i rgyal por gyur pa/sgrol mas non pa la gzigs par gyur pa/dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo
53b6(rgyud): mngon par phyogs pa/lha na sdug pa thams cad du srin mo ral gcig pa byas pa'i gzugs 'chang ba kun tu bri'o//de'i g.yas phyogs kyi gzhag su pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal
53b7(rgyud): sbrel mas non pa bre ste/rnam par 'gyur ba che ni po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bang ba'i phreng bas 'khrun pa bka' so sor bzhes bzhin pa/byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur
54a1(rgyud): la blta ba kun nas bri'o//g.yon gyi gzhog su pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ste/'di lta ste/
54a2(rgyud): shin tu dri ma med pa dang /shin tu dul ba dang /dag pa dang /mun pa sel byed dang /kun tu snang ba zhes pa/de rnams thams cad kyang gnas gtsang me'i gnas na 'dug pa/
54a3(rgyud): rin po che 'bar ba du ma'i rdo'i mthil dang 'dra ba/kun nas 'bar ba rnam par bkra ba'i me tog rnams kyis bcal du bkram pa/gzugs mdzes pa kun tu bri'o//pha rol gyi khor
54a4(rgyud): yug tu bru bzhir rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa rnam par bkra ba'i tshon sna lngas gsal ba/shin tu drang ba'i me dma' bas nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o//shar gyi phyog su bcom
54a5(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog gi rgyal po'i dbang po pad+ma'i gAdan la nye bar bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shin tu chung tsam du bya ste/
54a6(rgyud): kun nas 'ber ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/phyag mchog sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa/sku'i gtsug tor la bzhugs pa'o//de'i g.yas su btsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
54a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bri bar bya'o//g.yon du gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bi bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya'o//bcom
54b1(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i g.ya su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bya ste/phyag
54b2(rgyud): mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o//de'i yang ga.asu lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o//de
54b3(rgyud): bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gan su pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o//bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i rgyal po de bzhin ga sh+lo bas pa'i g.yon du gtsug tor gzi brjid
54b4(rgyud): phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o//de'i yang g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par
54b5(rgyud): mdzad bzhin pa bai DUr+ya sngon po dang /mar gad dang /pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/kun nas kun tu 'od gsal ba bri'o//de'i yang g.yon du rgyal ba'i
54b6(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun tu bri'o//de'i yang g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bri'o//de'i yang g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs/
54b7(rgyud): dang bgrang phreng dang bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o//sgo'i gnasu rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar bar bri'o//bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
55a1(rgyud): gri 'og tu phyag rgya chen po dbyug pa can dang /ut+pa la'i phyag rgyu kun nas 'bar ba ri dag phan tshun mu 'byur bar kun tu bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun tu
55a2(rgyud): bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de yang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba rnam par bkra zhing lta ni sdug pa/zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir ro//nang gi
55a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi sher phyogasu tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/gdong bzhi pa/gos dkar po bgos pa/stod g.yogs gos dkar po can/
55a4(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po can/gser gyi mdog rol pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/g.yon na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa/phyag na rdo rje'o//de'i yang g.ya su 'od gsal
55a5(rgyud): gyi lha'i bu bya ste/lus dang la'i gos bgos pa/da la'i stod g.yogs can bzhin rab tu zhi ba/ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/skyil krung
55a6(rgyud): gis nye bar 'dug pa/phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa'o//de'i yang ga ma su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/rab tu zhi ba'i lus/sems
55a7(rgyud): bsam gtan gnas pa ngar la'i gos bgos pa/da la'i stod g.yogs can skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/mchod phyir thogs dag
55b1(rgyud): can no de'i rim pas dga' ldan dang /'apral dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / thab bral dang /brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/go rim ji lta ba bzhin dang
55b2(rgyud): cha byad dang /dbyibs ji lte ba bzhi no//brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris te/rtag myos dang /phreng thogs dang /lag nA gzhong thogs dang /pi wang gnyis pa dang /sap+pa/
55b3(rgyud): ba'i lha'i bu rnams go rimos ji lta ba dang /cha byad ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du lho phyogasu mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong dang /gya nom snang dang /dge chung dang //
55b4(rgyud): bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams cha byad dang /dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang /de bzhin du yang byang gi phyogasu yang ngo //nub kyi
55b5(rgyud): phyogasu de rnams kyi 'og tu phreng gnyis la brten nas bre bar bya'o//dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go
55b6(rgyud): rlom bzhin du bri bar bya'o//byang phyogasu 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su nor sbyin gter dang nye bor gnas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan po/cod pan cung zad bcom pa/gnod sbyin
55b7(rgyud): gyi gzugs cano//de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang /gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dag bri'o//de bzhin du rim gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mi 'phrog ma bri ste/gnon nu
56a1(rgyud): dga' byed phyung na 'dug pa/dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa bri'o//lngas rtsen dmar ser 'jig su rung ba'ang bri ste/de rnams kyi nya logasu garlodang phyid
56a2(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du rim gyis nub kyi phyogasu lha lag na zhugs pa thogs pa dang /klu dga' bo dang /nye dga'i dang /'jog po dang /nor rgyas kyi bul
56a3(rgyud): sogs pa rgyal po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du phreng gnyis pa la brten nas go rIms bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri za dang /mi'am ci dang /lto 'phye
56a4(rgyud): chen po dang /drang srong dang /grub pa dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang /sman dang /nor bu rin po che'i bye bragang
56a5(rgyud): ri bo dang /chu bo dang /gling rnams go rims bzhin du gtso bor grags pa dang /mchog tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o//lho phyogasu gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang
56a6(rgyud): bcas pa bri bar bya'o//shar gyi phyogasu me lha kun 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/dbyug pa dang /ril pa spyi blug dang /bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa/ral pa'i cod pan
56a7(rgyud): 'chang ba gos dkar po bgos po/dar la'i stod g.yogs can/mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/gsor gyi mdog thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/sna tshogs pa'i
56b1(rgyud): d+hAnA /na chen chu dang /rgyu byung dang /dbying sa dang /khadag de yang phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bar bya'o//thams cad nas 'jug pa'i \u0f7flU 'khor chen par dka badrug/
56b2(rgyud): dag ga/d+hA mAr+g+ha ga la zhon te/'a ba gsas gdu mchogs la//l+h+wam pa di na zla yod N+ya nA thams kyis brten pa 'aM/sbyin drug kle srung rma la na
56b3(rgyud): lag nan dung gling thogs pa/gzhon nu'i gzugs can/glodang g+h+ra pA lus dri ma dather sna bgos sor byi bags shing stong g.yogs gos sir pi rnan/phyag g.yon pas
56b4(rgyud): d+hil du thogs nas byud na dmyur po thogs pa'i'o//go rim bzhin du dz+haiM gi ri te shin tu ring pa'i rnam pa dang /tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /dga' byed dpod phyug dang /nag
56b5(rgyud): chen po dang /ma mo 'dun po rgyan dang /chu byad dang /dbyings ji lta bzhin du mngon par bri'o//nor lce brgyad dang /drang srang bdun dang /khyadab 'jug phyog bzhi po/phyag na
56b6(rgyud): 'khrur sno / dang/rgyu dang /rnam sa /nam ng+ge m+bI gi hU~Mzhi nA ga rgyun thams cang+kaHsa~M rgyun bya'o//ga brgyu dang /d+d+haT+TaHda nga /
56b7(rgyud): sasteng gi dkyil 'khor lo rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad kyang bri'o//kau rims bzhin du/dkar po dang /nag po'i ches bco lnga dang /'dru gnyis dang /dus drug/
57a1(rgyud): zlab bcuganyis/ tshogs dang /sring mo bani glul zhon dang /lnga po mang po tshul gnas pa rnams te/mdor nA phyug rgyu rnanas rnam par gzhug pad+ma d+ha/
57a2(rgyud): lha rnams go rims bzhin du phreng gnyis su bya'o//mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum par yang /dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas mngon par bri bar bya ste/dkyil 'khor
57a3(rgyud): gsum po rnam su 'ang gru bzhir rnam par gzhog par bya'o//'di rnams bcom ldan 'daso//mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' thams cad kyi rga
57a4(rgyud): bo ni nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o//pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni g.yasu nges par bri bar bya'o//rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g.yon du
57a5(rgyud): ngas par bri bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang nges par bri bar bya'o//'dzom dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par bri bar bya'o//
57a6(rgyud): lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su nges par bri bar bya'o//'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro//dkyil ba la yang /shar gyi phyogasu mi mjed
57a7(rgyud): kya bdag po tshangs pa nges par bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du lho'i phyog du 'od gsal ba'o//'og min dang gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro//
57b1(rgyud): ru shes med 'du shes mod min gyi skye mchod mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin//byang ba phyogasu brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang /rab 'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dgang //
57b2(rgyud): dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po ri re nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o//lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa
57b3(rgyud): bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su mngon par bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byung gi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog pa dang bcas pa//
57b4(rgyud): nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o//sgo gnyis po'i nye logasu gzhon nu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la/lag na mdung thung thogs pa/lus dmar por snang ba/gos ser po
57b5(rgyud): stod g.yogs bgos pa/phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs pa/gzho no nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o//shar gyi phyogasu
57b6(rgyud): na mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang /drang srong mArkaN+Da nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o//lhag ma rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su yang ngo //
57b7(rgyud): shar du gzhan nu bzhi dang /gzhon nu ming po dang lhan cig pa gru'i bzhon pa la kun tu gnas pa chu gter chen po la yongs rgyu b.raro byed pa/me lha'i rgyal po ya
58a1(rgyud): /nges pa madran par bru~M Sh+Tar+yA Sh+Ta//de bzhin du lta'i phyogs/slong gi sman pa bdan shin tu 'jugs rung bar+t+ta dang rkang ba nusaN+Da la brtan nas dang/
58a2(rgyud): pa dang rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa'i nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o//lcug m+b+ha phyug rgya rnam su yang rnam pa bzhin
58a3(rgyud): par bya'o//de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyog su klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya ste/gza'i gtso bo nyi ma yang ngo //nub kyi phyog suM thub pa ser skye zhes bya ba rlung
58a4(rgyud): slong mchog dang /mu stegs can gcer buM pa'i khyu mchog/gcer bu'i gzugasu go rim bzhin du phyag rgya rnam su rnam par bzhag par bya'o//byang nub kyi phyogasu gnod sbyin
58a5(rgyud): gyi rgyal po nir sbyin dang /dri za'i rgyal po zung phud lnga pa dang /myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa ste 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o//lhag ma dbyibs dzI ra kun tu gonas pa bzhin du/
58a6(rgyud): gari mus bzhin phyag rgya rnams yang mngon par bri bar bya'o//dkyil 'khor bzhi pa mngon par bri'o zhes pa phyi rol hU~M dkyil 'khor lon par rim+bi k+Shas smras pa b+hag rgyu'i rmi/
58a7(rgyud): pas mdzes par byas pa gru bzhi dang rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa dang /rgyal po chen po bzhis rnam par rgyan pa/gau rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa 'di lta ste/'jug pa'i sko
58b1(rgyud): phyag rgyar gyur bapa ni ut+pal sngon por bri'o//g.yas dang g.yan du ni pad+ma dang /rdo rje dang /dgra sta dang /dung dang /mdung rngu gsum dang /bre can dang /'khor lo dang /sim+ba ka dang
58b2(rgyud): zin pa dang /!dang /dung dang /gdung sgrer dang /ril pa spyi blugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / don dang /zhabs pa hUM/dril bu dang /phyi dang /zla ba dang /gzhu dang /ljags ma
58b3(rgyud): ste 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug bu grwa bzhir phreng bas khyab par bya'o//de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya cher po bzhi bzhag
58b4(rgyud): par byastI/byid phyogasu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa tsun b+has n+tasI rdo rje gan+ti sa ka nas rtse mo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bor ba'o//shar phyog su dkyil 'khor
58b5(rgyud): gsum pa'i rnam pa can kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o//lho'i phyogasu dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o//nu
58b6(rgyud): kyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas ut+pa la sngon po rang gi sdang bu dang /'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o//phyobs bral rnamasu phyag bzhir 'gyuraro//
58b7(rgyud): nub byang gi phyog su dkyil 'khor zlas pa'i rnams byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar po'o//lho nub kyi phyog pu dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byis nas dbyug pa kun nas
59a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'o//lho shar gyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can byas nas dag sta kun nas 'bar ba'o//byang shar gyi phyogasu ral gri kun nas 'bar ba
59a2(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o//thams cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang 'og dang thad kar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phyi mi nyid kyi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/
59a3(rgyud): gos dang /bsil yab dang /lham kun nus 'bar ba de rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o zhes//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas//sems can phan don 'dod pa yi//dkyil
59a4(rgyud): 'khor cho ga 'di rnams kyis//mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste/dbang po ma tshang ba med pa
59a5(rgyud): dang /yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang rje rigs dang /dmangs rigs byang chub tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa/thag pa
59a6(rgyud): gzhan mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sems dpa' chen po dad cing dge ba'i chos can dang /rgyal srid tshon po mngon par 'dod pa dang /longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang /
59a7(rgyud): longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma
59b1(rgyud): sdom pa la gnas pa/gas sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zho mi sdang ba dang /phyogs chen po dang /rigs dang ldan pa dang /rang bzhan/
59b2(rgyud): gyis chos spyod pa/nyin dang mtshan du bsrung bar gnas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/sgra dri zhim pa dang /khrus gsum byas pa/mi smra bar gyur pa/de'i nyin mo ga bur dang /gub
59b3(rgyud): bum dang /mo la ya'i tsin+dan dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/rtag tu nye reg byas pa dang ldan pa/ku sha'i khyis pa nye bor 'dug ste/srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang /rmongs par spyod
59b4(rgyud): pa dang /bden pa dang ldan pa dang /rgyal bar dgongs po phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang mi ring bar bzhag par bya'o//gtsang zhing gautsang sbra byas pa ji srid cig
59b5(rgyud): nas brgyad la sogs pa'i bar rnams te/gzhan rnams ni ma yin no//de rnams kyang phan tshun kun tu chaDa pa/rgyal rig spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang /de
59b6(rgyud): rnams kyi bu gzhon nu ma rnams grong pa'i chos ma shes pa ste bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tu
59b7(rgyud): par byed pa/gzhon nu'i skye bo dga' bar byed pas so//de nas ches thog mar de lta bu'i phreng ba'i chos mi shes pa rab tu gzhug par bya/rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel
60a1(rgyud): ba dang /tshe dang nad med pa dang /dbang phyug dang longs spyod chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang /khyad par du yang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos gru
60a2(rgyud): nges par gnas pa'i phyiraro//de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzong po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/rgyab kyi phyogs pa yin par bya
60a3(rgyud): rol tu 'byung bar bya ste/byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/srog chags med pa/rtsa ba'i rog pa brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas pa/phyag rgya chen pos
60a4(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'i tshus khrus byas nas/nye reg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas/me thab du song nas/ku sha'i khris lo nye bar 'dug ste byang shar du mngon par
60a5(rgyud): phyogs pas ga bur dang gur gum tsan+dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//sngar brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang /gshegasu gsol
60a6(rgyud): li//slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o//zhugs nas bum pa gang ba brgyad gtsang mo'i gos dang ljon pa shing sa ha ka'i yul mdab dang 'bras bus rnam par brgyan
60a7(rgyud): pa gser dang dngul dang rin po che dang /'bru nang du bcug pa/de lnga bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o//gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la
60b1(rgyud): gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o//bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'o//lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
60b2(rgyud): dbang phyug la'o//drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o//bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang du bzhag par bya ste/gcig pa ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
60b3(rgyud): gyur par yongasu bsngos nas bzhag par bya'o//de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis bdug pa bsreg cing ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/sangs
60b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /'byung po thams cad dang /skyon ras gzigs dbang
60b5(rgyud): phyog kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drang bar bya'o//de bzhin du me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /mar me dang /lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis lha shos
60b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o//mar me smos pa nyid kyis ma de gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o/'gas pa dang /'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos
60b7(rgyud): smos pas/sa bu'i zan zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang ldan po/'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la bcos pa'i snum khur gyis mya ngan med pa 'khyil pa dang /baN+Da la so Da pa
61a1(rgyud): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o//phyi rol gang ba dang /tsan+dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi dang 'am/'o thug btsos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang
61a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o//ladra
61a3(rgyud): tsAn+da dang /gar+b+ha d+hA khyad par dang /sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang /'byung po'i tshongs dang /sems can thams cad la dbul bar bya'o//de bzhin du sna ma dang /rgya smos
61a4(rgyud): kyi me tog dang /pudz+nyA ga la sogs pa rnams sder nges par bstan pa/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen
61a5(rgyud): rnams dang /'phags pa dang /'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dngul bar bya'o//khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga sna ma'i me tog dang /pad+ma'i rigs
61a6(rgyud): la pad+ma dang /de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ut+pa la dang /gzhan rnams lo tha mal pa'i sngags kyis//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs log pur gyi 'dug pa'o//
61a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs la tsan+dan no//de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o//sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar
61b1(rgyud): bya'o//'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la/mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o//'phags pa min pa'i sngags rnams la//dri zhim til mar dbul du bzhug/cho ga'i go rims bzhin du ni//bdug
61b2(rgyud): pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so//de bzhin kho nar brjod pa'i dri//sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o//de bzhin gshegs lnga gang brjod dang /phyagan rdo rje gang brjod pa//rang rang gi ni
61b3(rgyud): rgyud rnams//sngags spyod don du sgrub pa pos//'dir ni cho ga lta bar bya//kun nas rje su 'jug pa'o zhes pa'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang /
61b4(rgyud): mchod pa dang /bdug pa la sogs pa dang /lha bshos rab tu dbul po rjesu 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyen pas/'byung po
61b5(rgyud): thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa thams cad dang /rnga pa Ta ha dang /dung gi sgra'i sgra dbyings nges par sgrogs pas/bdug pa dang /me tog dang /mar mo dang /phreng bas rnam par///
61b6(rgyud): sbas pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang /phyogs phral rnams dang steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma
61b7(rgyud): rgya cher gtor bar bya'o//de na khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar la btags pa'o 'obs sa lu dang /thug po che'i sprin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa'am snying pos stong phrag
62a1(rgyud): brgyad phyug/skyon srog byas nas kyang byung posong pa'i dkyil 'khor ladus zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la snang ba'i cha ga rnams byas par rgya/
62a2(rgyud): khar gyi slob dpon gyis slob ma nyid khas blangs pa/byang chub tu sems bsrud pa/gso sbyong byis pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid
62a3(rgyud): kyi lus dngos grub kyi don du phul bA/sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'ongs spyod pa thun mongs par gyur pa bla na mong pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa/dge ba rnams
62a4(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/mtshams med pa
62a5(rgyud): nga pa'i phyi ban pas kyang snad cib de la gribo par 'gyur ro//de na sa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma nyems pa thug pas btags ma thag pa/skra dang bral ga
62a6(rgyud): ba'i rig pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa/dri zhim po'i tsan+dan dang /gur gum gyis bgos pa'i dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi gang
62a7(rgyud): g.yogs nas thog ma nis bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pas rab tu 'jug par bya'o//rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/gzhan yang sprong
62b1(rgyud): pa rgyal srong chen po 'dod pa yang rab tu gzhug par bya'o//dkyil 'khor gnas par gnas pa gdod g.yogs nas dro bzang po me tog tsan+dan dang klur lum dag gis
62b2(rgyud): rnam pa dusas pa shin tu gcing rjes pa'i phyug pa dag gis me rtag mazud du gzhug par bye//gang du 'i 'i rdeg pabs pa de la rdo ma dzin pa'i sdug sa
62b3(rgyud): pa bya'o//spyi gzhan rnams de nyid dang 'di hU~M 'phrul ba'o zhe sbyig tu grabs pa yin zhing/do das pa'i hUM shes du byung chu kyi skyed pa gnan par byung
62b4(rgyud): dang /byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzobs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o//de nyid 'dzitsho bsgru par byeb dang /langs su
62b5(rgyud): pa dang /zlal sang chen po dang /debang che bar grags pa'i gang theg dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngan par sgru par spyod pa'o//skye ba 'di nyid sgrub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag 'di spyong/
62b6(rgyud): las rnams thams rgyud 'thun par rnyegyud//de bzhin rim gyi de lta bul sogs 'dzi na da pyod pa sa d+hA sa de zhin rnams rim yin zhes/sgyu
62b7(rgyud): dad pa gzhan yad ci ster 'dang pa bzhin du sdug pa zang pa'i de ni du mtshig tsame 'gyung zhes pa'i//dkyil 'khor gyi sgrib pon gyis mngon par dbang ga phyi
63a1(rgyud): dang ba ra shig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ta cang mi ring /ha cang mi nye ba'i byung shar gyi phyogs kyi cha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing
63a2(rgyud): sngags kyis dag par byas nas de nus rgyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtho'i gcig tu sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la mngon par
63a3(rgyud): dang ba'i dad pa dang /spro ba chen po dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba/theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed pa/dbang po ma
63a4(rgyud): tshang pa med cing ma smad pa/skye ba 'di nyid la rig pa dang /sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/bsam pa bzang zhing /sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa/dge mtshan 'dod pa'i/
63a5(rgyud): rang bzhin can/sad pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i don la rnam rtog med cing der gtad pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o//lhag
63a6(rgyud): ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes//shes rab can dang spyod pa la ma rmongs pa'i khyad par las te/gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba me yi no//de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur
63a7(rgyud): bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/slob dpon dang mkhan po mnyes par bya'o//de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang gdugs dkar po mgo bor
63b1(rgyud): 'dzin bzhin pa dang /rnga yab dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa dang /bkur sti chen pos dung dang /rnga bo che dang /rdza rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang /rgyal ba'i sgra dang /bkla/
63b2(rgyud): shis kyi tshogasu bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang /bde logs kyi tshigasu bcad pa rgyal bas gsung pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang /bkra shis de byas
63b3(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod
63b4(rgyud): pa mngon par sgrub pa la yang dag par rjesu 'jug pa dang //'jig rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par rje su 'jug
63b5(rgyud): dang /chos kyi tshul srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa dang /mdor bsdus nas brjod na sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid sgri ba
63b6(rgyud): bgyi'o zhes//de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la dang po re shig rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur
63b7(rgyud): byin nas/phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa smras par bya'o//de nas rig po dang /sngags dag gang gnas pa/gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi haM gis bri bar bya'o//bris nas tsan+dan dang
64a1(rgyud): gur gum dag gis lag pa dag dang kham pho ru kha sbyor bkrus nas de nas glo ga'i 'dab ma khaM phor khyu sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nus dkyil 'khor
64a2(rgyud): gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du bzhag par bya'o//de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i snga/
64a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad sdo ma nyid du brjod par bya'o//de nas der ku shi'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o//phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad dang thun
64a4(rgyud): mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang bsgo dang nye ba sngar bzhag pa blangs nas slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bya'o//slob ma ji ltar 'dod
64a5(rgyud): po'i chus spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o zheso//de nas de la kham phor kha sbyor de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o//mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o//gal te des
64a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig pa'am sngags bzung po nyid yin par gyur na bklags pa nyid las kyang las byed do//rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrubs pas byed
64a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//gzhan rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do//de nas sngags yongasu bzung bar 'gyu ro//dang po bsgrub pa kho nas 'grub par byed do//zhes pa/
64b1(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa med pa las so//de kho na sbyar bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyuraro//'bad pa med par ro//de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par
64b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o//dkyil 'khor gnyis par mngon par dbang bskur ba ni/dkyil 'khor gnyis par dkyil 'khor thams cad lha dong /lha thams cad la gang rab
64b3(rgyud): tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas
64b4(rgyud): thams cad kyis rjesu gnang bar 'gyu ro//'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /dkyil 'khor dang /sngags dang /phyag rgya sgrub pa la yang lhag par 'dod par
64b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dngang bskur ba sbyin//dkyil 'khor gsum par nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i
64b6(rgyud): bum pa gang ba tshi ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o//khyod la sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten
64b7(rgyud): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang /nye bar ston pa dang /rgyud dang rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang spyad pa nges par ston pa/
65a1(rgyud): dang /rang gi cho ga ngas par ston par rje su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o//skyo ba 'di nyid dam dang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan rnams sangs rgyas nyi nges pa
65a2(rgyud): thob bo//de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang snga ngas por bstan pa'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la lngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang /
65a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin kho nar mngon par dbang bskur//de bzhin du yang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang
65a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos rnams kyi 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /lus tson thams cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgal ba dang //
65a5(rgyud): khyed sngags thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrubs shig ces rje su gnang ngo zhes brjed par bya'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dben gyis sems can lnga po nyid
65a6(rgyud): ro la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bsrung po sbyin par bya'o//de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
65a7(rgyud): cad la phul te/dkyil 'khor la bskor ba len gsum byas nas gshegasu gsol bar bya'o//de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa
65b1(rgyud): rnams la bslab par bya zhing /rnam par sbyar bar bya'o//skad cig de nyid la song nas sbyar brten par phul ba/byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sbyar phul ba'i chu bum go gang ba bram
