65b2(rgyud): nas/dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnamaso la chu khyod pa gsum shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o//'di skad brjod par bya ste/kye byang chub sems
65b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gang gis 'bar byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyuraro//dkyil 'khor gang du 'am/der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil
65b4(rgyud): 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyis slob dpon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas grogs byed pa'i lag par gos dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings
65b5(rgyud): gzhan gyis sam gos kun tu g.yogs te gnas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rigs dman pi rnams kyis me tog gtor bar bya'o//de nas grogs byed pa de rnams
65b6(rgyud): kyis kyang /rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis khrus bya'o//dri rnams kyis yang dam tshig tsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sgrub pa yang grub par 'gyuraro//de sngar
65b7(rgyud): byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnasu song nas rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyiso//der yang ma thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do//zhi ba dang /rgyas pa dang /mngon spyod do//zhe
66a1(rgyud): ba'i don du pad+ma'i rnam pa'o//yang na tshim par byed pas dbang du byed pa yang //mngon spyod la zung gsumo//de la mo'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad la ku shA
66a2(rgyud): dgram par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas/shar gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba bzhag par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas me'i bya
66a3(rgyud): ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse mor ro//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/byang gi rtse mo re sbyin par bya'o//de bzhin du yang bya ba rnams grogs
66a4(rgyud): byed pas gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyis ma'i bya ba ku shA rnams kyiso//thog mar rtse ba'i rig pas so//thog mar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin
66a5(rgyud): desreg nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o//zhi ba'i don du snying pos mar gyiso//rgyas pa'i don du shing a pa marga gsum gyi sbyin srego/mngon spyod la ka Ta ki yiso//me'i bya
66a6(rgyud): tshig 'di yang thams cad du thun meng ba'i sgrub pa rnams la yang ngo //dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa rnamasu yang ngo //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
66a7(rgyud): gnas gtsang mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/me'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa rnams la/de nas rtswa
66b1(rgyud): rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i khyad par rnams dang /bcom
66b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol/gang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga las 'das par yang rung ste/lus par byed pa dang /gzhan yang gang cung zad
66b3(rgyud): bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gnas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /byang chub sems dpa'
66b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyod yul dang ma bral bar thob par gyur cig/myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig/de skad ces brjod par bya'o//dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems
66b5(rgyud): can rnams thams cad la/mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o//sbyin pa la rab tu chags pa dang /byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang /sangs
66b6(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang /mdor na lung dang rig pa dang gsang sngogs sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya//
66b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad//
67a1(rgyud): la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yon phul nas sam de nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nus rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas gats+tsha gats+tsha zhes pa dang /swAn+d+ha zhes/
67a2(rgyud): pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bltas pas gshegasu gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o//
67a3(rgyud): byung chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byams kyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs
67a4(rgyud): so////de nas sems dpa' chen po de slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas lha'i bu rnams thams cad la smras par gyur
67a5(rgyud): te/khyed rnams nyon cig/mchog gi grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga rig pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang /rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa chen po
67a6(rgyud): nyid dang /don chen po byed pa/phung khrol thams cad bzlog par byed pa/don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/mchog tu bkra shis pa thams cad kun nas bak+Sha shisa~M pa sangs rgyas
67a7(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsungs pa/bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa las phrin tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya gi/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo
67b1(rgyud): las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na/na mau rat+na tA yA ya/na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki to shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/mahA ku ru No kA ya/tad+ya thA/
67b2(rgyud): tA re tuta t+tA re tu re swA hA/grogs po dag 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma las chen po thams ca byed pa lngas phran tshegs thams cid dbaklags pas grub pa/mchog tu gsang ba shin
67b3(rgyud): tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig pa byed pa'i rig pa 'di yang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang /sgrub thab su gyur te/'pha
67b4(rgyud): ma sgrol mas las chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang /las phran tshegs thams cad la yang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis cho ga dang sgrub thabs
67b5(rgyud): rnams la yang ngo //nyin mtshan gang du'am der yang rung ste/gtsang ma'i phyogasasu bri bar bya'o//bdag nyid nyes pa med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gcig pus dang por
67b6(rgyud): zhig grub bzhi mnyam pa sgo bzhi pa khru bzhi'i tshad dang ldan pa'i dbus pad+ma'i phyag rgya de'i ga ya su ut+pa la sngon po dang /dbyug pa'i phyag rgya dang /ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyags
67b7(rgyud): rgya g.yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang /gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya dang /rta mgroni dang dpal chen mo'i phyag rgya'o//shar sgor pad+ma/byang du ut+ma/lho ru rdo rje/nub tu 'jug pa'i/
68a1(rgyud): rim pa pas 'das pa ba steng du 'khyil nga'i rnam pa'i zhagras pa'i phyag rgya'o//de'i 'og tu phye nas me'i bya ba byas nas sbyar brjod pa'i cho ga su mchod pa la
68a2(rgyud): pa byas te/dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o//de la rgyal srid 'dod pas tsit+tha'i shing du'o//longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi'o//rta 'dod pas rta'i bres su'o//glang po che 'dong
68a3(rgyud): pas glang po che'i bres su'o//bu 'dod pas bo de n+ti'i shing gi drung du'o//tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bsgyangs pa ru'o//klus zin pa la klu shing dang nye ba ru'o//mkha'/
68a4(rgyud): 'phro mas zin pa le lam bzhi mdo ru'o//gnod sbyin gyi zin pa la paTa'i shing gi drung du'o//srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o//gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
68a5(rgyud): du gang du'ang /de ru yang nyes pa mdo//grogs po dag mdor bsdus na/rig pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor dang /las thams cad pa ste/las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//
68a6(rgyud): gsang chen 'di dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar bar bya ste dkyil 'khor 'di ni sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bus yod pa'o//longs spyod thams cad mngon por
68a7(rgyud): 'phel bar bad pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir 'byor pa thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa ste/'dor na phyi ma'i lus
68b1(rgyud): can 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa rab tu glags so//de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms par byed cing zhi bar byed/nad dang
68b2(rgyud): dgra 'phrog pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong zhing zos nas de nas cho ga la rab tu dang bskyo bar 'gyur po gang yin pa
68b3(rgyud): de rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis lung ston par the tshom med do//gang yong ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur//'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams
68b4(rgyud): rjes su mi rang bar 'gyur ro//sa spring dkyil 'khor sla ba ni//zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed//bkren po rnams kyis phan po thob//sems can mngon med sdug
68b5(rgyud): bsngal can//rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya//an+d+ra nI la sogs phye mas//dkyil 'khor yang dag kun tu bre//in+d+ra nI la sogs med na//sa luri phye mas yang dag
68b6(rgyud): bri rkes lu'i bye ma sogs med na//so phag phye mo sogs kyis bri//so phag phyi ma sogs med na//bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri//ji ltar yon tan kun bsdus pa'i//sgrol ma'i
68b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba//'jig rten mgon po'i yang dag bka'//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa yin zheso//byang chub sems dpa' sde snod dang ldan pa theg pa chen
69a1(rgyud): po'i mdus/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phangs ma sgrob ma ral bsten rjes kyi rtswa ba'i cho ga las sgrub thabs kyi cha bya dang /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byams cas/
69a2(rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa rdzog so////de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nus dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par 'phrul
69a3(rgyud): pa dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yi rang bar gyur ro/mchog gi sgrub pa'i
69a4(rgyud): cho ga ras ris kyis cho ga gsung so//dang po re shig dag pa'i nyi ma la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bal blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas de'i rgyun du gzhug par bya'o//
69a5(rgyud): de nas ras bal de la lag par gnas par bya ste rtsa ba'i rig pa dpa' bo rin gyis nyos pa'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub
69a6(rgyud): sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad lhag par gnas par mdzod cig/bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams legs
69a7(rgyud): rar 'tsho zhing bdag gi skye ba 'bras bu yod pa dang /sngags kyi dngos grub lhag par gnas par mdzod cig/de'i dus su rnga bo Ta ha dang /rnga bo che dang /dung dang /pi wang dang /
69b1(rgyud): gling bu dang /mkhar rnga dang /rta mur dza'i sgra thos par gyur pa 'am/rgyal rigs sam/rgyal rigs mo 'am/bud med dam/khye'u 'am/bu mo 'am/mi rnams glo bur du 'di skad
69b2(rgyud): ces/rgyal dang /grub dang //dngos grub sbyin pa dang /byir pa dang //zung shig dang /dpal dang /'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /las kyi 'khor lo dang /mang po zhes pa 'di lta bu
69b3(rgyud): la sogs pa gzhan yang dge ba'i sgra rab tu 'don pa dang /dril bu'i sgra byung ba dang /dga' ba'i sgra yang rung ste/de rnams rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
69b4(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o//gzhan du dngos grub 'bras bu medo zhes pas so//de'i dus su de nams ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa
69b5(rgyud): bAm/zung shig/zo shig/'dzin du chug shig/nyam pa rnam par bklag pa/kyi hud/ring ba med pa/de lta bu la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa dang /mi dang /me hU~M dang /
69b6(rgyud): sde sbyang dang /bong bu dang /byi la dang /dud 'gro dman pa rkang gnyis pa/rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sgra 'don par gyur nu/de la sgrub pa pos bdag gis dngos grub med do zhes shes par
69b7(rgyud): byi zhing /skye ba 'di nyid la kun tu brtul bar bya'o//slar yang snga ma bzhin du byas nas brtsams par bya ste/de lta bu la na bdun gyis mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang bdun
70a1(rgyud): pa'i las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur zhes//de nas sgrub pa blos bzhon nu ma dwe la sbyang ba byas nas ku sha'i khres pa nyaM bar 'dug tu bcug skye shar du mngon par//
70a2(rgyud): byugs pa'am/byung du mngon par phyogs par bzhig nasabadan nyid mdu'i stan mo bze'i zhing ga zhon no ma de la yang na du'i ston mo bzar gzhug par bya'o//snga ma kho na
70a3(rgyud): yongasu brtags pa'i ku sha'i khres lo cho ga de nyid kyi ras bal mkhal du gzhug par bya'o//dog pa de 'jam pa dang /legs par sgrim pa sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang
70a4(rgyud): dag par blangs te gcig dang gsum dang lha dang brgyud la sogs pa nas dza srid bcu drug tsam gyi bar du kaR+Sha'i srang grangs legs pa bgrangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu
70a5(rgyud): mes bya'o//de la rab ni bcu drug bya//de bzhin 'bring ni brgyad pa ste//phran tshig so las rnams sgrub pa la//lnga dang gcig ni bla ma'o//sngags rnams kun la sngags rig
70a6(rgyud): pas//ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya//de nas brtsams tAM gang cung zad//sdig pa'i las rnams sngon byas pa//dog pa la dmigs sems kyis ni//de yi skad cig nyid
70a7(rgyud): la 'jig/dge pa 'di ni blangs nas su//gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya//phyog su gyur par bzhog byas nas//ga pur gyi ni 'dug pas 'dug/srog chags yan
70b1(rgyud): lag min byu m+ba//myur bum can dan lnga sogasus ma//tsam pa ka sogs ma yig khro nam me tog rnams kyis bgos//gtsang ma'i phyogasu bzhag nas ni//srung ba'i cho ga byas
70b2(rgyud): nas ni//sdigs rig las kun shes pa yis//shin tu mnyam bzhag bzlas par bya//de nas thug par so nas//ji ltar 'dod pa'i rgyu byin te//yan lag bral min skams min
70b3(rgyud): nyid//dka ba'i chas la rtag tu dga'//nad kyis gdungs min rgan po min//lud pa dbugs mi bde las grol//ma ning mtshan gnyis min pa dang //de ni dman pa myin nyid dang //
70b4(rgyud): ngan par ltung ba spangs pa na//kun nas mtshan nyid yang dag ldan//rab bsngags ste na sdug pa dang //b+h+yo yis kun tu spyod pa dge/'jig rten pa yi 'jug pa rten//dngos gru ba da
70b5(rgyud): bA de la ni//ras mchog 'theg pa byed pa la//rab bsngags dge bya'i stobs ldan na mi//rdo ldan bza ni shin tu ma khas//shin tu mkhas par mchog gyur pa'i//ras ni 'thag
70b6(rgyud): byed mchog gi ni//ras kyi rab po bye ba yin//'bring lta 'bring po sgrub par byed //thams phyen tshogs lngas rnasmras ni//dman pa nyid ni kun las so//bzo bste ji ltar sku
70b7(rgyud): bzhin//de las gru ni ji bzhin sbyin//bzo bo yi ni dang po'i ngag/smras pa de los sngags rig pas//myur du rin ni sbyin par gyis//dpa' bo'i tshing zhes de la brjod//don du
71a1(rgyud): gnyer ba nyid dang de'i//rin gyi dngos po bzlog par byed//myur du dngos grub byed gang 'dri'i//ras na bla na med pa'i mchog/las rnams shin tu mchod par/
71a2(rgyud): 'os//lha dang mi yi bde nyid dang //'byung po kun gyis dpal yin zhes//yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la gso sbyong byin
71a3(rgyud): nAs/shin tu dag pa'i rgyu sbyar la'am/cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la'am/dkar po'i nyi ma'am/dkar po'i gza' nges par bltas te dkar po'i zla phyed gzhan la yang rung ste/
71a4(rgyud): shing sa ta kA ri'i snyi ma dang me tog skyes shing shing gi me tog dang yal ga rgyas shing dpyid ka'i dus/dus kyi mchog der snga dro nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe sngar bstan pa'i rgyu 'thun
71a5(rgyud): bcas pas tha ga paM tsa ru'i bza' bo zos shing gos dkar po gyon pa mgo la gtsug tor bcings nas legs par bkrus pa/tsan+dan dkar po dang /gur gum dag gang yang rung
71a6(rgyud): bas legs par byugs pa/lus la rje su byugs pa/gA pur gyi dris kha bsgos pa/yid dga' zhing bkres pa dang /skom pa dang bral bar byas nas/thags kyi snas la
71a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sa dang /ba lang gi lci ba dag gis bkrus te gsar pa rnams kyang slar yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o//de nas srog chags med
71b1(rgyud): chus bkru bar bya'o//tsan+dan dkar po dang /gur gum gyis mngon par gtor bar bya'o//sa'i phyogs gtsang ma tsa tso dang bral zhing /ljongs kyi me dang bral ba rnam par dben pa'i gnas bla khab dang //
71b2(rgyud): bcas shing gsang bar me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do//de nas rje su sgrub pa pos yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa'i sngags nyid yungs kar dkar po la brgyad mngon par bsdun
71b3(rgyud): par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams dang /steng dang 'og dang phyogs brul rnamasu gtor bar bya'o//de nas tha gro pa la yungs ka gyis yang dag par bsnun nas phyag rgya chen po gtsug
71b4(rgyud): bud lnga pa bcings te/gtsug tor bcing ba byas na srung po chen po byas par 'gyur ro//gal te ras rab yin na zheng du khru bzhi/mchur khru brgyad kyi tshing 'di tsam du tha ga pas bran
71b5(rgyud): bar bya'o//'bri bar gyur na zheng du khru ngo mtshur khru lnga nyid do//tha mo ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi chad la mchur ni sangs rgyas kyi khru gang nyid do//de las sangs rgyas
71b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bo zhes bsgrags te tshad 'dris chang kun tu bshad do//
71b7(rgyud): 'di ni 'phur ba'i dngos grub tu//skyes bu mcho go gis gsungs pa yin//thub pa mi snang gyur 'og tu//rgyal srid 'dod pa la 'bring po ste//longs spyod chen po don gnyer ba'i//
72a1(rgyud): skyes bu lha dang lha min dang //gdengs can tha ma grub par bshad//'bring la dngos grub 'bring po'o//ras 'bring po ni rtag pa ru//sems can kun gyi las
72a2(rgyud): rnams sgrub//phran tshegs las rnams bsgrub bya la//ras tha ma ni rtag pa ru//las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed//rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni//las rnams thams cad
72a3(rgyud): sgrub par byed//res ris gsum gyis nges bston pa'i//dngos grub dpal don gnyer ba'i mi//brgya byi ni bde sogs bdag po yang //cho ga nyams na mi 'grub ste//cho ga
72a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan gyur na//mi yi skye bo phal pa la'ang //'bad pa yis ni las rnams kun//myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur//rgyal dang rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis//sbyor ba
72a5(rgyud): 'di dag yang dag bshad//sems can bkren pa mgon med pa//sdug bsngal gyis gdungs kun gyi dpal//byang chub lam du gang 'di ni//de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis
72a6(rgyud): bstan//chos 'di byang chub rgyu yin par//sngags kyi lam gyis bsten pa yin//dkyil 'khor yang dag bston pa gang //'jig rten dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
72a7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'brub 'gyur te//'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'brug//gang zhig byang chub rgyur 'dod pa//de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur//rtag tu 'gro la ma
72b1(rgyud): phan po//gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs//byang chub ched du 'jug kun la//ras ris thams cad 'grub par gsungs//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi/dam tshig 'di ni khad
72b2(rgyud): par du//myur du bya ba'i don sgrub phyir//'dir ni mtha' dag thob pa ru//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin//de nas ri mi gyis bzo bo yis//'bad pas ras ni btagaso pa/
72b3(rgyud): bya//nyon zhig lnga dang brgyad rnamamo dang //bcu drug gnyis ka bzhi dag dang //nyin mtshan nyid kyis myur ba ru//ras ni 'thag pa rdzogs pa dang //bzo bo mchog tu grub pa ni//nyen
72b4(rgyud): mtshan gyis ni dge ba yin//gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs//bzo ba rtag tu byin rlabs pa//thag ring gnas su song nas ni//bshang dang gci ba yongasu dor//'ong ba
72b5(rgyud): gos dang bcas bkrus nas gzhan pa'i gos gzhon bgo bya zhing //gos dkar 'tshong zhing phreng bar ldan//yang dang yang du nye reg bya//lus la tsan+dan dkar pos byug/bzo
72b6(rgyud): la sogs pa gtsang bar bya//rtag tu 'jam zhing legs sbyangs pas//slar yang 'bad pas rtag par bya//de la sogs pa'i rab sbyor ni//rgyal ba gzhan gyis gsungs pa'am/
72b7(rgyud): 'bad pas rnam dpyad ngang tshul gyis//ras ni ma lus btags par bya//ras kyi thags ni rdzogs pa dang //sngar gyi las kyis le gos sprul po//de rnams ched ldan ma nyams pa/
73a1(rgyud): bya'o bzang ba'i nyin zhag la//rgyud dang rgyud du mnyam par 'jug/dkar ba'i phyogs kyi mdzes pa la//'od ma'i shing ni khru bzhi la//ra.a ni blangs nas
73a2(rgyud): nas 'gro/nor ni rgya cher 'god pa yis//bzo bo bdi legs byas nas ni//brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i//sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas//dri zhim me tog gis
73a3(rgyud): mchod de//gtsang ba'i phyogasu rnam par dgod//'di nyid kyis ni sngags kyis ni//srung ba'i cho ga rab tu byed //gang zhig ras bal sngon du ni//slar yang rnam mang yongs sbyangs
73a4(rgyud): pa/de nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang //ras nyid bsrung bar bya ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che//sngags bzlas pa yis gsungs pa yin//sangs rgyas rnams ni
73a5(rgyud): mang pos dang //ngas kyang de ni slar yang ste//de nyid gsang sngags thams cad kyis//rnam par spyod pa'i sngags kyi gzugs//brtson 'grus chen po gzi brjid che//snga
73a6(rgyud): kyi don kun sgrub pa po//sna tshogs skyabs pa'i rgyu rnams ni//rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur//'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams//sems kyi spyod pa kun tu
73a7(rgyud): rmongs//dad pa med cing phyir ci log/log pa'i kun spyod la rab brkam//sngags rnams sgrub par mi byed pa'i//de nyid phyir na slar gsungs pa//'khor ba mun pa'i btson rar//
73b1(rgyud): 'khyam//gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing //dang ldan ltad mo bkra shis dang //sngags rnams kun la rtag tu spyod//bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'ad//rtag tu 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang //
73b2(rgyud): spro ba che zhing gzi brjid tshe//rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams gang //'bad pa med par yang dag 'grub//dad pa med pa'i skye bo la//dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste//sa bon
73b3(rgyud): skor btab pa la//myu gu med cing 'bras med bzhin//dad pa rtag tu chos kyi rtsar//don kun gzigs pas gsungs pa yin//chos don ngang tshul can de rnams//sngags kyis dngos
73b4(rgyud): grub rtag tu brjod//de nas sgrub bos bzo bo ni//ri mo mkhan nam bdag kyang rung //ri mo mkhas pas ma 'dres pa'i//tshon rtsi kha dog gsal ba dang //kha dog can gyi tshon blangs nas//
73b5(rgyud): ji ltar tha ka pa la ni//sngar ni cho ga de nyid kyis//mtshan nyid yang dag ldan pa yis//ri mo mkhan la gong bzhin du//rgyas pa ru ni bya ba'o//ji ltar sngar bzhin tha ga pa'i//cho ga
73b6(rgyud): de nyid kyis ni de//ras la ri mo bri bar bya//yang na rang gi ri mor bri//ga pur gur gum tsan+dan las//so phag tshon la bsgo bar bya//bdug pa bsregs shing sngags nyi
73b7(rgyud): kyis//lan grang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas//na ga ge sar pun+d+ha ge/bku la~M dang tsam pa k+She//bA raM Shi ka d+ha nu suM//mA li ti'i me tog sogs//ras de la ni mngon par gtor//
74a1(rgyud): shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi//khyis la nyer 'dug dang ba'i blas//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun//sems dpar gyur pas 'di phra mo//la
74a2(rgyud): pas blangs nas ma 'khrugs pa'i//sems kyis ra sa la ri mo bri//dang po re shig/de bzhin gshogs pa shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
74a3(rgyud): pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku/rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od 'bar ba/
74a4(rgyud): kun nas 'od 'dom pang gis nye bar mdzes pa'i sku/chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/rab tu dang ba'i sku/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/dbus na gnas pa'i
74a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i bai DUr+ya'i sdong po can/'og na klu'i rgyal po sra bdan chen po pad+ma'i sdong bu de la 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la lta zhing lag pa g.yas pas phyag
74a6(rgyud): 'chal ba/dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/lus phyed ma'i rnam pa can gyi dga' bo dang /nye dga'o bri bar bya'o//pad+ma'i mtsho de'i 'khor yug tu
74a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /me tog dang /cung zad kha bye ba dang rnam par kha bye ba dang /chu las skyes pa'i bya dang /nya la sogs pas mngon par khyab pa/ma lus par bkad pa/
74b1(rgyud): mdzes pa'i rnam par mngon par bri bAr bya'o//gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu dang /'dab ma de nyid la rnam par 'phros pa'i pad+ma'i me tog du ma rnams rim gyis mtha ba'o//
74b2(rgyud): g.yon gyi gzhog su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad de/de rnams la yang pad+ma rnams la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi sku mngon par bri bar bya'o//dang por shig 'pha
74b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ze ba ltar cung zad dkar ba'i gur gum dang /gser gyi mdag can 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis dbu la rnam par rgyan pa/phyag na ut+pa
74b4(rgyud): pa la sngon po 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa//sku mdzes pa de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba zhi ba'i rnam pa/bzhin cung zad
74b5(rgyud): 'dzum pa/kun nas 'bar bas 'khrigs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus gnas pa'o//pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa zla 'od gzhon nu de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o//gsum
74b6(rgyud): pa la nor bzungs//bzhi pa la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o//lnga pa la na mkha' mdzad do//drug pa la sa'i snying po'o//bdun pa la 'jam dpalo//brgyad pa la spyan
74b7(rgyud): bzang ste/'di dag thams cad gzhon nu'i cha byad can//gzhon nu rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa mngon par bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas kyi gzhogs su
75a1(rgyud): d+d+har+m+ma ba rnams mtshan pa brgyad pa/b+h+ya smra pa ma gtugs panan rnams rgyud kyis rnam pa n+dan byASh+Ta/bcom ldan 'as da gsung
75a2(rgyud): byams mtshangs por skyed pa'i cha byed 'dzin pa/dbul la po'i cod pan bcings pa/gser mdog dur smrig dmar po gsol pa/dngal demer po'i snod g.yogs byas pa/
75a3(rgyud): tshon nu gsum gyi mtshon ma byas pa/gzugs mdzes pa dbyig pa dang /ril ba spyi thugs g.yon hU~M phyag du bkod pa/kriSh+Ta s+phA ra'i lpags pa byug+sa pa g.yon du bgos pa
75a4(rgyud): phyag gA yas pa bgrang phreng bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyog 'tshal bar byed zinon pa/der gtong po'i bsgre ba/bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can no//
75a5(rgyud): bong+ga gnyis la 'bags pa kun tu bzang po bri yang ku ltar sngo bsongs kyi mdog sgo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/phyag g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnam
75a6(rgyud): pa/phyug g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams nas mchog sbyin pa/mdzes pa'i gzugs can de bzhin du mngon par bro bar bya'o//gsum pa la 'phags pa spun ras gaH
75a7(rgyud): dbang phyug stan ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/gser gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba/mtshad phyir thogs dkar po can/thams cad mkhyen pa
75b1(rgyud): dbul byas pa/'phags pa 'od dpag med stobs bcu pa/ral pa'i nang du nye bar bzhugs pa/gzugs mdzes pa/phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa/bsam/
75b2(rgyud): gtan la dmigs par gyur pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can sku kun nas gsal bar gyur pa'o//bzhi pa la 'phags po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pas rdo rje bsnams pa/phyag g.yas pas
75b3(rgyud): nye bar 'gog pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnams nas mchog sbyin pa/gser mdog rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/mdzes pa'i gzugs can zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa do shal
75b4(rgyud): dang byed bus lus nye bar bkris pa/mu tig gi do shal gyi me chod phyir thogs byas pa/cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/dar srab mo'i shAm thabs dang /der la dkar
75b5(rgyud): po'i bla gos byas pa'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang kun tu bzang po'i sham thabs dang /bla gos kyang de bzhi no//lus kyi rnam pa ni sngar bstan pa dza bzhi no//
75b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma lta pa la 'phags pa blo gros chen po/drug pa la zhi ba'i blo bres//bdun pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'o//brgyad pa la ngan song spong ba zhes
75b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams phye ga na 'bras bu dang gleg bam bsnams pa/rnam pa kun tu mdzes pa/dar la'i stod g.yogs can/rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa
76a1(rgyud): g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i spu ngur smrig dmar po gsol ba/skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa rin po che'i rdo leb la bzhugs pa zhi ba'i cha byad can/kun nas
76a2(rgyud): 'byar ba'i phreng bas 'khrug pa/dri zhim po'i me tog gi gcal du bkram pa lo 'di lta ste/mU pa tI dang /bAR+Sha kA dang /d+hA nu ska ri kA dang /pun+d+ra ga dang /nA ga ge sar la
76a3(rgyud): sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras la kun nas gcal du bkra ma bzhin pas mngon par bri'o//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhog su 'phags pa
76a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gang yin pa'i steng du rin po che du mas spras pa'i shin tu ring po'i rnam pa'i gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor ro//b+hag ri'i rgyal po nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i
76a5(rgyud): rdo leb kyis bkab pa ri bo'i rnam pa lta bur mngon par bri bar bya'o//der gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/rin chen
76a6(rgyud): gtsug tor can rin po che bai DUd+tha'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/pad+ma rA kA dang /in+d+ra nI lA dang /ma rA kA ste la sogs pa dang /bai DUr+ya dang /
76a7(rgyud): rdo'i snying po la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po khyad par rnams kyis kun nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa/cung zad nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/de bzhin gshegs
76b1(rgyud): ba'i sku chos gos ser po'i stod g.yogs panabs pa/skyil krung gri bzhugs pa/chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/sham thabs ser po banabs pa sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
76b2(rgyud): gyi go cha bgos pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku rab tu zhi ba'i gzigs stangs can/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
76b3(rgyud): rin chen gtsug tor can mngon par bri'o//gnyis pa la de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po gser gyi mdog tu mngon par bri bar bya'o//
76b4(rgyud): nag gi sar ches bzang ba dang /bku lA la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba mngon par bri bar bya'o//'phags pa 'jam dpal la mngon par gzigs
76b5(rgyud): bzhan pa kun nas 'od can rin po che' 'od rnam par 'phro ma'i mthar thug pa'o//gsum pa lnga de bzhin gshegs bya sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po mngon par bri bar bya ste/pad+ma'i
76b6(rgyud): gser gyi mdog du snang ba/chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa'o//bzhi pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang mngon par bri bar bya'o//lnga pa la bzod par dka' ba'o//
76b7(rgyud): drug pa la rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'o//bdun pa la sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'o//brgyad pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi
77a1(rgyud): byed pa'i dbang po'i rgyal ba mngon par bri bar bya ste/thams cad gser gyi kha dog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan+de rnam pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par
77a2(rgyud): mdzad pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi steng du yang bri sku'i zur gnyis ka nas sprin gyi go dbar na gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lce'i bu gnyis me tog gi char
77a3(rgyud): 'bebs par byed bzhin pa bri'o//bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad lo phyag 'tshal
77a4(rgyud): bar byed bzhin pa/mngon par bri bar bya'o//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang du 'phags pa nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbu'i gnas spangs pa'i
77a5(rgyud): steng du mngon par bri bar bya'o//'di lta ste/gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /'odi srung chen po dang /rab 'byor dang /sgra gcan 'dzin dang /
77a6(rgyud): draga' bo dang /bzang ldan dang /ka pa ni zhes pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams 'di lta ste/dri dad can dang /tsan+dan dang /nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /dkar po dang /
77a7(rgyud): saM ka dang /dbang po dang /mu khyud dang /mu khyud bzang po zhes pa'o//thams cad mchog tu mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha lugs/zhi ba'i bdag nyid rab tu dul ba'i rnam pa
77b1(rgyud): na pas chen po rnams thal mo sbyar bar byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nges par rtog par byed pa'o//stong ngos su yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha dang /nye bar da/
77b2(rgyud): pa'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis drar gyi bla ro kun nas mchur ring zhing shin tu mdzes pa gzungs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan
77b3(rgyud): thos thams cad kyi steng du 'dzin par byed bzhin pa lha'i phreng ba dang gos 'chang ba'i lha'i bu mngon par bri'o//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng ngos dbu la mu tig gi do shal dang
77b4(rgyud): rin po che'i skud pa la pad+ma rA ga dang /in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyus pa'i rin po che'i skud pa'i tshogs de la dAr gyi bla re legs par bkod cing khor yug tu yang mu
77b5(rgyud): tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang ba mdzes par gyur pa mngon par bri bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i gdan gyis 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' chen po nye bar klu'i
77b6(rgyud): rgyal po nye dga' bo'i gzhog su rin po che'i ri bo//pad+ma'i mchi las mngon par 'phags pa rin po che'i myu gu dang /phug dang /r-i sul dang /byi ru'i khril shing yongasu pakris
77b7(rgyud): pa'i rin po che'i shing dang /drang srong chen po nye bar gnas shing bsten pa'i ri bo//de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa drag po chen po'i gzugs can phyag g.yon pas
78a1(rgyud): zhags pa bzung na g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa/bzhin khro gnyer can/byang chub sems dpa' chen po la blta zhing bka' nod par byed bzhin pa/gsus/
78a2(rgyud): pabarlo ba/skra gyen du brdzes paM/mig sman nag po//sprin dang mtshungs pa/ag tshom ser skya dang /skra ring zhing sen mo ring ba/mig dmar ba/mgrin pa'i phyogs sbrul gyis rgyan pa/stag
78a3(rgyud): gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ches mi bzad pa chen po/khro bo'i rgyal po chen po/kun nas 'bar ba/khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas
78a4(rgyud): non pa rnams 'di nyid kho nas bri bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu ral pa can de dang de'o//ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng du nye bar 'dug pa/pus mos la 'dud pa'i lus can lag pa spos phar thogs
78a5(rgyud): pa/cha byad dang /dbyibs dang /'jug pa dang /spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa/'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta bar gyur pa yang dag par bri'o//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
78a6(rgyud): pa'i 'og g.yas kyi gzhogs klu'i dbang po'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye log su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa'i rin po che'i ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po gzhan gsungs pa de/
78a7(rgyud): bzhin du mngon par bri ste/khro bi'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa phan pa lha'i me tog gnal du bkram pa mngon par bri ste/ri de ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o//
78b1(rgyud): nI do ni shin tu mtho ba/pad+ma rA ga'i rdo le ba dang /de nyid kyi myu gu dang /bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi rtse mo'i rnam par bri bar bya'o//de la brten pa'i lha mo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thu/
78b2(rgyud): rje/'phags ma sgrol ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang /dar la khra bo'i sham thabs can bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
78b3(rgyud): brgyan pa/phyag g.yon na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/gser mdog can ma/ha cang mi sbom/ha cang mi rgan pa/sems bsam gtan la gnas pa/bka' nod cing 'dug pa/
78b4(rgyud): phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin par 'dod pa/lus cung zad btud pa/skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta bar gyur pa/
78b5(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas yongasu bskor ba'o//de nyid du yang rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rtse mo de nyid du yang /pu nA ga'i shing gi yongasu bskor ba/yal gA thams can la kun nas
78b6(rgyud): me tog gi spras shing /kha bye bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la mngon par bkab pa/yal ga dud pa de nyid kyis kyang shin tu bkra ba'i byi ru'i myu gu 'brel pa rnam
78b7(rgyud): por bkra ba'i gzugs can gyi tshen rtsi 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma'i bzhin kun tu snang bar mngon par bri'o//lha mo bgegs kun 'joms pa mo//'jigs pa 'joms phra
79a1(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/sgrub po ni srung don du//mchog sbyin dge ba bri bar bya//bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni//thugs rje stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras//'byung ba/
79a2(rgyud): kun gyi dpal yin te//mchog sbyin byed ma bri bar bya//lha mo las tshan byed pa mo//byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po//bgegs kun rnam par 'joms don du//sgrub pa po
79a3(rgyud): ni kun tu 'dod//mi dbang rnams ni srung ngan dang //dpal gyi don du rab tu grogs//khro rgyal dbang po gang yin te//ri yi rtse mor gnas 'dod pa//bgegs kun rnam par bzhag/
79a4(rgyud): pa'i phyir//rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis gsungaso//drag po chen po brtson 'grus che//gtu ma chen 'od zer chen po ste//bstan pa la sdang sems can rnams//tshar bcad
79a5(rgyud): ched nyid rab tu brtags//sgrub pa po ni srung don dang //bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa dang //mi zad khro bo'i ngang tshul can//sdigs kyi lha rnams 'gugs par byed//
79a6(rgyud): shin tu drag po drag gzugs can//brtse ba med cing nges par 'gog/sdig pa drag po spyod pa rnams//dbang du ma gyur dbang du byed//mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang //
79a7(rgyud): kun nas sa 'og spyod pa dang //thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed pa'i//bdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed//ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang //grwa bzhi dag du bri bar
79b1(rgyud): /ras kyi 'og gi mtha' rnams dang //chu bo rgya tshor bya ba yin//klu ni gdangs kas mtshan pa can//gcig nyid kun tu bya ba yin//yan lag dkar zhing bzang ba dang //lus phyed mi
79b2(rgyud): yi rnam par skyes//rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa//mgo bo'i steng du bzhag byas nas//gdeng ka bdun pa brtson 'grus tsho//dbang tshon ldan pa'i klu dA ni//ming ni mtha' yas zhes bya
79b3(rgyud): yin/de bzhin gshegs la nges par blta//nor bu ren chen gyis na/dzes shing //shin tu ma dzes shing gzugs mdzes pa//rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//'bar ba'i
79b4(rgyud): dreng ldan kun tu bri//klu dbang chen por rnam par grags//thub pa'i bstan la rab zhugs pa'i//'jig rten kun la phan par brtson//bgegs kun rnam par gzhom don du//
79b5(rgyud): chu bo la rten bri bar bya//de la ras kyi cho ga 'di//mdor bsdus rgyal bas gsungs pa yin//rgyas par de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis//kun nas bshad pa sngar gsungs//
79b6(rgyud): mkhas pa gang zhigo 'dri byed pa//de yi bsod nams mtha' yaso//sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa//bskal pa bye ba byas pa gang //sa stengs bris sku mthong ba yis//de yis skad
79b7(rgyud): cig nyid la 'joms//mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //tshul khrims 'tshal dang smad pa dang //sdig pa kun la rab 'jug dang //'khor bas yangasu rgyu ba yis//
80a1(rgyud): 'gro ba skye gnas dman pa rnams//de rnams ras res 'dzin mi gzhug/de rnams ras ris mthong bas ni//'bras bu yod par thub dbang gsungs//
80a2(rgyud): phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni//skad tsog de la sdig pa 'jig/dag pas 'jug pa nyid dang ni//rjesu zlob pa dag 'jug pa//sngags mnyan pa la brtson pa yi//mi rnams sgrub thob
80a3(rgyud): smos ci dgos//bskal pa bya bar sangs rgyas kun//mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa//sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi//sngags pa bsod nams de thob 'gyur//gang ga yi
80a4(rgyud): ni bye ba ma yi//tshad du grags pa gang yin pa//de yi chad gyur sangs rgyas dang //rgyal sras rang rgyal bse ru dang //nyan thos rnams la 'jig rten du//slar yang lan mang
80a5(rgyud): mchod ston gsol//'bras bu thob pa gang yin de'i//sngags pa ras ris byis pa dang //mthong dang cho ga klog pa dang //rdza su yi rang ba nyid dang //cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa
80a6(rgyud): de yi sngags kyi dngos grub des//ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags//gang zhig rgyal ba skyes mchog dang //de slob pas ru lha rnams dang //byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid
80a7(rgyud): ches//gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad ni//ras ris 'di yi spyan sngar 'grub//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che//theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/
80b1(rgyud): ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brjes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam gyis bris sgyu dang po rdzogaso///de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams
80b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa//sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang khyod kyis ras
80b3(rgyud): ris kyi cho ga bar ma yod de/de ngas bshad par bya yis/de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/bshad par bya'o//dang po re shig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang /
80b4(rgyud): star brjod pa nyid kyi cho ga dang /sngar yongasu brtag pa'i gzo bo dang /sngar gyi chang bar ma nyid kyis ras shin tu dag pa/'jam pa/shin tu sbyangs pa/khe tshar dang bcas pa/
80b5(rgyud): chen ma 'dres pa/sgra dang 'dres pa dang bral ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tshad dang gzugs ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin nyid kyis/ras ros phye ma 'drer gzhug par bya'o//dang /
80b6(rgyud): bo re shig gnas gtsang me'i gnas kun nas mdzes pa'i rnam pa rin po che shelaM gyi rang bzhin lta bu mu tig dkar po'i de shal gyis rgyan pa/de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das
80b7(rgyud): shAkya thub pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste/rin po che seng ge'i khri la nye bar gzhugs pa/chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o//
81a1(rgyud): /g.yas kyi gzhog su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ge sar du snang ba 'am/gur gum mam/nyi ma'i kha dog can/phrag pa g.yon
81a2(rgyud): pa'i phyogasuM pad+ma bsnams pa/thal mo sbyar ba byas te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa li/nges par tog bzhin pa/bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/byang chub sems dpa'
81a3(rgyud): chen po/bde legs dbus ma'i cod pa na tsan/mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang /mgo 'dod pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
81a4(rgyud): g.yon gyi gzhog su phyag na rdo rje pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o//'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin
81a5(rgyud): pa'o//de'i gzhog su 'phags pa byams pa dang /kun tu bzang po dang /phyag na rdo rje dang /blo gros chen po dang /zhi ba'i blo gros dang /na mkha' mdzod dang /sgrib pa tha~Md///
81a6(rgyud): rnam par sel ba ste 'odi rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya ste/dang po ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//de rnams kyi stong du sangs
81a7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad 'dir gzhug par bya ste/bzhug pa phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/chos go so ser po'i blo gos banabos pa'i sku can/phyag g.yon pa//
81b1(rgyud): chos gos kyi rna ba 'dzin pa/cung zad dmar bar snang ba'i ngur smig gi sham thabs can kun nas snang ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa ma
81b2(rgyud): tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po dang /rin chen gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyob dang /log par dad sel dang /gser thub dang /'od srung dang /spyan bzang zhes pa'i sangs rgyas
81b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
81b4(rgyud): chen po 'drir gzhug par bya'o//nyan pos chen po brgyad dang /rang sangs rgyas brgyad sngar ji ltar bstan po de bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya ste/'on kyang 'phags pa mo'u
81b5(rgyud): dgal gya bu chen po dang /shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin du 'khor ba'i lus su mngon par bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du gnas gca
81b6(rgyud): me'i ris kyi lha'i bu mngon par bri bar bya'o//lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /rab 'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /dag pa dang /dri ma med pa dang /
81b7(rgyud): shin tu mthong dang /'od gsal dang /tshangs pa mi mdzad kyi bdag po dang /'og min te de lta bu la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i
82a1(rgyud): bu rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya'o//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar smras pa dgod de/rang
82a2(rgyud): gi gzugs dang cha byad 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o//bcom ldan 'ongs kyi sang+ge'i khri'i 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags pa'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ji
82a3(rgyud): srid du ras kyi mtha' mar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ras kyi mtha'i grwa'i phyogs gcig tu sgrub pa po che byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo dang /mgo bo btud pa/lag pa
82a4(rgyud): spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//rin po che'i ri bo de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa sngar ji ltar nges
82a5(rgyud): par bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs kyi seng+ge'i khri'i pog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kye drung
82a6(rgyud): dang nye ba drir rin po che'i ro la bzhugs pa'i lha mo sgrol ma mngon par bri ste sngar ji ltar nges par bsten pa de bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ras de'i 'khor yug tu'ang
82a7(rgyud): me tog sil ma mngon par gtor te tsam pa ka dang /ut+pal sngon pa dang /pad+ma dang /so'u gan+d+hi kaM dang /ma la tI dang /baR+Sha ka dang /d+ha nu stArI ka dang /pu na ga dang /
82b1(rgyud): nA ga gI sA la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis kha ra khor yug tu gcal du dgum par bya'o//ras kyi stang /ras kyi mtha'i grwa gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis mye tog ga tshogs 'thor bar
82b2(rgyud): byed bzhin pa/gzugs rnam par bkra ba/bar snang la gnas pa'i char sbyin gyi nang na lding ba kha dog dkar por mnyan par bri ba bye'o//'di ni ras ris 'bring bar brjod//rtag tu
82b3(rgyud): dge legs don 'byung ba//swa steng skye bo mi rnams la//dngos grub 'bring po sbyin par byed//'khor bar kun tu 'khor ba na//sdig pa cung zad sngon byas gang //'ding ni bris sra
82b4(rgyud): mthong ba yis//de yos skad cig nyid la 'jigs//sems can rmongs pa mi shes po//de rnams 'gro bai ldi por 'khyams//gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yi//bris sku
82b5(rgyud): bar ma mthong ba yang //sdig pa byed par 'gyur ba dang //mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //tshul 'tshal gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro//rnam pa sna tshogs sngags gsungs
82b6(rgyud): ba'ang //shin tu myung bar de sa glob ni//bzlas pa byas pas thob par 'gyur//nad can rnams ni nad las grol//bkren pas no de ni rnyed par 'gyur//bud med rnams ni sku
82b7(rgyud): thob 'gyur//bris srub rab bsgru ba ni//mthong po tsam gyis de'i tshe//bsod nams rgyas pa chen po thab//nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi//bde ba'i skal pa can 'gyu
83a1(rgyud): mi//de yi skye ba gzhan la yang //nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur//byi ba dang ni klog pa dang //lha mchod pa dang 'dir 'jug dang //de bzhin mthong dang reg/
83a2(rgyud): nyid kyang //sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur//'di ltar 'od chen bris sku la//don du gnyer dang gsol 'debs pa//rje su yi rang ba las kyang //skye ba 'bras bcas myur du/
83a3(rgyud): thob//bskalde mchog bye ma rnams kyis kyang //skye bros bsod nams gang thob pa//tshig tu brjod par mi nus//bris sku mthong ba 'bras bur btsas//zhes bya ba byang chub
83a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol mo ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam
83a5(rgyud): las/le'u gsum pa yongasu rdzogs so////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang sems dpa' chen po des bka' stsal pa sems dpa' chen
83a6(rgyud): po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga chung ngu zhes bya ba gzhan gsum pa yang yod de/gang 'bad pa med par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/sngar snyan pa nyid kyi cho ga dang /
83a7(rgyud): bzo bos bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam thad kar dang /de bzhin kho nar kun nas gru bzhi pa la sngar bzhin du ras ri sda bsten pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis
83b1(rgyud): 'drir gzhug par bya'o//dang por shig byang chub sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i gdan la d+hil krung gis bzhugs pa b+hI saSh+Te'u sngar bzhin du rgyas ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun nas
83b2(rgyud): 'od zeng 'phro bar byed bzhin pa/mdzes pa'i gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o//g.yon gyi gzhog su 'phags po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rdo leb la gnas pa phyog da
83b3(rgyud): yab thogs pa/g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa/kha dog pri yang sku ltar sngo bsangaso//g.yas kyi gzhogasu yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ran po
83b4(rgyud): che'i rdo la ba la gnas pa phyag na rnga yab thogs shing /phyag g.yon pas pad+mo bsnams pa/kun+da nas 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
83b5(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o//seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu gser gyi ri bo//ji srid ras kyi mtha'i bar du 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa
83b6(rgyud): sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i 'og tu g.yas kyi gzhog su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o//de'i 'og tu sgrub pa pa
83b7(rgyud): lo ga na sbos por thogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o//de thams cad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du'o//de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng
84a1(rgyud): du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste/rin po che'i ri'i phrag/sor bcu drug pa'i chad na bzhugs pa/khyang pa brtsegs pa dri
84a2(rgyud): pa'i ri bo'i bya skyibs mtho ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ras ris de'i 'khor yug tu ri bo'i khor yug tu ri bo'i rnam pas yongasu bskor ba mngon par bri'o//ras ris de'i stong
84a3(rgyud): gi zur du gnas pa'i ri bo'i bya skyibs dang /kun tu 'brel bar lding bzhin pa lta bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag dang rnam par
84a4(rgyud): dag pa zhes bya ba gnyisu 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ras de las me tog sna tshogs kyis gtsal du bkram pa mngon par 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ras ris rnam gsum mtshan nyid ni//
84a5(rgyud): thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las//'di ni chung ngu zhes bya ste//ras ris phrin tshegs las la shis//sdig las shin tu mi bzod pa//bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu//ras ris
84a6(rgyud): mthong bas grol 'gyur te//ras ris mthong ba tsam nyid kyis//skad cig nyid las grol bar 'gyur//skal ba bye ba stong phrag tu//blo ldan sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur byas//ngas ris
84a7(rgyud): tha ma mthong ba yi//bcu drug char yang mi phod do//sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la//mchod byas bsod nams gang yin de//ras ris chung ngu mthong ba la//mkhas pas de
84b1(rgyud): yi bsod nams thob//mdzes pa yi ni las rnams dang //longs spyod rgyud yang 'di spyod do//rig dang gsang sngags ji snyed pa//tshangs dbang drang srong gis ba shad dang //na mkha' ldong drang//
84b2(rgyud): gang bshad dang //chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang //nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang //lho min dbang po thams cad dang //lho phye che dang zla ba dang //rlung dang gshin rje la sogs dang //seng ge
84b3(rgyud): 'phrog byed sogs bshad pa'i//sngags rnams thams cad 'dir drangs te//ras ris spyan sngar 'grub par 'gyur//zhi ba can dang de bzhin du//rgyas pa can rnams bya ba ste//de
84b4(rgyud): bzhi ni 'dir ni mi bzad pa//rgyal mchog gis smad spang bar bya//zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan
84b5(rgyud): 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga bzhi pa ris ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam rdzogaso////de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras ga
84b6(rgyud): dbang phyug stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
84b7(rgyud): rjegasol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa ni legs legs so//
85a1(rgyud): /rig pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad dpyad pa'i don dang /phan pa'i phyir dang /bde ba'i phyir dang /'jig rten la snying brgyu bas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkha
85a2(rgyud): pa bstan pa/mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa'i chos lhag ma dang bcas pa nges par byang chub la rgyun tu mchog tu gzhol ba/byang chub sems dpa'///
85a3(rgyud): rnams kyis rig pa dang /sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa bdag gi rig pa gsang cheni 'di nyid skye bo thams cad rgyas par byed par 'gyur pa ma 'ong sid+d+hal
85a4(rgyud): dus 'jig rten gyi bla ma mya ngan las 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rigs nub pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa
85a5(rgyud): nyan thos thams cad kyiso spangs shing thams cad bor te mun par gyur pa dang /snod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa ro zhig ste/'phags pa'i lam dang /rig pa dang /sngags dang /
85a6(rgyud): sman dang /nor bu rin po che thams cad dang bral ba/skye bo legs pas yongasu bzung ba'i snang ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/le lo can dang /
85a7(rgyud): dran pa nyams pa dang /ma dad pa dang /mi srun pa dang /mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa sgyu dang g.yo dang /brdzun dang g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa de rnams
85b1(rgyud): chos rnam byungs 'di thos nas kun skrag par 'gyur te/lo lo dang /snyoms las la mngon par dga' zhing dad pa med par 'gyur te//'dod pa mal zhing gsang sngags tshol ba ma
85b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/log par lta ba la dga' ba rnams kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po la 'jug par 'gyur te/dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur//mnar med pal
85b3(rgyud): mchog tu gzhol zhing drag po'i yang drag por 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba de rnams kyi don gyi phyir dang /dbang du ma gyur pa rnams dbang du gyur par bya ba dang /dbang du
85b4(rgyud): gyur pa rnams la myi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rig pa dang /ras ris kyi cho ga da lta gsungs pa'i dus la bab par dgod na bcom ldan
85b5(rgyud): 'das gsung du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gasdang ba/rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga rab 'byam mchog tu gsang ba 'dod pa'i don byed
85b6(rgyud): pa don chen po rnam par 'byor par gyur pa rig pa bdun cu po thams cad kyi mchog gi snying po//rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus der 'grub par 'gyur ro//de yang sems can rnams
85b7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i don gyi thabs la mkhas pas 'khor bar kun tu 'jug pa rnams skyob pa/nges par byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar byed pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug
86a1(rgyud): gis gsungs par gyur pa/'di la rig pa ni/na mau rat+na tra yA ya/na ma AR+YA ba lau ki to shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi sarbA ya/mahA satwA ya/tA ren+d+rA t+ta re tu ta tA ra/
86a2(rgyud): swAd+hA//'phags ma sgrol ma shin tu rgyus pi zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA yi/nA ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ming+ga satwA ya/tI ra tu r-i tu ra~M swA hA/'phags
86a3(rgyud): ma sbrul ma bzhin bzang ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA mu Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ta re tut+tA ri tu raM swAhA/'phags ma sgrol ma dbus
86a4(rgyud): legs ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ni ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shI rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/man+ta sad+d+hi ya/tadwe thA/ta re tut+tA re tuM rau swA hAM/'phags ma sgrol ma legs
86a5(rgyud): spyod ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te sh+tsa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tA r-i tut+tA re tu re swA hA/'phags ma sgrol ma mtshan legs ma zhes bya
86a6(rgyud): ro'o//na mo rot+na tra yA ya/nA ma Ar+ya ba lo ki tI shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma d+hi satwA ya/ta r-i tu re tu re swA hAM/'phags ma sgrol ma lho chung ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra
86a7(rgyud): yA ya/na ma I r+yA ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/bo d+ha satwA ya~M/mahA sa~MtwA yaM/ta re N+yet+ta tu re tu re s+t+rai tAM/'phags ma sgrol ma logs gnas ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rah+ne
86b1(rgyud): yA ya/na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki twe shwa rA yA/bo d+hi s+yAt+kA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ta re tut+tA re/tu re tu re swA hA/'phags ma sgrol ma nye bar 'dud pa zhes bya ba'o//zhes pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag/
86b2(rgyud): gi rig pa chen pos cho ga gi snying po chen po dang mtshungs pa bya ba thams cad mchog tu grub pa/sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas bzhin du skyes pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
86b3(rgyud): rje su yi rang ba/'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa/las thams cad byed pa/byang chub kyi lam ston pa po//pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig pa rab dang /'bring dang /tha mA la yang dag
86b4(rgyud): bar rab tu sbyor ba/shin tu mdzes pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa/rab tu sbyin pa/bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe lnga 'grub par 'gyuraro//dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung
86b5(rgyud): ba'i ched du/mnyam par 'jug cing 'grub par 'gyur//de rnams sbyor ba chung ngu nyid kyi rgyal srid chen po dang /longs spyod chen po'i dbang phyug gi don de rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro///
86b6(rgyud): de rnams shin tu myur bar de'i tshe de'i dus su dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//ras ris kyi cho ga mdor bsdus par gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang /snyigs ma lnga'i
86b7(rgyud): sems can bsod nams chung bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/dbang chung bar grags pa/tshe thung ba/brtson 'grus zhan pas ras ris kyi tshe ga shin tu rgyas pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba
87a1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i las rnams rab tu brtson par ma nus two/do rnams kyi don du chos mdor bsdus te gsungs pa no//dang bar shog dpa' dzin rin tu dag pa nyis/
87a2(rgyud): srang tshad tsam mam srang phyed tsam/dukya su khru gang tsam la zheng du khru phyed tsam pa'i ras kha char dang /bcas pa tha ga pas btag par bya'o//yang na slar yang skra dang bral ba'i ras kyi
87a3(rgyud): dum bu gsar pa steng 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis sam bzhi 'am drug gam/lnga 'am/bcu 'am/brgyad pa'i ras shin tu dkar ba blangs te/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ri mo mkhan
87a4(rgyud): 'drir gzhug par bya'o//tsan+dan dang ga bur dang gur gum gyis bgos pa'i ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi de rnams dang /ras tsan+dan dang /gur gum dang /ga bur rnams gcig tu byas
87a5(rgyud): pas/srog chags med pa'i chu rnyog pa med pa dang sras te/snod gsar par ras spang du bcug nas nyi ma gsum du legs par mnan pas mnan la bzhago/gtsang ba'o
87a6(rgyud): phyogasu srung ba byas te bdag nyid kyang gtsang mar byas nas/dkar po phyogs kyi nya la res kyi snod kyi mdun du kha shar du phyogs pas ku sha'i khris la nye bar 'dug ste/snga
87a7(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di lan stong phrag brgyad brjod par bya'o//tad+ya thA/oM he he b+ha ga bAn/ba hu rU pa d+ha ra di bya tsak+Shu kha/oM bi lo ka ya/oM ba lo kA ya mAM/sa ma ya maM nu smer
87b1(rgyud): ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ra Na/ma hA bo d+hi satwe/kiny+tsi rA ya si huM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA///sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o//rmi lam du grub pa'am/mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyu ro//
87b2(rgyud): de nas langs nas grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam mthong na/ring po mi thogs pa/ras ris bri bar bya'o//gal ta grub po'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam mthong na ras de snod do nas phyung ste//
87b3(rgyud): nyi ma la bskam par bya'o//bskams nas slar yang snod gsar pa gzhan zhig du legs par sbas lo srung ba byas te bzhag par bya'o//de nas slar yang mchog gi snying po de rnams
87b4(rgyud): las sngags gang yang rung ba gcig bzung nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge drug po rnams las slar yang yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o//de nas ches myur bar ras ris
87b5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyu ro//dang po re shig ras de spangs nas/che 'phrul gyi zla phyed ma/gzhan yang dkar po'i nyi ma dang /rgyu skad dge ba dang //yang dag par ldan pa/dge ba'i tshes
87b6(rgyud): dkar po'i gza'i res kyi nyi ma la shin tu mdzes pa'i dge mtshan dang /bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan mo nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la nye bar
87b7(rgyud): gnas pas ras ris de 'drir gzhug par bya'o//gtsang ba'i phyogasu ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te dang po re shig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku rgyan thams cad
88a1(rgyud): kyis brgyan par byas te/dbu zur phud can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/gser gyi mdog can/dar la sngon po g.yo gzhin pa'i sham
88a2(rgyud): thabs can dar la sngon po'i blo gos bonabs pa/song ge'i khri lo skyil krung phyed pas gzhugs te chos 'chad bzhin pa/zhabs g.yas pa rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/
88a3(rgyud): seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/baulta na sdug pa bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/sgrub pa po la gzigs par gyur pa bri bar bya'o//g.yas kyi
88a4(rgyud): gzhog su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/rnga yab dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa/phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa/lus thams cad
88a5(rgyud): mdzes pa/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/dar la sngon po g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i sham thabs bonabs pa/mu tig gi do shul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/phyag
88a6(rgyud): g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po banabs pa/phyag g.yas je yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can bsnams nas g.yob par byed bzhin pa zhi ba'i rnam pa can spyan ras gzigs
88a7(rgyud): dbang phyug la blta bar gyur pa'o//de bzhon du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste de dag gnyis ka yang de ltar mngon par bri'o//pad+ma'i
88b1(rgyud): sdong bu gcig las 'thon pa'i pad+ma gsum gyi dbu ma rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i zo 'bru la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge'i khri dang rin po che'i zhabs rte no//pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa
88b2(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'o//pad+ma gsum pa la ni 'phags pa mthu chen thob bo//pad+ma'i sdong bu de ni mdzes pa/rin po che mar gad kyi rnam pa la pad+ma'i me tog du ma kha bye ba dang /phyed tsam kha bye
88b3(rgyud): ba dang /me tog kha bye ba dang ldan pa/mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis mtsho chen po las skyes pa'i pad+mo'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/
88b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kha dog dkar ba/gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan po/rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes pa/lus phyed ma'i mngal sbrul gyis gdengs kas mtshan pa/byed sprul
88b5(rgyud): gyi lus 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa/phyed chu'i nang du nub pa/nor bu rin po che de dag ga si nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o//mtsho chen po
88b6(rgyud): de'i 'khor yug gi 'og tu ras ris kyi mtha'i grwa g.yas kyi gzhog su sgrub pa po//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog
88b7(rgyud): bzhin pa lag na spos phor thogs pa lus dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/cha byad dang kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bri'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
89a1(rgyud): steng du/ras kyi mtha' gnyi su lha'i bu phreng ba 'dzin pa gnyis me tog gi phreng ba gzung nas na mkha' la lding ba/me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor bar byed
89a2(rgyud): bzhin pa/shin tu mdzes pa dag mngon par bri'o//ras ris de'i 'khor yug du nA ga gi sar la sogs pa'i me tog rab tu bkram pa bri bar bya ste/ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs
89a3(rgyud): gsum lhag par gnas pa'am/mngon par bri'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang /'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /'pha
89a4(rgyud): pa phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum po rnams gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya ste ji ltar
89a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang dbyibs ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du'am/sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o//dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
89a6(rgyud): po mtha' gnyi su yang /phyag na rdo rje dang /kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bum mtho gang ngam//
89a7(rgyud): khwa gang tsam la bdag nyid dam/gzhan gyis sim/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong med pa'am/dad pa can nam/gtsang mi'am/mi gtsang ba'am/tshul khrims dang ldan pa
89b1(rgyud): 'am/tshul khrims 'chal pa yang rung ste/ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o//sgrub pa po bdag nyid ni/gdon mi za bar sngon spyad pa byas pa/dad pas byang chub sems brgyad
89b2(rgyud): pa grad ni mi za bar 'gyur bas te/de ltar na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sdig pa byed pas nam kyang ma yino//de ltar dad par gyur pa yis//sngags kyi lha rnams bsgrub
89b3(rgyud): bya zhing //ngang pa de yis gsang sngags rgyal//'grub 'gyur 'dir na gzhan du min//gang phyir dad pa theg pa'i mchog/gang gis 'dren pa 'gro bar byed//dad pa med pa'i mi rnams
89b4(rgyud): la//dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste//sa bon me yis tshig pa la//myu gu sngon po ji bzhi no//dad dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la//sangs rgyas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur//lha
89b5(rgyud): rnams kun dang khyad par du//gsang sngags rnams ni thams cad ni//dad pa med na mi 'gru'o//'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //gang yang 'jig rten 'das de bzhin//dad dang
89b6(rgyud): ldan par brjod po dang //rnyog pa bral bas 'grub par 'gyur//yid ni byang chub der son pas//de rnams byang chub nges par 'grub//gzhan gyis grub par ma gsungs te//bstan pa
89b7(rgyud): 'di las bzlog pa yin//ras ris chung ding chen po dang //bar mo yongasu bsgrags pa yin//las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa//de ni rab tu bshad par bya//byang chub sems
90a1(rgyud): dpa'i lnga sdod pal ba cha theb pa chen po shin tu nus pa'i mad sde las bcom ldan 'das ma skal ma la pa byin pa rnas kya tsha ba las nas ras kyi cha ga g+sa
90a2(rgyud): byam lnga pa rdzog so////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/
90a3(rgyud): sems can chen po khyod kyis sems can de rnams kyi don gyi phyir bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam bshad pa 'di thabs nyung ngu nyid kyis 'grub par
90a4(rgyud): 'gyur te/de rnams kyi don gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa thabs yon tan rgyas pa rab tu dbye bas rnam par phye ba'am rnam par dbye ba de yang dag par 'thun par bshad par bya/
90a5(rgyud): yi/de legs par nyon la/legs par yid la gyis shig/sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bshad par bya'o//de nas yang byang chub sems dpas bcom
90a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'byor pa bsten par mdzod cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tAn sgrub pa'i mthu gsal bar mdzad
90a7(rgyud): pi legs par gsungs pa ni legs//bcom ldan 'das gang da lta de'i dus la bab par dgong nas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/de
90b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzig nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas zhal gyi sgo nas/
90b2(rgyud): 'od zer sngon pa dang /ser po dang /dkar po dang /brtsod dang /shel gyi kha dog la sogs pi byung bar gyur to//'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi
90b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snang ba byas nA stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad dpa' bkong bar mdzad nas/rgyu skar gyi 'od dang /ri'i lha'i tshogs kyi 'od
90b4(rgyud): dang /gang du zla ba dang /nyi ma 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul tshe ba de dag gi 'od kyang dpa' bkong bar mdzad nas de rnams mi gsal zhing 'od med par gyur te rnam par snang bar
90b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur zhing dang /dpa' bkong bar mdzad de nor bu dang sngags dang sman dang rin po che'i 'od thams cad med par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi
90b6(rgyud): slar nub par gyur to//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las
90b7(rgyud): yangs nas rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
91a1(rgyud): namasna ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen glang lags/de skad ces gso
91a2(rgyud): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje de de bzhino//de de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs
91a3(rgyud): pa ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyi/rgyu yod/rkyen yod do//gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i
91a4(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rje suM sgrub pa las sgrub par byed pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/chos kyi sprin le brten cing yang dge bar rje su 'jug cing rje su 'brang bar
91a5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ba dang /'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /klog par 'gyur ba dang /dad par 'gyur ba dang /gleg bam du bri bar byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /tsan+dan dang /
91a6(rgyud): ma dang /byug pa dang /bdug pa dang /phreng ba dang /gdugs dang /rgyul mtshan dang /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am/sil snyan gyi rnam pa'i khyad par ram/rol mo sna
91a7(rgyud): tshogs dang /pheb rdob pa dang /tha na rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyun tu thob pa'am/spu zing zhes byed pa skye bar byed par 'gyur ba 'am/rig pa'i mthu dang nu
91b1(rgyud): po thos nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/rjesu yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am/spyod pa so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba de rnams ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ltung
91b2(rgyud): bstan te de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byed par 'gyur//de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'dzum pa mdzad kyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin//dang po re shig dam tshig/
91b3(rgyud): mthong ba/sngon spyad pa rnams byas pa/mngon par dbang bskur thob pas/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'od la rtsi ba'i rig pa'am/snying po 'am/nye ba'i snying po'am/gzhan gang yang rung ba'i
91b4(rgyud): sngags bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin yang rung ste/dgon pa chen por song nas lo bdun du bzlas pa bya ste/'bras bu dang /chu'i bza' ba dang /rtsu ba
91b5(rgyud): dang /'dab ma bzang zhing /ston spyod pa rnams byas par 'gyuraro//de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub du phyogs par bzhag nas/bdag nyid shar du mngon
91b6(rgyud): par phyogs te/ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas pad+ma dkar po dang /tsan+dan dkar po dang /gur bum gyis mngon par btags te/'bum phrag gcig bcom ldan 'das
91b7(rgyud): shAkya thub pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi ras ris kyi 'og nas dbul bar bya'o//gapu
92a1(rgyud): gyi bdug pa yang ji ltar 'byor pa srego/lha'i bu rnams la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o//de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i nya 'am/1
92a2(rgyud): so so la mtshan mo phyed kyi dus kyi tshe ras ris kyi spyan sngar me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu byas nas tsan+dan dkar po'i shing gi me sbar te/gur gum dang ga pur gcig tu byas nas
92a3(rgyud): bsregs blugs ji ltar 'byor pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/de nas bsrung ba bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ras ris kyi khor/
92a4(rgyud): yug tu gcig tu 'bar por gyur pa 'byung ngo //de nos sgrub pa bo tsan+dan dang /gur gum gyis btags pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbulo//de nas sgrub
92a5(rgyud): pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis res ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas 'phags pa nyan
92a6(rgyud): thos rnams la phyag 'tshal nas sngar sgrub pa bes bris pa'i ngas mthi'i byor nas 'dziDa pa med pos ras ris bzung bar bya'o//de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur bar 'gyur/
92a7(rgyud): te/se gol gtogs pa tsam la chings pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te//bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gnas par 'gyuraro//gang du bcom ldan 'das
92b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba de bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang smyon par byed pa dang /ba/sa pa chen pa spyod du na pa med pa dang /
92b2(rgyud): 'chi ba med par rol par 'gyur//bris su gnos pa de nyid du sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis po rlabs par 'gyur//de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs
92b3(rgyud): kyang shes//zhing stong phrag kyang 'da' bar byed do//lus stong breg ston par byed de//rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang dag par 'byin par byed par 'gyur//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
92b4(rgyud): dbang phyug dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyuraro//nges par byang chub la gzhil bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde stong /
92b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sprul ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga/bris sku rab 'byim las/mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi che ga/las kyi 'bras bu drug pa rdzogs//
92b6(rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dug pa'i lha tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/grog po dag khyod cag nyin cig/las
92b7(rgyud): chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa'aphags ma sgrol ma'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi cho ga sgrub pa po srung ba'i don du gsang ba dam po mchog gi snying po
93a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang gis bzlas nA sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyuraro//kye kye lha'i
93a2(rgyud): tshogs rnams 'di ni 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang rig pa 'dis 'gugs shing /dbang du byed la yang
93a3(rgyud): dag par 'dod par gyur par byed na de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnams smos ci dgos/sngags thams cad
93a4(rgyud): dang bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa ste/'di ni brtson 'grus che ba dang /mthu che ba dang /gcig tu dpa' ba/rig pa thams cad gcig kho nar sngags thams
93a5(rgyud): cad kyi mchog tu bshad pa dang /gcig kho na reg pa'i rgyal ma 'jigs pa chen po rnaMs lnga mchog tu bshad pa ste/de gang zhe na/las chen po thams cad byed pa/don
93a6(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa/bya ba thams cad byed pa/sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/gdug pa'i las rnams dang /sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/snga/
93a7(rgyud): thams cad so so rdzogs par byed pa/dge bar byed pa/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa/
93b1(rgyud): thog pa med pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par gyur pa/bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/de gang zhe na/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+yA ba
93b2(rgyud): yo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/ma hA ka ru NI kA ya/tad+ya thA/tA re wA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/grog po dag 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba da mi pe/las chen po thams
93b3(rgyud): cad byed pa/rig pa'i rmyil mi chen mo sems can thams cad kyi 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa/'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkra shis
93b4(rgyud): pa/reg pa dang sngags thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/rig pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug/rnam par sdang ba thams cad la byams
93b5(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid/skye bo rnams la steng brtse ba dang /bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed de/mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar rab tu byed do//ma bsgrubs
93b6(rgyud): par yang las rnams byed//rig pa bzlas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyuraro//gos la mngon par bsngags nas gyon na bskal pa bzang por 'gyuraro//so shing la mngon pa
93b7(rgyud): bsngags te zos na so nid sel bar 'gyuraro//ka ra bi ra dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mig gi nad la
94a1(rgyud): /rgyamacha byed mar byas pa la lan dadun mngon par bstsags nas m-ig paka/ na myog nung sol bur da do//rna ba'i nad la rmA na 'o rgya ba nas 'thun pa dug smyan/
94a2(rgyud): panA 'byung ba'i tshwa d+h+ri ka/ka bu ka'i lo mar btums tAM mi chung ngus btso bar bya'o//chos nas phyir btsos pa byas la chu dron 'jam la rgya mtsho dang /sbyar ba byas nas yin bdun
94a3(rgyud): mngon par bsngags te des rna ba dag par byas te skad cig de nyid la nye bar zhi bar byed do//bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal 'gags nas bzer bas zil gyis non par gyur na//
94a4(rgyud): a Ta rU Shaka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na bde rlag du btso' bar 'gyur//skyes bu zug rngus nyams pa'am/mtshon nang du lus pa
94a5(rgyud): la mer rnying pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas glud par bya ba'am/de'i phyogasu byugs na/de'i skad cig nyid la zug d+hA med par 'gyuraro//ma zhu ba dang /bsud pa
94a6(rgyud): dang chad pa'i nang la kha ru tshwa dang /rgya mtshwa dang /tshwa gzhan gang yang rung bral mngon por bsngags nas nges na/nad de las grol bar 'gyur te nyi ma de nyid la bde bar
94a7(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur//gtan nad kyi chod pa 'am/'phal gyi tshad pa la yang rung ste/ma tu lung ga'i rtsa ba btags nas srog chags med pa'i chu mthung du gzhug ste
94b1(rgyud): gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur te/lan+da bdun bzlas pas sam/gnyis bzlas pas so//bud mod mo bsham mo skyo ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'dod na a shau gAn+d+ha'i rtsa ba'i mar
94b2(rgyud): dang lhan cig bkol te ba'i 'o mas bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa lnga yongasu bzlas te/zla mtshan gyi dus su mthung du bcug nas khrus byas pa'i mthor skyes pa gzhan spang zhing khyim pa yang
94b3(rgyud): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongasu spangs nas/rang gi skyes pa 'am/rang gi bdag po'i bu skye bar 'gyuraro//lo gsum mam/lo lnga rab tu skye ba'i dus las lhag pa'am/
94b4(rgyud): lo du mar bu ma chags pa'am/gzhan gyi sngags dang sman gyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang /gzhan gyis gdug par byas pa'am/mngal 'dzin pa mi 'dzin par byas pa'am/
94b5(rgyud): nad kun tu langs pa 'am/sbyor ba gzhan kun tu spangs pa'am/nad gzhan yang rung ba cung zad kyis yongasu mi 'dzin par byas pa'am/brtan pa dang /g.yo ba dang /bcos
94b6(rgyud): ma dang /bcos ma ma yin po la so& pI dug la so Da pa rab tu zhugs pa'am/rtsa ba dang /sngags dang /sman dang /mdza' bo dang /mi mdza' ba'i sbyor ba byas pa la/mar
94b7(rgyud): rnying pa dang /rma bya'i mdongs/gcig tu byas nas btags la/sha ka ra dang lhan cig sbyor te/lan nyi shu rtsa bdun mngon par bsngags nas/oM ru ra tsam bza'
95a1(rgyud): bya ste/nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du sha ka ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bkol ba btung bar bya zhing yang dang yang du bsngags kyang bzlaso//klad pa na ba la bya rog gi
95a2(rgyud): bshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te des byams na bde bar gnas par 'gyuraro//bud med la ches spyad pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams la a lam bu sha'i rtsa ba
95a3(rgyud): 'o ma dang lhan cig btags nas ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas nas 'o mas bskyo mar sbyar nas btud par bya'o//de bzhin du rims nyin
95a4(rgyud): bzhi pa dang /nyin gcig pa dang /nyin gnyis pa dang /nyin gsum pa dang /rgyun pa dang rtag pa'i rims dang /rims drug po la sogs pa rnams la 'o thug
95a5(rgyud): mar dang sbyar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/'thung du bcug na bde bar gnas par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du mkha' mgro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa la/bdag nyid
95a6(rgyud): kyi gdong la lon brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du ma mo dang /byis pa dang /srul po dang /ro langs dang /grul bun
95a7(rgyud): gyi gdon la sogs pa rnams dang /mi thams cad gdug pa can drag pos mngon par zin pa la bdag nyid kyi log pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te//
95b1(rgyud): zin pa de'i mge bo la reg na bde bar gnas par 'gyuraro//lan gcig bzlas pas bdag nyid spang //gnyis bzlas pas grogs pa srung //gsum bzlas pas khyim srung ngo //bzhi bzlas pa/
95b2(rgyud): grong srung ngo //lnga bzlas pas grong gi spyod pa yul du gyur pa srung bar 'gyur//de bzhin du ji srid stong phrag gi bar du bzlas pas dmag gri tshogs srung ba byos par 'gyuraro//'di rnams
95b3(rgyud): sam/gzhan yang las phra mo rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed do//de nas sgrub par 'dod na phra ma'i las rnams mi bya bar mtha' gcig tu song nas dben pa'i phyogs rgya mtshor
95b4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i chu klung 'bab pa dang /rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang /gang gA'i klung gi ngogs dang /gzhan yang chu klung chen po'i ngogs la brten nas/phyogs gtsang ma phyag dar byas nas
95b5(rgyud): khrus lan gsum bya zhing /gos lan gsum brjes te/sme ba bcad/slong mo'i kha zas za zhing /lo ma dang /nas zan dang /'o ma dang /'bras bu za zhi ngo 'bum phrag bcu
95b6(rgyud): gcig bzlas par bya'o//grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na/de nas sgrub pa rtsam par bya ste phyogs de nyid du rusa? ris thu ba der bzhag la/rasa? ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas
95b7(rgyud): gser dngul gyi rang bzhin nam/zangs dang si'i rang bzhin gyi mar me'i snod/tu ru ka'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am/dri zhim por 'bru
96a1(rgyud): mar gyis bkung ba 'am/ba'i mar gyis bkang ba'i mar mu'i snod du ras gsar pa dum bu dum bur byas pa'i mar mI'i 'bum phrag gcig rus ris la
96a2(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o//de'i khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnams phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od zer rnams byung ma thag tu ras ris kun nos 'bar ba'i phreng bar 'gyur//steng gi bar snang
96a3(rgyud): la rnga bo che'i sgra sgro shing /legaso zhes pa yang thos te/de nas reg pa 'dzin pas pis b+hi chu la g+h+riHsa ris kyi mthu'i zur du sgrub pa po sngar bris par ras ris la brten pa la mchod yon phul
96a4(rgyud): nas bskor ba byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la gzung bar bya'o//de nis gzung ba tsam gyis mar mi 'dzin pa de rnams thams cad kyi lhan cig tu 'phur bar 'gyuraro//
96a5(rgyud): gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang brgya yang 'gro bar byed do//lha'i sil snyan dang so sor yang dag par ldan pa dang /sgra snyan pa'i klu dbyangs sgrogs shing gar byed pa'i
96a6(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin ma de rnams kyis khor yug tu kun tu khyab par snang ba sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por dbang bsrung bar byed do//mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyis
96a7(rgyud): lhan cig rga ba med cing 'tsho ba med par ril bar byed do//bskal po chen por gnas shing nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang /lha'i rkyen gyis mdzes pa dang /rnam par bkra/
96b1(rgyud): 'gos kyis rgyan pa/de rnams dbang du byos nas mngag gzhug par 'gyur te/da rnams dang lhan cig spyod par gyur te g+hi'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran nyid du/
96b2(rgyud): nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur zhing ring du 'tshe zhing grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//skad cig tsam gyis tshangs
96b3(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur//brgya byin gyis yang blangasu mi 'gro na de las gzhan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/mthar yang 'di sangs rgyas
96b4(rgyud): nyid du 'gyuraro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur//las sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang yod de/ches dka' thub byas pa/
96b5(rgyud): nas mtha' gcig tu song nas lhag par gnas te 'du 'dzi med cing 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i dgon pa chen por zhugs nas/gnas gang na pad+ma'i mtsho chen po dang /chu dang
96b6(rgyud): bcas pa/ri bo gcig la brten pa'i ri bo de'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/rig pa rnams kyi dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas de rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du/'o ma'am
