96b7(rgyud): nas zan dang /pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /'bras bu bza' zhing 'o ma las byung ba zos te reg pa 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya'o//bzlas pa'i mthar yang sngar bstan pa'i cho ga
97a1(rgyud): de nyid kyi ras ris kyi thu bo bzhugs nas/pad+ma'i me tog la tsan+dan dkar po dang /gur gum gyis btags te sang ldeng gi shing gi me sbar nas sngar
97a2(rgyud): yongasu btags pa'i pad+mas stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis sbyin bsregs bya'o//de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer
97a3(rgyud): 'byung ste/des sgrub pa paM kun tu snang bar byas nas spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro//reg ma thag tu sgrub pa po mngon par shes pa sngar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob//
97a4(rgyud): lha'i gzugs kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu ste/bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug 'da' bar byed//de rnams
97a5(rgyud): kyi mthu yang yang dag por rje su mthong ngo //sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug mnyes par byed do//de rnams kyang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bas mngon par dgo' bar
97a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro//mthar yang byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin par 'gyur//ji srid
97a7(rgyud): byang chub tu ma ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das
97b1(rgyud): ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyon du brngos pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga las/las mchog sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam yongasu rdzogaso////de nas yang bcom
97b2(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang sgrub pa'i lam mchog gsungs te/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags yongasu bzung nas gang ga'i klung du zhugs nas gru'i
97b3(rgyud): bzhon pa la rab tu gnas te/gang gi'i dbus su 'o ma dang chu btung zhing /stong phrag sum tsur ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyin zhag gi bzlas pa bya'o//de nas bzlas pa'i mthar klu thams cad
97b4(rgyud): mthong ngo //de nas sgrub pa brtsam ste gru'i dbus de nyid du/mi thab pad+ma'i rnam pa bya'o//de nas nA gaM ge ser la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras ris la mchod pa chen po bya'o//
97b5(rgyud): ras ris kyi mthu'o//zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag ste/bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/na ga ge sar gyi me tog re re la lan bdun
97b6(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa byas nas seng ljang gi shing gis ma sbar te/tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum bsres pa'i na ga ge sar gyi me tog rnams kyis stong phrag bcu'i bar rje'i
97b7(rgyud): par sbyin bsreg bya'o//gzhan klu rnams mthong ba na nye bar bcings pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas rnams rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya'o//gang las sbyin sreg gi mthar gru'i
98a1(rgyud): bzhon pa dang lhan cig 'dur bar 'gyur ro//reg pa 'dzin pa rnams kyu rgyal por 'gyuraro//klur dbang po rgyal po thams cad kyang rjesu 'brang zhing bran bzhin du
98a2(rgyud): gnas so//bAr gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//rang dbang du spyod par 'gyur ro//'gro ba la thogs pa med do//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon
98a3(rgyud): sum du mthong ste/de'i spyi bo la reg par mdzad do//reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyuraro//nges par sangs rgyas nyid du lhag par 'gro bar byed//gzhan yA/
98a4(rgyud): mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga'i skyob thabasu 'gyur ba ni sngar bzhin du gang gA'i klung du zhugs nas bil ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi shing gcig nyid kyi gru'i bzhon pa byas nas
98a5(rgyud): shin tu portag pa legs par byas pa der mngon par 'dzegs nas bil po'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi skye ba des gru de'i rje su sgrub pa po ches mkhas shing gsal ba nyid
98a6(rgyud): kyis g.yab par bya ste/gang ga'i klung chen po yongasu ma dor bar kun nas thad ka 'am rgyun ring su g.yab par bya'o//de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa gzung nas sam/snying po
98a7(rgyud): 'am/nye ba'i snying po'am/yi ge gcig pa'am/khro bo'am/pho nya 'am/ring du rje su 'brang ba'am/gzhon gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas ras ris kyi
98b1(rgyud): thu bo de nyid du/zhal nub du phyogs par bzhag nas bdag nyid dang po zhal shar du phyogs la/phyis ni ji ltar 'dod par bya'o//'o ma dang /nus zan dang /'bras bu bza' ba'am/chu 'am
98b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /'bras bu bza' zhing /smra ba bcad de/dus gsum du khrus bye zhing /gos lan gsum brdzes te/shin tu dkar ba'i las kun tu spyod cing shin tu dkar ba'i
98b3(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas dang po re shig ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bzhin du sngar cho ga mthong bas rig pa 'bum phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o//de nas gal te rtsa ba'i rig
98b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//de nas stong phrag drug cu bzlas pa'i mthar gru rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus te sngar gaunas de nyid du bzhag par bya'o//
98b5(rgyud): de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na/'jigs par mi bya zhing /bzlog paro mi bya'o//sgrub pa po'i dbang las ma gtogs par bzlog par nus pa yang ma yin//de
98b6(rgyud): nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par byed do//lam thung na lta ci smos/der zhugs nas chu'i steng du sgrub pa'i las brtsams par
98b7(rgyud): bya'o//de nas me thab sngar gyi rnam pa'am rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod du seng ldeng gi me sbar la na gi ge sar gyi ze 'bru dang /me tog tsan+dan dkar po dang /ga pur dang
99a1(rgyud): /bsgos pa'i bsrogs blugs rgyas nyung ba 'am/chos mang b+ha'i tshod kyang rung ste/sUr+ya bzhin du rtsa ba'i rlig pas 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin bzlog bya'o//sbyin
99a2(rgyud): sreg byed pa na/lang ka'i grong na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams hA hU~M zhes sgrogs pa dang /klu'i grong longs spyod ldan nA gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnam
99a3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ches zhi ba dang /tshes khro ba rnams langs te klu dang srin po rnams kyang 'di skad ces smra'o//khyed bzhings cig bzhengs cig/bdag
99a4(rgyud): cag gi rje bo mdzod cig ceso//de bzhin du lha ma yin dang /gnod sbyin lha dang /lte 'phye chen po dang /grub pa dang /mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par
99a5(rgyud): byed mod kyi ldang bar mi bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags bzla zhing lag pa g.yon pa'i bsdigs 'jub kyi bsdigs par bya'o//de nas rnam par 'byol zhing phan tshun
99a6(rgyud): rab tu 'bros la 'jigs par byed do//de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru des sgrub pa po de khyer nas skad cig la 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar byed do//'jig rten gyi
99a7(rgyud): khams gzhan du yang 'gro zhing 'ong bar byed//byang chub sems dpa'i sems shes par 'gyuraro//mngon par shes pa lnga dang /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /mthu chen po
99b1(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyuraro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong bar 'gyuraro//klu thams cad dang /srin po thams cad dang /gnod sbyin thams cad dang /lha thams cad
99b2(rgyud): dang /lha ma yin thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te/bka' bzhin byed pa la bzhag nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
99b3(rgyud): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'di'i sngags grub pa de rnams kyang 'di la byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro//rjesu 'dod par 'gyuraro//sems can thams
99b4(rgyud): cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//gzhan yung las kyi cho ga mchog sgrub thabasu 'gyur ba ni bral ba'i shing la gru bo che'i bzhon pa byed du gzhug ste/shing gcig gi bzhon
99b5(rgyud): pa'am/bsdus pa yang rung ste gnas chen po bya'o//gang ga'i dbus kyi gling der gnas pa'i gru'i bzhon par skyes bu brgya nyi shu log ni sgron me thogs pa rnams gru'i bzhon
99b6(rgyud): pa la 'dzegs te gos dkar po gyon zhing srung ba byis pa ras ris kyi thu bo sbur gyi cho gar kun tu bzhag pa'i spyan sngar bzhag par bya'o//de nas ras res la mched pa chen po byas
99b7(rgyud): nas nag ge sar gyi phye ma rnams dang gur gum dang /tsan dan dkar po dang /ga pu ra bsres pa dang /seng ldeng gi bsregs blugs stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin po sreg
100a1(rgyud): bya'o//de nas sbyin sreg phyi mthar gru de skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu'o//
100a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do//mthong ba tsam las thob par 'gyur//mngon par shes pa lnga dang yun ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por
100a3(rgyud): gnas par 'gyuraro//rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro//mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i reg pa 'dzin pa grub par 'gyuraro//lhan
100a4(rgyud): cig spyod pa de rnams dang /thabs gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu zhing /rang dgar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mched
100a5(rgyud): pa dang /bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par dgyes par 'gyuraro//mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par gyur pa
100a6(rgyud): nI/chu klung 'gram mam rgya mtsho'i ngogs//de bzhin kha ba can gyi rer//ri yi rgyal po'i 'bigs byed de//der ni las mchog sgrub par bya//sa h+ye ma la ya nyid dang //
100a7(rgyud): ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang dang //bya rgod phung po'i ri rgyal du//las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya//rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni//shing sogs mai tog ldan pa ste//rgyal
100b1(rgyud): bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams no//phyogs 'di rnams su bsgrub par bya//rnam par dben pa'i phyogs gtsang ma//byas mtha' grong ba'i chos bzhi la//mi skya reg pa spangs nas ni/
100b2(rgyud): rtag tu gats+tsha ba bya ba yin//lus la lkog gnas bshang pa dang //brtul zhugs can dag gtsang sbra bya//reg na gzhon sha can rnams 'dod//srog chags spangs pa'i sa rnams ni//
100b3(rgyud): gsum po de bzhin blangs nas ni//rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o//de bzhin gnyis ka'i thar log pa//sngags pas rtag tu sa dag ni//sngar brtan pa dge blangs nas ni//
100b4(rgyud): zlos pas rtag tu rkang pa nyid//g.yas dang de las gzhan pa ni//phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas//'bad pas rkang pa bkru bar bya//rgya cher sngar ni brjod pa bzhin//sngags
100b5(rgyud): zlas po yi gtsang sbra yang //gring med pa'i gtsang sbra ste//rtag tu thab pa nyid kyis gsungs//'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin//rgyud rnams kun tu mthong ngo zhes//mnga'
100b6(rgyud): bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs//de nas zlos pos nye reg bya//sdom brtson dngas grub las la dga'//sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis//yid kyi nang gi dag pa yin//gtsang sbra//
100b7(rgyud): rnam pa lnga ru brjod//sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du//lus kyi gtsang sbra de bzhin du//ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags//bzhi pa bden pa'i gtsang sbra sta/chu ni//
101a1(rgyud): lnga par brjod par bya//bden pa'i chos ni khro ba thul//rgyud shes bstan bcos mthong ba dang //phra mo'i de nyid don lnga mkhas//sngags shos las la
101a2(rgyud): grags pa dang //rgyu yis nang la mkhas pa ste//de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'//bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'o//brdzun pa'i tshig ni smra mi bya//bden pa thams cad
101a3(rgyud): rnam spangs pa'i//ma rungs rab tu ma rungs nyid//rnam par sdang dang 'khrugs bcas dang //rtsub cing gnad ni 'gems pa dang //bden pa'i chos ni rnam par nyams//
101a4(rgyud): sems can gzhan la gdung bar byed//phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang //chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang //de bzhin 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can//rtag tu khrims
101a5(rgyud): 'chal chos min spyod//sngags zlos pa yis spang bar bya//de bzhin nyid du grong gi chos//khro ba brnab sems 'byung ba yi//'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa rnams//blo
101a6(rgyud): ldan rang rgyal bas ru dang //slar yang rtag tu nyon mongs dang //sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad//de bzhin rtag tu brdzun smra ba//'jig rten dngos grub 'dod don
101a7(rgyud): gnyer//sa steng brdzun sgra nye bar smra//me bzod dmyal ba chen por ltung //sngon gyis nyes pa las de bzhin//dga' bas ga shin rje'i 'jig rten du//rtag tu slar
101b1(rgyud): yang der gan so//rtag tu brdzun sgras nyer 'tsho ga/mi bzad dran 'byor ltung bar 'gyur//thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang //yang sos ral gri lo ma dang //de bzhin shal ma la yaM
101b2(rgyud): nags//der ni bskal pa mang por gnas//brdzun du smra ba'i skye bo ni//gsang sngags log par smra ba dang //rmongs pas log par brjod pa yi//'byung po rnams la slu byed pa/
101b3(rgyud): de la grub pa ga la yod//de phyir rmongs pa las 'di yi//sngogs kyi dngos grub ma mthong nas//sngags pa'i dngos grub me do zhes//'di skad du ni tshig smra ba//gang gis
101b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan pa ni//sa stongs 'dirwa nI rab spangs pa//bskal pa bye ba mang po yis//de yis grub par ga la 'gyur//de phyir 'di ni mi bzad pa'i//'jigs chen ma nar
101b5(rgyud): med 'tshod par 'gyur//yang sos dang ni thig nag dang //rab tu tsha ba'i sems can sdig sbrul la sogs spangs po'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya//'bras bu me tog yang dag
101b6(rgyud): ldan/dri med chu ni rab sngags pa//sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya//yul gzhan rnamasu bsgrags mi bya//lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dam//brtan pa'i tshig ma
101b7(rgyud): gcig pa dang //rtags gcig de bzhin bas mthar ru//sngags rig sngags ni bsnyen pa bya//bdag dang grogs rnams srung byas nas//sngar spyad gsang sngags
102a1(rgyud): ldan pa dang //sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya//dgon pa che mchog shing chen dang //me tog 'bras bu la sogs 'byung //ri yi rtse dang khung bu
102a2(rgyud): dang /da chu yi gnas ni gtsang mer bcas//'bab chu che 'gram yid 'ong bar//sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya//sngags shes nas ni nges rtogs byed//shar phyogasu
102a3(rgyud): yang chu klung che//lu hi ta 'gram dge ba dang //de bzhin kA ma ru pa'i yul//grong mchog 'phel bar byed pa dang //dma' be gang du 'di 'gro mchog/'dug pa dang ni chu
102a4(rgyud): klung mchog/gnas der rtag tu bzlos pa dang //gtsang mi blo gros ldan pas bsten//sngon du bsnyen po'ang der gyis shig/gang ga'i sgo ru las rnams kun//de bzhin/
102a5(rgyud): rtag tu gang ga dang //dug can pa ni phred pa ru//rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang //gtsang ma'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya//dur khrod che dang gzhan nyid ni//zlos pas der ni
102a6(rgyud): rtab tu bzlas//dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni//srog chagaso rnams kyis spangs pa ru//de nyid phyir ni shin tu ni//mnyam bzhag sngags kyis bzlas pa bya//der ni
102a7(rgyud): 'jig rten bsam pa yi//bsod nams min pa cung zad mthong //'on kyang sngags kyis nyer bstan pas//cung zad dus su 'dug par bya//de nas gzhan du 'gro
102b1(rgyud): bar bya//zla ba bzas zin dus der ni//dus ma bab na'ang dus cung zad//dar 'dug bya yi gzhan du min//gzhan du sngags rig ci nus pas//de nas myur du 'gro bar bya//badre ga
102b2(rgyud): mchod rten bzhugs pa yi//sa steng rnamasu kun tu 'dug/'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni//lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams//mu stegs can gzhan ga nas rnams ni//
102b3(rgyud): sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang //sngags shes der ni mi bsdad//skyes mchog blo gros rgyu ngan pa//rgyal ba mchog gi gang bzhugs dang //rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang //
102b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa che//rgyal mchog sras po nyan thos rnams//de rnams kun bzhugs sa steng gI/yul rnams kun tu sngags shes pas//'bad pas sngon
102b5(rgyud): du bsnyen pa bya//mnyam par bzhag pasngo gsang sngags ni//gnas de ru ni bzlas par bya//gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'di rnams//gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang /
102b6(rgyud): las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rnams//'di rnams rnyed par ma gyur na//gang yang rung po'i gnas der ni//gcong mas sngon du bsnyen pa bya//dad cing mos pas sgrub thabs kyi//tshe
102b7(rgyud): ga mchog gi las brtsa mo//dang po re shig/bris bsku'i thu bo zhal nub tu bstan nas bzhag ste/bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs la grog ma kha ri gyi sa'am/gang
103a1(rgyud): g+ha'i klung gi 'gram gyis blangs nas pu shul rtse dang /tsan+dan dkar po dang /gur gum dang /ga pur rnams bsros la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/de bris sku'i spyan
103a2(rgyud): sngar bzhag nas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku shu ga tsang ma'i phyogs nas byung bas 'khor lo'i rnam pa byas nas bris sku'i spyan sngar lag paM gA yas pas bzung ste/lag po ga
103a3(rgyud): pas ni rma bya'o//dkar po'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan phyed ni bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ga pur gyis bdug pa bsregs pa'i dri dang ji srid nam langs pa'i bar de
103a4(rgyud): srid du bzlos par bya'o//de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe de rma bya'i rgyal por 'gyur//'khor lo yang 'baro//bdag nyid lha'i phreng ba dang gos 'chang zhing rnam par rgyan
103a5(rgyud): pa dang /nyi ma 'char ka 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te/ras ris la bskor ba byas la ras ris
103a6(rgyud): blangs nas rma bya'i bdan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'da' bar byed do//rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu
103a7(rgyud): bskor ba'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'tshe bar 'gyuraro//ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing /rab tu spyod par
103b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro//gas pa med par 'gro'o//lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuraro//de nyid 'di'i/
103b2(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyuraro//mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur//de bzhin du dbyig pa dang /ril ba spyi blugs dang /mched phyir thogs dang /ljang ros dang /
103b3(rgyud): gi wa dang /ral gri dang /lcags mda' dang /mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /dgra sta dang /mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam po sna tshogs pa/swa'i ring bzhin gyi khyad par dang /
103b4(rgyud): rkang gnyis pa dang /rkang bzhi pa dang /bya dang /bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang /stag dang /gzigs la so DA pa rnams grog mkhar gyi sa dri zhim po'i dro zhim bsres
103b5(rgyud): pa las byas pa 'am/stan dang /bzhon po dang /mal cha dang /gdugs dkar po dang /cod pan dang /rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang /rin po che'i bye brag thams cad
103b6(rgyud): dang /ngab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang phreng dang /'chil lham dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /khab dang /gri la sogs pa rgyal gyi lha/
103b7(rgyud): las byas pa'am/gzhan yang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa rgyal gyis lcags las byas pa'am/grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/chu klung gi sa las byas pa
104a1(rgyud): de thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par ga srang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du sbyong ba'i sngags sama?/yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/snga ma/
104a2(rgyud): gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub pa'i cho gra'i rig pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang /rdzi
104a3(rgyud): ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po yongasu skyabs par byas pa/shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang rgyud shes pa/sngar bstan pa'i gnasu dris
104a4(rgyud): sgroskyesmyo zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar bzhin du'o//bris sgo la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bor ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sder bstan pa'i mtshon cha
104a5(rgyud): dang yo byad dang sems can gyi khyad pa rnams sngar bstan pa'i btsos mar byas la/yar dro'i zlo ba nya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung blangs te mtshan mo ji srid du bzlas pa
104a6(rgyud): byas na nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi che bar skabs 'dir bras sku la 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po kun tu mthong ngo //gal te sgrub pa po gzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur na/de la
104a7(rgyud): zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyuraro//gal te rkyen gyi khyad par ram/mtshon cha'i khyad par drang ba 'am/bcang bas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro//
104b1(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'phro zhing /lha'i lus can nyi mA shar ba dang mtshungs pa 'od zer chen po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa klog ltar gsal ba'i sku/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga'
104b2(rgyud): bdag/ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na spyod pa/sngar
104b3(rgyud): yongasu brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhon pa gang gi 'grub pa de nyid mthu chen por 'gyur te/de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang /de nyid 'di grogs po ste/gzhan gyi sngags kyi dngos
104b4(rgyud): grub bzlog par gyur pa bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa/byams pa'i bdag nyid can/phun par 'dod pa rtag tu rjesu bcings pa/de nyid 'di'i mtshon
104b5(rgyud): cha dang /rgyan dang /rin po che'i bye brag dang /stan dang /mal cha dang /sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba chen po rtag tu
104b6(rgyud): rjesu 'brel bar 'gyur ro//mthu chen po dang brtson 'grus chen po dang /lus chen por 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing /legaso zhes bya ba
104b7(rgyud): gnang ste spyi bor byugs nas ji srid byang chub snying po rje su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de/stobs bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste mchod pa'i 'o su
105a1(rgyud): yang 'gyuraro//sems can rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /'byung po thams cad kyis mo tshugs par 'gyur//yang dag pa'i mtha'i rigs
105a2(rgyud): rgyun mi gcod pa dang /sa thob par yang 'gyuraro//stobs bcu dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro//mngar bsdus na las mchog thams
105a3(rgyud): cod dang /gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las mchog gzhan nyid bya'o//rig pa 'dzin pa nyid
105a4(rgyud): namakha' la 'gro ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu 'jug po dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /sa rje su thob par byed pa nyid dang /lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten kun
105a5(rgyud): tu 'gro ba nyid dang /stobs bcu'i rgyud yongasu rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang /chos bstan pa do na
105a6(rgyud): yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /sangs rgyas gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing rje su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
105a7(rgyud): chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjesu 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang /nyon mongs pa'i yongasu gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang //
105b1(rgyud): 'jig rten rje su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tAn byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod
105b2(rgyud): par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /rang sangs
105b3(rgyud): rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/sngags kyi mtha' rab 'byam dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan
105b4(rgyud): snga dang nye bar 'dug nas 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad sngags kyi cho ga dang /rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste/mdor na 'dir rtog pa
105b5(rgyud): gzhan du gsung ba'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/myur du de rnams kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdon mi za bar 'grub
105b6(rgyud): par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen rjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/
105b7(rgyud): ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzog so////de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang
106a1(rgyud): /chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bar ma yod do//de mdor bsdus nas bad
106a2(rgyud): par bya yis/legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom
106a3(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/bdag cag la thu/
106a4(rgyud): brtse ba'i don dang /ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /byang chub sems
106a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po nyon cig dang po re zhig tshul
106a6(rgyud): khrims dang brtul zhugs dang /gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa dang /nges par sdom pa dang /bzlas pa dang /sbyin sreg dang /bsam gtan dang /cha ga dang /gang du rab tu
106a7(rgyud): gnas pa ste/sems can tha~Md kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang /sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyar ba'i dngos grub grub
106b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/de ngas bshad kyis sems dpa' chen po nyon cig dang po ra shig rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag
106b2(rgyud): par blangs te/dang por shig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig la yang dag par rje su 'jug par bya'o//khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/sngar
106b3(rgyud): nges par bstan pa gsol ba/yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob pa/khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho gau shes pa/mkhas pa gsal ba/chos dang ldan pa/
106b4(rgyud): bden par smra ba/spro ba che ga byas pa bzo ba dang /brtan pa/sems bzang ba/ha cang me rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa/rnyed pa dang /bkur ste thams cad la 'dod pa med pa/
106b5(rgyud): tshangs par spyod pa/snying rje dang ldan pa/rnyed pa tsam gyis sam longs spyod rgyur ram/rje su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na/shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang /rnyed pa dang /
106b6(rgyud): rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /'byung po thoms cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang /sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /sngar spyad pa
106b7(rgyud): byas pa khyod kyis gsang ba'i rig pa dang /sngags rjesu zlos pa dang /reg pa sngon du bstan pa byas pa khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dog par zhugs pa/'jig rten shes pa/
107a1(rgyud): yang dag par rje su 'dzin par byed pa/'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa logs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/chags pa med pa//
107a2(rgyud): dpa' ba/brtson 'grus brtan pa/nad med po ste/nad gleng gis la su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang /rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa/yon tan 'di
107a3(rgyud): rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/sgrub pa po yang de dang 'dra ba'am/yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o//de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob
107a4(rgyud): dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di la don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang sngags dang bcom ldan
107a5(rgyud): 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjesu 'jug par 'o tshal na bdag cag la rjesu brtse ba'i don dang /phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung
107a6(rgyud): du gsol//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas bzhugs por bya zhing sngar bzhin du mngon par
107a7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang sngags byin la rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o//gsang chen dang /phyag rgya dang /rgyud dang /sngags dang las rnams kyang
107b1(rgyud): dus ngong mo nyid nas yongasu btags te/bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang sngags la sogs pa dang /las rnams thams cad bstan pa bya'o//gzhan du ma yin zhes pa'i chog 'di rab tu
107b2(rgyud): bsgrag so//de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa'am bdag nyid dang longs spyod kyang dngul bar bya'o//de nas dkyil 'a/
107b3(rgyud): slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag par bya'o//bu bzhin du bsrung bar bya'o//ma bzhin ljongs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu byur bya'o//de nas slob po des rig pa dang /
107b4(rgyud): sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rog pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spun
107b5(rgyud): drang ba dang /gshegasu gsol pa dang /mar me dang /dr-i dang /bdug pa dang /gtor ma dang /lbu bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis rgyas par byis
107b6(rgyud): te spyan drangs nas gdan phul ba thun mtshems gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brdzis te nyim so so la bzlas par bya'o//de la thun 'tshams kyi dus zhos
107b7(rgyud): bya ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nis partsams te ji srid tu me'itsho ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang par bshad do//nyi ma gu na nyim shang ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshas
108a1(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni chog shes pas gung gi thun 'tshams shes par bya'o//nub pa'i dus su yang lhag ma gan/
108a2(rgyud): cha tsam thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o//slob dpon mkhas pa shes nyen can//tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan//chen po'i rigasu 'khrungs pa dang /
108a3(rgyud): kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa ni//sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan//bya ba kun lA blo gros byed//phra zhing mkhas la tshang shes pa//chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu
108a4(rgyud): 'dzin//spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan//'jig rten chos la ltos pa med//thub pa mchog gi chos lo dang //'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang //bzlas pa byas shing rnam dben
108a5(rgyud): byas//sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa//byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags shes//de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong //sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang sngags dang /
108a6(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes//srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa//gtsang sgra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni//kun nas rje su 'jug pa dang /
108a7(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal bso gsungs pa yin//gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson//rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang //'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid//sdig pa
108b1(rgyud): kun la 'jigs pa dang //phra me tsam la'ang de bzhi no//gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med//yid bzhungs lta na sdug pa dang //stobs bcu pas bshad sngags gang dang //de bzhin kho//
108b2(rgyud): nanur rgyal sras dang //'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid//rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la'ang //de la rtag tu ngal bar byas//gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa//nad med nus pa
108b3(rgyud): med min pa//rga dang nad ni rnam par spangs//de bzhin shes nyin can sngags grub//kun nas myur du byed po dang //mtha' yi ring min zhing de bzhin//tshangs par spyod cing
108b4(rgyud): shes rab che//khyad par du ni shes pa dang //gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang //dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang //de 'dir byang chub pha rol son//srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson///
108b5(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du rig sngags byas//mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang //'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa//dpa' nyid dang ni rab tu ldan//sbyin dang 'byung po phan la dga'//de
108b6(rgyud): bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la//rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya//des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi//sngags kyi dngos grub ster bor byed//de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur
108b7(rgyud): gyis//'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur//dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang //thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchid//de yi gsungs ni mi 'gom pa//slob mas 'bad pas bye ba
109a1(rgyud): yon//de smad 'byur cing 'dog pa yi//longs spyod do la dasgral bar bya//nAng du tsam mo ma dang //gang gis mAn+tas par 'gyur ba dang //sa
109a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyu yi phyir//pa la nar ni ster ba ltar//de bzhin slob mchi mi shes pas//slob dpon la ni nar dngul bya//mapa' yi dbang phyug dngos zla thob//tshe dang de bzhin na
109a3(rgyud): med dang //rgyas pa'i 'gro ba thub par 'gyur//sgrub mas bla ma de mchad na//de yi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur//lam dang cho gnyer mthong dang //bsnyen pa las kyi
109a4(rgyud): brten pa las//de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las//sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur//de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang //lha rnams thams cad dgyes
109a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur//bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na//bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi//'di dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur//sgrub pos ston dang thog mar ni//dam tshig pa
109a6(rgyud): nI rjes 'jug ste//dmanA rnams de dag mnyam yang rung //gal te ches mchog gyur pa yang//rmongs pa'am lcug par khro ba yis//drug tu b+h+ra ma bAnas mang+ga/
109a7(rgyud): des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni//man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya//gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin//'dis ni ser sna byas pa min//sngar bstan sgrub mo de la ni//man ngo
109b1(rgyud): rgyug tu sbyin par bya//gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byan//lus can zhon pa 'phel byed pa'o//mig no gang la yod gyur pa//de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o//slob dpon 'am ni slob
109b2(rgyud): mo'i rgyur//phan tshun rjesu 'jug byed pa//gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong ba//'jam po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste//de la sngags ni sbyin par bya//slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni//slob
109b3(rgyud): ma bla mar mthong ba la//rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba'am//gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor//de la rtag tu lam nyid dang //sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya//gnyis kas
109b4(rgyud): pa dang bur shes pas//sngags ni 'bras bcas rjes 'jug pa//brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob//rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni//rab tu 'bod pas bsrung bar bya//bu ni bdag nyid//
109b5(rgyud): chen po rnams//sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chad 'gyur//de med mgon med de rnams la//ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin//sems can bkren dang ma ning lnga'ang //
109b6(rgyud): thams cad la ni khyad par du//sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags//tha ma mchog dang bar ma la//dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o//yongasu thob pa'i chos rnams la//rjesu
109b7(rgyud): gzung ba'i rgyun bya'o//'gro ba blo gros nges po yi//'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya//de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags//slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya//de nyid kyis ni nyir
110a1(rgyud): /bstan pas//lam nyid yon gzhan du mon//dngos grub 'dod pas gang da la//pha ni pha rol song ba na//phra bzhin mgo bos phyag byas to//de nas ji ltar
110a2(rgyud): 'dod par 'gro//de nas 'dir ni song nas ni//mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas//slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing //smra ba bcad dngos gsum bzlas//de ltar
110a3(rgyud): bstan pa nyid du 'gyur//ji lta'i lam la rab 'jug pa//de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa//khang steng dang ni dgon pa che//ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs//gtsang dang ba lang gnas
110a4(rgyud): mtsho chen//rnam dben skye bo spangs pa bsten//lha khang dang ni shing drung dang //mtshan gcig ri ni mthon pa dang //rgya mtsha che 'gram nyams dga' dang //chu gling ngam ni gling rnam
110a5(rgyud): dang //rnam pa sna tshog sngo sngar bstan pa'i//yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba//'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du//mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya//grogs
110a6(rgyud): bo mtshan nyid ldan pa ni//sngags don nges po'i rtog go ga/lhas ni rnam pa de nyid shes//dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba//sring stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can//
110a7(rgyud): dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan//rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni//rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa//bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis//'ab
110b1(rgyud): meng pa'i nyin gyis ni//las rnams rgyu lbu ba 'grub par 'gyur//blo rangs mal nas langs nas ni//'bab chu man chen las byung ba'o//srog chags myed cing dri ma med//nA da nga
110b2(rgyud): khrus byas nas//sa dang ba byung phye ma yi//sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya//de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i//chu nyid shin tu dri med la//zlos po brtson pas khrus bya'o//ha cing
110b3(rgyud): yun rings khrus mi bya//de nas langs la lag pa dag/sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya//bdun dang bdun dang yang lani bdun//nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya//yang der song shing kun tu
110b4(rgyud): spyaspyod//so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya//de nas skyob la phyag byas shing //'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas//sngags reg ma chad pa yid 'ong bya//bya ba smre tshogs bstod mchod kyis//
110b5(rgyud): yang dag yong du yang dag bstod//de bzhin dri zhi mo me tog gis//ston pa skyo ba la mchod yon dbul//sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas//de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams//
110b6(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon+d+ra po de rnams kyi//spyan snga nyid du sdig pa bshags//dad go nyid drag kyang phul byas nas//ras ris sbyin sngar 'khod par bya//ku sha'i khrus la nye bar 'jug
110b7(rgyud): sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni//mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te//der ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni//rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya//de tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so//
111a1(rgyud): cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing //ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no//bar ma bar ma'i las dag la/brtul zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya//ha cang mthon po spang
111a2(rgyud): bar bya//gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min//bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la//rab tu sngags par rgyal bas gsungs//ha cang mtho min dma' ba min//bar mar rtag tu
111a3(rgyud): bzlas pa bya//sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs//gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing //gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang //bdag
111a4(rgyud): nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas//sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du//bzlas pas rab tu 'byor par 'gyur//sngags ni legs par thos pa 'ga'//dngos grub 'bang po 'dod pa
111a5(rgyud): nyid//sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya//de phyir skye bo dang bral bar//sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos//tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par//zlos pa pos ni sngags
111a6(rgyud): bzlas bya//mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang //de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi//skya ring dmar po'i dus tsam ste//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na//thun ni dang por de bzhin du//thub
111a7(rgyud): pa'i skyes mchog gis gsung so//dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te//bar mar yongasu bsgrags pa yin//de nas nyi ma byad nub na//sngags kyis bzlas pa de tshe btang //spa
111b1(rgyud): zlos bor ba de yi che//mchod yon phul nas gshegasu gsol//brtul zhugs can gyi rnam gzhan spangs//de tshe bor ba'i dug lhag na//thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya//shes rab
111b2(rgyud): pha rol phyin la sogs//dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang //sa bcu pa yi glegs bam ni//mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o//de nas dus la bab gyur na//rang sngags sngags kyi mgon
111b3(rgyud): po dang //thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas//de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing //de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan//dus su za zhing dbang por thul//sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang //
111b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson//grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na//mi smra gtsang sbra spyod la dga'o//sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i//khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug/
111b5(rgyud): zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu//tshos par grub pa gtsang mar 'dod//yang dgra lto ba phun sum tshogs//sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad//de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni//
111b6(rgyud): bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang //dper na brtson pas go bgos te//nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug/rtag tu dag ni 'joms par byed//dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa//
111b7(rgyud): de bzhin sngags pa slongs mos 'tsho//rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na//de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi//gzugs sgra mthong nas mo dge ba//'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir
112a1(rgyud): m-i drug dge ba bsgom par bya//lang rtswa'i rnam pas rgyan pa yi//dud myed lus ni mthong nus kyang //slad cing rul ba'i lus rnams na//smon bus zos shing dung
112a2(rgyud): khyod gnas//lus kyi mi rtag sdug bsngal ba//mau gtsang dri mi zhum par sgom//gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi//'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor//las kyi skyes bus brgyus pa
112a3(rgyud): ni//yun rings du su mya ngan byed//mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni//dmus longs sdug bsngal rgyu can no//gang du blo ni phyin ci log/chags pas skye ba phongs par 'gyur//
112a4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis//rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa//ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni//'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed//rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa//'dzin
112a5(rgyud): pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod//gang du sems cani ma dge dga'//lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed//zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin//srid pa'i mtsho chung 'byung ba rnams//'gro ba
112a6(rgyud): de rnams mi bzed pa'i//sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g.yengs//de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi//rtsertsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa dri//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
112a7(rgyud): dang //de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang //thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin//srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i//mtsho chen 'di dag bsgom par dka'//bud med sema?/
112b1(rgyud): kyiskye sdus pa mo//sems can gnas gang byung ba de//dmyal bdud 'gro 'dzi bra rten dang //yi dgasu 'jug rtenA lta ma yin//de bzhin mI yo 'jijog rten nyid//lha ya 'phro bar
112b2(rgyud): 'gro bar bya//rtag tu kun nas yongasu 'khor//bud med tshogs pas bslus pa ni//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi//'dab rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur//bud med chags pa'i
112b3(rgyud): blun po'i mi//ro la chags pa'i ce spyang bzhin//gang la sems can rtag dga' ba//mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par byed//dkar po chos la nges par nyams//sangs rgyas
112b4(rgyud): sbyin la rab tu gnas//srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid//thams cad bzlog par byed pa yin//sngags bzlos pa la dga' zhing brtson//dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan
112b5(rgyud): gzo brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa//der rnams la ni sdug bsngal med//yang dag sdom dang chungs bden shes//lha ma lha lha mchod pa byed//ma dang pha li gus pa rnams//gsuM
112b6(rgyud): po rnams la sdug bsngal med//mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang //gzhan gyi don la rjesu bsnyen//bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugaso//de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang /
112b7(rgyud): ngani phung po'i lcags kyis zin//'khor ba las ni mo 'da' ba//rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa//de la dngos grub yod pa min//de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin//'gro ba
113a1(rgyud): na na kun smra smra na rdzun sarna tu na na du
113a2(rgyud): di 'i mi dag sa sbyin gyi tsho pa na na
113b1(rgyud): shes//de rnams byub d+mod mi da/2//de ltar sngags shos zhugs pa no//b+h+r-ing du bsod snyoms sbyor du 'jug/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhon song nas//sdad ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu/
113b2(rgyud): mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bzar /bza' ba phyogs bzhug nas ni//phyi rol snying nas rkang pa bklu//de nas slar yang gnas de dra//srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis//de
113b3(rgyud): 'dren pa nyid yin te//gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi//rked pa man chad dris phyis bya//kun tu g.yas pa slar byin nas//lag pa sa yis bkru bar bya//sngar bzhag pa yi dag
113b4(rgyud): pa dang //gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du//bza' zhing dag chus gtsang sbrar byas//ser skya'i ba las byung ba yi//ba yi lci ba ser po dag/gtsang zhing dri med snod blang la//
113b5(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i chus sbyar te//dang por ston pa thub pa yi//mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin//khyad par khru gang tsam du'o//gnyis pa rang sngags mngon po la//gsu
113b6(rgyud): pi rigs kyi lha mo la//gang zhig sngags pa bzlos pa ba//slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin//bzhi pa sems can thams cad kyi//nye bar ljongs spyod don du grags//g.yas
113b7(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po yi//dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya//dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni//dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa'o//gnyis po rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
114a1(rgyud): gsum pa stabs bcu ldan pa'i sras//dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni//kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o//khru gang 'am ni khyu phyed rung //nyin re zhing yang bya
114a2(rgyud): ba'o//zlos pas de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs//sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin//de nas sngags pa thub pa langs//lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni//gtsang ma
114a3(rgyud): yis he reg bya//dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi//dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni//'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du blang //mtshe chen dang ni 'bab chu'am//chu mig chu
114a4(rgyud): bo la gnas pa//gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi//sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus//sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya//gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang //
114a5(rgyud): de nas kha la reg bya zhing //de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun//mig dang sna yi bu ga dang //spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya//dge ba spyod pas lan lha 'am bdun//cho ga bzhin
114a6(rgyud): du thams cad bya//gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum chogs//zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni//bsod snyoms snad ni blangs na su//chu yi nang du 'gro bar bya//gang du chu bo rab
114a7(rgyud): gnas pa//de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang //chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs//mi yi 'jig rten rjes bzung rgyur//de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya//de nyid phyir na
114b1(rgyud): thub pa'i ka tsos//brtson 'grus chen pos 'di gsung so//mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya bas//sngon gyi de tshe sa steng der//sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir//'byung po rnams la legs
114b2(rgyud): don du//sngags ni rab tu gsungs pa yin//sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun//dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba//mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams//'di rnams don du
114b3(rgyud): gsungs pa yan//'byung ba rnams la legs pa nyid//slar yang kun tu bsten pa rnams//'byung po kun gyi zlas don du//gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs//nga yis gsang
114b4(rgyud): sngags bde brjod kyi//byang sems la bsten thams cad dang //nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis//nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing //bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang //
114b5(rgyud): gang yang sems can skom pa dang //sdug bsngal thams cad zhi don dang //'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis//'od srung 'od ni chen po la//thub pa'i gtso bos de skad
114b6(rgyud): gsungs//nyon mongs rnams ni yid 'gu nas//khyab bdag de la gsol ba 'debs//chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che//chos chen gsang sngags bshad du gsol//dam tshig mchog/
114b7(rgyud): la nyar gnas pa'i//sems can rnams la rjes btser mdzod//de skad gsol nas thub pa yis//sngags mchog rgyas par gsung bar byed//ka la bing ka sgra dbyangs dang //
115a1(rgyud): rngabo che dang sbyin gyi sgra//tsho m+b+ha dbyangs btsun 'gyus chen po dang //rgyu sa pa'o sras gang rgyal mchog gis//gang yang cung zad dadang ngas pa//rkang mod
115a2(rgyud): pa dang rkang mangs dang //rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi po//'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig/mdor na sems can don kun tu//bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya//
115a3(rgyud): 'das drang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//sems can la sogs 'dir lhag pa//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya//'byor pa 'did pa rnams nyon cig/nA mAr+d+has man+ta du d+hArmA/
115a4(rgyud): up+sa ti tA ta sha s+ya nA nAM/t+yAd+ha thA/oM ga ga ne/ga ga ne/gaits+tsha A nA ya sarba li hu l+yA tu/sa ma ya mo nu sbyar/a kaR+Sha Ne/mU bi lam+b+ha/ya b+h+rUM bi tI sa pAM Sh+T+r-i
115a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas/cang mo gsung bar gyur to//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'odi srung gis/rig pa'i spya ng+ge
115a6(rgyud): tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar snabs 'dir na mkha' thams cad chen po la ltos pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongasu gang por gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
115a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi na mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to//bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par
115b1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don du blangs par bkru bar bya//slar yang de nas langs nas ni//gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro//gang sus sngon ni yang dge bsten//gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya//
115b2(rgyud): song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru//lhung bzed de ni bzhag par bya//de nas myur du nye reg bya//de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang //lhung bzed sa la lo ma 'am//dngul lam de bzhin
115b3(rgyud): gser nyid dang //zang sam shing shun dag kyang rung //ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul//ston la lha bshos phul nas ni//slar ying rang rig sngags rgyal la'o//'gron po gcig
115b4(rgyud): ni 'ongs gyur dang //sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin//bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du//kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid//ha cang mang po sbyin mo bya//sngags shes 'dir ni/
115b5(rgyud): gdung mi bya//kun nas rigs pa ldan par bya//lto po'i tshad tsam bzhag nas ni//gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o//bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis//sngogs don sgrub par mi nus
115b6(rgyud): te//ha cong nyung dang mang zos na//sngags don bsnyen par mi nuso//de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis//sems can zas kyis gnaso zhes//lus can kun la gsungs pa yin//
115b7(rgyud): gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang //lha dang lha min dri za dang //klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci//srin po yi dgas sha za dang //'byung po skur ma gze' dag ni//gang zhig zas la mi/
116a1(rgyud): r+d+ha swA ga/don 'bra' yang yod ma yin/rtag+sa tu kha nas rag+h+ra pa n+ta//khams kyi zlas zhes grags pa'o//snyoms can phra mo'i zlas dz+nyAn srung //da na
116a2(rgyud): gshegs pas gsungs pa ni//bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni//gzugs ni spyod cing g.yo ba ste//gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang //ting 'dzin 'bras du
116a3(rgyud): bsta/sred pa bar ma'o sems can yang //dri zla bar ni rab tu grags//de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams//zlas ni rnam pa sna tshugs za//'dod dang ldan pa'i
116a4(rgyud): dang me//khams kye zas ni za bar byed//de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis//sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes//chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin//gang de rnams ni rab tu gra
116a5(rgyud): zlas po rtag tu brtson bu na//zas kyi tshad ni rig par bya//gang phyir rig pa bstan pa ni//zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas//kun spyod ma nar dag pa dang //dge zhing tshangs pa
116a6(rgyud): spyad pa dang //zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la//de yi dngos grubo rnyed mi dka'//dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyur//shing rta yun rings gnas don du//shing rta'i mig ni
116a7(rgyud): bar byed//de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas//zas ni gnas pa'i ched du spyad//lus ni gas pa 'don du ni//rnaMs po rtag tu gas par bya//sngags rnams
116b1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i don phyir dang //byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir//zas thams cad dang /ji ltar mngon par sbed pa'i bza' ba de/de rnamasu char 'bab par gyur to//ji ltar mngon par sring
116b2(rgyud): pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'o sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang /skom pa rnams kyis btung ba/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu ba'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba/
116b3(rgyud): yang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /skom pa thams cad bsal bar byos
116b4(rgyud): par gyur to//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing tshim pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rje su yi ring
116b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das 'od srungad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la
116b6(rgyud): yongasu bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /bkres pa dang /skom pa
116b7(rgyud): gsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang /khyad par du sngags bzlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir gsungs pa la mngon par rjesu yi rang ngo //dang po ro shrI zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par
117a1(rgyud): bya'o//gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi skyon ri'i D+ho mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa bya/de nas dkar gsum bza' ba'am/'o ma
117a2(rgyud): btung ba'o//ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris par ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te gr-i twor ma dang lha ba shos rgya chen po byas nas/yang
117a3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis steng ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyi mi sbyar nas u dum bA ri'i yam shring la zho dang /
117a4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am/dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin nas
117a5(rgyud): pi chen po dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya/langs na 'gre bar yang mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrolo ma'i snying pos bdag nyid
117a6(rgyud): bsrung bar bya zhing /dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o//de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/bud med kyang
117a7(rgyud): rgyani thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa//'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa/sgrub pa pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/kye kye sems
117b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po longs shig/grub pa yino zhes//de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul//de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyi ma de nas bdag nyid
117b2(rgyud): dam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster bar byed do//ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu sbyin par byed do//de nas sgrub/
117b3(rgyud): pa pos mchod yin phul nas gshegasu gsol bar bya'o//ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nasau ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
117b4(rgyud): byas nas de nas ri'i rtse mo'am/mi med pa'i gan su 'gro bar bya'o//der bdag nyid dam/grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgam par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der na mkha' la 'gro
117b5(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o//de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug sto ras risau bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugasu gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gi me
117b6(rgyud): sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog zhi dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mi ra la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rtsu ba'i rig pa 'am snying po'am nye ba'i snying pos las
117b7(rgyud): chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am yi ge gcig pa'i tshad du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas mtshon phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol
118a1(rgyud): ma skyon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing /'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byed do//nA mkha' la 'gro ba'am/mi snang ba 'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/
118a2(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas sam/mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/tshe ring ba nyid dam/rgyal srid chen po dang /longs spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dim/rgyal po chen po many+dzus pa nyid dam/
118a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjesu rnam par spyad pa nyid dam/mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do//gang blangs kyang rung ste/de mthun par
118a4(rgyud): gnang bar byed cing /grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob bo//sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa'am/mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad
118a5(rgyud): mdzad do//las kyi nyes pa rab tu spags pa yang yang dag par sbyong bar byedado zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsung so//las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar mA'i sgrub thabs

118a7(rgyud): tu phyogs par bzhag la bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha'i khris la nye bar 'dug ste/rgyas pas gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du 'bum///
118b1(rgyud): phrog drug bzlas par bya'o//bzlas pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang /dong kA'i me tog tsan+dan dkar po dang bsres pa'am gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad
118b2(rgyud): sbyin slob bya'o//sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid//ras ris le 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do//ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khru
118b3(rgyud): no rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do//ras ris la mi byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do//ras ris ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum
118b4(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug nyid do//ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor rig na mngon par shes pa lnga dang /sa bdun rje su thob pa dang /stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do//de nas sgrub pa
118b5(rgyud): pos bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjesu thob pa de nyid kyis dang /cho ga de nyid kyi yo byad kyis rig
118b6(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thub kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya'i gzhan du grub par mi 'gyu ro//de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rje su 'jug cing mdor
118b7(rgyud): nan ton nges par sgrub par byed/rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang /nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do//sngags she/

119b1(rgyud): gang du nu ma yang bza' mi bya//mkhas pas de kun ces kyang spang //thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni//rmongs pas nam yang 'go mo mi bya//sngags pa dam chog nyams par 'gyur//

119b4(rgyud): ru lta bu gang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso//lo ma gzhan dang lha bshos 'byung //zlos pos de rnams spang par /yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom//sna tshogs bza'
119b5(rgyud): bsnum khur dang //de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams//sngags pas 'bad pas blang bar bya//rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang //de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog/
119b6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi//lha bshos thams cad nyid dang ni//zlos pos rtog tu spong bar bya//chung ngu tsam yang lus can la//sngags rnams dri yis mi 'grub/
119b7(rgyud): ste//kun nas bkra shos thams cad dang //rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos//rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can//lha ci shes gtor ma za byed pa//de tshad yi kun mi 'grub//ga
120a1(rgyud): zhing mkhas la tshul khrim sna ldan//snying rje skyong rje'i las can dang //tsang sgra'i spyad pa la dga' bu//rAg sngags kun tu sgrub par byed//sems can
120a2(rgyud): gzhan la byin pa'i zas//zlos pos de ni bze mi bye//gzhan gyis rab tu ma btags pa'i//zas gzhan bza' dar mi bya'o//rang la byin pas kha zas ni//cung zad
120a3(rgyud): tsam yang blong bar bya//sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni//de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i ngagra/yongasu rdzogs par byed phyir gnas//zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni//bza'

120b3(rgyud): gcig la'o//de nas ras ris dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/dam pa'i chos kyi gleg pa mo bklag par bya'o//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
120b4(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa dang /'phags pa zla ba sgron mo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'phags pas nu pa dang /'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang /'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang /
120b5(rgyud): 'phagaso pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o//nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o//do nas yong du zhe nas
120b6(rgyud): deltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam
120b7(rgyud): mtsho phran chen por 'jug pas song nas/srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par bsngagaso par byas nas rig pa 'dis tshul gdab bo//gang zhe na
121a1(rgyud): @na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA n+ta a pra ti hA ta shA sa nAn+ta/tad+h+ya thA/oM sarba duSh+Tadz+ha b+hA yA d+hA/nA dI bar d+hA roH/sa ma ya ma nu skAr phaT phaT+Ta swA hA/'dis srung /
121a2(rgyud): byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang /grogs rnams dang /dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /khaM bcing ba dang /gdug pa dang /rab tu bdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs
121a3(rgyud): par byed po dang /bgegs bcing ba las yang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogasu bcings pas thams cad yongasu 'chags pa dang /bzlas pa'i dus
121a4(rgyud): thams cad dang /khrus kyi dus thams cad dang /gdug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom po dang /rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o//de
121a5(rgyud): nas las thams cad byed do//pad+ma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o//las rnams thams cad du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur//de
121a6(rgyud): nas sgrub pa pos sa los byung ba'i phye ma la sogs po rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te/thams cad du las
121a7(rgyud): thams cad la srog chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o//de nas khrus byas nas so'i rang bzhin na mo gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang /yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes
121b1(rgyud): byug par te'o//chu'i nang du mtshol ma dang /bshab pa dang gtso ba la sogs pa yang dor bar mi bya'o//rtse bar yang mi bya'o//snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can thams
121b2(rgyud): cid la so sor brtag par bya ste/bdag med pa dang /stong pa dang /sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /sdug bsngal nye bar 'gogs pa dang tsher bas mngon par non pa dang /chu rlabs
