121b5(rgyud): gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang skyob pa med pa dang /skyabs med pa dang /shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa
121b6(rgyud): nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa'am/lte ba tsam du gnas po'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar bzung bar bya'o//dang po re shig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la mi
121b7(rgyud): tog chen po dang ldan pa pad+ma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin los byung ba'i sdong bu dang /rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i
122a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i ge sar dang /shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye bA dang /de'i rjesu skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o//de/
122a2(rgyud): steng du sang ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ros bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o//de'i stengasu bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste//chos ston par
122a3(rgyud): mdzad cing bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog tu snang ba kun nA 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa tshad chen po na mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin
122a4(rgyud): pabaskyil mo krung gi nye bar bzhugs pa/ga ya su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/
122a5(rgyud): rnga yang bsnams pa/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grA na 'khod de/lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dodag lta bu'o//g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po
122a6(rgyud): thob sto na ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la/'phags pa byams pa dang /kun tu bzung po dang /sa'i snying po
122a7(rgyud): dang rgan mkha'i mdzod dang /sgrib po thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /'phags pa 'jam dpal dang /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang /nor bzang zhes bya ba byang chub sems
122b1(rgyud): dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi g.yosu rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste/tsan+dan dang /skyon dang ldan dang /tog dang /tog dkar dang /'dod pa dang /nye ba'i 'dod pa dang /mu khyud dang
122b2(rgyud): mu khyud brgyadado//de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lto ste/'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang /ba lang bdug dang /b+hA r-i d+h+wa
122b3(rgyud): bsod snyoms len dang /pi len da'i bu dang /'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang /'phags pa 'od srung chen po dang /'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams
122b4(rgyud): dang nye bar/dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o//rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o//byang chub sems
122b5(rgyud): dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gan su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o//de bzhin du/kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil
122b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po dang ldan par sbom por bya'o//byang chub so de' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi tshul gnas bzhin du lha dang mi ri ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man+da ra
122b7(rgyud): ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dang /pad+ma dong /pad+ma chen po dang /d+ha nud+g+ha ri ka dang /brli ka dang /in+d+ra ba ra'i me togau rnam pa sna tshogs pa ched chen po phung po chen por banas
123a1(rgyud): par rab rtsam smos ma tog gi skarnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing /'phags pardzun thos dang dang smra sArgyas mas cad dang /byu chub sa/
123a2(rgyud): dang 'arnams la bye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dun rnams dang /lha dang mo'i med me ming be byu gro ga khrig brgya steng blon yid du
123a3(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod par bya'o//de bzhin du gtor ma dang /bdug pa dang /sgru ba shos dang /mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur lo sogs pa yo byad dang mo'i nye re'i 9
123a4(rgyud): rnams dngul bAr bya'o//bcom ldan 'dis shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod s+thA nA sa 'od zer mngon par 'gro bzhin pas bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang
123a5(rgyud): kun tu snang bzhin por bskam par bye'o//sbom po po bsamA gitAn la zhugs ma theg na/tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo//nges par byang chub mchog tu gnas
123a6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams//'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs//'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang //sngags pa rnams la phan don
123a7(rgyud): dang //de che bas ma gtan dang po'i gtso//sngags pa kun la phan dan du//sems can rnams kyi phyir gsung so//de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi//dkyil 'khor rnam par
123b1(rgyud): brjod par bya//thub pas dang po gsungs pa yin//gnyis pa yin dkyil 'khor dang //gsum par yang ni de las gzhan//dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste//bar mo la ni de bzhin
123b2(rgyud): gzhan//chung ngu la ni phran tshigs 'grub//thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs//de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni//thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste//thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa
123b3(rgyud): de las gzhan yang mkhas pas ni//bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya//bsam gtan de la rab gnas na//sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur//ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga
123b4(rgyud): bshad//zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni//sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas//ji ltar bde bar gshegasu gsol//chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni//de nas ji ltar
123b5(rgyud): bde bar 'gro//gnas ni sngon du dros bstan par//cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar//de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas//sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin//rang gi lha ni spyan
123b6(rgyud): dngas pa//der ni sngags kyi gshegasu gsol//de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid//grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas//dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes//cho ga'i las la
123b7(rgyud): dga' shing 'dud//rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis//gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas//rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang //nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang /byang
124a1(rgyud): /chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe//'jig rten glasum po rjes 'dzin bzod//de nas gsang sngags bad+h+r-ismra pa blo//stan de la ni slar langs nas//thag
124a2(rgyud): ring gnasu song nas ni//phyi rol rlung gi rnam par spangs//snrubs dang mchil ma rnam par dor//bshang dang gci ba'ing de bzhi no//nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing //mtshan///
124a3(rgyud): mo b+h+yo ru kha blta'o//sngags zlos pos ni nam yang der//de na rnams bsam par mi bya'o//der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i//sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o//rab sngags
124a4(rgyud): 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi//de tshe sa steng nyer 'dug ste//dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya//gtsang ma'i gos mtho'i chur gzhug bya//se yi phung po bdun nyid kyis//'ab pas
124a5(rgyud): rkang pa dkyus byas nas//rab tu 'jog pa bdun blangs nas//bshang ba 'jig po sum cu ste//gnyis ka'i mtha' la lcag po drag/mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni//sna bus
124a6(rgyud): la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no//de nas 'bad pas nyes reg bya//gnas la ring du song ba'i sor//de bzhin dgra tsam song nas ni//lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru//de
124a7(rgyud): nas gzhan gyi ci 'ded bzhin//lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu//chu dang g.yangs med pa dang //de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang //chu klung spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs//
124b1(rgyud): 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par//gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang //bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang //rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas//sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar
124b2(rgyud): bya//zlos po dus ni shes byas nas//ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min//de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste//bas mthar de bzhin bshang ba dang //bci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni//de
124b3(rgyud): ru las ni ci bde bar//gnyis ka'am gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang //skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar//gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya//de bzhin kho nar thams cad du//ri bo
124b4(rgyud): dang ni tshang tshing dang //bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba//de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi//gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar//gsang sngags rgyal po thams cad
124b5(rgyud): sgrub//rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul//skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'//ma dang pa la gus pa dang //gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru//lha rnams dngos grub thob par
124b6(rgyud): 'gyur//gnas der yin gyis gzhan du min//nyams dgo'i skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram//ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa//sin d+hu nar ma da bak+She//zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram
124b7(rgyud): kA bai ri dang dbyangs can nyid//chu klung chen po shI ta nyid//'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par//stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad//stobs bcu pa yis gsungs
125a1(rgyud): pa'i zhing //byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang //kha che dang ni rgyu yul dang //bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang //rgya nag che dang li yul nyid//de
125a2(rgyud): dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing //byang gi phyog//su brten pa yi//gang yang dri dang rmya bo yang //bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod//nas dang ga no za ba'o//gang du sems can
125a3(rgyud): snying rje ldan//dri ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur//dpal gyi ri bo brag ri che//lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi//dpal ldan 'bras bung mchod rten ni//sa steng rgyal ba'i
125a4(rgyud): ring bsrel 'dzin//der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya//myur du las dang las rnamaso//rdo rje ba dan dang mchod rten che//chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang //gang du thob gtso
125a5(rgyud): zhi bar gshegs//der yang dngos grub blta bar bya/lho las babs pa'i mchod rten nI//sa bak+She dang cho 'phrul che//ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang //lum bi
125a6(rgyud): tshal du 'khrungs pa der//gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur//rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i//bya rgod phung por ri dor dang //de bzhin brag dang bsil
125a7(rgyud): ba'i tshal//me tog zhes bya'i grong mchog dang //de bzhin rtag tu kA shi'i grong //bcom brlags ka n+ya kub dzi dang //sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang //mchod rten
125b1(rgyud): de bzhin yangs pa can//rtag tu sa steng mi thi la//grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams//gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung //rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu//de rnams sun
125b2(rgyud): dngos grub sgrub//'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni//grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang //gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni//'o ma 'am 'bab chu la bsten pa//der ni rnams
125b3(rgyud): dben rjes 'jug cing //bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur//gnas ni bla khab med pa dang //rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru//sngon du bsnyan pa bya ba'o//sngags rnams rjes 'thun/
125b4(rgyud): las rnams ni//sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su//sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya//bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson//sngags rig gtong pa dag la goms//
125b5(rgyud): tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu brten//'byung ba kun la phan par dga'//sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa//brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas//gtsang ma'i yul dang
125b6(rgyud): gtsang sgra can//kla kro rku ni ma spangs pa dang //dmyal bar ni//der ni bskal pa chen por gnas//dam tshig snang ba bral ba'i phyir//dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru//byis
125b7(rgyud): pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed//dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang //mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang //ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'o ma//rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal ca no//
126a1(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa//mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur//de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing //log par smra ba'ang spyad pa yin//dmu
126a2(rgyud): pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang //log par lta ba smad pa yin//de phyir rtag tu dad gyur nas//gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten//bden par smra zhing chos shes pa//sin
126a3(rgyud): rnams la rtag tu phan//sngags shes sngags ni bsnyen par byed//de yi dngos grub nges par 'gyur//mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis//las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed//
126a4(rgyud): las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed//rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis//bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan//de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur//bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir//las de
126a5(rgyud): rtag tu bya ba'o//bya ba'i don du bye min gang //bya ba'i las la sbyar bar bya//'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi//bye bo nyid du rtag tu bya//bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid//bya ba
126a6(rgyud): las 'byos rtag tu'o//'bras mod 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing //'bras bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras//'bras med 'bras bu btses pa nyid//thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu ba
126a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste//yang dge sbyong dang bral ba yang //bral dang yang dag ldan smra'o//bsgrub bya sgrub byed meng par ni//de la grub pa yod ma yin//grub pa'i/
126b1(rgyud): rjes ni thams cad kyang //grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin//sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa//sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu//byed par 'dod pa de las te//'dod pa'i las ni byang ba
126b2(rgyud): 'gyur//las min las ni thams cad la//las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o//sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i//las ni mtha'i dge brtsam par bya//brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi/
126b3(rgyud): las nyid brnam par mi bya'o//bya ba mA ba rnams stsogs rnams ni//lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur//sam sna can kun rjes skyong ba yi//zlab pa'i gtso bos sbyin gsus
126b4(rgyud): pa/gsang sngags smra bas bston pa yi//rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag sdom//sgrub po sngags ni kun shes shing //rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig/sngags kyi tshul gyis
126b5(rgyud): bstan pa yin//lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa//sngags kun nyid ni sgrub par byed//rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin//de ni ring por mi thogs par//mkhas pas dngos
126b6(rgyud): grub 'gyur ba yin//'byung po thams cad zhi don du//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags//gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni//mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi//de
126b7(rgyud): bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam//chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed//de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni//dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid//de bzhin 'dir ni lhun
127a1(rgyud): grub tu//'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob//sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa//sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin//tshul khrims
127a2(rgyud): byasam gtan rnam thar rnams//'di rnams medar bsdus thab pa yin//dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa//rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin//gang zag rkang pa'i don
127a3(rgyud): thob pa//dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang //de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso//bems rgyal srid rgyu yin+da to//lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi//de bzhin de rnams
127a4(rgyud): bdag po ni//sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur//bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur//gcing sbra'i kun spyod yang drug ldan//tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag/
127a5(rgyud): tu dgra'//sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin//de nas sngags pas sngags bzlas bya//sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis//rnam pa sna tshogs lngas byas te//
127a6(rgyud): de bzhin mchog dang bar mye dang //tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin//tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba yin//bar mos gong ma'i lus can nyid//mchog nyid kyis ni ldang
127a7(rgyud): nyid//zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed//sngags pos bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing //ji srid du su brtag par bya//bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na//der ni bsgrub pa bya/
127b1(rgyud): //dnganan 'an sa sgrub par spyod//del rtag tu bzlas pas rgyas du ra ga bzud pa d+mand do//gas ngas rgyug gang byas pa d+mo ba rgya zlam
127b2(rgyud): ga bde/de nan du lhas tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba'i skyes pas skye skyes pa sa pas//ring skyugs nus sdug pa ba 'dzin du
127b3(rgyud): 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/de bzhin du mchog dang /bar mo dang tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed cing /skye
127b4(rgyud): brgyud pa rnam su gleng bar byas/sdig pa de thams rgyud 'jig par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags ba zlas pas/lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rkyen gyis rgyu
127b5(rgyud): theb pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang /yon tan thams spyod kyis glags par 'gyur ba dang /gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang /rtag tu don thang
127b6(rgyud): sgyid hU~M nga thob bye dang ldan//byang chub sems dbye kyi snying po ma po tshe tshig tu rkyen shin tu nus pa'i mad /bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags mi sgral mi
127b7(rgyud): rjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa les/rim ris par ma'i tshig re'i 'byam ste/dgu pa rdzogs///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i/
128a1(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka'
128a2(rgyud): stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjesu spyod pa sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/sems can rnams gang gis
128a3(rgyud): bzlas par bya ba'i rig pI sA Da dang /gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga/rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi
128a4(rgyud): cho ga de legs par nyon la/legs par yid la zung shig bshad par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di
128a5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das legaso legaso//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la rjesu brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang //
128a6(rgyud): dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
128a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par
128b1(rgyud): bshad par bya'o nyon cig/gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de ga zhe na/dang por shig/
128b2(rgyud): su'agyur ba ni//nA maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ats+tshirbu d+hAta/ru bi nI/tad+ya thA/oM Ta ru su dra sarba at+ma sA d+hA ya~M/sar+b+ba duSh+Ta bi ma hi ni/ko gan+d+ha bya'o 'o//shod+d+ha ya swA
128b3(rgyud): pa 'dis bzang phreng thams cadat+pa li les bya'o//byung ba dang /dbugs pa dang /byung ba dang /rgyu ba la sogs pa'i lus rnams bya'o//dang po bgrang 'breng shing ma ni//lan
128b4(rgyud): grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du//de yis mngon par bsngags byas nas//brtul zhugs can gyis bslong ba bya//mtshan mo gcig tu ga nyid log nas//der ni rmi lam brtag par
128b5(rgyud): bye//mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa//mi sdug ldeg par mche ba gtsigs//sngags pa la ni des smras pa//bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin long //sgrub po tho ra s+ya la
128b6(rgyud): sa ni/shing de dzin 'gro bar byed//mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che//rmi lam du yang mi mthong na//sngags pas shing de bor byar bya//de nas gzhan du 'gro d+hA
128b7(rgyud): gyis//dang po ru rik+ShA yin te//de la gzhan pa dbang po'i shing //bo de tse ni 'dod pa'o//gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi//shing la 'tshogs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i//
129a1(rgyud): phrogs dang lhan cig 'dzegs par bya//grogs po med par gyur na ni//rang nyid do la 'dzegs par bya//steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su//'dzegs//
129a2(rgyud): nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can//de la rtag tu bgo yod pas//steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs//steng gi sa la logs sbyar bya//steng gi mchog gi dengos grub du//
129a3(rgyud): gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin//bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste//tha ma la ni 'og ma'o//srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'o//'bras bu de rnams yang dag
129a4(rgyud): blangs//nub kyi yal ga las thob pa//rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya//byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs//lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed//dgug pa'i bya ba bshad
129a5(rgyud): pa ni/kun gyi don du zhi phyi ro//lha dang lha min gau yul 'gyed dang //mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams//'dod pa rnam pa sna tshog byed//'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir//
129a6(rgyud): 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni//ma lus spyod pa byed pa'o//shar gyi phyogasu yal gA dang //der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams//de bzhin 'bod pas byas gyur
129a7(rgyud): nate tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu//rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras//rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin//gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi//yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa//seni
129b1(rgyud): rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed//de na zlos po 'bad pas spang //lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la//'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod//phyogs des gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi//srog ni 'jig par
129b2(rgyud): byed pa yi//bsad na mos ma yin mang po'i rgyu//de ni zlas pos 'bad pas spang //'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas//'bras bu gang zhi go rab bsgrags pa//lha ma yin dang //
129b3(rgyud): ldan pa yi//sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro/de rnam 'bras bcas phreng ba ni/blangs nas yang dag ri ba bsgrags pa//'og tu 'gro ba'i 'khri shing la//de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro//de ru
129b4(rgyud): rab tu zhugs nas lha'i//bde nyid zlos pos deng 'gyuraro//lha min bu mos yang dag ldan//de ni bskal par gnas par byed//bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas//de nas zlos
129b5(rgyud): pos bzlas pa bya//lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni//de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro//de nyid ring po'i gan su ni//gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni//de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par
129b6(rgyud): bya//bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya//brtson pas bgrang phyeng 'bras bu blang //de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang //der ni phreng po dbug par grags//gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig/
129b7(rgyud): dang no//lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu//sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya//rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni//brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa//de nas de ni dag par 'dod/
130a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i rtswa lag legs brjod pas//bu mos ba/lba ba'i srad bu yis//sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi//brtul zhugs can rgyas phreng thag bya//sngags kyid/
130a2(rgyud): hr-id shes pas brgyu//'bras bu phra ma bzlum par bcas//rtag tu srog chags bu ga med//yan lag me nya mes ma smad pa//mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang //bre ba mod
130a3(rgyud): cing gus pa med//ring bu zlum po ji bzhin pa//de bzhin du rak+Sha dang ni//bo de tsi dang in+d+ra k+Sha//'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes//'bras bu dam pa 'am gang gi tshe//
130a4(rgyud): pa mchog tu brtson pa yis//'bad pas bgrang phreng brgyu bar bya//gser ram yang na dngul dag gam//nor bu shol las byung ba dang //mu tig dung nyid su ma ra//byi ru
130a5(rgyud): yis kyang bya ba ste//phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya//gzhan yong rin chen las byung ba'o//bgrang phreng bzang po bya ba dang //sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi//ril bus
130a6(rgyud): bgrang phreng rkyen dag ni//mnyam par gzhag sti srad bu brgya//gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam//'bras bu 'am khams las byung ba yis//ku sha'i rtse mos brgyu
130a7(rgyud): pa yang //zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin//brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga//lnga bcu 'di dag bar ma yin//sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis//'bras bu'i tshad
130b1(rgyud): rnams brgyu bar bya//sbyong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba//brang ba 'di ni thu bo yin//phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhin no//sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya//de nas rgyus te sngags rnams na//d+ha rma/
130b2(rgyud): gsum mam gnyis nyid dang //rgya lcags los byung gdu bu dang //de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang //de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang //phreng ba kun nas brgyu bar bya//de nas mthar
130b3(rgyud): ru yang mig bya//de la rim gyis dgod par bya/'bod pas mdzes par dkri ba bya//sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni//yongasu gsal bar byas de nas//dkyil 'khor
130b4(rgyud): lta bur mthong ba yin//sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin//yongasu bkris pas rgyan pa yin//mu tig do shal rnams mtshungs shing //mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa'o//
130b5(rgyud): do nas 'bab chu dag pa'i mthar//dri ma med la khrus byas nas//go rim ji bzhin khros byas te//chu yi gnas la ldang bar bya//de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya//bgrang phreng
130b6(rgyud): srad bu blangs nas ni//ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru//sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas//gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis//rjesu nye bar byugs pa dang //rab tu bsngags pa'i
130b7(rgyud): kha dog kyang //tsan+dan dkar po gur gu ma dang //'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya//de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur//ji lta'i gnas su song nas ni//gang du ras ris par//
131a1(rgyud): pa ni//rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo nI//shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin du//sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can//mtshan/
131a2(rgyud): ba de yi spyan sngar dgod//de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni//de tshe de yi spyan lnga ru//dam tshig le gnas stong rtsa brgyad//son pa 'am brgya yang gcig tu ni//brgyad dang bcas pa//
131a3(rgyud): bzlas byas nas//nyin mtshan bsnyung bar gnas gyur nas//bdun pa'i thub la phreng ba dbul//snga ma de bzhin zlas bya ba//tshad nyid de dang mnyam par bya//de nas phreng ba yod
131a4(rgyud): suM de zlas//mtshan mo de nyid du 'khrid de//su shrI ting ba'i sa bzhi la//sngags shes der ni nyel bar bya//rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba//dge ba'i rmi la ma mthong nan//
131a5(rgyud): lam nges par bstan pa yi//dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya//sangs rgyas nyan thos byas ru rnams//gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na//sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par
131a6(rgyud): 'grub//nges par de yi cho ga bya//dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi//gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong //gal te rmi lam de mthong ni//phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du
131a7(rgyud): sngags kyi don kun bsgrub pa po//de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das
131b1(rgyud): ma 'phags ma sbrel ma ral pa gyon rjes kyis rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ras ris bAr ma'i cho ga rab 'byam lus bcu pa bklang phreng gi chaga' le'u rab 'byam rdzogs//
131b2(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags
131b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /sbyin sreg gi las rab tu
131b4(rgyud): sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yid de/me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho go las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon pa ro btsun pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing
131b5(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/rig pa'i sngags kyi cho gas gsang chen ni/tad+ya thA/oM tiSh+Tha hU~M ri ping+ga le/hi rak+Sha di hi dA dA pA ya hUM phaT phaT+Ta swAhA/spyan ras gan
131b6(rgyud): dbang phyug 'di ni mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o//dang po re shig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di len cig bzlas pas mar
131b7(rgyud): gyi bsregs blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste mau lha spyan drangs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te//zhi ba can dang /rgyas pa can dang /drag po'i las rnam
132a1(rgyud): lA yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//mya ngan med shring ni dran du//khyad par brlan dang bcas pa nyid//ma byo glang 'am ni khru gang tsam//sar pa
132a2(rgyud): gsum du'ang mtho ba yi//snams pa'i rnam par ba tu shis//cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin//bu ga med cing ser ga med//de bzhin ne tse'i bshog pa 'dra//ljang dang dkar
132a3(rgyud): ba'i kha dog gam//kha dog nag po spang bar bya//srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang //bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin//gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa//tha ma'i chos
132a4(rgyud): kyang spangs pa'o//de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang yin//de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya//ma rul yon po min nyid dang //shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya//de nas me thab byas
132a5(rgyud): nas ni//kun nas zung ni bzhi pa ru//'og nyid du ni 'bad pas bsko//khru bzhi pa yi ched dang ni//khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang //de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa//rtag
132a6(rgyud): tu sreg chags spangs pa dang //bye mas legs par sbyar ba de//de nas pad 'dra'i kha khyer ni//kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o//yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi po//
132a7(rgyud): 'dab ma gsum du bya ba'o//zhi bo can dang rgyas pa can//'di'ang yang dag bsgrags pa yin//mngon spyod la ni sa dbus//rdo rje bya zhe rtse gnyis//rtse mo gsum du bya ba
132b1(rgyud): yin du me thab rgyal khru gnyis ro//gtsang ma'i phyogasu de bzhin bdar//chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyad//bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang //dur khrod khang pa steng pa ru//
132b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg legs par brtsams par bya//de bzhi ni ri bo'i rtse nyid dang //rtog tu lha khyad stong pa dang //de bzhin nyid dgod pa che//gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni//gang zag
132b3(rgyud): mchog gis gsungs pa dang //sbyin bsreg las ni thams cad la//de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin//khru gang ched du gnas pa yi//ku sha'i khres pa nyer 'dug nas//
132b4(rgyud): der ni sngags shes khyad par du//sbyin bsreg gi ni las bya'o//gnas de nyid du rab gnas pas//myur du dngos grub the tshom med//shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas//zhi
132b5(rgyud): ba can dang rgyas pa bya//lho ru dag po'i las rnams te//de ni sngags pas spang bar bya//shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste//rgyas pa can yang byang du phyogaso//de yis
132b6(rgyud): sngags ni dus rtag tu//rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya//bil pa ar+ha swak+ShA dang //n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyal las bya//mngon spyod shing ni skam po deng //cheb myur dang rnam
132b7(rgyud): po rnams//de dag thams cad spang bya ste//thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bka'//zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can//rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis//de bzhin drag las la shi
133a1(rgyud): skam//rmo ba skyur dang rnon po rnams//yum shing de rnams med na ni//shing la de rnamasu rtag bya//rtse mo gnyi su rtag pa bya//sngo dang sdum dang 'dra ba dang //rma bya'i mgrin
133a2(rgyud): ba dang mtshungs pa'i//rnam pa de lta'i ku shi yis//kho ra yug tu ku sha ni//rtag tu 'gram par bya ba ni//zhi ba can dang rgyas pa tsan+da//mer gad dang ni mtshungs pas so//de
133a3(rgyud): bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rtsas//sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste//'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkagau/dri med chu ni dag pa lo//rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi//de nas kun nas
133a4(rgyud): gsang gtor bya//g.yas phyogasu ni bskor byas te//brtson pas mo ni sbar bar bya//cho ga ji bzhin nyi reg bya//gtsang ma'i rtse yi rtsa ba yis//sgron mo tshad dang ldan
133a5(rgyud): byas nas//de nas khu tshur brtsams byas naso//'bad pas me ni spar bar bya//kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste//rtag tu gos kyi mtha' kyang min//sham thabs bla gos mngon
133a6(rgyud): par spang //gos gzhan gyis kyang log pa yi//rlung gis nye bar gzhom pa la//mngon par dga'o bas ma yin no//gtsang ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos//nor bus kyang
133a7(rgyud): ni rlung yang bya//rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis//min mnyi ma par byas pa la//sngags shes pas na me sbar bar bya'o//sbyin sreg don du mnyam bzhag pas//de
133b1(rgyud): nas g.yas pa min pa yi/dang na bsad gtor byas nas na//derarA ni bya yis mar gyis ni//bAsregs blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya//de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste//sangs rgyas kun dang /
133b2(rgyud): skyob pa dang //rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la//de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o//de tshe me yi snying po yi//sngags ni lon brgya bzlas pa yis//brtson ldan dri zhim me teg gis
133b3(rgyud): rtog tu me ni spyan drang bya//sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas//gnas la mkhas pas gdun dang gnas//sngags des dbul zhing gzhan gyis min//zho dang mang du bsres pa/
133b4(rgyud): dang //sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni//de l-is lan gsum sbyin bsreg bya//rgyas pa'i don du sngags dang las//kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba yis//'khrugs pa der ni
133b5(rgyud): ngas sbyar bya//skom pa tshim par bsam par bya//zhi ba'i las dang rgyan pa can//de la gsang sngags rig pa yis//lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba'o//mngon spyod las la thun
133b6(rgyud): mong po'o//nges par 'byung ba'i lha rnams las//gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya//rim pa ji bzhin me thab 'dir//ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang //mor la lani bdun
133b7(rgyud): yongs bzlas pas//de tshe spyan drang rnam pa der//ji ltar slar yang spyan drangs pa//lhag par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas//ya ma shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang //mar dang //
134a1(rgyud): sbyang rje mnyam bstan pa//de bzhin nyid du zho bsres pas//stong dam 'bum gyi tshad dang ni//brgyad dang brgyad du'ang rtag par bya//de bzhin snga
134a2(rgyud): pas rig pa bzung //lan+da re bzlas shing mo la dang //'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba dang //de bzhin me lce gcig gyur pa//zhi ba'i lus kyi ston bsreg bya//du ba myed la'ang rgyas
134a3(rgyud): pa can//du bcas drag po'i las rnams ni//rgyal bas smad cing spangs pa yin//me ni kho dog ldan gyur na//sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyor//zhi bcan la kha dog dkar/
134a4(rgyud): rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsdogs//gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed//de la sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur//de bzhin rtag tu kha dog dkar//rgyas pa can gyis dngos
134a5(rgyud): grub 'dod//nag po du ba'i kha dog dang //sor skya yang ni sdig po can//kha dog rnam gsum rab bsgyur bas//dngos grub rnam gsum 'di gra/yon//gzhan pa'i kha dog
134a6(rgyud): sprin mdog gam//slar yang bstan pa'i sa steng der//sngags pa de la dngos grub med//de lta'i kha dog 'dra ba'am//rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog can//me ni 'bar ba de
134a7(rgyud): mthong na//slar yang las rnams brtsams par bya//phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba yin//gal te sngags ni grub gyur na//las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis//slar yang sbyin sreg
134b1(rgyud): ArA 'dra//ga sheg sa gas pa sman drung / ste sngags na brjod pa ga//snar no rab tu tug sak+Sh+ma//la 'khor 'don gshogasu gso//smyan du/
134b2(rgyud): sa rnams/ du ni sa / /spyod zlusaso/sa ng+yas smra / ni sdugasan
134b3(rgyud): 'brub 'gyur bar//sman gyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs//rgyus bas bsngags pa'i mas rnams no//thams cad de nyid du bya//gzhan pa'i las ni b+he bste/
134b4(rgyud): 'i sin+ni da par de//gang du rtul mchog gis smang dang //'jig rten 'ashes dang smad rnam s+ho//du dang 'khor las ba sgyur ba dang //byung chub se slong 'i sa sa/
134b5(rgyud): dang //de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni//'dug rten ma nyid ldan pa 'grug//rtag tu sa la ba rkyen shes//skyer sreg sas la mkhas po mas ma 'og gi byeng /
134b6(rgyud): //yah+mang+ga b+ha ska spyod par 'gyug/sar+b+ba seM d-i da ni nga tu skye /rgyum skyed bdun da dang ni//yul dung yad na gang nyid du/
134b7(rgyud): 'dzin dang lha mon nyid//sems can thams cad dbang du byed//'byung po thams cad 'i zhugs par byed//sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid ni//byang chub sems dpa'//
135a1(rgyud): snyom sna 'a tshe//sa brtul nI yang dag brten//snro sles las kyis krugs bye na//sa spyod ma rnams smras ni dgos//spyod yod padad pa
135a2(rgyud): bzhin du//khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed//de bzhin nyid du mi bde phyi nyid//'byung po thams cad dbang don dang //yang nas
135a3(rgyud): steng rgyal po mnyam//de bzhin rtag tu lis kun+da la//thams cad sbyin pasag gis ni bya//kun nas kun tu brtson ldan pas//las kun yang dag bsten par bya//de
135a4(rgyud): che dnges par bsgrub par bya//dpal don las ni mchog yin te//bar ma nyid kyang sgrub par byed//yong na chung ngu nyid kyang ngo //de bzhin du na rdzas rnams /no//
135a5(rgyud): de bzhin slang yang 'grub par gsungs//sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas//'bras bur bcos pa'i dngas grub mthong //phyag rgya bcing dang rig pa nyid//las

135a7(rgyud): 'dun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas//na maHsarba bud+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ga tA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM dz+wA la tiSh+Tha hUM/ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha ba~M swA hA/sngags
135b1(rgyud): kyi rab sbyor 'di yis ni//slar yang shing la bzlas bya ba//gnyis bzlas pa'am bdun bzlas pa//sngags rig des mer sbyin bsreg bya//me tog bdug pa dri dag gam//mdor
135b2(rgyud): na thams cad nyid kyang ni//gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chu rnams kyis//'di nyid kyi ni gsang gtor bya//de nas lus rnams thams cad ni//rgyu 'dis tshi ga brtsams par bya//lha
135b3(rgyud): rnams dag ni thams cad la//snga ma'i rab sbyor nyid kyis bya//sngar gyi sgra can ma bcings nas//phyag rgya chen mor grags ldan ma//srung ba byas par gyur de nas/zlos pos
135b4(rgyud): rig pa cig gis ni//las rnams thams cad brtsams par bya//dngos gra ba rgya la mkhas pa oMs//gal te dge mtshon mthong gyur pa//rtag tu dge ba'i sgra gags na//des
135b5(rgyud): la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni//ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur//dang po las la rab sbyor dang //sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug pas//'gras med 'bras bur bcas pa nyid///
135b6(rgyud): dngos grub de la brjod par bya//rgyal ba'i sgra 'amAM pa Ta ha//rnga bo che yi dgra gragu na//brtson ldan kun 'gro'i dngos grub ste//sbyin srog las la yang dag brten//gzhan
135b7(rgyud): yang dge mtshan dpal dang ni//'dab chags sgra ni bzang po dang //rnam pa sna tshogs dag dbyangs sam//rgyal bas bsngags shing rab sngags pa//bkra shis bzang po ya

136a4(rgyud): ming na sa gzon ston byung chub sems dpa'i sems dpa na pa bag sa nags sa
136a5(rgyud): sa dpa'adzin go nga kyi rnye pa'i byas rkyen yod de//ga sa thams cad kyis sgrub thabs kyi choga'i dam tshig gas pa/de bzhin gas pa thams
136a6(rgyud): kyim dpas kyi khyis kyi sbyin la 'dun kyi kyi nas pa na po'i'i zhin/'tshig nyi dang 'dzi ton mas 'dun pa'i sngags kyi ma 'ad/
136b1(rgyud): chos glatso bor gyur pa sems dpa' chen po dper na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo//chas gtso bor gyur pa lU dang mi rnams kyis nang nas skyes bu'i
136b2(rgyud): khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yino//byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing /gtso bo dam pa yin/
136b3(rgyud): te/de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa rnams kyis sngar gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog
136b4(rgyud): gi mchog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba kun nis bkra shes par 'dod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod cing rab tu bsngags la/sems can thams cad
136b5(rgyud): dbugs 'byin pa/sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/bar skabs 'dir bcom
136b6(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod sngo nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to//gang 'di phyi
136b7(rgyud): bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang zhing sems can thams cad kyi yid kyang tshim par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das
137a1(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i gtsug ter du nub par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa'i seMn+da kun/
137a2(rgyud): gang gis kyang mi thub bo/'dra chen po yang dag pi brang gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus rgyan pa/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can/'khor los bsgyung ba chen
137a3(rgyud): pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya bar gyur to//byung nas na mkha'i dkyil kun tu snang ba byas te/rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis
137a4(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba/reg pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas mdun du bdar nas mchod bzhin pa/'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mo/rig pa'i 'khor los

151a6(rgyud): ba phreng ba da/ ba'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/pung+gA'i phreng bya ban+de drug rnams kyi pa basmyon pa/thams cad dkar po rnams kyis thams cad dkar po'o//byang chub sems pa

151b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgro gtsug gi cha la de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i phal po che g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa mi 'jigs pa rab tu
151b2(rgyud): sbyin pa g.yon pas chos gos bsnams pa/gser mdog phyag nas 'od zer 'phro bar byed bzhin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba can
151b3(rgyud): rnam par bkra ba'i rgyan thams cad kyi lus brgyan pa'o//sgrub pa po yang g.yas phyogasuM cha byad dang nAM pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'drir gzhugs par bya'o//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/
151b4(rgyud): na ma Ar+ya e ba lo kri te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA sar+b+bA yaM/mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/swi ti swe tai swe to swe te b+hu dzaM pA rA kra me bi dz+re ya bi tse d+yu te swA hA/dr-i dkar po
151b5(rgyud): chus dkyil 'khor nye bA b+huDap+da bye 'o na mo ra tA tr-i yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba laM ki te shwa rA ya/bo b+hI satwA ya/ma hA sad+da yaM/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/na mo ma hA swa ti ya/spre ta
151b6(rgyud): gran+d+ha bi shud+d+hA ya/su gran+d+ha ya swA hA/dri'i sdigaso//nA mo rat+na yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/br-i d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/na mo mahA/
151b7(rgyud): swe tAM ya/dzI ti sma/ti dz+yo ti pa ra swA hA/me tog gi rig pa'o//na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na ma Ar+ya e ba lo ki te shwa raM ya/bo d+hi saMtwA ya/me hAM sat+kA yaM/ma hA kA ru Ni//
152a1(rgyud): kA ya/na mo ma hA swe tA ya/sre ta pa rA ya/d+hu pa pa ra ya swA hA/dkar po bsres pa dang /lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o//na mo rat+na tra yA/
152a2(rgyud): ya/na mo Ar+ya a ba l-i ki te shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA yaM/ma hA kA dz+nyA NaM krI ye/na mo ma hA swe ta ya/b+hA la bir+Ya pra ba ra ba ri shu k+saM shr-i klod na ba ra pri yA yaM/
152a3(rgyud): ba ra ba raM ba ra bai ra shukle shukl-i shukle swA hA//gtor ma'i sngags te lhag ma rtse ba'i rig pa nyid kyi dbul bar bya'o//me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba nyid
152a4(rgyud): dkar po'i rnam pa zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o//dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du til
152a5(rgyud): mar la stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg dang rig po 'dzin pa gos dkar po bgos tau tsa ru'i ston mo bza' zhing mchod phyir thogs dkar po 'chang ba ku sha'i khres la nye
152a6(rgyud): bar 'dug pas sbyin bsre go la sogs pa bya'o//mchod pa chen po byas nas nyin mtshan du gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs bya'o//srod nas brtsam nas ji srid dngos
152a7(rgyud): grub kyi mtshan mo byung ba'i bar du bzlas po bya'o//lha'i rnga bo che'i sgo dbyangs thogs pa dang /sa rab tu g.yo ba dang /na mkha' la me tog gi char dang ras ris wa
152b1(rgyud): kyang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro//bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'byon to dmyal ba dang yi dwags dang /dud 'gro rnams skad cig drul zhi bar 'byung /
152b2(rgyud): byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung bar gyur te ci 'dod pa de rnams sbyin par byed do//rig pa 'dzin pa de nyid dam/rig pa 'dzin po
152b3(rgyud): rgyal po nyid dam/rgyal srid chen por lus yongasu rje ba nyid dma?/sa 'og tu 'jug pa nyid dam/mig smon dang /ldeng ros dang /gi haM ngaM/thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/
152b4(rgyud): mngon par shes po lnga yang rung ste/gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do//bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i
152b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po/dkar mo chen mo'i rtog pa yongasu rdzogs///de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa
152b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyal po sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs par byas nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rjesu son pa po zhes bya
152b7(rgyud): ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bka' stsal to//de la 'di rnams ni grub pa'i sngags kyi cho go rnamaso//na mo rat+ne tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tau shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+hi ma
153a1(rgyud): man+t+ra satwA ya/maT+Tak+ShA rA NAkA ya/bim+b+ha tA d+hA ya/da~MdzA ya/b.rA krA mA ya/a prAtatata/g+h+rA y+YA yA/a ba ro mit+tA/d+har+m+ma d+ha sh+yA h+Na nA ya/
153a2(rgyud): duHkha bi sho d+ha nA ya/na me Ar+ya a ba lo kiM ti shI rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ar+N+Na ba rI dra na hr-i da ye mA d+ha yi Sh+yo mi mi ti tad+ya thA/lA bai a liM be lom+ba pra muk+ta/
153a3(rgyud): la mA s+thi re/laMm+ba bid+hA ya te/na maHkA ru ni kA ru Ne/ka ru Na yaM ti/b+ho mu ne ku ru NAn+ta hr-i da ye kA ru Nan+na na maHtu te shUn+ta muk+te tsaM/shA ne kA ya bi b+ho/stA ta shAn+te/
153a4(rgyud): pra b+hU te/ni d+yaM ba ga bi t+ye/na ma tu te/suM ru su ru/A gats+tsha A gAts+tsha b+ha ga bAn ma ma bi r-i dI s+ya siM du/khi tA nA ma sa ra dri Ni ka raM swA hA/'di ni mthu chen po thob pa
153a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad mi 'gro bar byed pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dran pa tsam gyis phyi bzhi ni rje su 'brang bar gyur pa nyam su thag pa rnams yongasu skyob par byed
153a6(rgyud): pa/ngan 'gro rnam par bzlog par byed pa bklags pas grub pa/mdor ni 'jigs pa thams cad la dran pa tsam gyis 'di'i grogs brgyad srung ba la sbyor ba
153a7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod par byed pa dang /sgrub par byed pa dang /yongasu 'jug par byed pa de nam yang ngan 'gro log por ltung bar mo'i gyuraro//dbu ma zo
153b1(rgyud): gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu gang la lnga byang chub tu sems bskyed de klog par byed pa zlas par byed/sgrub par byed/sems la r+d+he su chags par byed pa yang dri shi 'phos nas bde ba can
153b2(rgyud): dri skye bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'di'i bsgrub pa thabs kyi tshig ni bcom ldan 'dus spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon pa bri bar bya ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ral ba gyen du brjes
153b3(rgyud): sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa/spyan gsum pa/zla ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i su/'jigs pa brgyud pa thams cad skyob po/bcom ldan 'das/'od
153b4(rgyud): dpagA mid dbu la bzhugs pa/mchod phyir thogaso dkar po can bri bar bya'o//sgrub pa po sngar bzhin du'o//rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ras ris bris nas mchod pa chen po bya ste/
153b5(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis dri dang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /gtor ma chogs dbu'o//gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bus rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di dus ma yin par gzho long la
153b6(rgyud): gnas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byams pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyis rjesu ston pos stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o//de nas grub
153b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ti gang 'dod pa de thams cad dang /las phran tshegs la sogs pa byed do//chus dug 'joms par byed do//ku shas bya bas pos rims nyon gcig pa'am//
154a1(rgyud): nyin gnyis pa'am/nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa 'joms par bye ro//sngags bzlas pa nyid me tog la yongasu bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur//
154a2(rgyud): mdor na byabs pas nad thams cad 'joms par byed//'di'i sgrub thabasu gyur pa ni ras ris sngar brjod pa'i gan su bzhugasu gsol nas 'bum bzlas//mthar mtshan
154a3(rgyud): mo gcig baspang bar gnas par gnas pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma dbul te/gtor ma ni dkar gsum du 'gyur ro//mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas ku shAn+ti
154a4(rgyud): khrul la nye bar 'dug ste sred nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan mar g+hu rgyo bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o//ris ris rab tu 'gul ba dang /mar me rnam
154a5(rgyud): 'phel nas thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur//ma grub na yul rnyed//mi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sbyin no//bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang
154a6(rgyud): du byed do//nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba byed//'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed//yang na dran pas 'gro bar byed//bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog
154a7(rgyud): pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i tinge 'dzin gyi rgyal por sems can thams cad rjesu son par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogaso////de nas yang
154b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin sgyu rgyal po rlom bzhin du gsor 'di zhes bya ba'i rig pa rkyen
154b2(rgyud): po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bcom ldan 'das pa'i yang rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bka' stsal to//na mo rat+na tra yA ye/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki to shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA
154b3(rgyud): ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Na kA ya/pra dzA li ta hasta ka man+ta lu pri yA ya/tad+ya phA/su ra s+ya a mri ta a pra taM he ti/be be tsa tsa re tsan+da re bi be ru ru be ru ru d+h+we thai the/sa ra d+h+we/saM/
154b4(rgyud): ra sa ra d+h+waM/gu gu mA b+hi naM g+ha na g+ha ne/e prI ta hastaM bud d+ha sat+yai d+har+m+ma sad+yaM sau g+ha sa t+yaM u pa ri sad+ya na b+ha gre bAn sa ma ya ma nu sma re/pad+ma gar+N+Na swA hA/pad+ma su baR+Sha ti swA hA/
154b5(rgyud): pad+ma dza swA hA/pad+me pri yA ya swA hA/pad+ma su tri tiSh+Tha ta tsa ra NA ya swa hI/sarba b+hA ya da da sne hAM//Ar+ya a mi tA b+ha sa ma dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA//'di ni mthu chen po thob pa gser//
154b6(rgyud): 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas du mas rje su gnang ba gser bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa bklags pas grub pa gnod sbyin
154b7(rgyud): thams cad las grol bar byed cing 'pho bar byed pa/bzlas pa tsam gyis nad sel bar byed pa'o//de nas 'di'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das 'phaT
155a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/phyag glayas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/pad+ma'i phreng bas so sor
155a2(rgyud): brgyan pa ril pa spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa/gos dkar po tsan/bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa/zhabs gnyis pad+ma la gnas pa'o//sgrub pa po yang spos phor lag na
155a3(rgyud): thogs pa ste sngar bzhi no//de lta bu'i ras ris kyi tshe ga byas nas sngar brjod pa'i gnasu bzhugs nas 'bum phrig lnga bzlas par bya'o//nu mo rat+na trA yA ya/na ma
155a4(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ba~M d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/dza le dze le de/shu tsi durba tse aM pra de shu tsi ni pra b+hU te swA hA/nye bar byug pa'i sngags so//na mo rat+na tra
155a5(rgyud): yAM ya/nA ma Ar+ya A ba lo kri te shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi satwA yaM/ma hA satwA ya/pad+me gar+N+NaM/su gan+d+ha ya/mu ru su ru swA hA/dr-i'i sdugaso//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ats+tsha
155a6(rgyud): a ba lo ki te shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kI ya/b+hI baHb+hud+b+ha ba/bid+yA tsan+te tsa li tsA lau swA hA/me tog gi sngagaso//na mo rat+na tra yA yau/
155a7(rgyud): na ma Ar+ya a be l-i ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA satwA ya/pad+ma shr-I ya~M ba ra~M bai ra le swA hA/bdug pa'i sngags//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ir+ya a pa lo ka/
155b1(rgyud): teshwa rA yo/bo d+hi satwA yA/mahA satwA ya/a mr-i ta a mr-i ta grA hA r+ye su mu khe swA hA/gtor ma'i sngag so//de ltar snga ma bzhin du byAs he/a gA ru'i sbyin sge gu gis grang /
155b2(rgyud): 'dod pa de rnyedado//tsan+dan+da gyi sbyin sreg gis 'gug so//sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin bsregs gis skye bo thams cad dgre' bar 'gyuraro//cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi tshes gcig/
155b3(rgyud): nas brtsams he ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho gas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par byas te ji srid zla ba nya bo'i bar du'o//mtshon mo gsum bsrung
155b4(rgyud): bar gnas par rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu rlung gi 'gram mam/chu gling du ras ris bzhugs nus mchod pa'i cho ga bya ste/srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi
155b5(rgyud): mtshan mar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//res ris rab tu 'gul bar 'am/mar me'i rtse mo mngon par 'phel lam/na mkha' la me tog gi char 'bab
155b6(rgyud): bya ma/'brug gi sgra thos pa'ang rung ste ras ris 'bul bas ni rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro//mar me 'phel na grong gi rje bor 'gyur ro//me tog babs na yul gyi bdag
155b7(rgyud): por 'gyuraro//'brugi sgras grong bcu drug so sor rnyedado//ma grub na los dang yo byad thams cad yang dag par 'byir bar 'gyur ro//nad thams cad spangs par 'gyu ro//
156a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'dadus ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen rjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i tingange 'dzin gyi rgyal por gser 'od ces
156a2(rgyud): bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongasu rdzog so////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan
156a3(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mthu yang dag por bsten pa'i ched du sangs rgyas
156a4(rgyud): /bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yid la byas nas bka' su lA pa/nu mo rat+na tra yA ya/nu ma Ar+ya u bA lo kI te shwa R+Sha
156a5(rgyud): ya/bo d+hi sot+kA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/su nA sa Ta sa r-i sa rA Ni shud d+ha bi tri mu khe bi dza yi swA hAM/'di ni mthu chen po thob pa rig pa'i
156a6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po chen po ste/gang la klog par byed zlos pa byed pa des byas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ro//'di rtag tu bzlas pas ngan
156a7(rgyud): 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gyuraro//skye ba brgya phrag bcu gnyi su skye ba dran par 'gyur//dus thams cad du mngon par shes pa lnga dang thun 'tshams
156b1(rgyud): gsum dran par 'gyur ro//de'i nad thams cad dang sha za la sogs pa rnams dang /sin po lus la 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu yang de ltar 'gyu ro//'di'i
156b2(rgyud): ras ris kyi cho ga ni ma nyams pa'i ras sngar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun nas bri bar bya'o//ral pa rkyen du brdzes
156b3(rgyud): pa dkar po phyag nA pad+ma ste g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa g.yon pa'i phyag gi pad+ma bsnams pa de'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis phri bar bya'o//
156b4(rgyud): gser mdog mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o//'di lto ste/pad+ma'i bla ma dang /yon tan bla ma dang /ye shes dbang phyug dang /rtag par sgra dbyangs dang /rnam par gzigs dang
156b5(rgyud): gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyob dang /log par dang sel dang /gser thub dang /'od srung dang /shA kya thub pa dang /'od dpag med dang /mi 'khrugs pa ste//
156b6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di rnams kun nas bri bar bya'o//de lta bu'i ras ris 'dri raM bcug nas sngar gsungs pa'i gnasu bzhugs nas 'bum phrag
156b7(rgyud): gsum bzlas pa bya'o//'di nyid kyis dri dang me tog dang /bdug pa la sogs dbul bar bya'o//gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o//
157a1(rgyud): de nas mtshan mo gsum du bskrad bar gnas twe ras ri su la mchod pa chen po byas nas mig sman nam/ldeng ros sam/gi bo yang rung ste stong du bzlas pa'i ras
157a2(rgyud): ris kyi spyan sbyar a shAt+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du ba tu m+b+has te ji skad gsungs pa'i tshogs ku sha'i khris la nye bar 'dug ste srid nas brtsams te rje srid dro bar 'gyur ba dang / ba 'phrul
157a3(rgyud): ba dang /'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//dro bar byed bzhin pas ni thig le byas nas thams cad dbang du byed do//du ba 'thul bzhin pasu ni mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'bar
157a4(rgyud): bas ni na mkha' la 'gro'o//ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma rul pa g+hun brdzus kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par yangs pa dang ldan pa'i
157a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogaso////de nas byang chub sems dpa'
157a6(rgyud): sems dbang chen po spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yungs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom bzhin pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag
157a7(rgyud): par dgengs nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa 'di bka' stsal to//
157b1(rgyud): na mau rat+na tA yA ya/na mau a mr-i tA b+hA ya/na mo nu maHsarba bo d+hi satwA ya/nA ma ApyA a ba lau kr-i to shwa rA yA/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/mahA kA ru Ni ka ya/tad+ya thA maN+Da mat+ta ba
157b2(rgyud): shI la kIrti sarba bid+yA swA hA/'di ni mthu chen po thob pa lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/sangs rgyas du mas rjesu gnang ba/byang chub sems dpa
157b3(rgyud): du ma'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par bskyed pa 'di bsgrub par bya'o//dbul po gang la la bsgrub par bya ba ras ris zla ba'i nang du de'i 'byor pa rgyas par 'gyuraro//dngul po thob pa gang
157b4(rgyud): la la rig pa 'di don chen po sbyin pos mchod pa bya bar 'gyuraro//'jig rten gyi rnam par 'byor pa sbubs par byed pa'i laso//de nas sgrub thabasu 'gyur ba na bcom ldan 'das
157b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngor brjod pa'i ras ris bri bar bya'o//dgu pa nas brtsams te dkar po'i zla ba nya la yongasu rdzogs par byed du gzhug par bya'o//pad+ma dkar ba'i gdan
157b6(rgyud): lo bzhugs pa ral pa gyen du brjes pa'o//'phags pa 'od dpag med gnyis pa steng du'o//rang gzhig su shAkya thub pa yang ngo //'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
157b7(rgyud): g.yasu dpal chen mo bri bar ba'o//g.yon gyi gzhog su rdo rje sde bri bar bya'o//sku mdog dkar po ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag ni ril po spyi blugs dang /chu snod desnams
158a1(rgyud): ba'o/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor A ti muk+ta kA'i me to gro/'phags pa 'od dpag med la baR+Sha'i me tog gri phreng ba'o//shAkya thub
158a2(rgyud): pa la snga ma'i me tog gi phreng ba'o//dpalo chen mo la na ga gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'o//rdo rje sde la me tog dkar po'i phreng ba dang /bdug pa dri zhim po rnams ji ltar 'byor
158a3(rgyud): pa dbul bar bya'o//sngar brjod pa'i gnasu ras ris bzhugasu gsol nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//de nas zla ba nya la ras ris la me tog gi phreng ba la sogs
158a4(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa chen po byas nas ku sha'i khris la nye bar 'dug ste 'di nyid kyis gang byed pa de thams cad la gcig tu dpa' bas bya'o//rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang ji srid
158a5(rgyud): phreng ba thams cad rab tu g.yo ba'i mtshan ma 'byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o//dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang gis tshe mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyu ro//

158b1(rgyud): le sham dang /ru rta rnams 'brum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal sbrid chen po rnyed de//ma grub na yul rnyed de nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyuraro//btsomu ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma
158b2(rgyud): ral pa gyen da rjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par yangs pa dang ljon pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yongasu rdzog so////de nas byang chub
158b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po phyag/

164b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ring babrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'di nyid kyi dri dang bdug pa la sogs phul nas bye ba bzlas par bya'o//rgyal srid chen po rnyed do//
164b2(rgyud): 'bum phrag bcur bzlas na gser stong rnyed do//mchod rten gyi drung du dkyil 'khor stong nye bar byugs nas dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa phul te 'bumo bzla sngon gang 'dod pa'i rgyal ba
164b3(rgyud): de dbang du 'gyur//chu rlung chen po dang /chu gleng dang /mchod rten bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi ched la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o//rgyal srid chen po rnyed de don chen
164b4(rgyud): po yang dag par 'gyur//gang zhig sngags 'dis rtag tu dran par byed pa de ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rje su yi rang zhing /rab tu bsngagaso la thams cad du son pa'o//bcom ldan
164b5(rgyud): 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyi ni brjes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog par yongs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongasu

177a2(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA yA/ma hA kA ru ti kA ya/t+yad+ya thA/ba su ra/ma ra/ba ra/b+hu g+hu/ni pa raM/pa rA ya Ni/e he e hi/bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/bo d+ha yaM swAh+ma//'di ni mthu chen

177a4(rgyud): bsres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o//ral pa gyen du brdzes pa pad+ma la bzhugs pa phyog g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/g.yas
177a5(rgyud): pas mchog sbyin pa/thugs khor dpal be'u'i mtshan mas rgyan pa'o//g.yosu gur gum gyis be'u bri bar bya'o//ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten pa ras
177a6(rgyud): ris zhal nub du phyogs par bzhugs nas mchod rten de nyid kyis 'dug pa bsregs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//mthar nyin mtshan du bsrung bar gnas te/
177a7(rgyud): na ga ge sa ra re ro la yongasu bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs khar bsnun par bya'o//de lta bu zla bar rdzogs par byas na gter chen po mthong
177b1(rgyud): dad//nyi ma bdun gyis gser stong rnyed do//phyogs kyi yul rnyed//bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sprul ma ral pa gyon brjes kyi rtog par yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin
177b2(rgyud): las nges par skyes pa dpal be'u zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongasu rdzog so////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan res gzigs dbang
177b3(rgyud): phyug slar yang yongs pa dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs//

177b7(rgyud): pa gyen du brdzes pa/ril ba spyi brags phyag na bsnams pa/gezhog su son pa/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o//de nasau ras ris de//
178a1(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la/mchod rten gyi byang du bzhugs nas 'di nyid kyis ji ltar 'byor phyi mchod pa byas 'bum bzlas//mtha'
178a2(rgyud): nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas srid nas btsoms nas bzlas par bya/ni mkha' la grubo zhes pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur te gang du
178a3(rgyud): mchod pa der che ra lhung bar 'gyuraro//ma grub na yul rnyedado//de'i spyan sngar pa la shI me la ny+dzu shing shi me tog snga la hata/bI sbyin sreg 'bum byas na dngul 'bum rnyed do//dong rtse brgya

178a6(rgyud): sgrol ma ral pa gyen pa rdzes tsha pa'i rtog pa las yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin las nges par skyes pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams te le'u rab 'byam bcu gsum pa

179b6(rgyud): 'das pa 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das reg pa 'ong ba'am 'gro byar ga la 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub

180a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bye ba rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing

180a4(rgyud): kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de yang sgrol ma'i rig po 'di nyid gsungs par gyur to//nub phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

180a7(rgyud): su yang de lta bu la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang ldan pa de rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang snying po 'di nyid su
180b1(rgyud): tu bshad par mdzad do//rigs kyi bla shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya brang ba las 'das na 'jig rten gyi khoms dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod do//de nas de bzhin gshegs

180b7(rgyud): chen po rin chen dpal la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu rig pa 'di sems can rnams kyi don gyi ched du ngas bshad kyi mchog tu zung shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa'

181a3(rgyud): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba sor 'khod do//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
181a4(rgyud): chen po rin chen 'byung gnas la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bozhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i ched

182a1(rgyud): sems can rnams la gcig tu stong brtsa ba shin tu stong brtse ba can son rnams mo 'dzugs pa rlag tu stsa lu gtsug thub pas ka smangs da ga

182b3(rgyud): mtho na shar phyogs dma' ba dang /lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs de me' ba dang /byeng phyogs mtho ni lho phyogs dma'i ba dang /shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dmo' bar//

183a4(rgyud): po dag ma 'jigs shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//phyag na rdo rje rab tu zhugs shig/de
183a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa tsam la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu
183a6(rgyud): g.yos so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang byang chub sems dpa' seMda'
183a7(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbyangasu gyis shig/de nas lha de rnams thams cad dang /dri za dang /gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang /byang chub sems
183b1(rgyud): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//de nas 'khor
183b2(rgyud): thams cad dang bcas pa nyid ngo mtshar thob nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhag so//nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mtho bos phyan
183b3(rgyud): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//'di lta bu'i gsang sngags byang chub sems dpa' gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar
183b4(rgyud): gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gsungs par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag

183b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i mthu lha rnams kyis sngon chad me thos pa gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtsha ro//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis
183b7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//'das pa'i dus na shar phyogs na de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan
184a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phyag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi so sor gnas so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing do na bud med ces bya ba//
184a2(rgyud): gdags pa med de/de rnams thams cad kyang rig pa 'dzin pa skyon med pa kho na ste rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa las ma 'das te/rigs kyi bu lha thams cad dang /byang
184a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad dang /dri za dang /'byung po dang /sha za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa
184a4(rgyud): 'di rnams mdor na rig kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rim pa las ma 'das pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo
184a5(rgyud): rjes/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ngo //nye bar song nas dga' nas gsang sngags gsungs//
184a6(rgyud): na mo rat+no tra sA ya/na maHtseN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se pA ta ye/A~M Tak+ki hUM r+N+NaM/'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rig pa'i
184a7(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa rig pa mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po rig pa'i rgyal po stong bzlas par bya'o//rgyud phyi ma bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'o///

192a1(rgyud): sha'i khrus la nye bar 'dun ste smad pa la phreng ba ny+tsi shu b+h+yas te 'phabs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.ya su phul la ji srid
192a2(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba de skying du bzlas par bya'o//'jigs par mi bye bor slar yang rig pa bzlas par bya'o//g.yo bar gyur pa dang /de dag blangs pas
192a3(rgyud): ud pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar sngo bsangs kyis rdo rje'i lus dang /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing /lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'a
192a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//dpag tshad stong phyag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir lding bar 'gyuraro//gang gis tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigasu skye bar 'gyuraro//ma nyams pa'i ras la ri mo
192a5(rgyud): mkhan gso sbyong can gyis bcom ldan 'das ma khyo gnyer can mo 'drir gzhug par bya ste/sde bsangs spyan gsum pa'i lha mo cha byad dang rgyan ma nyams pa
192a6(rgyud): 'drir gzhugs par bya'o//'og tu r+b+he su sgrub pa po lag na srog phor thogs pa bya'o//de nas sgrub pa pos ris ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas
192a7(rgyud): par bya'o//de nas mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhag nas dri dang me tog dang /bdug pa phul te 'byung po thams cadas
192b1(rgyud): yang nas rig pa 'dzin pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa gcig pung thod pa la zhag chen po'i dud pa bla ma nas slong po mnyam par 'gro ma'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o//
192b2(rgyud): de nas rig pa 'dzin pas slang yang ji srid du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o//rgyal ba'i spyan gnyis pa lta bu dang /dbang phyug rgyan
192b3(rgyud): bo'i mdung gi mtshon cha yis dbang phyug chen po rnams tha~Mng rig pa las dbang du 'gyuraro//de nas mig spyan sgrub par 'dod na rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song nas sngon du
192b4(rgyud): bsnyen pa ni chu dang 'o mas khrus byas nas mi smra bar rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos tAM bya la
192b5(rgyud): gi lpags pa tsam gyi gzhi la nye bar byug pa byas nas deng 'phags pa phyog ni rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan rab tu sa skyer gnas pa byed du gzhug/de nas mag pa thod pa
192b6(rgyud): blangs nas dri bzang po'i til mor gyis rab tu spa bar bya ste du ba med po debyu'o//de nas rnam pa ste tshogs gtor ma byas nas mere gyi mer ma rdul te de nas mno pa
192b7(rgyud): zad par sa ser bzhag nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar srung ba byis pas ku sha khris la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//mag sman de dro bar 'gyuraro//
193a1(rgyud): do nas rig pa 'dzin pa dang sa thab su rnyog pa lan 'dun yongasu bzlas par bya'o//du ba 'thul ba dang /'bar bar byed do//'bar bya na thod pa
193a2(rgyud): de blangs nas phyug na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro'o//'di zar ma'i me tog mtshungs po sngon med pa'i bye ba phrag dgu 'o dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro//de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod ner ma
193a3(rgyud): mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas mi 'dres pa'i chen gyis bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i snang ba mnyam par 'gro ma 'dir gzhug
193a4(rgyud): par bya ste/pr-i yang ku ltar stobasangs rgyan thams cad kyi rnam parare brgyan pa/snying po'i yang g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje'o//de nas sgrub pa pa chen rtse por man
193a5(rgyud): par 'dzegs te mi smra bas grogs med par yang rung ste 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o//de nas bcwa lnga la gtsad me gos gtsang mo bags te ras+ya ris la ma
193a6(rgyud): pargya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me sbyar te de nas sgrub pa pos srung ba'i tshig byis pas kau shar khris la nye bar 'dug ste rtse ma ma bcad pa'i ku shas sor brgyad pa
193a7(rgyud): tshad kyi rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje byed du gzhug/rdo rji bzhi pa g.yas pas mnan nas/ji srid bcom ldan 'das ma la 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par byar//
193b1(rgyud): nas par ma bar kyang yang kla napa ngon pa smras pa m+b+ha/da rdu ma nams snyan nga rgyu du na pa zlas bad+mo /
193b2(rgyud): 'dzid pa rings thab su mer dang sbyang rtsis btags pa'i byang chub shing gi yam shing gis sbyin pasreg brgyad brgya bya'o//sbyin gasreg yong su rdzogs nas kyang ji srid rdo rje la 'ang
193b3(rgyud): zer 'byung gi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o//des dus gsum du khrus byas pas skye la zhing 'i khyil ba/lo bad+mod gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa phyug na rdo rje gnyis pa ste bu
193b4(rgyud): bsangs dang ba'i lus su phyir nas bskol par gnas//gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur//de nas lcags kyi sgrub par 'dod na sngon bzhin du smra
193b5(rgyud): pa po sngon spyod pa bya'o//'o ma dang zan za zhing mi sgrubs pa lang gi gnas ku she bting ba'i mal stan la gtsang zhing gis gtsang zhing bris gtsang ma dgos te/dus gsum du
193b6(rgyud): khrus byas mo snying po mnyam par 'gre ma bzlas par bya'o//de nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas slong mo za zhing rked pa tsam gyi chung zhugs nas 'bum bzlas pa
193b7(rgyud): 'o/dge 'dun la bza' ba dbul bar bya'o//de nas rimo mkhan gas skyong la gnas pas gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste/g.ya su 'phags pa spyan ngas
194a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba spyan gsum pa'o//de'i nye lo gsu bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o//rdo rje
194a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//thams cad kyang pad+ma'i gdan la rab tu gnas par bya'o//de nas sgrub
194a3(rgyud): pa pos mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas bcom ldan 'das mas ku sha'i khres la mngon par bsngags pa la nye bar 'dug par bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pos rtse mo ma bcad/
194a4(rgyud): pa'i ku shAs lcags kyu byas nas lag pa g.yas pas blangs te ji srid lcags kyu las 'od zer byung ba de srid du dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o//'od zer de sgrub pa pa la bskor
194a5(rgyud): ba byas te nub par 'gyur te/de bzung bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro//lcags kyu lag na thogs pas rig pa
194a6(rgyud): 'dzin po stong phrag gi mnga' bdag tu 'gyuraro//bskal par gnas pa dang /rlung ltar 'gro ba dang /lha'i lus dang /rang 'chi ba shes par byed//gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i
194a7(rgyud): tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo le'u bzhi pa'o///
194b1(rgyud): de nas yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags nye bA kanA da/
194b2(rgyud): bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mgo bos phyag byas nas bskor ba byas nas mtha' gcig tu 'du'o/de nas yang tshangs pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa'
194b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras//bdag rig pa'i rgyal mo'i cho ga 'chadado//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/tshangs pa chen po
194b4(rgyud): legaso legaso//sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i cho ga gsungs shig/de nas yang tshangs pa chen pos cho ga gsungs
194b5(rgyud): pa rigs kyi bu gang la la rig pa'i rgyal mo smra bar gyur pa 'am 'chang bar gyur pa de la bdag rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o//gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der/bdag 'di
194b6(rgyud): la sangs rgyas rje su dran pa rje su sbyin par dbyu zhing /rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur//bklags pas las rnams 'grub par
194b7(rgyud): 'gyur//chom rkun gyis dbu su song bas yid la bya'o//sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang /gnam lcags lhub bo la lan cig brjod par bya'o//khros pa'i mdun du dran par
195a1(rgyud): byas na dpal rab tu sbyaro//gdon gas par 'dod na lan bdun mngon par bsngags la bsrang gis bsregs par byas na grol//phyag rgya dbye bar
195a2(rgyud): 'dod na gdong la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas blta bar bya ste phyag rgya dbye ba byas par 'gyuraro//yungs kar la dkyil 'khor bcings pa'o//phur bus khong bzang
195a3(rgyud): sbreng ba'o//phur bu nyid kyis mtshams bcing pa'o//gang du rdo rje gnas pa'i gnas der bcom ldan 'das mi snying po mnyam par 'gro ma lan brgyad brgyar bzlas
195a4(rgyud): tri bya'o//rdo rje rnams bcings pa byas par 'gyuraro//rdo rje dbye bar bya bar 'dod na/dug dang /ling ka dang /ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang /lug ga ra ste 'di rnams tshe
195a5(rgyud): mnyam par byas la rig pa brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas rdo rje'i me la de rab tu byug par bya'o//rdo rje rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyuraro//nor sgrub
195a6(rgyud): par 'dod na snga ma bzhin du sngon spyad pa byas la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong lo gnas pas ma nyams pa'i rwas sku dang bral ba la sangs rgyu sgo bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs
195a7(rgyud): brtan ches ston par mdzad bzhin po 'drar gzhug par bya'o//g.ya su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skyon ka'i sprin ltar dkare ba ral po'i cid par
195b1(rgyud): 'chang ba/'od dpag med dbu la zhugs pa rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o//g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin pa sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa phyag na
195b2(rgyud): rdo rje thobs pa'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi nye logs na bcom ldan 'das ma khro gany+dzar can pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs 'drir gzhug par bya'o//bcom ldan
195b3(rgyud): 'das ma'i nye logasu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o//tshangs pa yang lag na ril pa spyi blugs thogs pa'o//'og tu lag 'dren sna tshogs pa'i gzu
195b4(rgyud): can 'drir gzhug par bya'o//lha thams cad kyang pad+ma'i gdan la gnas par bya'o//sgrub pa po ni snga na bzhino//de nas sgrub pa pos bco lnga la gzho nu mas bskal pa'i
195b5(rgyud): sAd bul sngar bzhin rgyu skar rgyal la bsgral ba'i mchod phyir thogs byas l-i de nas ris ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dbul la mar
195b6(rgyud): gyi mar me yong sbar bar bya'o//de nas reg pa 'dzin pas rku sha'e khris la nye bar 'dug ste mchod phyir thogs lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byis nas 'phags pa
195b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas par dbul bar bya'o//rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyis rego/ji srid dro bar gyur pa'am du ba
196a1(rgyud): 'thul ba'am/'bar bar gyur pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o/'bar ba ni yid kyi mchod yon dbul//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas chang
196a2(rgyud): pa yid la bya'o//dran pa tsam gyis dbyug pa'i shing du 'gyuraro//yungs ka ra la len brgya bzlas pa bsnun par bya ste mchod phyir thog su 'gyur ro//bcom ldan
196a3(rgyud): 'das ma dran pa nyid kyi rje su blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa dkar zhing dang ba'i lus rig pa 'dzin pas
196a4(rgyud): bcu gnyis kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro'o//gang gis tshe 'pho ba de'i tshe slar yang rig pa nyam su myong bar 'gyuraro//sgrub pa gzhan
196a5(rgyud): yang sngar bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod du bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o//de nas slong mo'i zas za zhing shi ba'i ras
196a6(rgyud): blangs nas dz+nyA so 'di rnams kyi bkru bar bya ste//tsan+dan dang rgya spos dang /pu shel rtse dang /pA lA ka dang /rA dza~M hA ste rdzas 'di rnams gcig tu byas nas bkru
196a7(rgyud): bar bya'o//mi blo gros dang ldan pas bkrus pa de la nyi ma bdun du bdug spos dbul bar bya'o//de nas rig 'dzin pas bco lnga la dur khrod du song nas ba lang
196b1(rgyud): zhugs pa tsam ma bang la nye bar byugs nas dro bas mo tog la sogs pas mchod do//'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas nas de nas sgrub pa bris byed pa la nye bar
196b2(rgyud): 'dug sta ras des kun nas g.yogs pas srung ba byas pas ji srid de ba'am/du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas por bya'o//dro bar gyur pas
196b3(rgyud): ni dbang du byed//du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang bar 'gyu ro//'bar bos ni sgra yi zhing la khyil ba lus dkar po rig pa 'dzin pa drug cu'i mngal bdag tu 'gyuraro//ji ltar
196b4(rgyud): yang ras de kun tu g.yogs pa tsam gyis kyang bdag nyid du byed//de tshe rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la'ang cha shas sbyin par 'gyur//gang gi tshe 'tsho ba de'i tshe bde ba can
196b5(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur//dri nas bgrang phreng sgrub par 'dod na sngon bzhin du rgya mtshor 'bri drug lnga zlas b+h+yo'o de nA ku'i sha'i las byung ba'i bgrang phreng byas la mdud pa nyi shu r+Na l+yA
196b6(rgyud): bya'o//de nas dur khrod du song nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te de nas rig pa 'dzin pase ro dang skye bung po zhag nas bar du bzhogs par bya'o//dro dang mi tog
196b7(rgyud): la sogs pas mched pa byas nas gtor ma rgya chen po dbu'o//de nas sgrub pa pos ro'i brang khar nye bar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma
197a1(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o//rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bgegs char lta bu la 'jigs par mi byu'o//dzasrid nam gsum du 'gyur te/yid kyisachod
197a2(rgyud): yon phul nas slar yang ji srid bgrang phreng du 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o//slar yang sgrub pa pos 'chang bzhin pas bcom ldan 'das ma lan bdun
197a3(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o//de nas kun nas 'od zer 'byung ste rig pa dran pas gzung bar bya'o//bzung ba tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam par
197a4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs can nyi ma 'cher ka'i 'dra rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag gis yongasu bskor ba/skad cig thang gcig yud tsam la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro
197a5(rgyud): zhing tshangs par yang 'gyuraro//gang gi tshe 'che ba de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo la longs spyod par 'dod na slongs
197a6(rgyud): mo bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o//de nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi
197a7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan chos 'chad bzhin pa 'dir gzhug par bya'o//de'i spyan sngar yid kyis sngogs thams cad bsten par byed no//lha ma yin gyis rdzas rnams dbang //
197b1(rgyud): du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo tshangs pas gsungs pa le'u lnga pa'o////de nas glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pas byang chub sems da
197b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gan ba der nye bar lhag so//nye bar lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po la bskor ba byas nas
197b3(rgyud): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i tshe go bshad
