197b5(rgyud): rgyal po gang khyed sems can gyi don du cho ga 'chad pa le gso log so//de nas gang khyod smros shig/glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa smras pa/chos grangs med ci
197b6(rgyud): rgyu skar med/basmyung bar gnas pa med par bsgrub par bya ste/bud med kyi ro blangs nas dur khrod du ba lang gi lpags pa tsam gyi bang la nye bar byug pa byas nas sh+tsa
197b7(rgyud): du mgo bo bzhag na po dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyi mched pas mchod de/de'i b+ha gar mgo sman bcug nas ji srid du 'gro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya
198a1(rgyud): des rgyal ba'i spyan dang mtshungs par 'gyur te lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur/nag pa'i bcu bzhi la skyes bu shi ba de'i yan lag las
198a2(rgyud): skyes pa blangs nas skam par byas twa bska bos bkru bar bya'o//dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas/phyi ma'i nog po'i bcu bzhi la dbang phyug
198a3(rgyud): tshon po'i gan su song nas/'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te dbang phyug chen po g.yas kyi lus la bzhag na kham po kha sbyar du gnas pI de'i yan lago las
198a4(rgyud): skyes pa byas nas rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//de nas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma kham por kha sbyar g.yo bar byed do/ri go pa dran pas blang bar bya'o//
198a5(rgyud): blangs po tsam la mi snang bar 'gyur ro//dpag chad stong du 'gro'o//lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed de/nag po'i brgyad pa'am/nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la dur khrod du song
198a6(rgyud): nas ma skyes par shi ba'i byis pa'i dbang po lnga blangs nas rel bur byas te lcags gsum gyis yongasu dkris nas de nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te thod pa'i nang du
198a7(rgyud): bzhag nos reg pa snying po mnyam par 'gro me stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//ril bu khar bcug pa mi snang bar 'gyuraro//la stong phrag drug 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//
198b1(rgyud): dpag tshad brgyar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//ma nyams pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das mu snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'dir gzhug par bya'o//grang
198b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//bgegs kyi gzugs kha dog tu bltas pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//'og na sgrub pa po lag na
198b3(rgyud): spos phor thogs pa'o//de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas legs par nges pa skyes pa'i ro blangs nas dur khrod du dri
198b4(rgyud): dang me tog la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma mchod nas 'byung po thams cad pi'i kator ma byas te grogs bzang pos srung ba byas pa/gtsang mas gos gtsang mi bgos te
198b5(rgyud): ra'i dpral bar rkang pa byin nas gnas pas rig pa bzlas par bya'o//ji srid na ldang bar byed de/'dzegs par mi bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pasdu yungs kar la len bdun
198b6(rgyud): bzlas nas badzag par bya ste gnon par 'gyur ro//de nas rig po 'dzin pas rig pa bzlas te lag pa g.yas par rig par bya'o//reg pa tsam gyis khaM du ste mthong bar 'gyur ro//
198b7(rgyud): rig pas zlas la blang bar bya'o//blangs pa tsam gyis ska li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa lag pa bzhi pa glang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa/rig pa 'dzin pa
199a1(rgyud): drug gis bskor ba rlung ltar 'gro ba bskal par gnas par 'gyur//gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur //bcom ldan 'das ma
199a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo phur bu gsum pas bshad pa lo'u drug pa'o////de nas dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po ni 'di'i rig pas dga' nas cho ga gsungs pa/ri mo
199a3(rgyud): mkhan gos sbyong la gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyug na pad+ma bsnam
199a4(rgyud): pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje zar ma'i me tog dang /'dra ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o//'o phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi nye log su
199a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//lha'i bu rnams kyang me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa
199a6(rgyud): 'drir gzhug par bya'o//'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos por thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya/de nas rig po 'dzin pa zla ba gcig tu 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing ras
199a7(rgyud): ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa bzlas par bya'o//de nas mgo bo lnga thod pa blangs te gsum gyis sgyid pu gsum byas te thod pa gcig zhag gis bkang nas/de nas rig pa
199b1(rgyud): 'dzin pas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bya/thod pa lnga pa la nye bar 'dug nas yungs kar re rol lan bdun bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya
199b2(rgyud): sbyin srog de rdzogs pa na sba ba 'byung ste lago pa g.yas pas mnan nas brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o//de nas dri ba'i sgra thos te 'jigs par mi bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas
199b3(rgyud): rangs thubs su yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun bsngags pas bzhu bar bya ste/skyes bur gyur //rig pa dran pas stod cig stod cig ces brjod par bya'o//sa tI ka ru 'gyur/
199b4(rgyud): denas rig pa 'dzin pas sdong ras la lan bdun po sngags pas de la thig le byas pas glang po'i dbang por 'gyur//de la zhon pa tsam laM sgra 'i zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad baN+DI len po'i

200a1(rgyud): bzang po srung dbyas pa ku shi khros pa nye bar 'dug skye yungs kar dkar po la ldan bdun mngon par bsngags nas khar gzhug par bya zhing rig pa ran/
200a2(rgyud): ji srid du mi ra'i kha gdangs par 'gyur//de nas sgrub pa po 'jigs pa med par gyur pas rkang pa g.yon pas brang khar mnan nas sgra drag pa 'byung bar mi byed pa de srid

200a5(rgyud): zhing 'khyim pa mo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa glang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bdag por thogs pa med pas 'gyur te lo stong drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur//
200a6(rgyud): mdung thod gi sgrub par 'gyur te sngar bzhin du 'o ma dang /nas zan bza' zhing ri za'i tso mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pa

200b1(rgyud): de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod kyi thal ba dang grog mkhar gyi sa la 'o mas smras te rma bya'i gzugs bya/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis tshad kyis ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis

207a1(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid cang sgra sgrogs pa de snod du reg pa bzlas par rgya//dag pa dran pas blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam gyi mo b+hU
207a2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//sa'i cha drug 'phrog cing lo stong du 'tsho'//lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed//nag po'i brgyud pa la bud med shi bA de'i lce zla
207a3(rgyud): nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te yid rlung ltar 'gro'o//'di'i tshangs par spyad pas 'dod pa rnams la sems bskyed ni de gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gro zhing bskal
207a4(rgyud): pa chen por ga nA se//yid kyis skye ba 'dzin par byed//gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du zla ba drug reg pa bzlas nA mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lo lnga brgyar
207a5(rgyud): 'tsho'o//'ug pa'i mig sman dang lhan cig btag por bya/lcags gsum gyis dkris pa'i rol bu byes nas dbang phyug chen po'i g.yas kyis lus la kham por kha
207a6(rgyud): sbyar du bzhag par byas nas lag pa g.yas pas mnane ti reg pa dam pa dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya ste ji srid du rnam par chad do'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/
207a7(rgyud): rig pa dran pas ril bu blangs te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lo stong phrag gnyi su 'tsho bar 'gyur//mig sman dang /ldong ros dang /'o ma dang /pid+ma ge sor
207b1(rgyud): mnyam par 'gro ba'i rdzas mnyam par byas te/lcags gsum gyis dkri bar bya'o//rgyul la sbyor ba rnam par shes pad+ma byA zhing /de nas sgrub par bya zhing /shaza sgrub pa 'ad/
207b2(rgyud): pas dur khrod du ba lang gi lpags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byug so pa byas nas sho dang tshing la sogs pa'i gte rA ma b+his hU~M/kha shor du phyogs phyir mi'i
207b3(rgyud): lA khrag gis brtags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na sha za thams cad 'ong spro/'jigs par mi bya zhing srung bar yang mi bya bor 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//bdan
207b4(rgyud): gi dbang du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang mau snang bar 'gyuraro//nyi ma re re la 'di dang tshe lnga lnga ster bor byed/
207b5(rgyud): rnams kyang zad par bya'o//dung khrid du yo dgas dri med nyid kyi mdu nas smras pa dbang du 'gyur//dung khyod dri gzugs byinan byas nus rkang pa la sgyu bres gdab po dbyar//
207b6(rgyud): de nas rig pa bzlas par bya'i//de la yang ba lang gI lpags pa'i ched tsam gyi sa dkyi ba'i khyer lci bar byugs nas mchod po rgya chen po byas nas rig pa 'bum bzlas par
207b7(rgyud): dur khrod du til gyi sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad bya ste/nyi ma bdun du mtshan mo sbyin bsreg bya'o//nyi ma re re la dngul lnga lnga smyon par bya'o//ku mu ta la zho dang sbrang tshe dang mong /
208a1(rgyud): gyis btags pa'i skyon sreg 'bum byas na nges par mthong ngo //dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs brnyan byas te de la nye bar 'dug nas Arga'o na/
208a2(rgyud): la me sbar nas dri zhim po'i til mar gyis btagos de'i sna mo'i me tog gis sbyin sreg steng phrag brgyad byas na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//cho ga 'di kho nas ming na smos ni ldan
208a3(rgyud): dza'i rgyal po dang blon po 'gyu ro//bud med dbang du byed ni a ti muk+ta'i me tog gi sbyin bsreg byas na dbang du 'gyur te nyi ma bdun nas yid kyis gang gi tshe bsams pa de'i
208a4(rgyud): tshe 'ong ngo //dur khrod du song nas dkyil 'khor nye bor byugs te/sha chen gyis sbyin sreg byas nas nyi ma bdun pa la sha zas zin pa rnams bltas pas thar bar
208a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dur khrod du sha chen gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na sha za thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro//ne le'i spu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 'byung po thaMd
208a6(rgyud): kyang dbang du 'gyuraro//dur khrod du bshang ba'i sbyin sreg byas nr-i srul pos zin pa rnams yid kyis kyang tha ro//khrag gau sbyin sreg byas na mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang
208a7(rgyud): du 'gyur//dur kheng du boT+Ta ka'i sbyin sreg byas na 'di shi za mi 'ong ngo //sbrul gyi bun pa'i sbyin sreg byas na sbrul rnams 'bros par byed do//de nas sgrub pa pos
208b1(rgyud): gtor ma byas nas arga'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can gyi gnod sbyin ma 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya bar rig pa
208b2(rgyud): dran pas stod cig stod cig ceso//de de'i tshe mchog gsum po rnams kyi gcig 'dam du sprul te/ma dang /sring mo dang /chung mar 'gyur ba'o//mA ni bu'i bye ba thams cad
208b3(rgyud): byed do//sring mo ni nyi ma re re la dong tshe re ster bar byed//chung ma ni de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed do/lo lnga brgyar 'tshe bar 'gyuraro//gang gi tshe rig pa 'dzin pa nyams
208b4(rgyud): pa de'i tshe 'di bya'o//mtshan mo gtsang mas/gos gtsang ma bgos te/bsrung ba byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
208b5(rgyud): dang /phyag ni rdo rje dang /bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas shar du phyogs pas rig pa'i lha thams cad la bdug spros phul nus rig pa 'dzin pas dug
208b6(rgyud): la khragr-I gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//kau sha bting ba la nyal lo//gal te gzhon nu mdung thung thogs pa mthong na de'i tshe dri zas rdzas nyams par
208b7(rgyud): byas pa'o//gang gi tshe bram ze mthong na de'i tshe lha rnams kyis nyams par byas par 'gyuraro//gang gi tshe rdo rje sde mthong na de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs kyis rdzas nyams par byas par
209a1(rgyud): da klung l+h+wanas btsun pa / mabyed / hU~M b+h+ru~M rnams
209a2(rgyud): rkyen rgyu da du// shin nam kyi ma pa pa skye pa sa kun bu mdzad pa/ rnam sa nga
209a3(rgyud): sbyin min pa// 'i na shi gi ma snang nas ma d+ma s+t+wa~M da nas g+sa 'i sbyin smrig nga d+ma thA/rgyun rgyug yong sa rtogs pa
209a4(rgyud): byin pa de 'gyur//dri ba rnams kyi sbyin smrig ni rnam par dben pa'i phyog su babyung gi dkyis 'i kho nye bar byugs com ldan 'das lce gau ti ma 'di ma
209a5(rgyud): shes zhes mo nye par 'dig sbyi hU~M rje mi mi shing la zhi dang/slong rtsi dang /mang kyis btugs pa'i sbyin sag sbyong phrage brgyad //smyan phrin yi
209b1(rgyud): pan rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyuraro//rdo rje'i rigs la yang sbyin sreg ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dI dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing //
209b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la yang gter ma'i tshi ga byas la de nas skyob pa pos kha shar du phyogs la gu gul gyi ril bus sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur//
209b3(rgyud): nam mkha' lding rnangs la dur khrod du maN+Dal lo nye bar byugs pa byas nas mchod pa dang /gtor mo yang ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste ka ra bi ri'i me to gau la sogs pa'i maro gyi btags
209b4(rgyud): pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad byas nas rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur//lha ma yin rnams kyi sbyin srog ni dbang phyug chen po la dri sna tshogs kyis mchod pa dang /bcom ldan
209b5(rgyud): 'das la yeng gtor ma byas nas g.yas kyi lus la shar du phyogs pas ka ra bi ra'i yam shong gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas ni rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyuraro//me
209b6(rgyud): mo'i sbyin sreg ni smin pa'i zas dang /sha'i gtor ma phul naso phag pa'i rul ma la chang gis btags po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyuraro//
209b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams kyi sbyin bsreg bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma phul nas kha shar du phyogs nas arga'i me togau gis sbyin sreg
210a1(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyuraro//sha za rnams kyi sbyin srog ni dur khrod du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas til gyi til mar//
210a2(rgyud): gyis btags pa'i nom po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur//'byung po rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod kyi thal bas dkyi
210a3(rgyud): 'khor nye bar byugs nas gtor ma yang ci 'byor pa phul ti ba lang gau sha'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyuraro//yi dgas rnams la nI ra ma
210a4(rgyud): la'i sbyin seg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas log tu phyin par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das me rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma mo dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin pa dang /'byung
210a5(rgyud): po dang /sha za thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mtshon nyid kyi le'u bcu pa rdzogaso////ma bsgrubs par yang lasu 'gyur te/char ma babs pa la chur zhugs te rin
210a6(rgyud): pa bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis char 'bab go/khu ba 'ching ba la srad buso//myos pa rnam par 'joms pa rnams la dur khrod kyi thal bas so//bsud pa la ni rgya skyegs
210a7(rgyud): kyis//gzer gyis nyam thag pa la ardza nas zug rngu dang bral bar byed//til gyi til mar gyis bya rgod dang gcod par byed chu gri dang gsum gyis mche ba 'jug por byed//
210b1(rgyud): gu gul gyi bdug pas gnas nas skrod par byed//'di rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed do//bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//dper na 'di bdag dpe'i
210b2(rgyud): don du 'chang bar byed/klog par byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang gcing ma bgos pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste bklags par bya ste cho ga 'di nyi ma bdun du bklags pa bya na
210b3(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyuraro//tshor ches na gro ga mkhar la 'dzags te bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad nye bar bzlas na de nas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//dri dang me tog dang /bdug po gang
210b4(rgyud): la sbyin par bya ste rig pa thams cad 'gugs pa dang /'ching ba dang /rengs pa dang gcod pa dang /rig pa thams cad gsod pa dang /bdug pa'i yid skrag pa dang /kha 'ching
210b5(rgyud): bar byed do//de'i 'di'i las bya ste gur gum gyis chus rmongs par byed//ser mos sbrul 'gugs par byed//yungs kar dang /pad+ma'i rtsa ba las skyes pa dang /me tog bzang po
210b6(rgyud): rnams kyis 'byin par byed//bdug spos kyis smra bar byed do//ka ra bi ra'i me tog gis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed do//a ka ru'i bdug pas 'phrol du bdug pa dang /bcom
210b7(rgyud): ldan 'das mo'i las stong rtsa brgyad po 'di rnams rab tu sbyar bar bya ste yam shing gi mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur pa rtse ba dang /rked pa dang /rtse mo yang bskrad pa'i don gyis sdong
211a1(rgyud): bu nga rtsabs sbyin bslob bya'o//tAd pus ni nor 'dod pas so//rtso mos na zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can la'o//nor 'dod pas po rangs kyi rus su gnod sbyin
211a2(rgyud): yongasu rgyu bar byed//des na de'i nor sbyin pa'i las kyi dngos grub du 'gyur ro//bskrad par 'dod pas bar du gnas pas mtshan mo'i snga mo'i snga ma la rtsa ba'i sbyin bsrog
211a3(rgyud): bya'o// sdigs mdzub kyis tshad tsam la dug dang khrag gis btags pas dur khrod kyi me la sbyin bsreg bya'o//mtshan mo phyed nas yi dgas rab tu rgyu ste/des de
211a4(rgyud): l-is mngon spyod kyi las rab tu sgrub par bya'o//sgrub pa chen po la khru'i tshad kyi yam shing la zho dong sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyis btags pas kha shwa ra du phyogs pas sbyin
211a5(rgyud): bsreg bya'o//des sgrub pa po de'i sgrub pa chen po sgrub par byed de//dbang du byed pa la byang chub kyi shing gi ye shing gis sbyin bsreg bya'o//bsdigs mdzub kyis tshad tsam
211a6(rgyud): 'dis//nyon zhag bdun du nyi ma 'chur kar A pA marga'i yaMm shing khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin bsreg byas na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rnam pa gzhan du ma yi no//nad bskyed
211a7(rgyud): par 'dod na bA na ya'i ril ma'i sbyin bsreg nyi me bdun du byas na nad bskyed par byed do//mong nas smos nas sgrub par 'gyur te/rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//bcom ldan
211b1(rgyud): 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o////de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungaso//sgrub pa pos
211b2(rgyud): phug gi sgo ru du ro khro du go dra cing ma bgos pas ku sha'i khras la nye bar 'dug ste phug gi sgo la mngon par phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma stong
211b3(rgyud): phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste/thams cad gnas nas 'byor par 'gyur ro//dogs pa med par rab tu 'jug par bya ste/lha ma yin sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlig pa dran bzhin bras
211b4(rgyud): rab tu blang bar bya'o//bud med la dga' ba dang bcas pas yongasu bzlas nas gtogs par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro//de nas sgrub pa pos gsum pos 'di byed par 'dod pas ri'i
211b5(rgyud): rtse mor 'dzegs te snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//de nas ba lang gi lpags ba'i ched tsam gyi dkyil 'khor la tsan+danau dmar pos nye bar
211b6(rgyud): byugs te srung ba byas nas ku shwa'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste phug gi sgo la mngon par phyogs pas rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro mas a pA mtsha'i yam shing la dug dang
211b7(rgyud): khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu bya'o//de nas sbyin sreg yongasu rdzogs pa nas thal ba la yongasu bzlas nas gtor bar bya'o//gsum po 'dir 'gyur
212a1(rgyud): to dogs pa med par rab tu 'jug par bya zhing lha ma yin gyi bu mo des mthong nas dbang du 'gyur//de nas sgrub pa'i rdzas de blang bar bya ste/gang 'dang /
212a2(rgyud): pa de rig pas mngon par bsngags nas blang bar bya'o//'khor lo sems can thams cad dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//nyi ma zla ba
212a3(rgyud): dang skar ma gnas kyi bar du 'gyuraro//de bzhin du ldong ros dang /bi da dang /dgra p+ta dang /paT ka dang /shar+t+ti ste mdung thung dang /ral bri dang /ral gri'i yu ba dang /mchis
212a4(rgyud): lham dang /gre dang /srad bu dang /mchod phyir thogs dang /bgrang phreng dring gi chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams kyis zla ba nyi ma dang /skar ma'i bar du 'tshe bar
212a5(rgyud): byed//bcom ldan 'das ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang sa bcu la phanas pa'i byang chub sems dpo' dang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams su la yang
212a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pa me gtogs lha'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//de nas rnam pa gzhan ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags 'dri rnams thams cad bgegs par
212a7(rgyud): byed pa ni yungs kar gyiso//de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thig bzangs ris kyis dam pa mchog tu gsang ba gsungs pa/lha ma yin gyi bu ga'i sgor song nas 'o ma
212b1(rgyud): dang nas can zabs bcom ldan 'das ma'i stong po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum brnam par bya'o//lha ma yin+da gyi bu mo mthong bar 'gyuraro//de rnams ral glo sbyin pa 'am/dru
212b2(rgyud): papa'i rjes gzhan snang bar byed de/de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyuraro//lA ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs rIs kyis bA shad pa'i bcom ldan 'das
212b3(rgyud): ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rele'u bcu gnyis pa'o///byang chub sems dpa'i sgra snod pal po tshu las bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo'i bskyed par byed pa'i gas
212b4(rgyud): chen zhes pa'o//de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thamapa cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas bsam pa rnam par dag pos 'dir bcom ldan 'das
212b5(rgyud): ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du rtog pa'i rgyal pos rig pa'i sngags 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsung mo//ber skabs
212b6(rgyud): 'dis byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i thugs ka'i phyogs nas bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to//'od zer des thams cad dang ldan
212b7(rgyud): nga'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yang su bskor nas sems can rnams snang bar byas te slar yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus nub pa
213a1(rgyud): gyur to//bar skabs 'di gsungs par gyur pa de gang zhan+da na mr-i rat+na tra yA yan pa A byas ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bi d+hi satwa yA/ma hA satwA yA A ra l-i ka rang//
213a2(rgyud): ni mchog gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de yin te/bcom ldan 'dab ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i tshi ga gdon mi za ba kho na sgrub
213a3(rgyud): pa po rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//don med pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/bkra shis rab tu 'jug pa sangs rgyas thams cad
213a4(rgyud): kyis rab tu bsngags pa/de'i sngagaso//tho rangs stan las langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas khyor ba'i chu l-i lan bduni mngon par bsngags te shar du mngon par phyogs
213a5(rgyud): te btung bar bya'o//las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por zhi ba can gyis las thams cad 'grub par byed de/
213a6(rgyud): nye bar gnod pa med par dran par 'gyur zhing stobs dang ldan pa dang /gzi brjid dang /ldan pa dang /lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du
213a7(rgyud): rgyas pa can ni nyi ma gzhan la 'di rnams bya'o//bar ma la mngon spyod can baN+Di ta rab tu 'jug pa la ming med kyi sor mo lan bdun mngon par bsngags par bya'o//
213b1(rgyud): zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can la yang ngo //mngon spyod n+dan la bsdigs mdzub la/bzlab pa nyid kyis de brnams par bya'o//gang la la rnam par dwa lta'i cho ga byed pa de la dngos grub
213b2(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyuraro//bzlas pa'i dus su bdag nyid kyi snying khar 'dis mngon par bsngags par bya'o//de'i dngos grub nges par brjod do//sgrol ma'i ched du sgrub pa ni nges par
213b3(rgyud): myur bar bshad pa de bzhin du bya'o//sgrub pa pos blo dang ldan pas rig pa thams cad la de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po stobs chen po bdag gi sngags kyi rig pa shin tu dge ba dga'
213b4(rgyud): bar rab tu bsgragaso//sgrub pa pos kyang bdag nyid srung ba dang /dag pa byas la de rtag tu rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bcom ldan 'das mi sgrol ma
213b5(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o//gang la la sgrub pa byed par 'gyur ba de
213b6(rgyud): rnams gdon mi za bar reg pa 'dzin pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dang bas 'byung bar bya'o//yang 'di'i tshi gar 'gyur te ring bsrel dang
213b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ri'i rtse mo 'am/gzhan du yang rung ste gtsang ma'i phyogasu gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'i ma dang nas zan bza' ba 'am/rig pa so ser sgrub pa
214a1(rgyud): stan mo'i bza' ba yong pu spangs la mchod pa yongs rdzogs pas gso sbyong la gnas pa 'am/gso sbyong la mi gnas par yang rung ste 'bum phrag
214a2(rgyud): phyed dang gsum bzlas par bya'o//sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyuraro//mched pa byas nas bsnyen pa yang sa ga'i nya 'am cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la mchod pa byas nas stong phrag
214a3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas par bya'o//snying po sgrub par 'gyu ro//de nas las rnamasu 'gyur te tshe 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la a ka ru'i yam shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar las btags pa'i
214a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//me tog stong phrag brgyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyuraro//me tog stong phrag brgyad po rnams kyis gzugs brnyan la
214a5(rgyud): bsnun par bya'o//yang na slar yang mtshan mo thams cad du bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur//de nas ma mthong na dong rtse lnga rtag tu rnyed do//mtshan mo bdun du
214a6(rgyud): thun 'tshams gsum du mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyuraro//myos byed kyi shing la gzugs brnyan byas nas rgyan thams
214a7(rgyud): cad kyis rnam par brgyan la/rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sba ra nas thur mas rkang pa phug ste thun mtshams gsum du brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gnyis pa
214b1(rgyud): da pa dag gos 'ong bar byed do//mya ngan med pa'i shing gis sor ma drug pa'i sha la b+hAn+tak+Sha b+h+yas nas ran rtsa maur gnas te'o ma dang nas zan bza' thong 'bum phrag gsum bzla

221b6(rgyud): oMHsa sh+tsang+ge ts+tsha/nam semyas ma shU yaM/bar+b+he si~M d+hA ya~M/mahAs d+ha ma/ni mi ts+tshag kyai/Adz+dza d+hI r+m+ma susang+ge/swA smai
222a1(rgyud): ti/gan+d+ha nu le ba na/byA tIts+tsha swAhA/'dis mchod yon dbul shing dri dang gdan yang //na mo rat+na tA yA ya/nu mo a me tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ma/
222a2(rgyud): ar+ha ti/samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ir+ya a ba lo ki to shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/na ma Ar+ya tA rA yai/hi li hi li/mi li mi li/ma hA pr-i b+hA yo/br-ih+ma sum/
222a3(rgyud): no nu ru ha/hau ra ha ra/sa ra sa ra/ka ra ka ra/de bi pra sA d+haM ku ru pra tIts+tsha tha puSh+pa swA hA/me tog gi rig po ste 'dis me tog rnams dbul bar bya'o//na mo rat+no tra yA ye/na
222a4(rgyud): mo oM mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/sa myakl-i bud d+hA yaM/na me Ar+ya a bi lo ki te shwa rA ya/bau d+hi sat+kA/ma hA satwA ya/na mo b+ha ga ba t+yaM/IR+ya tA rA yaM/
222a5(rgyud): d+hi satwA ya/min+ta/ma nu smA ra/sarba de ba/pri yau b+ha ga ba taM/a ba lo ki nau/sid+d+ha sid+d+ha pra thA naM/bud+d+ha sat+ye na/d+harma sat+yai na/saM g+ha sat+ye na swAhA/bdug pa'i rig pa'o//
222a6(rgyud): na mo ret+na tra yA yaM/na ma a mi tA b+ha ya/ta thA ga tA ya ad+d+ho samyakraM bud+d+ha ya/na mo Ir+ya A ba laM ki te shI rA ya/bo d+h+waM satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/na maM b+ha ga ba taM Ar+ya tA ra
222a7(rgyud): d+hu te/badz+raM d+hA na/a nu dze/be gai/be ge/d+hu ru d+hu ru/sarba dzA ba/pr-i ye/bud d+hi sa t+ye na/d+harma sat+ye na/saM g+ha sa t+ye na swAhAM/gter ma'i rig pa'o//na mo
222b1(rgyud): rAt+natA yA ya/na mAM a me twA b+hU ya/ta thA ga d+hA ya/an+tat+to/sam+b+hak+sha bud+d+ha s+ya/nA ma stur+yas pa lo ti te/shwa R+Sha ya/bo dz+nye swAn+tA ya/mahA sa twA ya/maHku ruNAkA ya/nA ma b+hag
222b2(rgyud): bi t+yAM/Ar+yA tA rA yaM/a br-i ti ta tAM/b+ha ga ba t+ti/A tA re ta re pod+mi b+h+yo saM ni shI tAM gai/she ta d+hu dze/d+hu me d+hu mi/bud d+hA sa~M d+h+ye ne/d+harma sat+yai ni/saM b+hA sIt+te na smA hUM/'di na ma ma
222b3(rgyud): rigs pa'o//de bzhin du rig pa 'dis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//sngon du bsnyen pa dang /sgrub pa la thams cad mtshungs pa nyid du sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rag pa ni/na ma
222b4(rgyud): rat+na yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA yau/ar+d+ha te/sa myakl-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ma hA satwA ya/na mo b+ha ga ba ta Ar+ya tA rA yaM/
222b5(rgyud): tad+ya thA/A ga ma/A ga maM/ga ga ne ta le/saM pra tsau/di t+yau/saMrba bi d+hA/d+ha ra/bi sho d+ha ni swA hA//rig pa 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu chu la yongasu bzlas nas bumaM pa la

222b7(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ye/ar+d+ha te/samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/no ma Ir+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya~M/bo d+hi satwA ya/man+t+ra sad+g+ha ya/na mo b+ha ga pa te ts+tshad+d+ho rA yai/d+hUd+hu mr-i/tsU d+hu mai//dUSh+Tar+m+ma/
223a1(rgyud): khu khu mo/nA shud+d+ha/sid+d+hi kany+tsa ne/shud+d+hi kA re/shu tsa ni swAhA/rig pa 'di sgrub pa pos rtag tu gos la lan gcig gam/lan bdun bzlas la
223a2(rgyud): yongasu bcang bar bya'o//rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa rnams kyis nges par ston no//gdon mi za ba kho nar sgrub pa pos bya'o//na mo ra na tra yA ya/nu mo e me tA
223a3(rgyud): b+ha ya/tA thA gA tA ya/ar+d+ha te/sam+bak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te/shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA yai/na mo b+ha ga ba twe/Ar+yA tA rA yai/shAn+ti/me ka ro hA/
223a4(rgyud): shan+ti mA te/shi shAn+ta/ni shAn+ta/kal+yA Ni ni shId+ha/bi dza ye/de be ba ra do swA hA/rig pa 'dis bdag nyid la la ni bdun bzlas nas gnyid log par bya'o//rmi lam du log
223a5(rgyud): par 'dren pa me mthong ngo //nu mo rat+na tra yA yaM/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/te thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/sa myakle bud d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/
223a6(rgyud): mahA satwa ya/ne me b+ha ga wA ti AR+ya tA rI yi/sUR+ya ta u pa ri/tra byaM/d+ha ra Ni/ban+ti ti/kur+d+ha sho d+hi ni/ku tsa mA li ni/shu kr-i be shA d+ha ni swAhA/ku sha bi shA d+hi ne swaM hA/

225b2(rgyud): 'khor nye bar byugs te rig pa 'dis dri dang /me tog dang gtor ma dang bdug pa la nyi ma so sor mngon par bsdigs nas mchod par bya'o//'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing /bdag

225b4(rgyud): pa na bgegs med par 'gyuraro//rnam pa gzhan du rnam par 'joms par byed zhes pa sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa 'di rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po bklags pas grub pa

226a7(rgyud): mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kau te/shwa dz+nyA ya bo d+hi satwA yaM/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/tA re tA re swAhAM/rig pa 'dis zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dusu mtshon mo

226b5(rgyud): sbar nas ut+pa la sngon po la zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyis pa ta Da pi'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//de nas na mkha' la gru bo grubo zhes pa'i sgra 'byung //yang na ras ris/
226b6(rgyud): g.yo bar byed do//de lta bu ni grub par 'gyur te/yul dang grong dang grong khyer ram rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug so sor rnyed//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+tsa
226b7(rgyud): rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA tu re tu re swA hU~M/rig pa 'dis 'bum phrag cig tu bzlas nas zla ba dang nyi ma gzas bzung ba na a shwats+tsha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi
227a1(rgyud): nang du bcug nas gzobarjod dang ldan pad+mo lhag pa kha sbyar gyis mnan nas rje srid rdo ba dang /dub 'phrul bu dang / byung ba de spyod du bzlas par bya/
227a2(rgyud): dro byar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do//du ba 'phrul bzhin pas nI mi snang ba dang cha drug tu 'brug go//'bar bas ni na mkha' la 'gro'o//thogs pa med pa'i skyabs dang /
227a3(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang /nyi ma 'tsher ka'i mdog dang /sku lI zh-ing 'khyil baM/le brgyud gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing lus tha dad pa'i lha rnams
227a4(rgyud): skye bar 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA ma Ar+yA a ba lo/ te shwo rA yA/be d+d+hi sad+g+ha yA/mahA s+yAd+d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/d+hu re tu re swA hU~M/'dis rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i sa
227a5(rgyud): mo byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dri dang me tog dang gtor me'i cho ga byas nas bsgrub par bya'o//du bu 'thul ba la
227a6(rgyud): blangs nas mi snang bar 'gyuraro//cha drug 'phrog go/lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a pA li ki te sh+tsa rA ye/bo d+hi sid+d+ha yA/
227a7(rgyud): mahA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/tA re tA ra ya~M b+ha ga ba ti swAhA/rig pa 'dis til mar la len brgyad mngon pa bsngags te bsku sa na rma med par byed//tsher ba med par bye'o//
227b1(rgyud): zug+sa tu yod pa byed //na mo rat+natrayA ya/nA ma AR+tha a bAkro ka to sh+tsa nA ya/batrU~M panA ma/maHsad+d+ha pa/maSh+TA/s+'ukA ya/ N+Da/tA rad+d+ha ro/ts+tshat+tAt+ta s+yAH/rog pa
227b2(rgyud): depa'i sa song sa hU~M len bdun yang su gas pa'i tshul gtor ba \u0f7f/mA na kI dang /rgyu la la sogs pa'i ma ra 'gyur//na me
227b3(rgyud): na ma A byas pa oM ki trUM shwa rA ya/d+his te ye/mahA satwA yA/d+d+han+tu/rahU~M r+ya swAH/reg pa 'dis chen po rnams kyi las kyi lom thams cad byed pa

234b6(rgyud): ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//rtsod par 'dod pa rnams kyis smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur//nyi mi so ser 'bru rlon pa dang /phub ma rnams lag pa g.yon pas
234b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg byos na ming nas smos nas mtshon mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyuraro//rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg thun mtshams
235a1(rgyud): gsum du stong phrag 'argyad rgyu'o//nyi ma gsum du u mra'u yam shong gis mo sbar nas dur zla dang tsho rA maHnA gyi sbyin srid stong phrag brgyad bya'o//
235a2(rgyud): nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po rnams dbang du 'gyur//jo ma dang ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan dang bsod snyoms za ba'am mi smra ba'i dartol zhugs kun tu spyad cing ga
235a3(rgyud): mas gos gtsang mo dang shing shun 'chang bas sgrub pa byas te/gang ga gtun shing gi sgra dang bral ba gtsang ma'i phyogs chu bo'i 'brim gnyis kyis blangs nas khyu
235a4(rgyud): bdun pa'i sa'i gong bu bzhi byas nas dbus 'dab ma stong gi pad+me byas te/de'i steng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gong gi ched kyi lcags lnga las byas pa'i 'khor la
235a5(rgyud): rab tu bzhag nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus zos sku'i sprin sngar bskyob par bya'o//dri zhim po'i dri rnams dang n+dan dkang dmar gyisna mchod nas min da ra'i me tog dang /
235a6(rgyud): bdug pa dang phreng ba brgyu bul nas bcom ldan 'das l-i dr-i dang /me tog dang /bdub pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o//myur gyi mar me'i phreng ba bdun dbul bar bya'o//
235a7(rgyud): phyogs bzhir mar gyi bum pa bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o//phyogs bzhir bu pa bzhi sa bon thams cad kyis gong bar rin po che rnams bcug nas bzhig par bya'o//
235b1(rgyud): spyan nga na /dru dum rnan su btugs / du b+hU du 'ang da d+h+r-i/kaN+Da rgyun rgyun rgyu rdzun ska pa na /
235b2(rgyud): 'i bi de // d+hI ni ni b+hU tIt+tA deng bachu dang bsres pa s+thAn+d+ra po b+hi'o//b+h+ri b+h+yogasu'i thug gis gang bu'i gto mas te bing+ge mchod par bya'o//sems can thams cad pa
235b3(rgyud): sa du ni rnye na ma 'tshod pa byung bar bya'o//sbrul shi'i yum shing gis mI swA na m+b+ha mna'i yam shing la mar gyis brtags so lan bdun mngon par ba gas
235b4(rgyud): hU~M brgya d+hA//mingonas smos pa de debang du 'gyur//byang chub kyi yam shing gis me sbyar nas lan tshu las byung bu'i gzugs ban+d+han+ta s+yA te/mA
235b5(rgyud): mas te ji srid na du pa'i bar du bsregs thugs re re lo lan bdun bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bsregs thugs spyong phral brgyad bya'o//gle nas sa rje
235b6(rgyud): la ba dbang du 'gyur//da//da pe'i bcoM lnga la yan lag brgyad dang ldan du'i gas spyod can gyis nyon mtshan du sbyang bar gnas te/sA la~M m+b+ha ltung ba'i bzung
235b7(rgyud): maung gis lpa zhes pa'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nimi ring bsrel dang btsos pa'i mchod rkyen dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gnangs
236a1(rgyud): /kyi drung du gser dngul rgyu snod du sor sbyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'o mar gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa blangs nas ku sha'o khrus la ts+tsha bar 'dug te/lag
236a2(rgyud): ge yon pas snod bzung zag pa g.yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrug par bya ste/ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du'o//de nas btang bar bya ste/yid bzhungs par
236a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//lan cig brjod pas thos pa 'dzin par byed//de la du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed par 'gyur ro//'bar bas ni mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yan lag zi mas cad
236a4(rgyud): na ba nye bar zhi bar 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa lo gso sbyong can gyis snga dro las brtsamos par bya'o//shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu gzhi'i ched kyi dkyil 'khor nye
236a5(rgyud): bar byugs nas dbusu nad pa'i so dag bzhag par bya'o//phyogs bzhi rnamasu bum pa chus gang po bzhi la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas la bzhag par bya'o//so
236a6(rgyud): phag rnams kyi steng du sen rtsi'i gros bzhag par bya'o//gzho nu mas bkal ba'i tshen sna lnga'o skud pas yongasu dkris te de zhim pos yongasu bkang bas so//phyi rol du
236a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bya'o//phyogs bzhir chang dang sha'i gtor ma dbulo//dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas gu gul gyi dud pa dbul//zangs kyi snod mar gyis
236b1(rgyud): bkang ba bzhag par bya'o//de nas ku sha ljang ku bzung nas nad pa gos dkar mo can la ji srid rkang pa'i bar du byab par bya'o//mar gyi stong du ku sha dong bar bya'o//de banan du brgya rtsa brgyad
236b2(rgyud): bya'o//de nas mar zos pas blta bar bya'o//de nas ku sha yang ku blangs nas zlos bzhin du bzhag par bya'o//sbyangs pa las 'byung ba'i snod dang gos byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
236b3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi zhabs la phyog byed du gzhugo//do nas pri yang ku dang /na ga ge sar dang /sbrang rtsi can dang /bzhi po cag tu byas nas mnyam par thob par byas la mar dang lhan
236b4(rgyud): cig pa'i zas mchog zos na nad med po rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro//skud pa sngon po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas rked pa la bcing bar bya'o//shu ba mched pa nye bar
236b5(rgyud): zhi bar byedado//de bzhin du mgrin pa la nye bar bcing bar bya'o//dbugs ma bde ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug gis spyan
236b6(rgyud): sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas te mar gyi mer me bu 'o//de nas byang chub shing gos yam shing gris me rab tu sbar/
236b7(rgyud): sper nas su rtse pog la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o//nad nyo bar zhi bar byed//rig pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed
237a1(rgyud): 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyi sa blangs nas seng ge dang /stag dang /phag dang /lug gi gdong pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tsho/
237a2(rgyud): pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o//de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis mtshan mo phyogs gtsang mar bla re dmar po bris la las yang dag par brtse mo//
237a3(rgyud): san rtsi'i gos bcu bzhi la bgegaso bzhag par bya'o//dbusu bgegs rnams kyis gtso bo log 'dren bzhag par bya'o//tshon sna lnga'i phye ma la lan cig mngon par
237a4(rgyud): bsngags pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o//dri dmar po'i me tog rnaM kyi mngon pa mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me bcu bzhi dbulo//gu gul gyi bdug pa dbu po/
237a5(rgyud): sha dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bcu bzhi dbu lo//rgyu skyigs kyi khu ba yang bcu bzhi gtor bar bya'o//dri nas srad bu dri mang pol lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mtshan
237a6(rgyud): ma bcing bar bya'o//'byung po dang /bgegs kyi rgyal po yang bcing bar bya'o//de nas u duM ba rA'i yam shing gis me sbyar nas bgrags rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes
237a7(rgyud): brjod de/swA dA'i yi ges dkyil 'khor ba rnams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//der bgegs dang log par 'dren pa bcings par 'gyur//rig pa rnams
237b1(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed pa na bgegs rnams 'phrul byed//de na bgegs dang log par 'dron pa rnams sa'i snod cig du bgegs thams cad gzhug par bya'o//cig du ldog par
237b2(rgyud): 'dren pa chen po'o//de nas bge Da rnaMs tha~Mng la me rtag thaMd dbul bar bya zhing log par 'dren pa chen po la tsan+dan dmar po dang /ka rA bI ra'i me tog dam po dbulo//bgegs
237b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad la rdzas thams cad kyi bdug po dbulo//log par 'dren pa chen po la gu gul gyi bdug pa dbu'o//mar dang bsrel pa dbul//de nas lte ba'i tshad kyi dong du
237b4(rgyud): so sor gzhug par bya'o//de lta bus bgegs thams cad med par 'gyuraro//gso sbyong can gyi dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung
237b5(rgyud): ba'i ba lang gi lci bos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas me tog dang dri dang bdug pa dang mar gyi me la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas ud dum ba ri'i shi
237b6(rgyud): gi me sbar nas tshangs ma'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya zhing lha la phul ba zos na yid gzhungs par 'gyu re//'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyur ro//lha
237b7(rgyud): la phul ba'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro//nas dang /zho dang /lha la phul ba cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byas na rje rigs dbang du 'gyuraro//dag la
238a1(rgyud): bltas nas bzlas pa byas na rengs par 'gyuraro//lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus thams cad 'bebs pa dang /nor byed do//dug thams cad
238a2(rgyud): la yang nye bar byu'o/zhun mkhan gyi ril bu byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mig nAd sel bar byed//na ba la skud pa bcing bar bya ste/gdon thams cad mi
238a3(rgyud): 'byung //gtsug pud bcings pas bdag nyid srung ba'o//thal bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o//bong ba la la ni bdun bzlas pas phyogs btsong ba'o//bud med bu ma thon
238a4(rgyud): ba la til la yongasu bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro//rmongs pas mngal gyi zla mtshan gyi dus las 'das pa na khrus bya zhing rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o/
238a5(rgyud): ma la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdogs pa byas nas btung bar sbyin zhing bza' ba mchog dang mar bsres pa bza' bar bya'o//de nas bu bci' bar 'gyur ro//bu mang po can
238a6(rgyud): gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o//thal ba r-i chu'i bum pa bzhi dang kun tu dasres nas bzhag par bya'o//shu dag la lan brgyad brgyar bzlas te lhag pa g.yas pa la bcing
238a7(rgyud): ji srid skye ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro//gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro//
238b1(rgyud): gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa byas te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas lag bcing bar bya'o//brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mi 'byung //de nas ma rungs pas mcho
238b2(rgyud): ba'i ming nas smos te chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas khyor chu 'thungs pas de lta bus shi bo yang ldang bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du bcu bzhi ru mngon par bsngags par
238b3(rgyud): byas nas btung ba sbyin par bya'o//'dzeg pos kyang mche ba sos par bya'o//chang gi phabs la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas shi ba la sbyin par bya'o//gal te
238b4(rgyud): byis pa mi 'byung //de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang rig po thams cad yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub
238b5(rgyud): nga'i thabs kyi spyi'i rig pa gsungaso//na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/nA mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ta thA gra tA ya/artA tau sa myak+saM bu dz+nyo ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kI te shwa dwA ya/ba d+hi
238b6(rgyud): satwA ya/ma hA sautwA yA/ri dz+ra kai/tA raM/shAn+te/tut+tA rI/a na b+hi/sA le/tu r-i swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo spyi bo'i sgrol ma zhes bya'o//rig pa 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro
238b7(rgyud): ba'i chu klung du phrag pa'i tshad kyis chur zhugs nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste ji srid na mkha' nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor lo bug pa mthong ba'i bar du ste/de lta
239a1(rgyud): bu byas pas las 'grub par 'gyur//gal te ma mthong na slar yang 'grub par bya'o//de nas lan bdun du myur rdzasu song nas dri dang me tog dang
239a2(rgyud): bdug pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga bya ste/lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas mtshan thog zag tu bzlas par bya'o//ji srid dbugs 'byin zhes brjod pa'i bar du'o//nyi ma so
239a3(rgyud): sor dngul brgya sbyin par byed/de yang zad par bya'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA gau tA ya/ar+thA taM/samyakl-i bu d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shA
239a4(rgyud): rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sat+kA ya/ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ri dz+r-i ke/tA re/shAn+te/tI re/a na b+h+r-i/sA s+yai tut+ta re/a gr-i/d+harma naM t+yA taM/tu re swA hU~M/'di ni 'pha
239a5(rgyud): ma sgrol ma dag pa zhes bya ba ste/rig pa 'dis dgon pa'i bu lang gi lci bzho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad bya'o//dus gsum
239a6(rgyud): du ba lang brgya rnye do//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/mo hA kA ru Ni kA yau/lam+ma/pra lam+b+he/lam+b+haM/bIr+ya/sar+b+ba
239a7(rgyud): sid+d+him+me ku ru swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phyang ba zhes bya ba ste rig pa 'dis ka ra bi ra'i yam shing le mer gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya
239b1(rgyud): ste ji srid rgyal po dbang du 'gyur te 'ong bar byed//sde snod smra ba yang sgo ba'i lus byas pa 'ching ba grol ba la sogs pa de yang skyong du 'jug//de ma grol bar du mang du dngos grub
239b2(rgyud): kyis grub pa yang sngar brjod pa'i rigs pas sarba sid+d+hiny+tsa me ku ru swA hA//zhes byin nas rtag tu bzlas pas 'ching pa grol por byed do//yang na gtsang mar gyur pas mtshan
239b3(rgyud): thog theg bzlas par bya ste 'ching ba grol bar byed//na mo rat+na tr-i yA yAM/nau mA a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyaM kr-i bud+d+hA ya/nA ma Ar+ya a bA lo kaM te shwa rA ya/
239b4(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sautwA ya/ri dzA ka/d+harme/tA ri/shAn+ta d+har+m+ma tu d+hA re a na bi la s+ye/d+har+m+me tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phag sa ma sgrol ma zhi ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/'das
239b5(rgyud): ma du lu maM ga dang /d+hA la na dang /sog mang me la sbyin sreg bya ste ji srid log 'dren 'ong bar byed de/de brjod par bya'o//nyi ma so sor bdag la dang tshi re sbyin//de yang zad
239b6(rgyud): bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la reg tu gzhug par bya'o//de nas grub par 'gyuraro//rnam pa gzhan du na mi sdod do//nA mo rat+na tA yA ya/na mo oM me trA b+hA ya/tA
239b7(rgyud): thA gau tA ya/ar+ha taM sa myakle bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ir+ya i bi lo ki ti shwa R+Sha ya/tho d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/re dzu ka/d+harma ni t+s+ya taM/tA r-i shan+d+ha/d+harma ni d+h+ya te tut+tA ro anats+tsha
240a1(rgyud): lU ste/d+harman d+hA ti/tu ra swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma drang po zhem bya ba'i rig pa ste 'dis ring srol dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du be kaM ka ta'i yA/
240a2(rgyud): shing gyis me sbar nas bel ba'i 'bras bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btagles pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//'dis las rnams dpal dang ldan pa 'am/yul gyi
240a3(rgyud): bdag por 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na ma A mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA yi/adzA taM sa myakr-i bud+d+ha ya/no ma AR+ya a ba lo ki twe shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ma hA sat+kA ya/
240a4(rgyud): A gra d+harma ni d+h+r-i tA de/ri dzu ki d+harmA ne te te//tud+hA re/a naM bi lA s+ye/d+harma ni t+yA te tA ro sA hAM/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro/
240a5(rgyud): ba'i chu klung du zhugs te/ki ki r-I d+hA'i me tog sbyin sreg stong phyag brgyad bya'o//nyi ma so so 'am nyin zhag la tshal bdun nam brgyad rnye do//yong na dngul ba rgya mthong ngo //rig pa
240a6(rgyud): de nyid kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi shing gi me skAr nas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o//dpal dang ldan par 'gyuraro//nA me rat+na tra yA ya/
240a7(rgyud): na mo ya mi tA b+hA ya/ta bA ga tA ya/ar+ha ti/samyakr-i bud+d+ha ye/na maHAr+ya a ba lo ke te shwa rA ya/ba d+hi satwA yau/mahA satwA ya/e gre tA ri/ri dzu ke tA re/shIn+yaM tun+dza
240b1(rgyud): /An d+ha lA s+yo/tu ro swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo mngon par brjod par byed ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/'di rtag tu bzlas pas nad med par 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/nA ma
240b2(rgyud): A mi tA b+hU yaM/ta bA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te/sa myak+saM bud+d+ha yA/na ma Ar+ya e bA lau ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sang+gI yaM/a pre tA raM/a na b+hi lA s+yai/d+harma tud+d+hi re/a na b+hI lA/
240b3(rgyud): s+ye/d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags mau sgra la maM nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rog pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod pa nye bar rdzogs par byed//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/nu
240b4(rgyud): mau a mr-i trA b+hI yaM/taM b+hU gr-i tA ya/ar+ha twe/samyakr-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma AR+ya a bA lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+ha ya/ma hA satwA ya/a gre tA ri/ri dzu ka d+harma tu d+ha re/i ra b+hi/lU s+yai/
240b5(rgyud): d+harme tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par brjod pa byar med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas dgra thams cad las mchog tu rgyal bar byed//
240b6(rgyud): nA mo dat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA yAM/tA thA ga tA ya/er+ha tau/swamyak+saM d+har+d+ha ya na mo Ar+ya a ba lo te shA rA ya/bo d+hi sud+hA ya/ma hA s+ya drA ya/a gre tA paM/shAn+te d+har+m+ma tuSh+Ta/
240b7(rgyud): re/shAn+ti d+harma ner+yA te tu re swA hA/'di zhi ba'i chos nges par 'byung ma'i ri gaM paM b+ha rtag tu bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo
241a1(rgyud): mi t+tA b+hU ya/tA b+hU ga tA ya/Ar+d+ha twe/sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/nu ma Ar+ya a bA lo k+Shi te shwA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sAt+pA ya/ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/a br-i d+hA rA/
241a2(rgyud): ri dzu ka d+harma/nir+yA te/tut+tA re/a na b+hi lA s+yai d+harma ni nir+yA te/tud+d+ho ri swA hA/'di ni drang po can gyis chos kyi mchog nges par 'byung ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas de ni thaMd
241a3(rgyud): thob pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ma 'am/rin po che rnyed//na mo rat+na tra yU ye/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA bA tA ya/ar+ha twe sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma ar+ya a ba lau kri te shwa rA ya/
241a4(rgyud): bod+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a gre tA re/ri dzu ke d+harma nir+yA te tud+d+hi re ri dz+re ka d+harma nIr+yA te tun+ti rai swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mau thams cad drang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag
241a5(rgyud): tu bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dgra' bar 'gyur//na mo rot+na tra yAM ya/na ma a mi tI b+hA yai/ta bA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te/samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shA rA ya/
241a6(rgyud): bo d+hi sad+g+ha ya/ma hA sat+kA ya/a pre d+harma ni r+yA taM/tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma phongs pa la sgrol ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtog tu bzlas pas skye ba
241a7(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par byed//na mo rat+na tr-i yA yaM/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya au ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mau hA
241b1(rgyud): satwA ya/a g+h+r-i tA ro/AnAb+h+r-i l+yA s+yo tA re/a na b+hI lA s+yai trAt+kA rI/an b+hI lA s+yaid+harmA nar+yA te t+tA re swAt+na/'dan 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas
241b2(rgyud): pas mchog gi'i bras bu ste ro//ni mo r-it+na tra yA ya/ni mr-i aM mi tA b+hA yaM/to dzA g+h+ra tA yau/ar+thA ti/sam+b+hak+saM bud d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kr-i twe shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA
241b3(rgyud): satwA ya/shAn+te d+hArmA tut+tA raM shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA ti tA raM swAhA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi'i ldan mA zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas zhi ba'i sems bskyed par byed//na mo ra
241b4(rgyud): yA yaM/nA ma~M oM mi tAp+tA ya/tAMb+hU ga trI maM/an+te te/sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+yA ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yAM/ma hA satwA ya/ri dzA ke tAr+ye/r-i dzu kad+h-irme tut+tA
241b5(rgyud): dz+ra kI d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hUM/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma drang por ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas drang po'i sems bskyed par byed//chos thams cad zhes bya
241b6(rgyud): ba'i rig pa'odri rnams bklags pas 'grub pa bdag nyid srung ba dang /gzhan srung ba dang /bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'bum phrag gcig brjod pas sngar brjod pa'i las tha~Md
241b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ste stong phrag bcu bzlas pas bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa/stong phrag sum cu bzlas pas bsod nams dang ldan pa/'dum phrag gsum bzlas nas mtshams
242a1(rgyud): mod pa byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/mdor na ma nor bar phan pa sgrub pa'i sems sbyin pa snying rje'i bdag nyid canA yu nAg tu bzlas pas nad thong mod/
242a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//yams thams cad mi 'byung //nye bar 'chi ba thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o//de nas 'di'i cho ga phyogs tsam du 'gyur te/
242a3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas pra las thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas sdig pa zad par 'gyuraro//'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas mchog rnams sgrub
242a4(rgyud): par byed//'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pas mngon par shes pa so sor rnye do//'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas lha'i shes pa so sor rnyed//'bum phrag drug bzlas pas yid bzhin
242a5(rgyud): gyi nor bu rin po che rnyedado//'bum phrag bdun bzlas pas mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyuraro//'bum phrag bcu bzlas pas rgyal srid chen po so sor rnyed//'bum phrag bcu
242a6(rgyud): gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//de nas mig sman ldong ros a shret+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du btums te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid dro ba dang /
242a7(rgyud): du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//de la dri bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed//du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o//'bar bas ni na mkha' la 'gro'o//mar skya
242b1(rgyud): sgrogs thugs 'bum sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed//'bum phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ngo //de mthong na sna gang tshol ba
242b2(rgyud): de rnyed//rjen da/ ba'i yem shing gis sbyin sreg stong phyug bo rgyad bya'o//tshig gam zhi bas te ching ba thob cing yul gyi bdag por 'gyur//oM gA ru nag pa'i yam shing gis sbyin
242b3(rgyud): sgeg 'bum bya'o//rgyal po dbang du 'gyur//rgyu chen po rnyed//tsan+danA dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o//grub pa thams cad la stong phrag bsdus pa rnyed//byang chu
242b4(rgyud): shing gi 'og tu 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o//bcu dang bcud kyis len rnams rnyed//zos pas sgra dkar dang gnyer mi spangs par 'gyuraro//rtag tu bzlas pas bya rgod stsol bar
242b5(rgyud): byed do//'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mi mchog dang rnam par 'phrul par byed do//yungs kar rgyal pos rtag tu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur//'di la
242b6(rgyud): mAr gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o//rtag tu nai rA d+hi //gso sbyong can gyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o//bza' ba dang btung bzhim po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//arga'i yam shing
242b7(rgyud): gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o//gsor brgya rnyed//dzi N+yaika gi sbyin sreg bya'o//skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro//yid la byas ni bzlas pa bya ste/rtag tu bzlas pas na/
243a1(rgyud): rdzu dadu/gdon thams cad dang /gdung ba thams pad+ma dang / rtswa ba dang /'jigs pa smras pa 'arnams par byed// la
243a2(rgyud): la ba du swA h+Na g+sasdu pa'i sbyin sge phrig bAr+b+bad d+hIn+ti//nar byung ba n+d+ha re//dzAmA prA bA g+sas sa rgyal srid da//rgyu skyer gyis gnad pa pa'i mi dang
243a3(rgyud): rkyen bsgres pa'i na'i skyon ste/na par 'gyur//'don nyid dam gzhan gyis sgyu maSh+Ti Sh+T+rI N+Di g+sas sbyini srog gis rgyal pa du byed bar 'gyur//r+ya ba'i mye gus
243a4(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur//dug dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'dod ni kyil dang 'bras thug pa che'i sbyin srog rte nir chen po zab phyed 'ad+mo //rdul dang /sa~M siy+Ya
243a5(rgyud): rgyo mngon par bsdigs byabyas nas 'byung ba'i nye bar 'tsho bas btub pa'i sems can thams cad la ston du gzhug par bya'o//mthong ba lta nga gnas 'gro'o//
243a6(rgyud): brgyad pad+ma de banas ni dang bro gang mthong ba de dag tu 'gyur//tshul yongasu bzlas nas ga dang bklu bar bya ste/skyeb thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//rgyu rig ma 'dzu la
243a7(rgyud): rjes thos da da pade rnyed//tshul lani bdun mngon pa'i bsngags pa'i khye chu nyi ma sa ser po sa byung bar byar//rlung med par na pa rgya med
243b1(rgyud): bya bar 'dod pas ldan tshwa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te spyi bor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste nyi ma bdun gyi dbang du 'gyur//zhes pa sgrub thab
243b2(rgyud): kyi grub pa dang /yid la grub pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa 'di rnams sad pa'i rgyur yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du yang 'dir phyogs cung zad tsam zhig byas pa las sgrub
243b3(rgyud): thabs kyis nye bar sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi stobasu 'gyur bar bya'o//tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs tsam gyis sgrub pa'i yang dag dngos grub spyod/shin tu stong ming gang ba min//bza' ba
243b4(rgyud): kun nas sbyin par bya//tsha ba mang sgyur la sogs pa'i//ro las yul bral lnga la yang //sred pa ldan pas ro la ni//sred pa gang phyir skye bor 'gyur//sred pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg
243b5(rgyud): sogs//'dir ni cung zad brtsam mi bya//'drir spro 'dir ni rnam par shes//leg pa ldag la sogs brjod pa//dong bar bya'amo dor byo min//nang du g.yog po lha rnams ni//phur du
243b6(rgyud): gnas par yongs brtag bya//lha rnams kyi ni khang pa'am/khang stong dang ni phug gi nang //shing cig gam ni dur khrod drong //ri bo dang ni chang cheng du//bzlas dang sbyin sreg smra
243b7(rgyud): pa yang //rtse gcig yid kyis bya ba yin//ma dag ma dag kun dag la//dag pa rnam par sbyong ba yin//gnyis ka yis kyang gnyis ka la//dngos grub smra bas bsgrub par bya
244a1(rgyud): gang yang ro yi srad bu dang //lhag ma de nas 'grongs pa dang //zla mtshan ldan pas kun tu reg/gdol pa'i skye bos bskol ba yang //rul pa'i dri dang slar
244a2(rgyud): yang 'byung //legs byas 'dod pas sbyin par bya//lha rnams ched du bsnyen pa las//de lta la sogs yon te ni ldan//zas sam mo la stan la sogs pa//sgrub pa rang gis blangs
244a3(rgyud): pa 'am//min pa nyid ni bsnyen par bya//btung ba ljon pas gnas dang dga'//skye bo ngan pa'i sems can btsas//phyi ru kun tu btags pas blangs//mtshams med lnga po byed pa
244a4(rgyud): go/nad dang 'byung chen byed pa dang //med pa 'am yang mang na'ang //zas dang le los bcom pa dang //dge 'dun 'khu dang ngo tsha med//ser sne lhur len tshon gyis 'bugs//
244a5(rgyud): rtag tu log par lta ba gzhan//de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan//kun tu gsungs pa mdzes pa'o//dus min khrus ni mi nus nang //rang gis nus pa ma yin pa//rang gi rlung ni
244a6(rgyud): mchog tu bsgrags//dus gsum min par de yod pa//cig tu pheg gsum bral ba dang //khrus nyes pa dang chu ba'i nang //nyes pa gsum zhes bya ba 'joms//khrus ni mchog
244a7(rgyud): tu rab tu bsgrags//de phyir dus kyang kun bsams nas//me dos sam ni de nas kyang //chu yis khrus ni dngos grub kun//sgrub pa po la bstan po yin//de nas kun tu nad pa
244b1(rgyud): las//gsang ba'i sngags kyis khrus rnams ni//rab tu skyugs par 'gyur ba yin//yang 'dir sngags ni/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo A mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/an+ta to/sar+b+ba
244b2(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya/bud d+hA shu tsa~M/d+harma shu tsi/saM g+hA shu tsaM/a nai na par+ya bAkye ne/a shU n+ya shu tsi ra/b+ha bA mo swA hAM/sngags 'dis tshul lan cig yongasu bzlas nas dku bar bya'o//sngon
244b3(rgyud): du bsnyen pa dang sgrib pa'i du su dang /nad pa'i sngags 'dis khrus byos pas gtsang mar 'gyur ro//metshan me'i stod du thun gsum du dam pa'i chos kyi kha ton la sogaso pa rnams
244b4(rgyud): dub pas mu chen mo'i gung laM ku sha la sogs pa'i stan la gtsong sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga dang /phyag rgyas yongasuM brtags te bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bya'o//de'i tshe srung ba byas
244b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//seng ge'i rmyil du sgrub pa pos rtag tu seng ge'i stabs kyi lce 'ami shar gyi phyogs mgo bo bstan nas rmi lam du me zhi ba can nam rgyas pa tson gyi sbyin sreg gal
244b6(rgyud): gyur na shar dang lho'i lho ru kun tu gnas nas rkang pa rab tu bskyang bar bya'o//nub kyi phyogasu mgo bo byis nas lho'i phyogasu khwa bltas la nyal bar bya'o//rig pa rnams dang
244b7(rgyud): yang dag par ldan pas gang yang tsan+dan dang /bil ba la sogs po dang /n+ya gr-i d+hA dang /oM du maM ba ra la sogs pa rmi lam du mthong ni/bdag nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i/
245a1(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o//dad pa dang /byA ka rat+na ba dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /bya ro tA n+ya rmi lam du byung na de'i dngos grub myur du bdag la
245a2(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gos dkar po dang mnyam par kun tu ston pa 'di yang bdag nyid kyang tshe 'phel bar mthong na gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal
245a3(rgyud): mtshan gyi phreng bas khyab pa dang /rmi lam du khang bzangs la 'dzegs pa 'am/gnon pa la sogs pa byung na dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid de/grul mngon par 'dzegs

245a5(rgyud): nyid do//rmi lam du bang bu dang /snga mo dang /shing rta la sogs pa rnams mthong ba'am/reg pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub la bar du gcod par shes par bya'o//nges par yang
245a6(rgyud): 'dod do//de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan//dge ba'i las dang dge las gzhan//de rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni//de phyir rmi lam shes nas pa//rmi la mo srung dang phag rgya ni//
245a7(rgyud): phan tshun nyid du rig pa 'dzin//bgegs rnams rtag tu gnyid log byed//rnam par gzhom bya rnams 'joms pa//yang dag gnyer gnas de yi phyir//bzlas dang sbyin
245b1(rgyud): sreg la sogs kun//sngar brjod bsrung ba sbyar bar bya//srung ba'i cho ga'i dbye ba las//de 'dis yang dag 'grub par 'dong //mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha gnod sbyin//rung grub yi dgas srin po
245b2(rgyud): dang //kun tu rgyu byed rnams 'jom snga phyir//rang gi gnas dang sems kun g.yo//de phyir phrogs ma nas bya ba//bdag nyid srung dang mitshan ma ni//nye bar mtshon pa la sogs pa//skub
245b3(rgyud): pa kun gyi tshon 'gyur//mtshan ma med par gyur na ni//bgegs de las 'bras skye ba lo//khyi ni g.yon nas 'byin pa dang //be lang sbyin dang mdzes pa yi//'dab brgya can dang rda ba can///
245b4(rgyud): ri dgas ce spyang bya rog dang //khyim gyi phag pa de bzhin nyid//rtsangs pa gdugaso dang rgyal mtshan dang //ba don la sogs thams cad nas//gtso bor brjod bya dge ba'o//dge ba
245b5(rgyud): la sogs ri go pr-i yIs//mi dge pa yi mi dge la//de bzhin mchog dang mchog min dbye//shes nas dang por spyad par bya//bil ba arga'i me tag ni//mi nA nyid 'dod dang ang ma pa/
245b6(rgyud): khyad par lasa? ni de byin cig/blo ldan sngags pas las kun la//me thab rnam pa gsum bya'o//lho ru mngon par kha phyogs pAr//gyur pa'i hU~M phaT yi ge ni//swA hA'i gnasu bzhag
245b7(rgyud): par bya//yid kyis kun tu bsams nas bya//mngon spyod can bye cho ga bya//byang du mngon par phyogs gyur nas//smr-i hA'i yi ge dang ldan bzlas//yid kyis bsams nas zhi ba
246a1(rgyud): dge ba mngon par mdzes pa can//shar du kha ltas nyid kyis bya//zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can//bye brag tu ni brjod bya ste//'og tu kha ltas byas nas kyang //rgyas
246a2(rgyud): pa nyid la rab sbyar ba//mngon spyod stan la skyil krung ste//zhe dang rgyas pa can brjod pa'ang //rang gi stan la tsog pur brjod//mi dgo'i las kyi kun spyad no//skra dang sen mor
246a3(rgyud): brjod pa ni//bcing bar mi bya gang gi phyir//gal te sgrub po tshangs spyod dang //ldan gyur de tshe nyes pa med//bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs bya la//'thab mo 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro///
246a4(rgyud): yongasu dag par bya bzhin po'i//skra rnams mkhas pas tshul de nyid//spu gris skra ni breg par bya//bsag par bya ba yang ma yin//dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni//lha
246a5(rgyud): rnams mchod par yongasu bsgrags//'dod pa'ang min yang stobs bsags pa//de nyid phyir yang nyes bcas 'gyur//sen mo'ang yongasu 'chang ba dang //de bzhin so dang spu
246a6(rgyud): la sogs//dri ma nyid ni bcang mi bya//shig la sogs pa rab skyes pa//de las sro ma la sogs 'byung //khron pa de ni blta mi bya//snang byed gzas zin gnas pa na//de bzhini
246a7(rgyud): bshegs pa'i theg pa ni//dngos grub 'dod pas nyams mi bya//lha rnams mchod pa'i du su yang //zas mngon ma byur lha rnams la//shes rab can gyis mchod mi bya//
246b1(rgyud): gal te gzhan du bla mar bka'//dam tshig las ni bzlas par 'gyur//sngon dus chos rnams thams cad ni//rtun pa sogs kyis mchod par 'gyur//rig pas gzugs ni skyes
246b2(rgyud): nas ni//bskyed pa nyid dang bsngags par bya//de nas cig tu bsams dmigs bya//brjod pa'i rim pas rang nyid kyis//tshig 'di kha nas smra bar bya//sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems
246b3(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chi ldan srid pa yi//rgya mtsho 'di la dgongasu gsol//zhes pa nyid ni slar brjod nas//rmi lam rtag tu nyi ma yi//tho rangs la yang rab bsngags 'gyur//mar gyi sbyin
246b4(rgyud): sreg sogs sbrang rtsi//don med mngon par bzlas byed pa//sbyin sreg mngon par mdzes pa ni//bgegs gzho mngon du brjod par bya//so sor dgag pa'i don gyi phyir//zhi ba'i sems
246b5(rgyud): ni bsngags pa ste//dngos grub 'dod pa'i don du bya//rgyas pa can yang bshad bya ste//de bzhin kun tu yang dag bsams//sgrub pos legs par bsgrub par bya//de nas mdzes

246b7(rgyud): a sh+lot+ma dang ba dzA ka/rgyas pa can la skyon sreg kun//de yi yam shing bye ba ni//u du maM ba ra n+ya gro d+ha//e shwat+tha dang 'o mar bcas//gang yang zhi la grags pa nyid//las rnams
247a1(rgyud): kun la yam shing don//sgrub pa seng ldeng a raSh+Ta//nim pa dang ni tshor can bshad//de bzhin gzhan du mngon mdzes pa//yang dag sgrub byed the tshom med//
247a2(rgyud): bab bla mog sman la sogs pa//rdzas rnams sgrub pa la yang ni//ba byung lnga yi gtsang spu dang //de tshe rig pa ldan pa yis//yang na lha yi chu la ni//dri zhim dri se ge sa yang dag sbom
247a3(rgyud): u dum pa ra be sher mdab bsam//yang ni a shwat+tha las byung //me tog can gyi sngags kyi nad//bA na tAM 'am bshol ldan la//yangasu srung ba'i cho ga ni//byas nas cho ga

247a6(rgyud): kyang rtag tu myas byed 'thung ba dang /skye bo rnams phan tshun gces 'thab par byed pa rim pa gang lnga phreng ba dang /kha dog dang /gar gyi don dang /rol pa dang /dregs pa dang
