247b1(rgyud): bar bya ba yod pa bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du yang 'gron du gnyer bar bya'o//zhes brjod nas byang chub kyi sems kyis bsdu bar bya'o//rtag tu dkon mchog go ra
247b2(rgyud): bzhin gyi skyabs 'gro sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par bskyed nas bsgrub pa pos rim pa 'dis thams cad 'tshams sbyar nas bsgrub par bya'i zhes pa'o//na mo rat+na twA yA ya/na mo a
247b3(rgyud): ma tA b+hA yau/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/samyakr-i bu d+hA yaM/nA ma Ir+yA a ba lo ke te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mohA satwA ya/su b+ha gi tA re/dan+te tu tA re/i baM bar+t+ta ke swA hA/
247b4(rgyud): 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skal pa dang btsas baM zhes bya ba'i rig pat+te rtag tu bzlas pas beskal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur//na maM rat+na tra yA ya/na mo A mi tA b+hA ya
247b5(rgyud): dzA ga d+hA ya/ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mar+d+ha satwA ya/su ga ta d+harme tA re/da rI d+harma tut+tA re/a be bar+t+ti kad+harmak+ShAn+ti/kad+hArmA tu
247b6(rgyud): re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyir mi ldog pa tsan gyi rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas gos kyi rnyed pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/na
247b7(rgyud): ma a me twe b+hA ya ta thA ga tA yaM/ar+ha te sa n+yak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ur+ya e ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi sat+kA ya/mahA satwA ya/su kha d+harma nir+ya ta/tA re/dAn+ta d+harmi nir+ye ti/dAn+ta
248a1(rgyud): d+harma nir+ya te tut+tA re/a bo baN+Di ka/d+harmA nir+ya to tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma nor thams cad bde blag tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu
248a2(rgyud): bzlas pas bdug pa thams cad rengs par byed pa'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/te thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha yo/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/
248a3(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/bud+d+he ta re/a baM brti ka d+harme tut+tA re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas
248a4(rgyud): khyim 'byor par 'gyu ro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na maM a mi tA b+hA ya/taM thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sam+ba kr-i bu d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya oM ba la ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA/
248a5(rgyud): yau/bu r+d+he tA re su ge d+harma tA re/dAn+te d+harma niR+YA ti tut+tA re/a bai birti ka d+harme tut+tA re swA hA/'di ni 'o phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyis dul ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu
248a6(rgyud): bzlas pas 'bras bu 'phel bar 'byung bar 'gyu ro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mau a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyaMk+saM bud+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
248a7(rgyud): ba d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/bud+he tA ra//ni dAn+te d+harma nirA ti tut+tA re/a be brti ka d+harma nair+yA ti tu re swAhA//'di ni 'phagaso mi sgrol ma sangs rgyas ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig
248b1(rgyud): sta rtag tu bzlas pas rab tu mi gnas pa'i bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyu ro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+tha t+ye samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma a ba la ka ta shwa rA
248b2(rgyud): ba~M d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/bur+d+ha tA re/bud+d+ha d+harme te tA re/bud+d+ha d+harma nar+yA tA tA re swA hA/'di ni 'phags mi sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi blo gros mo zhes bya ba'i reg pa ste rtag tu bzla
248b3(rgyud): bas thabs mkhas pa rnams la blo skye bar byed//na mo rat+na tr-i mA ya/ni mo a mai tA b+hA ya/ta thA gra tA ya/ar+ha t+yai samyak+saM bud+d+hA yo/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ke ta shI rA yaM/
248b4(rgyud): satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/su kha de ba~M t+tA re/su kha d+harme tut+tA re suM kha d+harma nair+yA te tu ra~M swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo bde ba dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/bzlas pas
248b5(rgyud): nas 'phel ba skye bar byed//na mo rat+na traM yA ya/nA mo a mai tA b+hA ya/ta thA gi tA ya/ir+tha tAM samyak+saM bud+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yaM/ma hA satwA ya/
248b6(rgyud): man tA re dAn+ta d+harma nir+yA ti/tA ri tu ri swA hA/'di ni 'phags me sgrol ma ma dul ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed//na mo rat+na tra yA
248b7(rgyud): ya/na mo oM mi tA d+hA ya/taM thA ga tA yaM/ar+ha te/samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a bi lo ki te shwa r-I ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a nan+ta tA re/de byaM tut+tA re ai nu
249a1(rgyud): /dun 'a'arnam marnamam ma mas nas na /ga 'ananams ras rgyu rgyud//dadra
249a2(rgyud): /dzin da na mngon nas Sh+T+r-i Sh+T+r-i tu ma pa ma byed // rna
249a3(rgyud): sa d+g+ha A/nAm n+ta A pa sa kit+te shUng+ga/r+b+husarbA so+o/mr-iT+Tasa~Mr+b+bayU/An+dan+nan+na Sh+T+r-i r+m+mA n+naSh+TA
249b1(rgyud): yas par 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na trA yA yA/na mo a me tA b+hA yA/tA thA ga tA ya/an+ta te/sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+ha yA/na ma Ur+ya a ba po ki twe shAR+ShA ya/baud+hi sad+d+ha yA/man+t+ra sar+b+bA gsu/
249b2(rgyud): tA re/sid+d+ha d+harme tut+tA re/sid+d+ha d+harma ni rA te tu re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo grub po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar byed/
249b3(rgyud): nr-i mo rat+na tr-i yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hU yaM/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te sam+bak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki t+to sh+tsa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/sad+d+hi tA re oM nan+muSh+Ta
249b4(rgyud): re/di byaM t+yet+tA re a nut+pan+ti ke shu tu re sUt+ma///'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pa thabs la mkhas pa'i dul bas
249b5(rgyud): sems can mtha' yas pA 'dul bar byed//nA mo rat+na tru yA ya/na mo A mri tAM b+ha ya/ta thA ga tA ya/oMr+d+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha yaM/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/dzo d+ha
249b6(rgyud): satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/sid+d+hi sid+d+he tA rau/a nan+taM tA ro daM bye tut+tA re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtagA tu bzlas pas lha'i 'gro ba thong
249b7(rgyud): par byed//na mau rat+ne tra yA yaM/na mi a mi tA b+hU ya/ta thA gai tA ye/ar+ha te/sa mak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ye/sid+d+he
250a1(rgyud): tUr anan+ta ro anan+ta r+d+harmAT+TAt+tA8/doSh+TAd+hamak+Shat+tAr/do b+h+yaHmaHt+ta/Ana?HnA~MSh+Tha/Do s+yAt+ma/don 'phags maN+Dal ma grub par mas /
250a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas dmyal bar mi ltung bar 'gyur//na me rat+na t+yA yA ya/nA ma a mid+b+hadz+nyAya~M ta thA ga tA swa/an+ta taM samak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+yA
250a3(rgyud): a bo lo ki twe shA R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/man+ta satwA ya/sid+d+he tA raM/A nan+ta d+harma nair+yA tAM t+tA ra di byA d+harma ni rA sin+d+hi am+b+han+ta ka d+harmA nir+yA twe tu ro swA hA//'od ni 'phags ma sgrol
250a4(rgyud): ma grub pa skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung //na mo rit+na traM yA yaM/na mo a mi tA b+hA yai/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te
250a5(rgyud): samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na mo Ar+yaM a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yai/ma hA satwA ya/di bya tA re di byA d+harme tu ra~M/nir+yA d+harma nar+yA te tu ra swA hA/reg pa 'di rtag tu bzlas pas
250a6(rgyud): sems can rnams lha nyid du 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na twe yA ya/na mo oM mi tA b+hU ya/tA thA gra tA ye/oMr+d+ha twe samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ni ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/bi d+hi satwa/
250a7(rgyud): ya/ma hA satwA ya/sid+d+hi tI ri/a nan+ta d+harma ti rai/a nan+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu ra~M swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo grub pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas
250b1(rgyud): d+ha dau//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a ma tA b+hA yo/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha tAM sa myakl-i bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+ha ya/ma hA satwA yA/sid+d+hi tA re/di bya d+har+b+be tA ro di d+ya
250b2(rgyud): d+hArmaM nir+yA te tu ri swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i rigo pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas glang po tsho rnye dau//na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na mo aM mi tA b+h+r-i ye/ta thA ga tA ya/arba/
250b3(rgyud): taM samyAkl-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ma hA satwA ya/sad+d+he tA re/a pai bArti ka d+harme nir+yA te tu re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa myur ma zhes
250b4(rgyud): bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas ba lang yang dag par 'byor par 'gyuraro//na mo ratAM tra yA ya/na mau a mi tA b+hU yaM/ta thI ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myakr-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a
250b5(rgyud): br-i lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a nut+sAn+ti ka d+harme tut+tA ra/a nut+tin+ti ka d+harma nir+yA te tut+ta re tu raM swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo skye ba med pa tsan zhes bya ba'i//
250b6(rgyud): rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas gos 'byor bar 'gyu ro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ti thA ga tA ya/ar+ha taM sa myakr-i bud+d+ha ya/na me Ar+ya a ba lo kI te shwa rA ya/
250b7(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a dra yo tA re/a dra ye/d+harme tuSh+NI re/a dra ya d+harme nir+yA te tut+tA re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo gnyi su med ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtagatu
251a1(rgyud): bzlas pas rgyal po dang blon po gnyisu med par 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo a mi tA b+hU yA/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myakl-i bu d+ha ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba
251a2(rgyud): lo ke twe shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a dA yai tA re/mai tri tut+tA re shu ri ga me tu t+tA re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyisu med par byams ma zhes bya
251a3(rgyud): ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyuraro//ne mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ta thA gau tA ya/ar+ha te saur+ya/
251a4(rgyud): bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mau hA satwA ya/a dA ya d+harma nir+yA ta/tA re mai tri/d+harma nir+yA te tu re swAh+ma//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyi su
251a5(rgyud): med pa'i dpa' mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas spro ba dang ldan zhing dpa' bar 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yA yi/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+ha ti
251a6(rgyud): sam+bakraM bud+d+ha yA/na mau Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/be d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a dra ya d+har+m+ma tu ro mi tri d+harma tut+tA re/shu raM gra ma ya d+ha me tu re swA hA//'di ni 'dag
251a7(rgyud): ma sgrol ma gnyisu med ma'i chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te
251b1(rgyud): samakr-i bur+N+Na ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba l-i ka to shwa rA ya/br-i d+ha satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/k+ShAn+te tA re a d+hA ye tA rau/mai tre tut+tA ro/shU ro ga me tut+tA ro swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma
251b2(rgyud): bzod ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas zhi ba'i sems nyid//na mo rat+na tr-i yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+ha ye/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma AR+ya a ba
251b3(rgyud): lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/k+ShAn+te tA re shu raM ga ma/d+harma nir+yA tAM tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i dpa' mo zhes bya ba ste/rtag tu bzlas na mi
251b4(rgyud): thub par 'gyur//na mo rat+na tra yU ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/arti twe sam+bakr-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwa yau/ma hA satwA ya/k+Shen+te tA re/
251b5(rgyud): mi tri d+harma niR+YA N+ye tu raM swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas dran par 'gyur ro//na ma~M rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/tAM thA //
251b6(rgyud): tA ya/ar+d+ha tAM sa myakr-i bud+hA ya/na ma Ar+yA a pa lo ki te shwA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sar+b+bA yaM/k+Shen+te tA re/a dA ya d+harma tut+tA raM/a drA ya d+harma nir+yA te//tu re swa hAM/'di ni
251b7(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol mo bzod pa dang gnyi su med ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i mdun du 'don du 'gyur ro//na maM rat+na tra yA yaM/na mo smi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga
252a1(rgyud): Sh+ThA.a/an+tat+tasam+b+haH/bud+d+ha ya/nAmA Ar+yA A byA'o/ shwan+d+ha ya/bad+hAsad+g+ha ya/mAd+husatwA ya/k+ShAn+mAt+tA rA yat+ma yAHrmAH/maHd+ha tu n+d+har/
252a2(rgyud): ga ma d+han tu re swAn/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mi bzod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i gnong chen du 'gyur//na mo rut+pA dzA yA ya/na ma~M a~M mi dz+nyAH
252a3(rgyud): ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo kI te shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwe ya/ma hA satwA ya/k+Shan+te tA raM/oM dA ya tA re mai tri tut+tA raM/shu raM ga me tut+taM
252a4(rgyud): swAhA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i pho brang du smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro//na mai rAt+na traM yA ya/nam
252a5(rgyud): a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA yaM/Ar+d+ha te sam+bak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na mo Ar+yA a ba lo ka tai shwA rA ya/bau d+hi satwA ya/mar+d+ha satwA ya/k+Shen+te tA raM/k+ShAn+ne tA rI/k+Shan+ti d+harmA tut+tA re/d+hAn+tu
252a6(rgyud): d+harmA ni d+hi ti tu de swA hA//'di ni 'phags me sgrol ma bzod pa dos par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas ni thams cad 'dzin par byed//na ma
252a7(rgyud): tra yA yai/na mo oM mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/samya k+She bud+d+hA ya/na ma ar+ya a ba lo ki to shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/oM dra ya tA ra/
252b1(rgyud): dr-i ya d+harmA tut+tA ro/a dra ya d+harma nir+yA ti tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyi su med pas phongs pa las sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad
252b2(rgyud): drang gnyi su med par 'gyur//na mr-i rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha twe sa myakraM bud+d+ha ya/na mau Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sarbA ya/
252b3(rgyud): mai tri tA re/d+harme tu d+hA re/mai tri d+harma nir+ya te tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma byams ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cang la byams pa'i
252b4(rgyud): bdag nyid can du 'gyu ri//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mri tA b+hA ya/ta thA ge trA ya/ar+d+ha te/sa myakr-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a be lo kri te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mA hA sat+kA la/
252b5(rgyud): shu raM ga maM tA re/shU raM ge me d+harme tuSh+NI re/shu rAM ga ma d+harma nir+yA tai tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dpa' bar 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas chu'i mtha' ltar
252b6(rgyud): bdaM bar d+hA daM//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA yai/ar+ha taM sa myakr-i bud+d+ha yaM/na ma Ar+ya a bo lo ta shwa r-I ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/mA hA sat+kA ya/shI ra Ne tA re/
252b7(rgyud): bo d+hi tut+tA ro/pU ra se tu ri swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs 'os ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad kyi skyabs kyi 'osu yang dag /
253a1(rgyud): 1'gyur//na mo rat+tA NA m+b+ha ya/na mA ya mi d+b+har+thA ya/tAthA ga tAya/An+ta ta sam+b+ha bud+d+hA ya/na maM yUr+yA ya da shwAr+yA yA/bo d+hi satwA ya/mad+h+ya sad+d+ha ya/
253a2(rgyud): ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/sha ra Ne d+harme d+hA ra~M bod+hi d+harme tut+tA re pU rA sha/d+harma tA re swA hA/'di ni 'phag so ma sgral ma skyabs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas
253a3(rgyud): chos thams cad khong du chud bar 'gyuraro//nu mo rat+ne tra yI ye na mo a mr-i t+sA d+hA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha two sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma~M Ar+ya a bkro kr-i t+ta shwa rA ya/
253a4(rgyud): satwA ya/ma hAsatwA ye/sha re Ne tI ri tut+tA ri swAhU~M//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mi skyabs kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas so so'i skye bor yang dani
253a5(rgyud): par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad ba ling du mi 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yU yA/na mo A mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/sA myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/nA mo Ar+ya a ba lo /
253a6(rgyud): te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/sha ra NAM d+harme ner+yA te tA ri/bo d+hi nIr+yA te tut+tA re/pU raM sha d+har+m+ma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs myur
253a7(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas thams cad du legs par 'ong bar brjod pa so sor rnyed//na mau rat+na tr-i yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ta thA gau tA
253b1(rgyud): aHtaM/sa myakr-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma yUr+ya a ba la ka rta shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA matwA ya/a mi te tA re/sau mye tA ra/a sa skA ta d+harme tA re swAhA/'di ni 'phags ma k+kol ma
253b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi rab tu spyan dar 'gyuraro//n+ya mo rat+na trA yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/a d+ha
253b3(rgyud): te samyakraM dud+d+ha yo/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka te shwa ra ya/bo d+hi satwA yA/ma hA sa nA yaM/a mo to d+harma nir+yA tai dA re sau me/d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/a sa skr-i ta d+harma tu re swAt+tha/'di ni
253b4(rgyud): 'angagos ma sgrol ma bdud rtsi'i chos nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas bdud rtsi dang ldan par 'gyur ti bde bi tho be//na mr-i rat+na tra yA ya/ne maM a mi tA/
253b5(rgyud): b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha twe sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+yaM a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+ha yaM/ma hA satwA ya/a mr-i tA d+harma nir+yA te tA raM saM maM d+hirma nar+yA te tut+tA ra/a saM
253b6(rgyud): skr-i d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/'di ni 'phags mi sgrol ma bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod chags nye bar zhi bar byed//nA mo rat+na twaM yA ya/na mr-i a mi tA b+h+ya
253b7(rgyud): ye/ta thA gi tA ya/er+tha te sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sanA ya/ma hA satwA ya/dr-i d+hi tA re/shA ra No tI re/bo d+he Shud+hi re/su rA sa tu re swAhA/
254a1(rgyud): 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas nad med cing lus brtan par 'gyur//nA mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA mau a mo tA/
254a2(rgyud): b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ye/nA ma ArA a bA lau ki te shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ma hA satwA ya/dr-i D+ha tA re/shwa ra Ni d+harma nir+yA te tA re/bo d+hi d+harma nI te tut+tA re/
254a3(rgyud): bo d+hi d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/pu rA sa d+harma naiR+YA te tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags me sgrol ma brtan par 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas tsher 'gyur te mchod rten/
254a4(rgyud): gyi las la sogs pas tshe 'di 'o//na mau r-it+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ir+d+ha te/sa makraM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya e ba lo kI te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA
254a5(rgyud): ya/mahA satwA ya/dri D+ho tA re/bo d+hi d+harma tut+ti re pro d+hi shwa ra Ne d+harma nirA taM/pU rA so d+har+m+ma tu ri swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa'i chos shes bya ba'i rig pa ste/
254a6(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas pas bcos ma dang btsos ma ma yin pa'i dug thams cad sil bar byed//na maM rat+na tra yA ya/na mo e mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/sam+b+ha
254a7(rgyud): bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba laM ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwAM ya/ma hA satwA ya/dr-i nr-i tA re/dr-ir+d+ha d+hirbi tut+tA re/dr-i D+ha d+harma ni rA tI tI re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sprul mas/
254b1(rgyud): dang ldan ma zhes bya bar rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas 'jigs pa chen pa rnams sal ba byed do//na maR+thaNA tra yA ya/na ma a mad+ha Sh+TA yA/tanA ga tA ya/An+ta ti sa ma s+yad+g+ha ya/narma
254b2(rgyud): Ar+ya e ba lo ki two shwa rA ya/bi d+hi satwA ya/mi hA sAtwA ya/d+harme t+tA re/A mr-itwA d+harma r+yA te t+tA raM/saumr-i d+himan+diR+sha ti tu re swAhA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo bdud rtsi legs par
254b3(rgyud): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa skye rtag tu bzlas pas 'chi ba rnams rmel bar byed//nr-i mo rat+no tA y+YA yA/na ma a mi tI b+hA ya/t+ye thA ga d+hA ya/Ar+thA te/sa mAk+saM bud+d+hA ya~M/na ma Ar+ya a
254b4(rgyud): dr-i po ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya~M/s+yAhA satwA ya/sau mye tA re sau mye d+harme d+hot+tar sau mye swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba nyid kyi bdud d+hi zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas
254b5(rgyud): mdze thams cad sel bar byeng //na mo rat+ne d+hA y+YA ya/no me A mi d+hA b+hA yaM/tan+do ga d+hA yaM/an+ta te sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+hA ya/nA ma Ar+yA A ba la~M ki tau shwa rA ya/bod+ha sa~Md+d+ha yaM/men+da
254b6(rgyud): satwA ya/d+harme d+hA ra/a mr-i ti d+harme d+ha re/sa mr-i twAt+tA re/saskr-i ti tud+d+hi ri satwA//'di ni 'phag sa ma sgrol mchos shes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas sor ma'i nad thams
254b7(rgyud): cad 'joms par byed//na mo rod+na tri yA ya/ni ma a mi tAdz+nyA ya/ti thA ga tA ya/ir+ha te sam+b+ha k+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bad+hi satwA ya/ma hA sa twA ya/
255a1(rgyud): d+harmaM tA re/d+harma d+harma tut+tA re/d+har+m+ma nir+yA te tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas
255a2(rgyud): gser gyi rnyed pa 'byung //na mo rAt+na tra yA ya/nr-i mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA yA/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/
255a3(rgyud): d+harma tA re/a mr-i tA d+harme tA re sau mye d+harme b+hU tai tA re/a saM skr-i taM d+harme tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'dus byas pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas dngul
255a4(rgyud): g+h+ri rnyed pa 'byung //na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/a
255a5(rgyud): mr-i t+yA tA re/a mr-i te d+harmaM tut+tA re/tu rI a mri ta d+harma nair+yA te tu ro swAhA/'di ni 'phags mo sgrol ma bdud rtsi thams cad kyi chos shes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas dbyig
255a6(rgyud): 'byung //na mo rat+na tra yU ya~M/ni mo a mai tar+dz+dza ya~M/ta thA gr-itA ya~M/an+ta te/sam+bak+saM bud+d+hA ya/nu ma A~Mr+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sar+b+ba ya/ma hA satwA yaM/d+harme d+hA raM/
255a7(rgyud): a mr-i tA d+harme tA raM/a mr-i tA d+hA tu tA re/a mri ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas rgyu ba thams cad/
255b1(rgyud): gyu//namo \u0f7f /na mo na k+Sha d+d+ha/sa /na mam+b+ha A r+m+ma d+ha/ d+d+ha san+ta
255b2(rgyud): Ne tA re/saMd+d+hi tIt+tA re tut+tA r+ye/a sa~M skr-i ta d+harma nir+yA N+Di ts+tsha re swAhA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol me 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas mkha 'gro mas zin pa rnam
255b3(rgyud): la bltas byas grol bar byed//nu mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo oM mai d+hA b+hA ya/tA thA gu d+hA ye/an+tatrA~M samyaSh+kaM bur+d+ha yo/na ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki t+te sh+tsa rA yA/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA sar+b+ba
255b4(rgyud): d+harmA tI re so m+b+ha d+hArme/ts+tshi nir+yA te t+tA re swA//'di ni 'phags ma skyil ma zhi ba'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa sti rtag tu bzlas pas sul po'i gdon gyis zin pa thams ca
255b5(rgyud): bltas pas grol bar b+h+ri//ni mo rat+na dz+nyA yA/na mo a ma~Mmr-i trU b+hU ya/ta thA gAd+hA ya/an+ta trA sam+b+hak+Sha bad+d+ha stAM/nai mA Ar+yA a ba lo/te shU rA y+ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/
255b6(rgyud): sarbA saM/d+harma d+hA /oM si~Mk+Sh+ma ta~MHrmetud+hIri a sa~Mn d+heHrmA ni swA/ga tu bzlas dus smin pacho gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bltas pas grol ba byed//
255b7(rgyud): tri sA ya/na me A ma~M ta d+hA ya/taM thAg tA ya/oMr+ha te sa m+me bud+d+hA ya~M/na ma A~Mr+ya e ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/mahA satwA ya/a ra Na d+harmA na
256a1(rgyud): d+hAr+m+ma tut+tA re/a daR+shan d+harma niR+YA twe swA hA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'bab pa med pa'i chos shes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas brtan pa dang /
256a2(rgyud): ga ye ba la sogs pa'i dug thams cad sel bar byed//na mo rat+na tra yA yA/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/aur+ha twe sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na mi Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA/
256a3(rgyud): rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/A ru Ne tA rau bi d+yA tut+tA re/A di daR+sha ni tu raM swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skya rengs dang po mthong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag
256a4(rgyud): bzlas pas yul gru sbyin par byaMdo//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma a mai tA b+hA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha yA/nr-i ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA yau/bo d+hi satwA ya/
256a5(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/a ro Na d+harme tI raM bid+yA d+harma tud+d+hi re/a nI daR+sha narme tu re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa s+thA rtag tu bzlas pas lo thams cad yang dag
256a6(rgyud): par 'byor par 'gyur//na me rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a ma tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ye/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/
256a7(rgyud): trai bi d+yo tA re a ra NaM tA re/bid+hA t+yait+tA re/a ni da R+sha na tu re swA hI//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum gyi chos zhes bya ba ste rtag tu bzlas pas mtha' mthong ba
256b1(rgyud): //zlum \u0f7f /rnam Ama?d+hAd+hahA/hAk+ka r+dz+dza ga \u0f7f/ b+h+yag+sa//na ma m+b+ha d+h+ya ya d+ha la~MkaN+Ta shrA/d+d+ha/ma d+hA d+hU d+d+hu /A
256b2(rgyud): d+harmAd+hA re bid+d+ha d+harme d+hA re bid+yA d+harma d+haN+Dar br-id+d+he d+hirmAnad+hA te tI re san//'di ni 'phag snyom sgrol mi rig pa gsum pa zhes pa ba'i rig pa skye rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i bu'i mdo ni nA do
256b3(rgyud): 'gyur//nan+to/rat+na trI yA yaM/na mau a mi tI b+hU ye/tI thA ga tA ya/Ar+that+te/sam+b+hakr-i bud+d+ha yA/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka trI sh+tsa rA ya/bo d+hA saMd+d+ha yaM/ma hA saut+kA ya/tr-i bong+ga d+ha rai/khaih+ye
256b4(rgyud): a ra Na d+har+m+ma tA re/bid+yA d+harma tut+tA re/a ni daiR+Yan d+harme tu rI swAhA//'di ni 'phags mo sgrol ma nyon mongs pa med pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya ba ste rtag tu bzlas pas/bud meng zod
256b5(rgyud): rgyu gnang chen du 'gyur//na maM rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tAM b+hA ya/ta nA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te samyakr-i bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ad+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi satwA ya/maH satwA ya/
256b6(rgyud): bid+yA tA ra/a naM dar+Ya ni/d+harma tud+d+hi re/A ni daR+sha na d+harme nir+yA twe tu rI swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sbrel ma rig pa gsum bstan du med pa zhes bya ba'i reg pa ste/rtag tu bzlas bas
256b7(rgyud): gzhi thams cad dbang du 'gyur//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tI b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/sar+yak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na mai Ar+ya a bo la ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/mar+tha
257a1(rgyud): /satwA ya/did+yet+tA ra/a ra Na d+harma nirA tA t+tA ra/bad+yA d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/a ni daR+shan d+har+m+ma nar+yA ta tA re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rab bya
257a2(rgyud): gsum gyi chos shes bya ba'i rig pa'o//na mo rat+na tra yU ya/ne mo A ma~M tA b+hA ya/tithA gra tA ya/ar+d+ha te/sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/nam+ba Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hA
257a3(rgyud): sat+kA ya/mat+ma satwA yau/tr-i pi d+ye tA re/bi d+yA tA re/bit+sA d+harme tut+kA re/bi d+ye d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag
257a4(rgyud): /tu bzlas pas grong steng sdom pa rnyed do//na mo ra t+ne tra yA yau/na me a mi tA b+hU ya/ta thA ga tAM ya/ar+ha te/samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma AR+ya a ba lau ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi
257a5(rgyud): satwA ye/ma hA satwA ya/traM bid+ya tA raM/a ra Ne d+har+m+ma tut+tA re/a ra Na d+harma nir+yA tai tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gsum ri ga ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas
257a6(rgyud): pas rgyal po'i pho breng nA yod pa thams cad gnang chen por 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mr-i tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/samr-ik+saM bud+d+ha ya/na mo Ar+ya a ba
257a7(rgyud): lo kau te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ar+ha Ne tA raM/a ra Na d+harmaM tut+tA re/a ra Na d+harbe nir+ye te tu ra swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'thab pa med pa zhes bya/
257b1(rgyud): rig pa sta rtag tu bzlas pas smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur//na ma rat+na dza mU ya/na mo a mr-i tA b+hU ya/ta thA gA d+hA ya/an+taH/samyakr-i bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo/to shwa rAm//
257b2(rgyud): d+hi sar+b+bA ya/mahA satwA yA/bid+he d+hi re/bid+yA d+h+warmA nIR+YA tet+tA ra~M swA hA//'od ni 'phags ma sgrol mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la rig pa slar yang
257b3(rgyud): 'byung ba 'gyung //m-i dz+nyAm+b+hi ya na mi ahUM ga d+hA ya~M/ar+d+hat+te/saMs+yAd+d+he shud+d+ho ya~M/nam Ab+h+yAM.a pali~M shwA rA ya/dz+nyA satwA ya/man+t+rasad+hA ya/ye
257b4(rgyud): rI/d+harme tut+tA /a ma tA r+b+hu tu re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma nges par shes pa zhes bya ba'i reg pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas yul gyi bdag por 'gyur//na mo tItA yAM yA/na mo
257b5(rgyud): maid+b+ha Sh+TA ya/tathA ga d+hA ye/its+tsha tAM/sa mAk+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ka te shwA d+hA yau/bod+d+ha satwA ya~M/man+t+ra sak+Sh+ma ya/A r-i No t+tA raM/d+han ni re Ne t+tA re ni Ni Ne ti mai t+ta re tu re sAmra/
257b6(rgyud): doni 'phags me la ma bu lon med pa zhes kyi ba'i rig pa ste/rtog tu bzlas pas dbang du ldang //nA ma rat+na tra yA ye/a mo A ma~M trA thA ya~M/tAthA gr-I tA ya/oMn ti/sam+b+hat+ka
257b7(rgyud): ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ni rin d+ham hA ra~M/shAn+ta d+harmi tud+hA ri a me tAr+dz+dza d+harme tu re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bul ni
258a1(rgyud): za smra nas bya ba'i rig pam+b+ha/d+hAr+m+ma d+hA s+yA ngas hU~M rnamapa bad du byed phyur 'gyur//de rnams sku'i spyan rab t+na b+hinId+d+he d+harnams sa pa mA m+b+ha nga 'tsho bar
258a2(rgyud): byed de//de bzhin du thams cad du//na mo rat+na t+nam+b+ha ya~M/na mo A mo twAr+dz+dza ya/ta thA ga tA y+Ya/oMn te/som+b+hak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma m+b+ha sa pa lok+ki t+yai shU rU ya/b+hod+d+hi satwA sa
258a3(rgyud): mAhA satwA ya/ni ra ri Na d+har+m+ma nIr+yA t+yAt+tA re/a mi tA b+hA d+harma nir+yA te tu rI swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mo bu y-i na med pa'i 'od dpag med kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i sku
258a4(rgyud): ga tu bzlas pas tshangs po'i srin che'i bo dang bcas pa rnams dbang du byed de//nA m+bo rat+na tA yU ya/na mo a mr-i trA b+hA ya/ta thA ga d+hA ya/ar+ha t+te/samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/nama? Ar+yam pa
258a5(rgyud): ti shre rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/s+yAh+ma satwA ya/satwe tu ri nir Na/nair Na/ni Na d+hu ts+tshi tI t+tA rad+d+har+m+ma d+harmA/nair+m+me tut+tA/a ma~M trAb+hUd+hArmAn d+hi s+t+wa~M hA/'don 'dags
258a6(rgyud): k+kol ma skyid stobs sa b+hA ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas snu zhan rnams dado dag sa byaim+ba d+h+r-ing+ka NA~Ms rna ma hU~M rjes rnams thams cing dbye byasmra par 'gyur/
258a7(rgyud): rjen yi/rnams ma trA d+hA /tar+b+hu g+h+ra pA~M na/ myog hU~M yi/rnam yi rgyam po'i kau ti shwar /bai d+he pa~M Sh+NI /me n+ta sa t+pa yai/sadrwang+ga
258b1(rgyud): A m+b+ha me+e s+yAb+h+ya// / sa sa m+b+ha sa ky-i /mau sar+b+ba blo ts+tsha/rmAt+yA sa pa nga ba sa da du d+hA /rnam turmA/
258b2(rgyud): ra hrIH//'di ni 'brug po mi sgril ma sbyi'i stong sa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ri pam+b+ha/ga tu bzlas ga pa thams cad dbang du byed cing mi snang bar yoda'i 'gyur ro//rnam
258b3(rgyud): rAt+nA trayA ya/na mo a mi tA nA yaM/ta thA g+hA tAM y+ya/an+ta t+te/sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+ha maM/nau ma Un+yA yA bA lo krI tai shwa ra ya/bod+h+r-i sar+b+bA yA/ma hA s+yAt+kA ya/d+harmAt+ta r+ye/d+hamaiSh+TaSh+Ta
258b4(rgyud): d+harma d+harma nir+yA te tu ri swA hA/'di ni 'phabs ma sgrol mchis kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas lha dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du byed//na ma
259a1(rgyud): /rat+na tra yU ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+ha taM/sa myakl-i bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ad+ya a ba lo ki tAM shA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/d+harma
259a2(rgyud): tA re/d+harme d+harme tut+tA re swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi rig pa can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas klu'i bu mo thams cad dbang du byed//na mo rat+na tra yA
259a3(rgyud): na mo a mi tA b+hA yai/taM thA ga tA yu/ar+N+Na te/saMm+b+hak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/many+dzu satwA ya/d+harme tA re/d+har+m+ma d+harmaM tut+tA re swA hI/'di/
259a4(rgyud): ni 'phags me sgrol ma brtag pa'i chos shes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas na khyim chen po'i bdag por 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tri yA ya/nA mo a mi tA b+ha ya/tA thA ga tA ya/
259a5(rgyud): ar+d+ha te/sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kI te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yaM/ma hA satwA ya/d+harme tA re/d+harmaM nI ri Ne/d+harma ni ri na/d+harma ner+yA te tu ra swAhA/'di ni 'phaT
259a6(rgyud): ma sgrol ma 'od dpag med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed//nA mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo oM mi tA b+ha ya/ta thA ga tA yA/
259a7(rgyud): ad+hi te/sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/d+harme tA re/d+harma d+harma nair+ya te tu re swAhA//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mchos rgya
259b1(rgyud): soms ma nos bya ba'i rig pa m+b+ha/rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams kyi sam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur//na mon+tar+d+ha dz+wa mA ya/na ma ya mot+ta b+hA ya/taSh+Tha bA trA s+ya/an+tan+ta satwA tA/
259b2(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ir+ya a ba ma t+ta shwa R+Sha yA/tho d+hi satwA ya/maHsA nA ya/a mo g+he tA re sau/g+he tut+tAra~M/su kha ba tI trai rI swAhA/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gdan mi za bA nas
259b3(rgyud): rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas stobs dang gzi brjid rnams gdon mi za byar 'byung bar 'gyur//na ma~M rAt+na trai yA ya/na mo A mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga d+hA ya/Ar+tha taM sam+b+hakr-i dud+d+ha yo/
259b4(rgyud): na ma stu r-I oM ba wikA ti shA rA ya~M/d+h+waM sad+hA ya/mad+h+ya satwA ya/a m+bog+hAd+hAmr-i nir+yA te t+tA ro/sak+Sh+maHma nor+Ya smra kha bat+ti d+harma naiR+YA te tu r+yA swA hA//'di ni 'phags ma sbrel ma
259b5(rgyud): 'chi ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas lha ma yin gyi gan sa rab tu 'jug pa rnyed //ne mo rit+na d+ha yA ya~M/ni mi oM mi tAM thA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+g+haM ta sa ma
259b6(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a bo lo kr-i te shwa rA ya/dz+nyA sad+g+ha ya/many+dzu sar+b+bA ya/a mo g+ha~M t+tAr+ye/a mr-im+b+ha d+har+m+ma tAt+tA re oM mr-ib+hU d+han+tu/nir+yA te tA ra swA nA~M//'di ni 'phags ma s+t+rai ma
259b7(rgyud): 'tsho ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig po ste rtag tu bzlas pas rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur ro//na mo rat+na te ya~M ya/na mo ya~M mai tAdz+nyA ya/ta nAM ge tA ya/aH te/samr-i tra

261a7(rgyud): tu bzlas pas sdig pa byed pa yang sum cu rtse gsum pa'i lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur//na mo ret+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta bA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/samyak+Sha
261b1(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya/na mra Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sarbA ya/a bu lo ki te tA re/I sho tut+tA re/a na bi na tu re swAt+ma/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan ras gzi/

261b3(rgyud): mi tA b+hU ya/tA thA ga d+hA ya/ar+d+he te sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+hA ye/no ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shU rA ya/br-i d+hi satwA ya/mahA s+yAd+g+ha ye/a ba lo ki to d+harma nair+yA twe tud+d+hi re/I sha d+harmA nirmA

272a2(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ma hA sat+kA ya tad+ya thA/dr-i d+hi dran+ti pra b+hi dro D+haM/pr-i b+he t+yaMr+t+ta raM swA hA/'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o//ni maM rat+na tra yA ya/
272a3(rgyud): na ma Ar+ya a ba l-i ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+hi ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/shak+ti t+ti raM/shek+ti prA b+h+r-i t+tA ra tA re swAhA/'phags ma sgrol ma nus pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o//ni ma~M rat+na
272a4(rgyud): yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba la~M ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya tad+ya thA/a byA ya tA re a bya ya pra b+hai tA ra tA re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma mi zad pa'i 'ad ces bya ba
272a5(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA yau/na ma Ar+ya a be wau ki taM shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA yau/tad+ya thA/ni rany+dza ni ta raM/ni rany+dza na pr-i b+haM/ni rany+dza na pra b+he tut+tA re tu re swA hA//'phags
272a6(rgyud): ma sgrol ma mig sman med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o//nA mo rat+na tA yA ya/nA ma Ar+ya a pa lo ke te shwa rI ya/bo d+ha satwA~M ye/mahA satwA ye/tad+ya Sh+T+r-I/s+yAb+hU tA ra~M/s+yAk+Sh+ma prad+d+he/
272a7(rgyud): sUk+saM pra d+he tA re tA re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma 'od phra mo zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na me Ar+ya.a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma~MhU~M satwA ya/tad+ya thA/
272b1(rgyud): a ba ya bi tA re/a ba ya ba pra b+he/tA ra tA re/tu re tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma cha shas kyi 'od ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tru yA ya/na ma Ar+ya.a ba lo ki te shU rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yA/
272b2(rgyud): maN+DasatwA ya/tad+ya thA mA na man prA b+h+yAM/tA re tA rA ya/b+hA ge be ti swA hA//'jigs ma sgrol ma lam gyi 'od ces bya ba'o//ni mi rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa R+Sha yA/
272b3(rgyud): satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya g+ha duHkho duHkha pra b+hU tA re tA ri tu re swA tI//'phags ma skyob ma sdug bsngal rab gos la zhes bya ba'i//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA
272b4(rgyud): ya/bo d+hi satwA yaM/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/d+ha n+yai d+ha n+ya pra b+he/d+hA n+ye tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma 'bru'i 'od ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA rA ya/

272b6(rgyud): ya~M bo d+hi satwA yA/ma hA satwA ya/tAt+ma T+Ta/tA re tA ri/d+harme d+harme d+harma oM ba b+hA saM tu re tu rI swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tA yA ya~M/na ma
272b7(rgyud): Abyas pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ba d+hi satwA ya~M/mai hA sa~MtwA ya~M/tod+ya thA/sa g+hA sa~M b+h+r-i tA ra~M/sa k+She oM ba b+hA saM/tu ra~M tu re swA hA//'phags mi sgrol ma dge 'dun kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba//
273a1(rgyud): na mo rat+na trayA ya/nam Ar+ya a ba la~M ki te shwaR+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sar+b+bA ya/tad+ya b+hU/bud+d+he bud+d+ha tA re/bud+d+ha te dze tu re swAhA//'phags ma sgrol ma sangs
273a2(rgyud): rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+he ye/ma hA satwA ya/tid+b+ha tAM/u pA yau/u pA ya/tA ra u pA ya ti dza tu re tu re

273a4(rgyud): dzit+te re tA re tu re mA r+tha//'phags ma sgrol me pha ro gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo rad+b+ha tra yA ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+h+wa~M satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/tid+yan+tu/
273a5(rgyud): ak+Sha ya ak+Sha ya te dze N+Da re tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma gzi brjid mi zad pa zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sat+kA ya/man+ta satwA ya
273a6(rgyud): tad+ya thA/dA ne d+hA na tA re dAn te dze Nu t+tA ra tut+tA re swAhA//'phags ma sgrol ma sbyin pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ta shwa rA ya/khrots+tsha
273a7(rgyud): satwA ya/ma hA sa d+hA ya/ted+ya thA/shwA li shI laM/d+hA ri shI la te dze tut+tA ra~M tut+tA ro tu re NA re/swAhA/'phags ma sgrol ma tshu'i khrims kyi gzi brjod ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yAM
273b1(rgyud): nam Ar+yA a ba ma ka twe shwashU rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/tAd+ya thA/k+ShAT+Te g+h+nAn+na t+tA re k+ShAn+na te dze t+ta re swAhA/'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i gzing bzad ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tram+b+ha

273b3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sad+d+ha ye/tad+ya thA/d+h+r-i ne d+h+ya na tA rau d+hA na taM dzA tu rI tu re swAhA//'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gtan gyi gzi brjid ces
273b4(rgyud): bye ba'i//nA mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sed+d+hA ya/ma hA sad+d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/pr-i dz+nyA pra dz+nye tA re pra d+h+we ti dzaM tA re tu re tA re tA re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma shes
273b5(rgyud): rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo r-it+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/mahUM satwA ya/tad+ya thAM/pra b+hi/pra b+ha te dze/tA re tA rai tu re tu re swA hA//'phags ma
273b6(rgyud): sgrol ma 'od zer gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya e ba lo ki tai sh+tsa rU ya/bo d+hi sat+kA yAM/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/ma d+h+ya ma d+h+ye tAr tu re tu rai/tA re tA re swAt+ma/
273b7(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma dbu ma'i sgrol mo zhes bya ba'o//ni mo rat+na tra yA ya/ne ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA satwA ye/tad+ya gr-I nair ma li/nir ma la/tA ra~M na ra/
274a1(rgyud): ma lA ta dza t+tA ro tu ra swAt+ma//'phags ma sgrol ma gzi brjid dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'o//na m+bo rat+na twA yA ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba la~M ka to shUR+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/
274a2(rgyud): mahA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/shud+d+he/shud+d+he tA re shud+d+ha tI dzaM tu re sU hA//'phags ma sgrol ma dag pa'i sgrol mo zhes bya ba'o//ni mau rAt+na tA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/
274a3(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/si ti sau te tA re/si tAM te dze tu re tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma dkar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na me Ar+ya

274a5(rgyud): ba'o//na mo rat+na tre y+YA ya/na ma Ir+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/bo d+hi bo d+ha tA re bo d+hI twe dze tu re tu r+ye swA hA//'phags ma sgrol me byang chub kyi
274a6(rgyud): gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tre yA ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sid+d+ha ya/mahA satwA ya/tad+ye thA/ni r-i na ro Ne/ni r-i Ni tA re/ni r-i Na twe dzo tu re swA hAM//'phraT
274a7(rgyud): masgrol me bu lon med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nu ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thASh+Ti ge be ga bi ti ta

274b4(rgyud): ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/gan+d+he gan+d+ha tA re/gAn+d+ha dzi tA dza/tA re tA re tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma dri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o//ne mo rat+na tA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

274b7(rgyud): a ba lo ke te shwa rA yaM/bo d+hi sarbA yai/ma hA sanA ya/tad+ya thA/tA ro tA ra~M d+harma me ta~M tut+tA re tA re tA ra ma ti swAhA//'phags ma sgrol mchos kyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra/
275a1(rgyud): smA ya/nA ma Am+b+has pa la ka ti shA R+sha ya/bod+d+hi s+'uSh+Tas/many+dzu s+yAr+b+bayA/tad+yak+Sh+ma/d+hA ret+tA ro saMd+d+hi s+yAm+b+had+hA ro sa thA ma tId+hAr s+yA//'phags ma sgrol mu dge 'dun/

275a3(rgyud): me zhes bya ba // mo rAt+nar+Na yI ya/nA ma AR+tha oM ba mo/shwa rA yai/bod+d+hi sar+b+bA ya/man+ta said+d+ha ya/hrI/g+hu su mai t+tA re/ku su ma d+hAne trUM pak+Sha su ma ma tI swAhA/

275a5(rgyud): tut+tA re tu re b+ha dra ba ti tA re swA hA//'phags mau sgrol ma bzang po ny+dzan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya aM ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sarbA ya/ta

275a7(rgyud): dzI ya/d+ye thA/gr-i hi tA ra~M gra ha ma ti tA ri tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA//'phags me sgrol ma khyim ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya ya ba lo ki ta~M shwa rA ya/
275b1(rgyud): ba d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/de be tA re/dwe bA ma ti tA re tu re tu re tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma lha dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA/
275b2(rgyud): ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hUM satwA ya~M tad+ya thA/ri dzuM ka rA re ri dz+ye d+harme tA re r+ya dzA ka ma ti tA ri tu re swA hA/'phags ma la me drung po dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a
275b3(rgyud): lo ki te shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/sau mye tA ri sau m+b+ha d+harme tA re tut+tA re tudz+dz+wa ra~M swAt+ma//'phags ma sgrol ma zla ba nyid dang ldan ma zhes bya ba 'i//na ma~M rat+na tra yA ya/na ma

275b6(rgyud): rat+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya e ba lo ki to shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwAM ya/ma hA swed+d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/bi pu le tA ro/bi pu laM d+harma tA re/bi pu la d+hadrA ba ti tA re swA hA//'phags mo sgrol ma yangs
275b7(rgyud): ba'i chos ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na ma Ar+yaM a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/te dze tA ra/te dzaM ba tit+tA ri tut+tA re swA hA//'phags ma skra
276a1(rgyud): sgrol ma gzu brjid ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra ya ya/na ma an+d+ha a ba lo ke te shwa rA ya kho d+hi sarbA ya/man+tasatwA ya/tad+yathA/to dzad+ha rar+N+Na
276a2(rgyud): ba tA tA re tut+tA re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma gri zi brjid ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//ne mo rat+na tA yA yo/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki ta shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/

276a4(rgyud): ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/dwe ne dA na tA ro dA na pa ti tA re tut+tA re/tut+tA re tA re swA hA/'phags mau sgrol ma sbyin pa'i bing ga po zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya
276a5(rgyud): a ba lo ki tai shwa rU ya/bi d+h+waM sat+kA ye/ma hA sat+kA ye/tAd+h+ye tha/AM pA ya/twA re/u pA yau sat+kA tA re/u bA ya tA ri tu re tu raM swA hI//'phags ma sgrol ma
276a6(rgyud): thabs dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mi rat+na tra yA yaM/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo gi te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/shI le tA raM tut+tA re tA ra swA hA//'phags ma
276a7(rgyud): sgrol ma tshul khrims dong ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya aM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/k+ShAn+ti pa ti tA ra tA re tut+tA ra
276b1(rgyud): tut+tA re/tu re tu re swAtA//'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa lda na ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bod+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/shu b+he tA re tut+tA raM tA/
276b2(rgyud): retA ri tu re shu b+ha ma ti tA re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma dge ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA yaM/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA satwA ya/taM d+ye thA/sUr+ya
276b3(rgyud): tA re sa mA na tuMt+tA re tu re tu re tA re sUr+ya ma tI tA ri swA hA//'phags ma sgrol mo nyi ma ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na ma rot+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sed+g+ha
276b4(rgyud): ya/tA d+yA bA/tsin+yA tA re tsan+na sa me tA re tA re tsats+tsha b+hi sa me tA re tA ro tu re tu raM swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma zla ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA/

276b6(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwAM ya/ma hA satwA ya/ta d+ya thAM/brah+ma tA re/brah+me sa me tA ra/brah+ma Ni sa me tA re brah+ma ma ti tu re tu re swA hA//'phags mo sgrol mtshangs ldan me zhes bya ba'o//na mo
276b7(rgyud): rat+na tra yA ya/ne ma Ar+ya a ba laM ki tai shwa ra ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA sit+kA la/tad+ya thA/in+ne tA raM in+ne sa me tA rau/in+d+ra pa ti tA re tu re tu raM swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po'i
277a1(rgyud): bdag m+bo zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+nA trA yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+tsA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yA/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/an+d+ra tA ro an+d+ra ra tIt+kA ro tA re tut+tA rA
277a2(rgyud): s+yAhA/'phags ma sgrol ma las kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ni maM Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mat+ta satwA ya/tad+ya thI/A kA she tA re A kA sha pe tai tA ra
277a3(rgyud): tur tu re swA hA 'angar ma sgrol ma kun nas gsal ba'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a be lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+h+waM sad+d+hi ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/ga ga ne tA raM
277a4(rgyud): ga ga na pi ti tA re tA re tu re s+yA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma na mkha'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tr-i yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/
277a5(rgyud): tAd+ya thA/dza yai tA re dza ya pi ti tA raM/tA re tA re tu re swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma rgyal ba'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o//na mau rat+na tra yA ya/na mA Ar+ya aM bA l-i ki ti shwa rA yaM/bo
277a6(rgyud): d+hi sar+b+bA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/sarba de ba tA/swe re tA raM a b+hi skA ra pa ti tA rau tu re tu re tA rI swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma 'od gsal gyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra/
277a7(rgyud): yA yaM/na ma Ar+ya aM ba l-i ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/pra d+ha na pr-i ti tI raM/pra d+hA naM/tA re tu re tu re pra d+hA na pa ti swA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma ga
277b1(rgyud): bzhes bya // mr-irat+na d+hAr+dz+dza ya/na ma sa byas pa lo ka shU rA ya/bod+d+ha sanA yA/man+tas rbA ya/taH/sarba ga ShA /sarba de ba ba N+Da/ r+N+Na tur stan//phags ma slob na d+hA rna

277b3(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma kun tu ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//ni mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwe rA yA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA sad+d+hA ya~M/tad+ya thA/sam+bi dz+nyA ma tit+tA raM tu re tu re tA ra ya~M/

278b1(rgyud): ma dge 'dun brtag pa zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra y+YA ya/nA ma Ar+ya a ba la ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA pA nA ya/tad+ya thA/swa te b+ha ga da te ta re/a b+ha bA tA re dA re tu re swAhA/

278b3(rgyud): ru ku ru/mu ru mu ru sA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba laM ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/tad+yA thA/

278b6(rgyud): shwa rI ya/bo d+he satwe ya/mahA satwA ya/tad+ya thA/sarba pA ra ma tAM t+ta re/sarba pA rA me tA nir+ya twe tu re mA hA//'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o//na mo rat+na tra yA
278b7(rgyud): ya/na ma Ar+ya a pa lo ke ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma satwA ya/tad+ya thA/sarba dI ni dA re tA raM/sarba dA na bA ra mi tA niR+YA te tu raM tu be s+thu tA//'phags ma sril ma sbyin pa thaMd kye pa

279b1(rgyud): Ar+yA a pa k+Sha to sh+tsa rA ya/kho t+to sarbA a/mar+d+hasat+ta ya/t+yAd+har+dz+dza/sarba b+hA ra me t+ta/non+ma tot+ta rat+nA /sarba d+har+m+ma A bA rbAH/sarbathAr mo tot+tarod+har swA//phags ma sgra la ma pha rol tu /

279b7(rgyud): tA re tA re/sarba pA ra mi tA tA re/sarba d+harme tA re sarba ri dzu ka d+ha nair+ye te tu re tu rau a na b+haM lA bya tI re tu rai tu re swA hA////'phags ma sbrel ma mngon per brjod par byar med pa
280a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma 'a di rnams chos thams cad nges par 'byung ba rang bzhin med cing mngon par brjod par byar med pa/don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/nad
280a2(rgyud): thams cad gso bar byed pa/thams cad du bklags pas grub pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad las phran tshogs thams cad ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de
280a3(rgyud): lta de ltar sgrub par byed//'di rnams kyi cho ga phyogs tsam ston par 'gyur te dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te gso sbyong la gnas pa'am/gso sbyong med pas//
280a4(rgyud): kyang rung ste dro dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis nyi ma de re la mchod pa byas nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o//mthar nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnos pas/
280a5(rgyud): ras ris sam/sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ji skad gsungs pa'i rims pas bdag nyid khaM shar du phyogs te/sngar brjodad pa'i a ga ru nag

280b1(rgyud): mchod rten du sA la ma ltung ba'i ba lang gro lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs te me tog dang /bdug pa dang /mar gyis mdzA mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas u dum ba ra'i shIng gis sbar
280b2(rgyud): tshangs pa'i ye shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya sta tsa ru'i bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyuraro//'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas pas bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyuraro//tsa ru'i bza' bas
280b3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya ste rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyuraro//nas dang zho bsres pa dang tsa ru dang gcig tu byas nas sbyin sreg bya ste rje rigs dbang du 'gyuraro//dgra la bltas nas bzlas pa bya ste rengs
280b4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus babs pa thams cad sel bar byed//dug thams cad la yang nye bar byabs pas so//gzhu mkhan gyis ril bu
280b5(rgyud): lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mig nad sel bar byed do//na ba la skud pas bcing bar bya ste/gdon thams cad sel bar byedado//gtsug tor bcings pas bdag nyid srung ba'o//
280b6(rgyud): bal bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o//bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pas phyogs bcang ba'o//bud med bu mthon pa la til mar la yongasu bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/bde brag
280b7(rgyud): bcing bar byed//rmongs pas mngal gyi zla mtshon gyi dus las 'das na khros byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas/btung bar byin
281a1(rgyud): bAr bya'o//gzhan gyi tshad dang mar bsres nas sbyin par bya'o//de nas bu btsa' bar 'gyuraro//de nas bu mang po 'dod na sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas pa'i thal
281a2(rgyud): bde ba chu'i bum pa bzhi dong bsres pa bzhag par bya'o//brgyad brgyar bzlas de'i srad bus lag pa g.yas pa la bcings na ji srid du smra bo thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyuraro//
281a3(rgyud): gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byos te gi yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyuraro//gzhon nu mes bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa byas nas lan
281a4(rgyud): bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas lag pa la bcing b.ro bya sti brtan pa dang g.yo bar bcas pa'i mnga' ba dag tu 'gyur//de nas drag shul la nyams pa'i ming nas smos
281a5(rgyud): lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas khyor ba'i chu btung bar sbyin par bya ste/shi ba yang lang bar byed//de bzhin du phyogs bzhir mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung byar
281a6(rgyud): sbyin par bya ste/'jog pa'i mche bas zin pa yang 'tsho bar byed do//nu ma'i phur ba dang 'bras la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas byin pas grol bar byed de/tshor
281a7(rgyud): bo med par 'gyur//yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang /g.yul la grong khyer gyi dbus sam mtshan mo mda' rgyang gang gi tshad kyis gzhi lo nye bar phyogs nas dkar gtor byin te
281b1(rgyud): 'o ma can gyi yam shang gas me sbar nas 'o ma'i srogs blugs stong phrag gi sbyin bsreg bya ste/yams nye bar zhi bar byedado//de nas nye bar ma zha na de las gzhan du rengs par bsams/
281b2(rgyud): ba'i dus bad kan mthar byed kyi yAm shing gis me sbar nas don grub kyi shing la ek+Sh+mI dang /til mar gyis bta glos pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/'dral du yams thaMd/

281b4(rgyud): bya ste dgrul bum rnams dbang du 'gyur//tI la btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/yi dgas dbang du 'gyuraro//dur khrod du bai l-i dang /khaN+Da ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag
281b5(rgyud): brgyad bya ste/sha zi dbang du 'gyur//gnod sbyin dbang du byed pa la wA Ta'i yaM shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad bya ste/brjed byed dang /
281b6(rgyud): gnon po dbang du byed do//bal bye bsregs thugs kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//rig pas bgrogs rnam par gzhom po'i don du seng ldeng po rtse mo pa rnon po'i til mar
281b7(rgyud): gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//gu gul gyi ral bul maro kyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/lha chen po'i rdza su 'brang ba dang /lha chen po
282a1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro//dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyes pa'i ldong ros blangs nas rgyal po'i ye shing gis me sbar nas ji srid mo dpung du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
282a2(rgyud): de na rgyud mtshungs pa'i bu ser skya'i 'o ma la gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar du byas nas/myur de la gdab par bya'o//de bzhin du zhos gang ba'i snod dang /myur deng sbrang rtsis
282a3(rgyud): gang ba'i snod la yang //de nas srung ba byas te za ma tog du bzhag nas zla ba gazla bzung po na mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam 'phan
282a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas kha byang du mngon par phyogs pas snod bzhi ru bzhag nas ji srid 'gro ba dang /du ba
282a5(rgyud): 'thul ba 'am/'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//dbang du byed pa dang /mi snang ba dang /na mkha' la nye bar 'khrid par byed//de bzhin du mig sman bla bskyed pa'i ched//
282a6(rgyud): du rang nyid khyad par du dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i skud pa la bzhag nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lagA kha sbyar nas blangs nas ji srid dro ba
282a7(rgyud): dang /du ba 'thul ba dang /'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o//'di nyid la mngon par rnam pa gsumo//lcags lngas pad+ma byed du bcug nas gur gu dang /gi bi dang /
282b1(rgyud): ga pur nam mkha'i chus btags nas pad+mar bcug ste de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
282b2(rgyud): mched rten nam 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lag pa g.yos pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//de nas blangs pa
282b3(rgyud): des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed//de bzhin du gdu bu dang cod pa ni dang /lcags sgrog rnams kyang ngo //de bzhin du ri'i tsan+dan dmar po dang /gu
282b4(rgyud): yul dang dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rtsa ba dang /lcags lnga dang /gi ri kirna ka dang /'bru'i phub ma dang /ru rta dang /rgya spos dang /sbrang rtsi dang /pi pi ling dang /du ru ke rnams cha mnyam pa
282b5(rgyud): gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib po byed du gzhug/de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs par ba'i 'o ma blangs nas gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar sar dang gcig tu byas pas phyi ma la
282b6(rgyud): ril bu byed du gzhugo/arga'i til mar gyi phye mas mar me dbul bar bya'o//de nas dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gso sbyong can gyi a shAd+d+ho'i 'dab
282b7(rgyud): ma bdun gyi nang du bcug par byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sbyin sngar ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa ra bya'o//de khar bcud pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de nas
283a1(rgyud): 'bar bar byed pas ni na mkha' la 'gro bar byed//de nas cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can
283a2(rgyud): gyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas me'i ye shing gis me sbyar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi yo shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//
283a3(rgyud): dkar po'i bcu bzhi nas brtsoms te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o//de nas grub par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du gso sbyong can gyis rtag tu bzlas pa stong phrag gsum bya'o//phyi nas las
283a4(rgyud): thams cad du 'gyuraro//yang na rgyal po 'am blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das la mchod po byas nas shing gi rgyal po'i yi shing la atshu da'i til mar gyis
283a5(rgyud): btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o//bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o//las 'dis tshul khrims 'tshal pa yin yang de bzhin kho nar gsod pa
283a6(rgyud): dang /bskrad po la ni nA'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste mtshan mo bdun gyis spyod par byed//rigs bzhi dbang du byed pa
283a7(rgyud): 'dod pas rtse ru dang bcas pa'i chu dang /gnod sbyin gyi kha bor zhes pa'i sbyin ba sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro//mtshan mo pu tsi ra dza ti'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad bya'o//
283b1(rgyud): bzlas byas tshang bra las mal pad+ma byed do//bzhegs la sun ma dang tal gyi spyan sagags pagatsug du yang chung bu rag tan par 'gyur//lanany+dza sh+tsad+d+ha spyos
283b2(rgyud): kyi bu mo dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg bya'o//gos 'dod pas ngur ba dang /tshur ma can gyi hU~M gri bu bya'o//stong phrag brgyad dam mtshan ma 'dun dul//shu drug la stong na
