290b1(rgyud): 'gro ste lha'i 'gro ba brgya phrag gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro//rna ba'i mig sman la las 'di kho na'o//gi baM sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang nas zan za bas sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas
290b2(rgyud): par bya'o//zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dusu pi pi ling gi 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du 'am/ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten du gaM pAM rnam pa brgyar bya ste btang nas rig pa yongasu bskor bas
290b3(rgyud): las bya'o//nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa can te des thig le byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong du 'tsho/
290b4(rgyud): bar byed//dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman gyi 'dab ma blangs nas me gdung bzang por byas nas/lan brgyar rab tu bcug nas zla ba gzas gzin pa na chur zhugs te ji srid
290b5(rgyud): grul bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o//skad cig la bcag pa tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro//'di byugs pas gzi brjid dang ldan zhing cod pan dang rna rgyan 'chang ba
290b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'i lus rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par yang rab tu smon par 'gro'o//'khor dang bcas pa lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do//rlung
290b7(rgyud): ltar 'gro zhing yid ltar mgyegs par 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//pad+ma dang ut+pal stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis gser stong rje do//pa la sha'i las ni 'di kho na zhi ni/
291a1(rgyud): yang 'dir las chen po'i sgrub thabasu 'gyur ba ni rgyal ba'i zhabs drud ngam/ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram/rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa'i tsho gas kyang
291a2(rgyud): rung ste rig pa 'di rnams kyi ming gsum gsum brjod pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga de 'am/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'o mchod rten gyi drung du phyogs gtsang mar 'o ma dang nas zan
291a3(rgyud): za bas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te me tog dang 'bras bu dang /tsa ru dang /rtsa ba dang /zho'i bza' ba'am//chu dang phye dang /za na dang dri'i bza' ba'am/wA kwa'i
291a4(rgyud): bza' ba 'am/mar gyis bza' bas kyang rung ste yang na mi skye ba'i btul zhugs spyad par bya'o//thog mar sngon du bskyon par bya'o//yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang
291a5(rgyud): yang dag par ldan pas nyi ma so sor mngon par brjod bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya'o//gsung ra po ji lta ba bzhin du slongs mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o//byang chub kyi sems yongasu//
291a6(rgyud): gzung zhing sdug bsngal gyi gdungs pas bza' bar bya'o//sgrub pa pos duso gsum du khrus byas pa'i 'og tu shis pa'i ku sha'i khres lo 'dug ste sbyangs pa las byung
291a7(rgyud): ba'i gos bge zhing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya'o//mthar nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma dang bcas pa'i shing
291b1(rgyud): ngam a gu ru nag parda y-i shing sor bzhi pa'i tshod dum mdzub mo'i tshod la tu ru ka'i hi la mAr gyis btags pa dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad snyun bsreg bya'o//de nas byung
291b2(rgyud): par 'gyur te bco lnga la phyogs gzhi ra sa las byung ba'i bum pa bani chu dang bcas pa a mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha g.yogs pa/rtsa ba dang nag po med pa bzhog par bya'o/
291b3(rgyud): grayas kyi gzhog su sa las byung ba'am/gse las byung rin po che dang /sa bon thams cad kyis yongasu gang ba/sman thams cad dang /rtsa ba dang /rin po che'i snying po paung+ga dra ba /
291b4(rgyud): me tog gis kha g.yogs pa/du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pa/rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa dbusu bzhug par bya'o//de bzhin du shar gyi phyogasu/
291b5(rgyud): 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o//nub kyi phyogasu ha rings zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o//de lta bu la sogs pa bumo pa rnams kyi ming smos te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi
291b6(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o//bri bzang po'i me togaM dang /gtir ma dang /phreng po nyi shu dngul bar bya zhing /dris bkang ba'i kham par nyi shu phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o//re mos bkang
291b7(rgyud): kham pang nyi shu phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o//mar gyis marare me brgyad bul bu bya bum pa'i sgron ma bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o//de thug gis bkang ba'i kham par bcu gnyis kyu
292a1(rgyud): rnams la dbul bar bya'o//til gyi thug pa'i kham phor bcu gnyis srin po rnams la gtor ma mchod par bya'o//zan dron gyi kham por brgyad 'byung
292a2(rgyud): po rnams la gtor mar sbyin//hwags kyis btsa' ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bya'o//gzhan rnams la mor sar dang
292a3(rgyud): zhos bkang ba dang /ji ltar los pa dang /ji ltar mtshungs pa'i kham phor rnams phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o//A ga ru nug po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o//ga
292a4(rgyud): pur dang /tsan+dan dkar po dang /kun tu ru ka dang /shri b+ha sa can gyi bdug pa'i kham por phyogs bzhirwa bzhag par bya'o//de nas srod la las brtsams par byas te nyo ni mtshan
292a5(rgyud): du sbyang bar gnas pas arga'i ye shing ngam/seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu skur nos las 'di la sngags 'dis spyan drangs pa byas par 'gyuraro//sngags ni/nA mA rAH
292a6(rgyud): t+ya yAM ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sid+hA yA/maN+Da sAd+d+hA ya/hI r-i hi ri/su ru su ru/ma hA k+ShA ru NI kA A gan+d+haM A gany+tsau/Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra d+hi ri d+hi
292a7(rgyud): Ne/ya thA sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA//gshegasu gsol ba'i dus su dri zhim po'i me tog gis bskul bas so//dngul las byung ba'i snod dam/sa las byung bar mchod yin
292b1(rgyud): bul nas de nas a gau ru nag po'i yam shing ji skad gsungs ma'i tshod/gzhan gsungs pa lo til mar gyis btags pa rnams zla ba po zas bzung ba'am/nyi ma gzas bzung ba na
292b2(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu thugs brtse ba phyag na ril pa spyi blugs dang /dbyug pa
292b3(rgyud): bsnams pa/ral pa btsod pon 'phyang ba 'byon par 'gyur ro//de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i snod du dri zhim po'i me tog dkar po rnams snyim pas blangs nas chu'i mchod yon dbul
292b4(rgyud): bar bya'o//de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ci yin pa'i mchog te sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs par byed//gang mchog blangs pa de ste ro//na mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/
292b5(rgyud): mi snang ba 'am/rgyal po nyid dmo/rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam/mtshon cha 'am/tshe ring po nyid dam/sems can thams cad
292b6(rgyud): dbang du byed pa 'am/gi baM sgrub pa'am/mig sman sgrub pa'am/gter 'pho ba'am/phug tu 'jug pa'am/bcud len nam/ldong ros sgrub pa'am/mngon par shes pa lnga nyid
292b7(rgyud): dam/rang gi lus la rje su 'dod pa'i cho ga 'am/lha'i mig gam/nad 'joms pa'am/lha'i shes pa 'am/lag pa dang rkang pa'am/mig cha dang bral ba nyid dam/lha'i
293a1(rgyud): dbang po smras pa nyid dam/dang 'dzums pa nyid dum/mdo' ma lus la gang nung zad bsgru min pa'i nad dudrung du rnams la dI las par pa dang /
293a2(rgyud): thos pa 'dzin pa dang /nor sgrub pa nyid dam// zlus pa'i mchog de sbyin par mdzad//'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug ni gnas 'ang 'a l-I/tshe bskal par
293a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das mi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pos ku sha'i khros yod pas u dum bA ra chog shes par bya ste/oM dum ba ra'i shing gi shing l+h+wam gnyis sa
293a4(rgyud): rdza mkhan gyi sa le/de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid do//sgrol ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po'i cho gar 'gyur te//ni mai rat+na tra s+thA ya/nA ma Ar+ya a ba lo/
293a5(rgyud): shweR+Sha ya/tho d+hisatwA ya mahA satwA ya/oM ku ru ku ru kul+le swA hA//'di ni rig pa 'od thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po ste bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa tha~Md
293a6(rgyud): gnon par byed//nad thams cid zad ci 'dzums//'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed//las phran tshegs rnams kyang bklags pas 'gru'o//'dum phrag nyi
293a7(rgyud): rtsa gcig tu zlos par byed pa ni na mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa'o//de nas mig sman ldong ros A~M shAt+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyis nang du ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa
293b1(rgyud): bya'o/khro ba byed bzhin pas ni dbang du byedado//du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o//'bar bas ni na mkha' la 'gro'o//til gyi bsregs blugs 'dum gyis sbyin bsreg bya'o//gang 'dod pa/
293b2(rgyud): de ster bar byed do//'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya ste ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed//de mthong na gang brtsams pa de 'grub par byed//can
293b3(rgyud): dan kar po'i ya ma shing gi spre ni sreg stong phrag brgya byo ste nyi ma so sor la dong rtse rnyed do//tse n+dan dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/nyi ma re re la kaur sha pa
293b4(rgyud): Na drug rnyed do//'bum phrag bdun bdun bzlas par bya ste mo snang bar 'gyu ro//'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste/nad 'joms par byed//mchin mo brgyad du lan gsum yongasu
293b5(rgyud): bzlas pas nad 'joms par byed//'bum phrag bin+d+ha gnyis bzlas par bya ste//bcud len dang bcud rnye do//de zos nas gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs par 'gyuraro//'bum phrag gsum
293b6(rgyud): byis gra d+ha shI sel bar bye'o//lcags bsregs nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i til mor gyis rkang po g.yas pa la bskus nas lcags des rkang pa la gdung bar bya zhing /gr-i d+ha shI mchod
293b7(rgyud): cig ces brjod par bya'o//'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed//yungs kar rgyal po'i bsregs blugs byas pas dbang du 'gyur zhing mchen mo bdun
294a1(rgyud): gyis nor gyi bdag por 'gyur te 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ma gtog so//mArga la 'bum bzlas te bskul na bza' btung gang blangs pa de rnye do//arga'i
294a2(rgyud): yaM shing gis sbyin sreg byas na gser srang brgya rnyedado//shing pi N+ya ki gi sbyin bsreg bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyu ro//tAm+bu la'i phye mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste cod/
294a3(rgyud): pan 'ching bar 'gyuraro//bye ba bzlas par bya ste 'khor brgyas bskor ba'i reg pa 'dzin por 'gyur ro//'bras yos kyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin bsreg bya ste nyi ma
294a4(rgyud): bdun gyis bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro//'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste/ba lci skam po hwags kyi btso bar 'gyur ro//rtsa ba med pa'am/dug med par brjod pa
294a5(rgyud): bskus nA dri bzang por 'gyu ro//tAm+bu la thams cad yang dag par sbyar te 'bum gyis sbyin bsreg bya'o//tAm+b+ha la ma tshang ba nyid med par 'gyur ro//a pA margas mig nad sel
294a6(rgyud): bAr byedado//rims kyis btab pa la ku shas byabs pas so//srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlos nas bcing bar byi ste skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro//zan dang zho lhan cig pa 'bum gyis
294a7(rgyud): sbyin bsreg byas na ji srid 'dod pa'i zas ma tshang ba med par 'gyur//mar gyi srog blugs stong gi sbyin srog byas na yul gru gsum rnyed//bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rna
294b1(rgyud): kyis sgrub pa lan gsum gyis bsgrub par bya'o zheso//gu gul gyi ril bu ka par Sha'i rus pa'i tshod kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byA//nyi ma re re la pa Na bcu drug rnyed do//lhag ma med pa zad par bya'o//
294b2(rgyud): dong ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste ma btags pa'i gos sna tshogs pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis rnye do//snying rjes sbyin du bcug pa dang /de bzhin du dad pa dang /lha bsnyen po las
294b3(rgyud): gzhan ma yin pas 'grub par mi 'gyur//zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o//rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang chos thams cad kyi nang du gtogs par rtog pa thams cad kyi nang du gto/
294b4(rgyud): pa'i rig pa 'di ni cho ga rgyas par bstan par lo brgya phyug gis kyang de dang 'dis mdor bsdus nas bstan par mi nuso//cho ga gzhan rnamasu yang rig pa 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga de thams
294b5(rgyud): cad bsgrub par bya zhing /de bzhin du gang nges par brjod pa'i las rnams sgrub par byeda'o//rtag pa'i rgyal po 'dir rig pa'i sngags de rnams dang gang sngags rnams kyis bsgrub par
294b6(rgyud): bya ba de rnams kho na yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa dang /rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'o//de rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sgrub/
294b7(rgyud): thabs kyi spyod pa sbyin pa dang /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang /dkyil 'khor gyi las dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par
295a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i rig pa dang /sngags rnams dang /rtog pa thams cad du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen pa'i cho ga bcu rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen du/
295a2(rgyud): cho ga brgyad rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyuraro//'di lta ste/'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rtog pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu bzhi po'i rtog pa dang /yang
295a3(rgyud): pa'i ri bo dang /kun tu ri bo dang /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud ste/rtog pa chen po thams cad kyi spyod pa'i cho ga rnamasu mnyam pa nyid du 'gro bar byed//
295a4(rgyud): de bzhin kho nar bdag gis brjod pa de dang /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas gsungs pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po bde blag tu bsgrub par bya ste mtha' yas pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu/
295a5(rgyud): 'gro'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyon parje so rtsa ba'i rtog par thams cad thun mong pa'i cho ga'i rig pa'i le'u rab
295a6(rgyud): 'byam rdzogaso////phyag rgya'i le'u bri bar bya'o//de nas sems dpa' chen po phyag rgya yang dag par mdu bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dkyil 'khor
295a7(rgyud): thoms cad kyi cho ga thun mong pa rgyud thams cad kye nang du gtogs pa phyag rgya ro mo'i cho ga/rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyur pas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsung
295b1(rgyud): gyur to//myong ba rnams sbyi mtshan da na//shes nas rab tu bzhag pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad //rigs kyi phyug rgyu ma gsum rnams//ma'i dkyil 'a khyo kun nas/
295b2(rgyud): 'bar//gtsug tor phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni//'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o//gtsug tor de nyid cung zad bteg/gtsug tor steng 'gro'i phyag rgya'o//
295b3(rgyud): kun tu dkar ba gdugs dkor can//'khor lo 'bar ba rnam par 'phyo//gzi brjid phung po rdo rje nyid//gzhan gyis mi thub lan gsum dkris//rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya'o//'khor
295b4(rgyud): lo rtsibs brgyad lta byar bcas//chos kyi 'khor lo'i metshan nyid do//pad+ma rin chen nor bu ni//rin chen snying po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid dkyil 'khor so sor gnas//las kun byed pa
295b5(rgyud): gdu bu can//dbus son pa dbus ma yin//spyan de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan//de nyid rtsa ban+dan gyis dman//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'o//rtse mo'i steng 'og nus pa'i
295b6(rgyud): mtshan//de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa'o//'bar ba'i tshogs pa gzhan mo thub//'bar ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni//thams cad lhung bzed sogs phyag rgya//sngags sam
295b7(rgyud): yid kyi bye brag las//de bzhin gshegs rig phyag rgya'o//pad+ma 'dab brgyad phye ma la//'dab ma can rdzogs gang ba yi//zla ba'i rnam pa cha dang bcas//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma can//
296a1(rgyud): pad+ma g.yo ba'i steng du na//des zhugs nor bu 'dod pa 'o//dun tshogs byed pa'i phyug rgyu'o//rta mgrin dang ni sngon phyogs kyi//pad+ma yi ni ze 'bru'o//
296a2(rgyud): dkar po ges dkar can//ze 'bru de nyid grags ldan ma'i//ud pa la de nyid sgrol ma yi//ud pa la ni zlo ba ya'o//cung zad rin chen khro gnyer can//sdong bu dang bcas dpal
296a3(rgyud): mo ste/pho nya mo kun zhes bya'i rigs//kha bye rgyas pa rigs rgyal mo'o//lhag ma rnams kyi thun mong nyid//byug pa'am ril pa spyi blugs kyi//rnam pa de dag lhag ma ru//rig pa can
296a4(rgyud): rnams kyis shes bya//'o bar bas pad rigs phyag rgya'o//rtse mo lnga pa rdo rje yi//gdong gnyis lha mo sngo sor gnas//'bar ba'i phreng ldan rig pa mchog/rig pa'i rgyal po'i rdo
296a5(rgyud): rje'o//dam tshig rdo rje thad kAr gnas//bum dngos stong song mA ma ke/gtsug tor gcig pa tshul ba ste//gtsug tor gnyis pa rnam par rgyal//gtsug tor gsum pa rdo rje'i
296a6(rgyud): mtshan//dbus su mdung gi rnam pa ni//rdo rje yaM ni mtshan ma'o//dbus 'khyil ba byas nas ni//mdung la 'khyil ba mngon phyogs pa'o//rdo rje'i dbus dkyil 'khor la//kun nas/
296a7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//yod pa phreng ba can ma'o//rdo rje gnyis ka'i rtse mo la//phreng ba dag byed phreng ba 'chang //cung zad cod pan gzhog su ni//lca g+nis kyu rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o//
296b1(rgyud): dbyug pa dbyug pa'o de bzhin du//dgra stang dbus ma'i rtse mor ga/rdo rje khu tshur bum can yang //de nas nges pa'i rnam pa ni//rdo rje rtse gcig 'bar bcas pa//rdo rje kha ma dung gi sna//pho nya ma ya/
296b2(rgyud): ring po ste//khro bo rnams kyi thung ngu'o////rnam par 'phro ba rig pa'i rgyal//cung zad dbu su gtsug tor ldan//rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o//'og tu mdung li steng rdo rje//
296b3(rgyud): tshogs kyi'o steng du mdung dang ni//'og tu rdo rje log 'dren kun//dbusu byi de'i phyogs bzhi ru//mgo gsum rdo rje bi dI ni//rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du'o//de nyid 'dir yang de bzhin
296b4(rgyud): du//thams cad du ni 'bar bcas pa//bdun lnga gsum gyi 'bar bar bya//rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad la//rdo rje lnga yi mtshan nyid rnams//phyag rgya bcas pa'o gtum po rnams//bi dI ka
296b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa'o//gcig shos 'jig rten pa rnams ni//'bar ba dang bcas gtum po mi//bi dwe med par so sor gnas//ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba yi//dge ba'i spyod pas 'jig rten pa//
296b6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyud shes pas//thams cad rtog pa dkyil 'khor gyi//zheso//aM sa ri sa ra badz+ra prA kA raM hUM phaT swA hA//ra ba'o//oM bi pu rad/rak+Sha badz+re pany+dza ra hUM phaT swA hA/
296b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i guro//oM kI li kI la/badz+re badz+ri b+hu ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT swA hA/bur pa'o//da ltar 'di rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nas sems dpa' chen po des/slar yang bya
297a1(rgyud): rgya yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub thabs thams cad kyi sgra 'tsho ga mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang
297a2(rgyud): rig pa thams cad la kun nas mnyam par 'jug pa de rnams gdon mi za ba kho nar dngos grub rtogs par 'gyur//zheso//de nas thal mo dbu ma ye//gung mo'i sor mau gung mos gung
297a3(rgyud): mo la//de nyid bsdigs mdzub rtse mo lta bar gnas//de bzhin gshegs rigs dam tshig gi/phyag rgya lhan cig par bsgrag so//dang por sngags bcas rdzogs par bya//bzlas pa
297a4(rgyud): la sogs par 'gyur ro//yang 'dir sngags ni//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHoM ta thA ga tA ud b+ha bA ya swA hA//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su dam tshig gi sngagaso//g.yon pa'i
297a5(rgyud): rgyab phyin ci log tu 'gyur te bkan la lag pa'i mthe'u chung bzung lo gong gis mthe bong gnyis cung zad brkyang ba mnan par bya ste//sor mo dag ni mchog gi dam tshig gi sngags
297a6(rgyud): twe rdo rje'i rigasu rab tu grags par 'gyuraro//yang 'dir sngags ni//nA maHsarba ta thA ga twe b+haHoM badz+ra ud b+ha bA ya swA hA//rdo rje'i rigasu dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sngagaso//gung mo'i
297a7(rgyud): sor mo gung mo can//byas nas thal mi skyuR+Ya byas pa//sor mo gnyis rtag bug pa med//dang por bcings nas de bzhin phyis//rdzogs nas bzlas pa la sogs 'gyur//yang
297b1(rgyud): 'dir sngabs ni/na maHsarba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHzhes pa 'di rnams dmachog gi phyag rgya rnams la'o//oM pad+ma ud b+hu b+hA ya swAhA//'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sngagaso zhes/
297b2(rgyud): pa dam tshig phyag rgya ni//gsum po 'di rnams kun tu bsgrag/yon tan dpag med rnam pa ste//stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'o//dang por bcing bya rtog tu slar //sgrub pos lha yi spyan
297b3(rgyud): snga ru//de yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//myur du 'dod pa'i zhi sogs rnams//'jig rten mgon po mthas yas dang //de sras bdag nyid che rnams kyis//lus can kun gyi phyag rgya
297b4(rgyud): chen sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa yin//rtag tu snga bar langs nas ni//nyin re nyin re bcing bar bya//gtsang zhing dad dang blo gros ldan//de yi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur//dam tshig
297b5(rgyud): phyag rgya gsum po 'di//gang gis shes pa blo ldan pas//gzung ba'i 'phags pa'i man ngag gis//de yi dngos grub the tshom med//'di rnams rnam par shes pa ni//cho ga nyams
297b6(rgyud): kyang sgrub pa pos//de yi dngos grub byed pa yin//stobs po che la sogs rnams kyis//phyag rgya kun tu srung don du//de nas dbugs 'byin chen po de//bdag gis kun nas snang ba yi//
297b7(rgyud): phyag rgya yang dag skul byed pa'i//sgom pa kun nas rtag du ni//phyag rgya rab tu gsungs pa ste//sgrol ma kun gyi thun mong du//rtag pa gang du gsungs pa yin//rtog pa gzhan du
298a1(rgyud): reg pa gang //de rnams nyid kyang rab sbyar bya//yang 'dir phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'gyur//slar yang sor mo phan tshun du//lan gnyis kha sbyar gnas pa la//mdzus
298a2(rgyud): mo gnyis ni rab tu brgyad//blo ldan de bzhin mthe bong yod //sems ni legs por mnyam bzhag pas//bcing bya rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//sgrol ma spyan drang tshad du ni//'di rnams
298a3(rgyud): rig pa lhan cig paso//zhes 'di sprul ma thams cad kyi//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin//sgrub pa po ni don thams cad//rlung gi rig pa sbyar ba yin//cho ga nyams kyang dang pa yin
298a4(rgyud): lha rnams 'phel du 'ong bar byed//de nyid mthe bong bkan byas nas//mchod yon dag ni dbul bar bya//de nas mchod yon can du 'gyur//mi rnams 'dod pa'i 'bras rab sbyin//ma
298a5(rgyud): yon gyi phyag rgya'o//lug pa bkan ti bteg la brkyang //mthe bong gdan du rab brtag bya//de nyid 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i don//lha rnams yongasu mnyes par byed/gdan gyi phyag
298a6(rgyud): rgya'o//mthe bong dag gi rtse mo che//bskum nas tha dad gyur gang nyid//khrus byas bdag nyid don bzang sgrug//khrus kyi phyag rgya'o//sor mo'i rtsa ba'i nyi logasu//g.yas pa'i mthu thong
298a7(rgyud): rnam par bgod//sman dang srog chags yan lag ni//yongasu spangs te dri dag dbul//dri'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin g.yon pa'i mthe bong yang //mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par
298b1(rgyud): dgod/lha yi dri mchog dang ldan pa'o//me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya//me tog gi phyag rgya'o//sdigs mdzub g.yas pa'i rtse myo ni//bskum ste gung mor gnas par 'gyur//gang gis mthe bong/
298b2(rgyud): can gyis ni//de yis bdug spos dbul bar bya//bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o//g.yon pa'i mthe bong bsdigs mdzub ni//gong mong gang gis gnas par bya//gtsang zhing dag par yang dag ldan//
298b3(rgyud): de nyid gtor ma'i mchod par bya//gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o//bsdigs mdzub rtse mor mthe bong gnyis//rnam par bkod pa byas nas ni//ba'i mar ni phul byung bas//sgron ma dbul bar bya ba'o//
298b4(rgyud): mar me'i phyag rgya'o//gung mo'i rtse mor mdzub mo ni//phyi'i rtse mo'i tshi gsu sbyar//mthe bong dang ni ming mad dag/bgrang phreng srad bu yongasu 'dzin//phreng ba 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o//rtag tu me ru
298b5(rgyud): mngon phyogs pas//lag pa g.yas pa'i ming med ni//gung mo'i tshigasuM byas par 'gyur//lag gnyis sbyar ba'i gung mo la//mthe bong cung zad rnam 'dud pa'o//me spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o///
298b6(rgyud): ming med mthe bong sbyar byas nas//sngags dang bcas pa rab sbyar bya//de nyid kyis brjod gshegasu gsol//ma lha spyan drangs pa bskal pa'i phyag rgya'o//zhes pa 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi
298b7(rgyud): rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba'i phyag rgya ste sgrub po po dngos grub mnyam pa med pa 'dod pa rnams kyis thur bang du rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o//rkang pa 'khyog por byas nas ni/phyag rgya
299a1(rgyud): rnam par rgyas po no//lag gnyis brgyad rgyas 'khor lo dang /skyon du mtho bong ba skul nus no//khargyud yongs te mtho bang da//mnyam par bshogs tu brgyang par/
299a2(rgyud): gung po sbreng ba'id+hAshAd+hA //b+h+yo ljin byung chub sems ga yaM//dbyug pa'i byeg rgyur grag sa yin/ byis myur du sbyar shAr/ zlazla thams rnyed pyod pa 'gyur/
299a3(rgyud): daMd+h+r-ig pa'i byug rgya'o//legs par khe sbyor glu thal mo khyod stong du 'gyur te kha sbyor gyi phyug rgya'o//gang du mthe bong nang du btsu pa ni babyung ba'i gad no//bzang ba'i gan gyi sbyin
299a4(rgyud): d+h+r-ikaM/sbrul mo khad+ha s+t+wa~Mng des rab tu brjod pa'i kha spyar kyi b+hU/rgyulas mo med kyi sor mo yod dag pad+ma/ra ba ni khA b+h+yAM b+h+rUM b+hag d+hA'i bats+tsha pa hU~M rnam pa 'od cing kyi rnam
299a5(rgyud): phyag rgyu'o//zhes sgrub pa pa ste deng ldan pas shes bor sti'o//gdan gyi don tu rab tu sbyar bar blaH/byAg+sa ts+tsha 'din blugs pa chen+ta pa'o//hU~M byug d+hA/
299a6(rgyud): rgyu ni rab tu brjod pa de uSh+NIl de 'dir brjod par //nas tsam+b+ha rnam par grol po ni//myu pa na yon la nyid//Any+dza ma'i phyag rgyu mi/'dzi rkyen gsum
299a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyal gyi'i phyag rgya dang //sgrol ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de phyag rgyar yongasu bskrun no/tshigs gsum pa bcig pa ni khro gtor byin gyi'o//de/
299b1(rgyud): kho na tshigs par bar gyur pa yang dag pa kho nar 'dod pa ni ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i phyag rgyar gsung so//bsdigs mjug dang mthe bo yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ni ral gcig
299b2(rgyud): ma'i cod pan laso//dang po ting nge 'dzin yang dag par gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams phyag rgyu gnyis pa ral gcig ma'i'o//phan tshun sbyar byas lhag ma phyi rol tu d+ma'i rnam
299b3(rgyud): par rab tu brkyad nas dbu mo gnyis ni mdung gi rnam par legs par gnas pa'i phyag rgya ni mdung du yang dag par bshad//lha yi 'bar bar byed pa dang /yang dag por mtshungs
299b4(rgyud): 'di brtan pa tsam gyis bdug pa rnams thams cad rnam par 'joms pa mdung gi phyag rgya'o//zhes pa phyag chen 'di rnams ni//dam tshig don du rab sbyar ba//gang gis yang dgra shes
299b5(rgyud): byas pa//de yis dngos grub thob par 'gyur//phyag rgya lhag ma thams cad nyid//tshod mod grangs med nyid du bya//phyag rgya yang dag yongasu bsgrags//mdor na 'di ru brjod pa ni//se na
299b6(rgyud): sems ni dur ba rnams//las chen byed par mi nus pa//mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod par bya//zhes pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgro ba ma
299b7(rgyud): ral ba gyen parjes rtsa ba'i rtog par phyag rgya'i le'u rab 'byam rdzog so////de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dngos pa'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom zhing
300a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gos dkar mo zhes bya ba rang gi rigs kyi rigs pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs srung ba'i don dang /bgegs bzlog
300a2(rgyud): pa'i don tu dasungs pa'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa R+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/duR+sha na/pAR+ShA NA/b+h+yo shra ba NA/smA ra d+hI na/b+hUs+sa ma hU~M/sar+b+ba
300a3(rgyud): satwA nAM/sarba byA d+hi/tsi kit+sa ka/tad+ya thA/oM ka Te/bi ka Tau/ka nAM ka Ta/kA D+hA/bI ka nA/bAM ka Te/b+hA ga ba ti/bI dza ye swAhA//'di ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de'i rig pa chen mo/
300a4(rgyud): ste/rig pa thams cad dang /sngags rnams kyi dngos grub byed pa/pad+ma'i rigasu rigs kyi rig pa 'dis bdag nyid srung ba dang /gzhan srung ba dang /g.yeg srung ba dang /
300a5(rgyud): ras ris gnas pa dang /lha rnams bsrung bar bya ba dang /ras ris grub pa 'di yang khyed kyi sgrub thabs gsum byas nas sam/bdun byas nas bzlas par bya'o//de nas
300a6(rgyud): rang gi lha'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste/myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//bzlas pa'i mthar yang bgegs rnams srid pa gzhan du 'gyuraro//rtag tu bzlas pas kyang nad med par
300a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /ring du 'tsho bar byed//bde ba yang so sor rnyed do//srad bus bdag nyid srung zhing phyir bzlog pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
300b1(rgyud): de nas 'di'i phyag rgya nyid ni spel ma thams cad kyi spyi'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste de nyid ni bsdigs mdzub bcings nas 'khyil ba'i rnam par bya ste mthe bong zung yang kun tu ngacer ba ni gos
300b2(rgyud): dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o//'di yang phyag rgya'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa mnyam par 'gro ma gden mi za ba ste dang por zhabs la phyag byas te/de nas las thams cad bya'o//yang rtog pa'i rgyal
300b3(rgyud): pa'i dbang po chen po 'dir 'phags ma sgrol ma dang /sgrol ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa mngon par mdzes pa thams cad dang /srung ba dang /nyes pa byas pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/
300b4(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho ga rab tu sbyor ba sgrub nus par 'gyur te/de yang gang zhe na/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sit+kA /
300b5(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/tsan+te tsan+ta ma te sUr+yaM/sUR+YA ma ti/g+hu ni g+hu no/la li/lai le/sU ti sU ta ni/sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/pa rA kra me swAhA/a mi tA b+ha su tA swe hAM/sarbe ShAM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA/
300b6(rgyud): ya swAhA//'di yang 'phags pa bzang po zhes bya ba 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa che na mi nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o//gang 'di sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i cho ga rab
300b7(rgyud): 'byam spyod pa dang /sgrub thabs dang /phyag rgya'i cho ga la sogs pa de thams cad 'phags ma sbrel ma'i zla bas bsgrub par bya'o//zhes kun tu rtogs par bya'o//rtog pa gzhan gyi
301a1(rgyud): tsho gas kyang sgrub par byed//rtog pa med pas kyang mngon spyod kyi las 'di byed de/phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge spangs nas/rig pa 'ba' zhig gi swA hA gan su hUM phaT
301a2(rgyud): sbyin par bya'o//rtog pa gzhan gyis cho gas kyang ngo //gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed par 'gyuraro//yang na nye bar 'joms par byed par 'gyuraro//mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed//
301a3(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen po de thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/bsam pa rnam par dag pas sems dpa' chen po rnams la smras pa/gang rtog pa'i rgyal ba
301a4(rgyud): 'dir sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /mchod par 'gyur ba dang /yi ger 'dre bar 'gyur ba de rnams don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad la byam
301a5(rgyud): pa'i sems dang /sems can thams cad la kun nas dga' ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//srung bar byed par 'gyur ro//gang du rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba mtsho
301a6(rgyud): rten du 'gyur ba dang /sa phyogs de gang nyid kyis lag mthil du phyin par 'gyur ro//mchod pa 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mi gang la
301a7(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob pa des thams cad du rnal 'byor du bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang stobs med pa shes nas rab tu gsal bar bya'o//'di yang gca
301b1(rgyud): phyog su thams cad kyis rab tu gyu bang 'gyur gyis gzhan du m+b+ha yin//gang zhig byed pa de mngon par 'dod pa med pa sems can gyi bsam pa spang ba dang /chos dang chos
301b2(rgyud): babo la ma gus pa la mi 'jug pa'i rab tu sbyor bas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//rtag pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub pa po thams cad kyis srung ba'i don du lhag ma dang /lhag ma med pa yang rung ste/
301b3(rgyud): gtsang sbra byas pas srung ba'i don du rig po'i rgyal ba'i rdzog su 'gyur ba ni/na mo rat+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+yA a pa lo ki tI shwa rA ya/bad+hi sid+d+hi yA/at+mA sad+g+ha ya~M/oM am+b+hi d+hA/Ats+tsha
301b4(rgyud): bahUM phaT+Ta sautwA//'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal ba ste/thal ba la lani bdun mngon par bsngags pas bdag nyid srung ba dang /g.yog srung ba la mdud pa'i spyod pa bye'o//
301b5(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang rgyal lam//tha skar yang rung ste dge ba'i sbyor ba la mchod pa dang /gtor me'i tshogs mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas chos dang /chos yang dag por sdud
301b6(rgyud): pa po la yang bsod snyoms dang /theg pa chen po la bza' ba gya nam po dang /khyud par du yon dang bcas pa'o//de nas 'di rdzogs par bya'o//de bzhin du bya ste/rtog pa'i rgyu klo ji ste
301b7(rgyud): ba bzhin du rtog pa'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i gsang sngags bklag par bya ste de bzhin du deman par mi 'gyur ro//ji ltar myur du dngos grub nyid kyang stsol bar byed do//bcom ldan 'a
302a1(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
302a2(rgyud): dga'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che shin tu rgyas pa chen po nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal por ral pa gyen du brdzes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa
302a3(rgyud): rdzog so////de nas bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyal po gru 'dzin na bzhugs te/der bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos
302a4(rgyud): te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ral pa gyon pa rdzas kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de bshad//da ni phyi ma'i rgyud gsang ba de gsang chen phyi ma dang bcas/
302a5(rgyud): pa thabs sla ba bde blag tu sgrub pa/cho ga dang bcas pa sngon du 'gro bas brjod pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po badre ba'i tshod dang /sdug
302a6(rgyud): bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams la/snying rtse ba'i ched dang /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis rje su yi rang bar mdzad pa sgrol ma thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i rig pa/ral pa gyi ni
302a7(rgyud): brdzes rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi sbyor ba rnams shod cig/bcom ldan 'daso la sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas rjesu
302b1(rgyud): gnang ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjesu yi rang bar mdzad na bshad par bgyi'o//dang po kho nar sgrub pos re shig skyabs gsum yongasu gzung ba dang /byang
302b2(rgyud): chub du sems bskyed pa dang /ral pa gyen brdze su ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong zhing /dam tshig dang /slob dpon gyis rjesu gnang ba dang /sgrub pa'i thabs dang /mngon par dbang
302b3(rgyud): bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba bla ma la yon phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rig pa blangs te ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram/sku gzugs kyi drung du slar yang sgrol ma gang yang rung ba'i
302b4(rgyud): rig pa blang bar byas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'bum bzlas par bya'o//dus phyis mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas zla ba nya la sku gzugs sam/ras ris kyi spyan
302b5(rgyud): sngar mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas 'o ma can gyi yam shing gi me sbar naso seng ldeng ngom/a ga ru nag po'i ya ma shing sor drug pa'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya
302b6(rgyud): nam langs khar mtshan mo mchod pa ches rga chen po dang /gtor ma'i cho ga ji ltar 'byor pa byas nas slong mo'i zas zos nas dngos grub stsal bar bya'o//de nas rig pa 'grub par 'gyuraro//
302b7(rgyud): de nas las thams cad bya'o//yang 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du dam
303a1(rgyud): tshig dang mo'i bya ba gnas par ji srid gsungs pa'i tsho gas rig pa sgrub par 'dod pas sgrub thabs kyi tshig rlig pa rnam par gsang ba'i ji skad gsungs pas
303a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gzhan gsum bre ste/bla ma la yon rab tu phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu rig pa blangs nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me srang nas dang po re shig tu
303a3(rgyud): rdzi'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas a ga ru nag po'i yam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad dang mar rnams kyi sbyin sreg
303a4(rgyud): brgyad brgya bya'o//tsan+dan dkar po'i yam shing la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas slar yang gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg
303a5(rgyud): brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas dngul gyis phye ma la sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin srog brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas rA gan gyi phye ma la 'o mas btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//
303a6(rgyud): de nas zangs kyi phye ma la zhes btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas mu tig gi 'bras bu'i phye mas skyon sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas tsan+dan dmar po'i phye mas
303a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas tsan+dan dmar po'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btagasau pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas 'bru dang bza' ba dang long spyod/
303b1(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg brgyud brgya b+ha'o//de nas dkar po'i rnam par brtag pa legs par dkrus shing dri zhim po'i gos sku dang bral ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya b+h+ya'o//re re
303b2(rgyud): la lan ri yongasu bzlas naso de nas gu gul dang /shrI b+hA sa dang /gan+d+ha rA sa dang /kun tu du ka dang /g+ha bud rnams gcig tu byas nam gyis btags pa'i bsregs thugs bdun
303b3(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o//de nis ji ltar rnyed pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyis bsregs blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis bsregs blugs bdun
303b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas bza' ba mchog gi bsregs blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas gzhon nu mas bkol ba'i skud pa cha dang bcas par byas pa la mar gyis btags pa'i
303b5(rgyud): bo sregs blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o//ka ra bI ri'i me tog gis bsregs blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas mar gyi bsregs blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas thal ba'i
303b6(rgyud): bsregs blugs bdun sbyini sreg bya'o//de nas sdod bu tsan 'bras bu med pa rnams la mar gyis btags pa'i bsregs blugs bdur sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas mang sar gyi bsregs
303b7(rgyud): blugs bdun sbyin srog byo'o//de nas gser gyi phye ma'i bsregs blugs bdun sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas dar ba'i bsregs blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas yung ba'i phye ma la

310a4(rgyud): byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa smra ba tshul khrims 'chal ba 'am/dge slong nga mi dge slong ma'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma yang rung ste rang gi bslab pa'i mtshams

310a7(rgyud): gyur pa'am/lha thams cad la brnyas pa ste/nyes pa 'di rnams kyis las gzhan byas pa de yang dag par byas pa ma yin rnam pa gzhan du byas par 'gyur ste/de dngos
310b1(rgyud): grub dang bral ban de nyid kyi cho ga las 'das pa'i phyiro//gang la la 'di rnams byed ba de'i dngos grub de skad ma gcig la 'dzegs par byed de rig pa cung zad bzlas pa na dus gzhan du
310b2(rgyud): kun tu gnas te gang yang sgrub pa'i dus can gyi dngos grub ma yin pa de 'dir 'gyuraro//slad yang rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig gsal ba'i sgrub pa'i tsho gas rgyal po'i rkang rjes kyis
310b3(rgyud): bar skangs 'dir brgyad pargya 'am/snga brgyar bsregs blugs mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bye'o//de nyid du thams cad du byed pa'i rgyas po ji srid 'tsha'i bar du dbang du 'gyuraro//
310b4(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba la yang ji skad gsungs pa'i dus kyi sgrub pa la nges par dngos grub mod par mi 'gyur te do sa grub nyams par yang mi 'gyuraro//de nas yang sems dpa' chen po
310b5(rgyud): stong phrag ngargya ci yang ma gsung bar gnas par gyur te/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
310b6(rgyud): phyag skye bo du ma'i nang du lhung ba dge ba'i spyod pa'i mchod nga chung ngu de ston las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te mngon par phyag 'tshal nas byang chub
310b7(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gi zigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal te sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces smraso//

311a6(rgyud): pa thod par 'gyur ba dang /shes par 'gyur ba dang /kha tan byed par 'gyur ba dang /'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /mchod par 'gyur ba dang /glegs pa

311b7(rgyud): mkhas pa'i bya ba gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i tshe de dang /sa dang por so sor thob pa'i ched dang /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du ji ltar sa bya
312a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i khwa lo sgyur ba/bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po rgyun tu nye bar bskyed pa/de bzhin

317a6(rgyud): du ba 'thul bzhin pa la bcud kyis le no//'bar ba mi snang ba dang /skye ba dran par 'gyur//arga'i me tog 'bum gyis sbyin sreg byas na dong tshe 'bum sbyin par byed//sku gzugs kyi spyan/

317b2(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad bya'o//dong tshe brgya lhag par rnying //rigs kyi bdag po dang rigs kyi bdag mo dbang du byed par 'dod pas/gzugs brnyan gyi sbyin sngar arga'i yam shing gis mtshan mo dang/

352b2(rgyud): do nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogasu ras ris bzhugs nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod de 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gos gtsang ma dgos pas ros
352b3(rgyud): ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid dang po g.yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongasu bzlas pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub po'i me tog mchod yon dbul bar bya'o//
352b4(rgyud): slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o//thams cad 'ong bar byed do//'jigs par mi bya'o//bsngags bzlas pa'i rma byas reg par bya'o//ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed//lus kyi nang du son par
352b5(rgyud): gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o//de nas sgrub pa po'i lusu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//skad cig de nyid la sgra li zhing 'khyol pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa rnam pa nya ma 'char ka'i mdag ltar
352b6(rgyud): sdang ba thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do//gang mthong ba dang /lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'bur bar 'gyur//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bsgral pa
352b7(rgyud): gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha rnams skye bar 'gyuraro//sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par
353a1(rgyud): bya'o//gso sbyong can gyis mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o myur nyin khrag bdun du gzhug par bya'o//de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang nan+dan gyi chus
353a2(rgyud): mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog po'i shing 'khrur gzhug par bya'o//de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyong can gyis bzo bos sing+ge byed du gzhug par bya'o//de nas rgyu skar sner ma la dkon
353a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen byas nas dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slongs mo bza'o bar bya'o//ras ris kyi spyan sngar mched pa rgya chen po byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
353a4(rgyud): gtom dbul bar bya'o//de nas sgrub pa po gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas log pa g.yas pas seng+ga mnan te ji srid seng ge g.yo bar
353a5(rgyud): byed pa/de srid du bzlas par bya'o//g.yos pas dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon ma skye ste 'jigs par mi byed do//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i
353a6(rgyud): yungs kar rnams kyis seng+ge l-i gzhu bar bya'o//seng+ge sra chen po sgrogs par byed do//sgrub pa po yang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyu ro//de nas sgrub pa pos
353a7(rgyud): lan bdun brjod nas seng+ge la 'dzegs te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'das na sing+ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro//yid kyi rlung ltar 'gro ba dang /
353b1(rgyud): na pa lakhyo d+hA ma nang gang na na da gang su shA N+Dag/ na zla dru na rgyu ba spyod du/
353b2(rgyud): te ma sba bar 'a ma dang nas rgan na zhing ji snyed byi ma zla ba gsum gyi bar du ngas ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par gyi'o//de nas ri'i ris g.yo bar 'gyuraro//yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzug
353b3(rgyud): brnyan g.yo bar byed//nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur//nI lA Ta ka la brgyad pa rgyur mngon par bsngags te mdud pa bya'o//gyad g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyuraro//thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcis
353b4(rgyud): bzlas te spyi bor bzhag par byas na g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur te/gyad kyi dngos gru'o//dkar po'i chos gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar ma
353b5(rgyud): bar bzlas pa byas nas bzungs shig/de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal na 'od zer byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas
353b6(rgyud): nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed//nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo cig smyung bar gnas pas gzugs pa
353b7(rgyud): gyi mdun du go ba bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam la sred med kyi bu'i stob su 'gyur te bzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med pa
354a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro//gang blong ba dang ldan pa do gnas sum brgya 'tsho bar byed//nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la hin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bol ba'o shing
354a2(rgyud): gi me rab tu spang nas be kaM kA ta'i yaM shring la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/dong tshe cig d+hi do//dkar po'i bcu gsum pa lo nyin mtshan du sbyang bar
354a3(rgyud): gnas pas sa las byung ba'o 'dod pa'i lha byas nas de'i khar 'bras thug po che'i stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/nyi ma bdun la gang bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyu ro//nag po'i
354a4(rgyud): bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas dur khrod du song ste/sa la ma lhung ba'i ba glang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsan+dan
354a5(rgyud): dmar po'i chus bkrus mo tog dmar po dang /dri dang me tog gis mngon par mchod cing de nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug te/gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o//ji srid thod pa
354a6(rgyud): g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o//de'i tshe grub par 'gyuraro//de'i tshe sen mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste/gang brjod pa de byed do//zhi bar byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag
354a7(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyuraro//ras ris kyi spyan sngar mA la ti'i me tog no dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyes shig/zhi bar 'gyur//
354b1(rgyud): sngon spyad pa byas pa/nag po'i bco lnga pa la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o//phyi rol tu 'byung po thod pa'i/
354b2(rgyud): gtor ma byin te/de nas na ga ge ser gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris shig/dkyil 'khor bcing ba yang byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ji srid du skor mdo' ltung ba de srid du bzlas
354b3(rgyud): bar bya'o//slar yang ji srid ras ris 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//dngos grub kyi mtshan mo gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
354b4(rgyud): byas nas 'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//'dod pa'i gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byeda'o//rig pa 'dzin thams cad kyis gnod pa medado//sngon spyad pa
354b5(rgyud): byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mtshang nas lag
354b6(rgyud): pa g.yas pas byin te ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du 'brar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//'bor ba tsam gyi rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongasu bskor te na mkha'i mthil du 'phung bar byed//lo
354b7(rgyud): brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa sgra li zhing 'khyil ba rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'o//'bebs pa la 'dug pas so//dug 'joms pa la yal 'dab kyis//bdag nyid srung
355a1(rgyud): / byung bcu na pa nas ban tu batshud garnanas da na rgyu na dag pags nga pa das nga/
355a2(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o//gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do//ma la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'azungs shig/nyi myi bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur//ngas ris kyis sbyin

355a7(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyog bya ba byas nas nyi ma cig la thun gsum du yongasu bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis bzlas par bya'o//rna ba so sor rnyed//nad la 'ang
355b1(rgyud): rgyun ras dazigs dbang phyug ting 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i tshogs ras sam 'bras bu can la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drar gzhug par bya'o//de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen pa byas nas/
355b2(rgyud): stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o//ku sha'i stan lo 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsuM du khrus byed cing gcing ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis tshes cig nas//
355b3(rgyud): bsams nas ji srid cig gi bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o//de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang /nas zan za ba'am ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za bas dus
355b4(rgyud): gsum du khrus bya zhing gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so sor sbar te pad+ma stong gis mchod par bya'o//nag po'o phyo/

356a1(rgyud): mar mo gsum sbyar te u dum ba ra'i ye shing gis med rab tu sbyar nas me tog re re la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas sbyar gyis byugs te sbyin sra
356a2(rgyud): bya'o//glang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyuraro//mtshan mo bdun du dus gsum du yongasu bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrangs par 'gyuraro//nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos par

356b4(rgyud): rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa'i shing blun dang bcas pas khyad par du byas pa mtho gang ngam khru gang tsam ma ma sor

356b6(rgyud): lo ma bskam pa'am/kha dog nag po yang sbyin par bya'o//srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa med pa yang kun tu 'jog pas khaM dog gzhan mchog dang tha ma nyid kyang spangs
356b7(rgyud): nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod do//ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang gzhan spang bar bya'o//de nas me thab kun nas gru bzhi pa byas nas 'og nyid du
357a1(rgyud): bskor bar bya ste/gzhu gang dang /khru gang gi chud las khru gsum 'am/khru gnyis sam/khru bzhi ste/de bzhin khe nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma
357a2(rgyud): bsngags te de la pad+ma'i rnam pas so//de nas kha khyer kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa yang 'bad pas so//ngas ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang /rgyas pa can yang rung ste/
357a3(rgyud): 'di rnams yang dag par rab tu bsgrags mngon spyod duni bshad pa la/dbusu rdo rje bya ba ni//rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa//gzhan yang me thab khru gnyis pa//thad kar yang ni bdun

357a5(rgyud): yang //lha yi khang pa stong pa dang //rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang //de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni//sgrub po'i phyogasu gsungs po yin//gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams gsu

357b4(rgyud): bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa//de bzhin ku sha'i rnam pa yi//zhi dang rgyas po rtag tu bya//mar gad dang ni 'dra ba dang //de bzhin dkar po'i rtsa rnams kyis//sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu bA
357b5(rgyud): rgyal ba mchog gis bklag pa yin//'dir ni dri med chu la yang //dag pa srin bu spangs pa las//rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru//kun nas bskor ba bya ba ya //rang snang phyi rol brdzun pa
357b6(rgyud): 'am//cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya//gceng mas rtsa yis sgron ma'i ched la bya ba'o//de nas khu tshur ched byas na//'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya//kha yau rlung gis bu mi byi//de bzhin gos
357b7(rgyud): kyi mtha' yis dang //gos kyi chun po'im sham thabs dang //sgrib g.yogasau dag ni spangs pa ya si//na mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung //nye bar bcom dang mngango na dga' ba'am//gtsang ma nyams
358a1(rgyud): babral bas dang //de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang //rlung yab bya'o rlung bzang pos//me ni yang dag brnam par bya//de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yis//sngags shes no/
358a2(rgyud): sbar bar bya//shin tu mnyam bzhag sbyin sreg don//bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dge/byas nas yang ni mtha' rung ni//ba yo mar gyi bsregs blugs gsum//der ni sbyin bye de//
358a3(rgyud): las ni//gang yang tshad du bya ba'o//sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad dang //rang rang sngags kyi mgon po la//de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya//de tshe ma la sbyin bsreg bya//gsang sngags
358a4(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas pa yis//rtag tu me ni spyan drong ngo //bdag nyid rtsom pa'i dri zhim po'i//me tog kho nas rtag tu bad//sngags pa gnas la mkhos pa yis//gdan ni gnas
358a5(rgyud): la phul ba pa//gsang sngags nge so gzhan du min//zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la//sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsume//rgyas don me la sbyin bsreg bya//sngags kyi las kyi
358a6(rgyud): thad du//pad+ma'i gdan la nyer 'dug pas//zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin bsreg bya//rgyas pa can la 'di rnams nyid//sbyin bya gzugs 'thun sngags rnams kyis//mngon spyod can du gnas pa
358a7(rgyud): la//gzhan gyi gzugasu lta ba bya//dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni//rim pa bzhin du me thab tu//ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri//bdun du yongasu bzlas pa yis//mngon par ngos pa
358b1(rgyud): de yis tshe//'byung gnas nges par bzhag pa rnams//ji ltar gnyis kar gnas de bzhin//yam shing rdzas dang bsreg pa dang //mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dang ldan//de bzhin kho nas zho bsres
358b2(rgyud): pas//bya'o sdong ngam 'bum chad dam//yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya//sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du//rig pa lan cig bzlas pa yi//mig dang gtsug phud 'bar ba yi//phreng ba'i
358b3(rgyud): me la me lce cig/de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las//sbyin bsreg nges par bya ba yang //rgyas pa can la de dang dbang //drag po'i las ni smad pa ste//rgyas pas sbyangs sbyin bsreg las//rab sbyor me/
358b4(rgyud): ni bsngags par 'gyur//sgra tsan brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan//rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags//deng ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed//dkar ba'i me la sbyin ba sreg bya//gal te kha
358b5(rgyud): dog mar de bzhin//rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grub 'dod//nag po dus kha ser skya la'ang //g.yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid//kha dog rnams gsum rab 'jug pa//dngos grub rnam pa
358b6(rgyud): gsum yi do//sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gang /rnam de sna tshogs khakho dag nyid//de la sngags kyis dngos grub med//slar yang lag pa'i 'thil 'dir ni//rnam pa snga tsho/
358b7(rgyud): kha do gnyid//kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod//ma ni bar ba mthong nas ni//slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya//spyan drang byas la gzugs kha dog/gal te sngags kyi sa
359a1(rgyud): grub 'gyur//smad yung sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa/ras kyi chog ma 'ing bA mas//ldan pas gshag su gsol ba nyid//me la skyugs brjod par b+h+yo//b+hur nir
359a2(rgyud): btags pas kyang //dkyil 'khor 'di ru rlom pa gzhan//mchog de nyid kyis de gyis shig/sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang //gshegasu gsol ba'i las can gyis//las rnams
359a3(rgyud): de nyid kyis bya'o//der ni me yis spyod pa'i las//de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi//spyan sngar brtsams nos 'grub par byed//de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa//de bzhin bshe
359a4(rgyud): brgyal bas bsngags//las rnams kun nas der bya'o//gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste//khyad par sdig pa can gyi las//rgyal ba mchog gis smad pa dang //gang du 'jig
359a5(rgyud): rten dang 'gal sbed//'khor los bsgreng ba nyid du langs//de nas byang sems sa yi bdag/de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa//de nas lha nyid 'grub par byed//'dir ni rtag
359a6(rgyud): tu sbyar shes pa//ris ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas//sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni//bar snang la ni spyod par byed//de nas sa bla'i lha dang ni//gnod sbyin nyid dam gnod sbyin mo//
359a7(rgyud): 'grogs par byed cing rtag tu yang //rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid/yang na yul 'dir 'khor ba nyid//yang ni rig dang rig 'dzin nyid//lha min nyid dang sems can kun//dang/
359b1(rgyud): byed rjes 'gro 'gugs par byed//sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//sems tshon sa bcur gnas bcas pa//sbyin srog las kyis 'gugs par byed
359b2(rgyud): sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos//lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin//khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid//'byung po kun la yang dag nges//mi bdago nyid dang de bzhin yang //dbang gi don//
359b3(rgyud): du sems can kun//mi bdag des sam mi des ni//sa stengs thams cad mnyam pa yis//las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni//rtag tu sbyin bsreg gis bya'o//nges par las kun yang/
359b4(rgyud): dag rten//bdag nyid brtsom pas lhan cig sgrub//dpal gyi don du de yi las//mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang //yang na chung ngu nyid bsgrub bya//de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi//dngos grub brjod/
359b5(rgyud): ba'i don du slar//lhan cig dngos grub blta bar bya//sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa//las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing //bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi//sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug
359b6(rgyud): byed//de nas ras ris gsang sngags 'di//bdun bzlos pa'im brgyad bzlas pa//rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+he bo d+hi satwA nAn a pra tI ha tA ga te satwA nAn tad+ya thA/
359b7(rgyud): dz+wa la tiSh+Tha hUM/ru ru bi shwa sam+b+he be swA hA/shing la sprir ba 'dis bzlas te//slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas//sngags rigs mai l-i sbyin sreg gyis//me tig dadug pa dza/
360a1(rgyud): yang rung //kun nas thams cad nyid la ni//lan+d+ra bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis//khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya//las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa//cho ga rgyul//
360a2(rgyud): snga ma yis//rab sbyor nyid kyis byi ba'o//las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i//phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma//de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas//dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa
360a3(rgyud): yis//las rnams thams cad brtsom par byos//gal te nus pa mthong ba na//dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni//rtag tu 'bras can sa de yi//gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du nges/
360a4(rgyud): par mchog 'di sbyin pa'o//dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba//gsang sngags rgya yis rab zhugs pa//'bras bur bcas pa kho na yis//dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya//rgyal ba'i sgra
360a5(rgyud): dang sa Ta ha//rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges//thams cad du ni smad par brjod//sbyin sreg la ni gnas bcas pa//gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni//med pa chags can nam
360a6(rgyud): dge ba'i sgra//rnam pa sna tshogs nges sgrogs pa'i//sgra yang rung ste rgyal bso bsngags//rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang //yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra//gdugs dang rgyal
360a7(rgyud): mtshan pa den dang //btsun mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang //mchod yin mthong na dngos grub rgyu//rnam pa 'di yis bsngags pa'am//rab bsngags 'jog/
360b1(rgyud): rnam mchod pa'o//dge slong dang na dge slong ma// rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi//sna tshogs spyod la su zug//zhes//byang chub sems dang rdza sno pal po chu phog pa chen po
360b2(rgyud): do sde ral ba rgyan rjes kyi rtog pa las bgreng 'phreng sring bu'i cho ga'i leru rab khyim bcu gcig pa nga su rdzo daso/de nas ras ris kyi sprin sngar k+She shing gi me tog stong phrag
360b3(rgyud): kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyu ro//nad thams cad las rkang shu dang //bdug pa'i rma rnams la sa'i gong buM la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//sngon spyad pa/
360b4(rgyud): byas pas ba byung lngas lus skyong na byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te'i ma gtung bar bya'o//rtsa dwa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas por bya'o//phyi nas nag pa'i brgyad pa
360b5(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la lte bar 'dug s+ho/bil ba'i ye shing la mdzo dben dang /sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg kyis
360b6(rgyud): shig/'phags pa 'jam dpalnga gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar byed do//des sgrub pa paM la bskor ba byas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brtan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de
360b7(rgyud): nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang ba rnyed pa de rnyed//reg pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang /khyod ji 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das
361a1(rgyud): de 'dra ba nga'o//zhes//dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang /sgyid rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed//nyin mtshan
361a2(rgyud): du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya che no byas nas arga'i yaM shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par
361a3(rgyud): byed//a ka ru dang /pri yang ku dang no ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te khaM phor kha sbyar du byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas lus las byugs te/
361a4(rgyud): g.yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//'bum phrag
361a5(rgyud): bcu gcig zlos shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ngo //ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bu mo phrag bdun bzlos shig/mi snang bar 'gyur ro//nad kyis btab pa la ram ris kyi sbyin
361a6(rgyud): sngar 'bum phrag bco lngas zlos shig/nad 'joms par byed//sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig/bcud dam bcud kyis len so sor rnyo do//de zos pas gnyer ma
361a7(rgyud): dang sgra dkar spangs par 'gyuraro//lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
361b1(rgyud): sho/rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du 'gyur//mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu phyin te 'dod pa nye bar bzhag pa ni mya gtog so//rAs ris kyi spyan sngar arga ye shing 'dzum sbyin sred
361b2(rgyud): gyis shig/gser srang ba rgyu so sor rnyed//'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig bgegs med par 'gyuraro//pa n+ya ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig/skye bo thaMd dga' ba
361b3(rgyud): 'gyur//bum phrag gsum zlos shig/rkeng pa'i nad med par 'gyur//rims gyis btab pa la ku shwas phyag par bya'o//bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bstags
361b4(rgyud): pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o//bskal pa bzang por 'gyuraro//dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/gos bye ba bcu gnyi so sor rnyed//rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin
361b5(rgyud): tu mdzes pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang btsas pa'i mchod rton du ras ris bzhugs nas nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor
361b6(rgyud): le blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid bzlas par bya'o//gang gi tshe me rtag 'phro bar byed pa dang /ji srid 'dra lnga 'gyur ba de sri du bzlas par bya'o//de nas gru byar 'gyur te rig pa
361b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byedado//rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang /thogs pa med par 'gro bar byebya'o//snga bar
362a1(rgyud): langs nas lor bzlas par byed//mchog sbyin par byed do//zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nad chen po grolo//zla ba cig tu zlos shig dus ma yin par gu gul/
362a2(rgyud): gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed//nyin gcig pa dang /nyin gnyis pa dang /nyin gsum pa dang /nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnamasu 'ong //bud med dbang du byed pa la
362a3(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar lA pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro//'di ni yugs mos skyes bu yi'o//rgyal
362a4(rgyud): po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yaM shing la/zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /mor gyis btags pa/stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro//rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la
362a5(rgyud): mtshan mo thun gsum du lan tshe nyi shu rtsa gcig skyon sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro//mgo bo la lan gsum mam bdun du mngon par bsngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par
362a6(rgyud): byed na rgyal po'i nang chen por 'gyur ro//brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i rma byol mdongs kyis phyag par byas na dug 'jom so//ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums
362a7(rgyud): por byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsams par bya ste skal po bzang por 'gyur//ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes cig nas btsems te/
362b1(rgyud): 'am dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gaus lan gsum brdzes te/a ga ru dang du ru ka dang /tsan+dan+da rnams ba sregs shing dkar gsum gyis gtor ma dngul bar bya'o//'thung ngo /
362b2(rgyud): thaMd pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa 'am/thung las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog dang /ba'i mar gyis mar me gsumo//mthar mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas mtshon thog zag
362b3(rgyud): tu bzlas par bya'o//gang don du gnyer ba de rnye do//thun motsham su bza' ba yang ji ltar nus pa sbyin//ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mtshan mo gsum du sbyang
362b4(rgyud): bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i yi shing la zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang /sa 'gul pa dang /
362b5(rgyud): mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi grub par 'gyuraro//rno ma'i smig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums tAM stong phrag rdzogs pa'i srer bya
362b6(rgyud): byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug tAM ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//'bras bu can la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon
362b7(rgyud): bsngags po byas nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o//de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do//nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do//
363a1(rgyud): 'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon par dris nas/de bzhin du khron pa 'am/mtsho bran du gzhug par bya'o//de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul
363a2(rgyud): byed du gzhug/der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gan so//de nas blangs par bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa bgrod bko' ba can
363a3(rgyud): gyi mdun pa'am/rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran pa byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyuraro//gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o//de 'phagos pa'i zhal du yang bcug
363a4(rgyud): nas cung zad yang dag par gsungs par mdzod cig ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur//chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsams te ste
363a5(rgyud): phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o//dug med par 'gyur//de la brjod pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par
363a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro//sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas tsa ru bza' zhing mi smra bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum
363a7(rgyud): bzlas//zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad ci zla bas dngos grub dang /zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyuraro//lus kyis
363b1(rgyud): kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do//zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byed do//gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par dris nas de'i sbyong du rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag ste g.yogs pa
363b2(rgyud): su 'dum bzlas par bya'o//klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byedado//klu thams cad kyi gnasu rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o//der rab tu 'jug par byed//de bzhin
363b3(rgyud): du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed//thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung ngu blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongasu thor cig/sbrul bzlog par
363b4(rgyud): byas par 'gyur ro//slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste bos dkar po'i kha dog can la sa las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te/
363b5(rgyud): mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khug shig shing slong bar byeda'o//sdong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang ral grwa dang /sta gre dang /'khor lo dang /b+hu Sh+TaN+Da la sogs pa rnams pa byung
363b6(rgyud): lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i bsregs blugs bya ste/rje sra ga du yang rung ba blangs nus ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig phyis nas ji ltar
363b7(rgyud): byas de'i rin gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi ye shing gis me sbar te//ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o//de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i rim
364a1(rgyud): bu mos bsrungs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o//de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bkang ba la yang //de nas blangs te gur gum
364a2(rgyud): gyis za mu rtag tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas dazung ngan mtshan mo gsum du phyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mcho de pa
364a3(rgyud): rgya chen po byas taM a shrat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu bkris nas bzhis dag bo bar bya'o//ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro
364a4(rgyud): ba dang /du ba 'thul ba dang /'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byedado//du bas mi snang ba'o//'bar bas/
364a5(rgyud): na mkha' la 'gro'o//lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byedado//sems can thams cad kyis mi chug so//de bzhin du mig sman pa bla sgrub par byed pa dang /gi baM la tshi ga 'di'o//dkar
364a6(rgyud): po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i 'dab mer bzhag ste ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/ji srid dro ba dang /du ba 'thul ba dang /'bar bar gyur pa

364b1(rgyud): phyugs gsum gyis pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa'am/brgyud pa gdan dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas nas gur gum dang /gi bo dang /gA bur rnams na mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar bcug

364b3(rgyud): bAdapA la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar ba do srid du bzlas par bya'o//de nas pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa rig par 'gyur ro//sems can
364b4(rgyud): thaMd kyis mi chug so//lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed//de bzhin du gdub bu dang /co dra pan dang /lcags sgrog dang /rdo rje dang dgra sta dang /'khor lo yang zhes pa'o//'di ni 'khor
364b5(rgyud): lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga pa'i 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi cha do//gang+gA'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ras ris kyi
364b6(rgyud): spyan sngar gong bur bya'o//dri la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan+dan dmar pos mchod de ku ri b+hai ra'i me tog dmar po dang phreng ba phul nas drikar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyi
364b7(rgyud): skyong bar gnas pos slongs mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o//gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//ras ris
365a1(rgyud): lam dz+nyAn pa b+h+yas nas d+ma dang /mu N+Daka dang /'dun pa la sogs bla rnams dul nas hUM stsur bar 'byung ba'i ma m-i sprul nas 'khor lar byugs dran
365a2(rgyud): rA yang mar me bani dang /bu phul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o//ku she'i khris la nye bar 'dug/nAn dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan ra bzlas te re res bstan par byar/
365a3(rgyud): srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o//de nas 'khor lo sgra dang //'od zer 'phro ba dang /de nas 'bar//gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang /
365a4(rgyud): chub sems dpar thams cad la phyag byas nas reg pazlos shrIg/de blangs par bya'o//blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang panas parig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te depag
365a5(rgyud): tshad stong phrag bcur rlig pa 'dzin po chen po klu dang gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin po thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyuraro//lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed//shin yang ba
365a6(rgyud): can du skye bar 'gyuraro//de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na so so le tA ka dang /tsan+dan dmar po dang /rgya skyegs dang /gu gul dang /tA rA bar tI ka'i rtsa ba dang /lcags kyi phye ma dang
365a7(rgyud): gi ri kor+t+ti dang /'bru'i phub ma dang /ru d+ha dang /rgya spos dang /sbrang rtsi dang /pi pi ling dang /tu ru ka ka rnams/cig tu byas nas phye mi zhib mor byed du gzhug/de nas sor skya rgyu
365b1(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gyis cig tu byas nas phye ma des rmya shugs go tshig gu tsam gyi ral bu byed du gzhug/de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am dkar
365b2(rgyud): po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam grangs te a shrat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyi
365b3(rgyud): spyan sngar bgrang phreng dang til mang dang /phye ma la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin par bya'o//ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag pa g.yos pas mnan te ji
365b4(rgyud): sred du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//yang dag par bgos te/khor bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lha gzugs can rnams 'ong ngo //grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas
365b5(rgyud): mthong ngo //lo brgya phrag sngar 'tsho bar byed//de nas 'bar byed na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro//dngos grub rnam pa gnyis//'di yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub
365b6(rgyud): pa'i thab su 'gyur ro//gsum pa 'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyuraro//rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin
365b7(rgyud): du rtog par byed do//bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogaso////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
366a1(rgyud): pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi sman gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus son pa'i byang chub
366a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i//sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas//dkyil 'khor las/
366a3(rgyud): can thams cad ni//sems dpa' chen po smros shig smos//sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang //phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel//sgrub po rnams la phan pa yin//don//
366a4(rgyud): phyir 'dren pas rgyal bar smros//ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi//lus can bar mar gyur ba rnams//khyod kyi tshig gi mchog gyur pa//'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni//myur du
366a5(rgyud): lha rnams sgrub pa la//sems can gang du rab zhugs pa//de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang //sangs rgyas bya ba stong rnams kyis//thams cad de la rjes
366a6(rgyud): yi rang //dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa//dngos grub kun byed dag pa ni//sems can rnams kyi mgon pos smros//sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig/sems can cho ga yang
366a7(rgyud): dag 'gyur//dkyil 'khor gang 'di thos nas ni//rab tu dad pa skye bar 'gyuraro//dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang //de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing //dkyil 'khor sems can thad
366b1(rgyud): kyi gzi brjid stabs ni rnam par 'phol//mthong dam thos nas de nas ni//rab tu dad pa spyod par byed//gang yin de rnams bdag gis ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni//thob pa'i ched du 'ag//
366b2(rgyud): lung bstan to//ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba//'dzag rten mgron po rnams kyang ni//rje su yi rang 'gyur ba yin//dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel byed pa//de bzhin ston kun
366b3(rgyud): sdud pa//rmi la ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba//sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon//yang dge bka' yis spros shig smos//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
366b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das
366b5(rgyud): gang na ba der thal mos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshigasu bcad pa bstod pi tshigs mngon par bstod do//shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal//phun
366b6(rgyud): tshogs yon tan du ma tsan//rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul reb ma nyams//rgyun tu dkar ba'i gos dang ldan//mchod sdeng zhal ni 'dam skyes dri//blo bzang snying po brtan pa 'dzin//gang phyir
366b7(rgyud): khod ni phun tshigs nyid//'di ni 'gro ba de dag go//dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni//mgon po lha rnams kyi ni ste//rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang //de yi tshig ni rab dag pa//dpa' du
367a1(rgyud): pa rang da//'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed// de bzhin du da yasan//rgyu yi mdzes mas kun 'grungs pa//brgyan kyis 'di ni dab ga pa las//skyes pa'i dang //
367a2(rgyud): bor rab stongs dang //g.yo ba'i spro dge'i dbang bI dang //kun nas de ser gyi ri dang ldan//cod pa na yang ni lhan cig gang na//lha dang lha min ltar bcas pa'i//lhag pa'i theg pa 'di
367a3(rgyud): kye//'jig rten par de'i srid pa dang //skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs//byung ba mdzes ldan pa nyid kyi//'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste//ga rnams zla ba lta bu drA/pr-I//lha rnams kyis bzung

367a6(rgyud): dam pa ni//rnam pade nas dang dri 'khor ba//bum dkar glang bas so yi//bum pa dri rnams dbyung bskur zhing //tsan+dan sa mchog yan lago bshad//ge baM thig le rnam par dkru/

367b1(rgyud): mi 'pho bas//gzhan du 'chi med logs pa ni//de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi//drug gis btab pa smad pa ltar//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i//char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni//thun
367b2(rgyud): las khyod ni lam gyi mgo/dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang //me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la//rnam par cher phyin longs spyod ldan//bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid//btsos nas sngar med cho ga/

368a1(rgyud): /g.yo rab tu sbyin par byed//phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom//gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs rnyan brtan//dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni//'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa//

373a1(rgyud): / ts+tsha rlu glun nga/na shAm+bA / u sarnamams pa/na na r+m+ma n+da d+hAr+m+marmA tu r+m+mahA/

374a6(rgyud): lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste//de nas kha dog thams cad de//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing nas ni//rdza ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyud bzlas//de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni//sangs rgyas byang chub med/

374b1(rgyud): 'dug pa'i sems can zad kyi//sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o//dkyil 'khor yang ni thams cad kyi//slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams//ral cig snying po nyid kyis ni//thog mar srung ba byas nas ni//byang shar
374b2(rgyud): phyogs nas brtsams byas te//tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya//rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid//dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris//yongasu bcad cing lus dkar ba'i//slob de de bzhin gshegs

379b1(rgyud): bcwa brgyad la 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang /phyag stong pa dang /phyag brgya pa dang /phyag bcu gnyis pa dang /phyag drug pa dang /phyag bzhi pa dang /zhabs stong pa dang /zhang

379b3(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /mtha' yas rnam rgyal dang /rnam rgyal chen po dang /lha'i mtha' dang /mtha' dpag tu med pa dang /yid kyis shing rta dang /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa rig pa'i
379b4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po 'di rnams pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo srid par 'jug pa nye bar spyod par byed pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa pad+ma'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus phyag na pad+ma dang
379b5(rgyud): g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/cung zad sgrol ma la lta bar gyur pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nye log su gos dkar mo pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/rab tu dong ba'i sku/
379b6(rgyud): pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/phyag na pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa dang /g.yas pas baglang phreng bsnams pa'o//de'i yang g.yasu phreng cig la
379b7(rgyud): bsten pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi gtso mo bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can dang /dkar mo dang /dkar mo chen mo dang /dpal bdun ma dang /pad+ma go bo
380a1(rgyud): sha dang /blugs ldan ma dang /sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i zla ba ma dang /longs spyod ldan ma dang /bde ldan ma dang/grags pa ldan ma dang /shes rab gos can ma dang /stem
380a2(rgyud): gcig ma dang /stobs mang po dang /stobs bcu ma dang /sangs rgyas kyi yum dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gi yum zhes pa 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas
380a3(rgyud): 'khrugs pa/pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa lha'i bud med kyi cha byang 'chang ga/rab tu dang ba'i sku/cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o//
380a4(rgyud): pad+ma bsnams shing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/rang gi gzugasu bri bar bya'o//sgrol ma'i 'og tu ci bgyi zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzheg
380a5(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/lus brtan pa nag po mthar byed pa'i gzugs can/khro gnyer du byas pa/mche ba gtsigs pa zhal gcig gis drag tu bzhed pas gdangs bzhin/
380a6(rgyud): pa/gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bzhin pa/dang pos sgrol ma lta ba'o//phyag dang pos rin po che mthong ba 'byin par byed bzhin pa/g.yon dang pos zhag pa bsnams pa/
380a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o//de'i yang g.ya su khro bo chen po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba lha tshon po la nye bar 'dug pa/pad+ma'i chu bas dkris pa'i
380b1(rgyud): lus can ud pa lnga ltar sto bsrungs/bcom ldan 'das mya 'phags masgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa dri bur bya'o//'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i cha bya thams cad sngar brjod pa kho na'o//
380b2(rgyud): ral pa gyen ba rjes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bco
380b3(rgyud): to//bcom ldan 'das ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi snying po sbyin par bgyi'o//gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur
380b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang /nye bar 'tshe ba dang /nad 'go ba thaMd rab tu zhi bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs
