380b6(rgyud): 'di la sa dkyil 'khor che//dam pa yang dag rab 'chang byed// la 'khor rten pa'i rnam bau// yi dkyil la kho kun tu bri//de yi dbu sa sud du m+b+hanyam//gru ba n+de yo su skor bar bya//gnyis par
380b7(rgyud): pa po song ste/dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyi ni//ri mo bzhi pa rnams kyi //pad+ma 'dab bai rgyod bri bar bya//pid+mo yi ge ze 'bru l-i/'jig rten mgon po bged par bya//bad+ma'i
381a1(rgyud): 'dab ma'i phreng ba rnams//sangs rgyas gzugs brgyun kun tu bri//de ru srab dpon rab bzhugs nas/pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/dkyil 'khor gnas la nyer 'dug pas mnyam pa/
381a2(rgyud): gzhag pas mnyam par dgod//ji ltar rgyu la pad+ma gang //gnas kyi nyes pa mang pos kyang //gos par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir//'gro la chags pas yang dag byed//lan cig 'di gsungs dpar//
381a3(rgyud): brjod nas//de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis//yang dag bkug nas pad+ma che//spyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur//de la 'di ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu chen po'o//oM ma hA pad+me hUM dza hrI//de nas
381a4(rgyud): bac+doMs 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dben la mthong ba sbyin par byedado//yang na 'od zer stong par bye'o//de nas 'di nyid kyi phyag rgyas slob ma rab tu gtsug par bya ste
381a5(rgyud): dngar dkar pos gos dkar po dang /gtsug tor dkar pos mgo bo dkri bar bya'o//'di nyid 'jig rten du rab tu brjod nas de nas smros shig zheso de nu pad+ma log pa g.yon du byin nas g.yos pra
381a6(rgyud): chu snod byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas thams cad pad+ma che//dId+ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/de nyid lhan cig brtag par byazhes
381a7(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang //ting 'dzin yang bslab par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o//de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste de bzhin du
381b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris nas dbus kyi zo 'bru la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o//de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu gzigs par byed pa
381b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid thob par byed//nis pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor//de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/de bzhin kho nar dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas dbus pad+ma stong
381b3(rgyud): dgong du bzhug/de nas pad+ma stong po de bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste lan re ldan re yongasu bzlas naso//de nas slob ma rab tu bcug nas dam tshig brjod por bya'o//bu dang slob ma'i tshang du yA/
381b4(rgyud): dam tshig nyams par mi bya ste//dam tshig bdag la brjod par bya//gang phyir pad+ma'i rnam pa las//'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dag/dam tshig gi ni dkyil 'khor ro//las kyi dkyil la hrI/
381b5(rgyud): bri bar bya//mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni//sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mchod//lus kyis spyan ras gzigs mgon la//ngag gis phyag na rdo rje la//las las na mkha'i snying por//
381b6(rgyud): skyes//ji ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ro rab lhun po'i ri'i rtse mor 'khod pa rang gi ti nge 'dzin gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku
381b7(rgyud): thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad zhes//de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyis ches gcig nas brtsams te/rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun tu bzlas pas
382a1(rgyud): ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'phros nas sgrub pa pa'i pad+ma'i dbus 'kho
382a2(rgyud): de slar yang de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan 'byung ste sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shong brtan par 'gyur ro//de nas bdag gi dngos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs dpa
382a3(rgyud): phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan pa dang ji srid du 'phur bar byed//sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro zhes//de nas sgrub pa gzhan/
382a4(rgyud): drang las chen po thams cad 'byung ste 'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i
382a5(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyuraro//'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyuraro//de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang
382a6(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa lags pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa lngas bzlas pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon du 'gyur ro//de nas phyag rgya chen po ni/

382b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' so sor d+he do//de nas zhal du rab tu 'jug par bye'o//de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor d+he do//ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur ro//thog mar brjod
382b2(rgyud): pos gzhan gyi grong dang grong khyed srung ba dang /mdzes par spyad pas thams cad bya'o//'bebs pa la tsan+dan gyi gdug pas gdon 'bebaso//shI ri ShA'i me tig gis sems can
382b3(rgyud): dbang du byed do//dri bzang po'i me tig gis sems can thoms cad rengs par byed do//sa dkar pos bud med do//dri zhim po'i me tog gis tshim rkun rengs pa'o//yungs kar
382b4(rgyud): dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis ri dgas dang bya reng so//yungs kar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par byed do//rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par byed do//dus gsume du bzlas
382b5(rgyud): pas rmi la mo dran pa 'joms par byed do//til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad 'ongs par byed do//bya gag gi bshog pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do///

383a1(rgyud): sreg gis so//bu ma dbang du byed pa la yang ngo //don gzhan la yang sbyin srog dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi mdun du ny+dza ma re rer dus
383a2(rgyud): gsum du bzlas pa bya'o//ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar los chen po thams cad kyi rgyu 'phrul lo//de nas sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du khro ba'i
383a3(rgyud): rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khar gsungs//khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang //sgo khyud d+ha bAbAs des gnas pa//phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya//

383a5(rgyud): dkar po dmar po ser po dang //nag po ljang ku tshon snga lnga'i//phye ma 'jam po rnams kyis ni//sol mi'i rig pas mngon bsngags pas//bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya//
383a6(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste//g.yon du rol pa gcig ma bya//g.yas su 'dam skyes phyi rol gyi//sgo khyud snying por ji rigs grub//yongasu 'dod pas rdo rigs bya//dri
383a7(rgyud): yi ge mos yangs su //rdo rje khu chung sgribs pa che//bar du 'dzag rten gsum chog/rdo rje 'chang tshon 'did pa yis//'das pas rnam par thim par 'gyur//khu tshur
383b1(rgyud): chur bcas//du ni g.yas kyi sgo khang du//stobs po che ni rab bzhag nas//nywa yis mgrin par stobs pa che//nub phyogs su ni bya ba'o//g.yas kyi phye yi sgo khang du//de bzhin dbang phyug
383b2(rgyud): chen po bya//dri la mdung gi phyag rgya dgod//ji 'dra'i u mra bri bar bya//lho yi grwa gnyis su bya ba//phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o//nub dang byung ge grA rnams su//log 'dren phyag rgya//
383b3(rgyud): rdo rje'o//byung bi grwa gnyis rnams ni//mkhas pas rig gis sbran pa bya//shar gyi grwa gcig rnams su ni//ma mo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod//b+h+ri gi re Ta log 'dren bcas//de nas rnga ltar/
383b4(rgyud): 'byor pa yis//tshogs ji bzhin lha rnams mchod//khro bo stobs chen sgrol mas nan//bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya//kau ra bI ra ta yin//blangs nas rang gnas skyang gnas
383b5(rgyud): pas//mkhas pas byung gi sgo khang du//gtsang mar gang du rab 'jug bya//blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya//khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad nas//ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yiHsa//
383b6(rgyud): tshar bcad rjes su 'dzin pa'i mchog/gdon dang lus kyi las rnams ni//de nyid du ni nges par bya//cher bcad dam tshig bde ba 'dra//gu na 'pho byed drang za byed dang /
383b7(rgyud): gang zhig la la gsod pa dang //de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang //sems can rnams ni thams cad nyid//bsgrub thabs bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni//je 'dro ba yis bya ba dang /
384a1(rgyud): mkhas pas las ni stong dag dang //gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang //rang gi rigs dang gzhan rigs kyi//phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya//'di yi dkyil
384a2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad nas//'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun//de nas gtor ma bdug pa sogs//rgyas pas mngon par mchod byar gyis//de yis gdon mthong de mchong bya//
384a3(rgyud): phyis kyi dbang las dul ba thob//skye bos btung ba sprin sreg la//sogs pa rnam par gzhom par bya//shi Sha lAn tsa na blangs nas//gdon thob pa ni 'phyo bar bya//srin po

384b4(rgyud): dge ba la//shing cig gam ni dur khrod dam//khang stong gtsang ma tsha sgo med pa'i sa gzhi mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar
384b5(rgyud): byugs te re kha gsum der bya'o//kun nas khwa bzhi pa la dang por thal ba'i re kha'o//gnyis pa ri'i btsag gi'o//gsum pa sol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o//
384b6(rgyud): byang ngam nub tu yang sgo cig byed du bzhug/skye'i dbusu yang lha chen po lag na mdung thogs pa bya'o//snam bu'i nang du sangs rgyas bden par rma du byung ba'i bdag nyid tsan+da bya
384b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas g.yas kyi gzhog su sgrol mas non pa rnam par dgod par bya'o//g.yon du dpa' mtshan mo stobs mo cha ma ral pa tsog ma bzhag nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku
385a1(rgyud): rgyab tu spyod par bya m+bu rgyal po mtha' yas dang /de bzhin du 'dog pa dang //da 'ab tshan po stos kyi rgyuya dgod byu gyu'o//da 'i du padang
385a2(rgyud): pad+ma chen po dang /dung skyong dang /rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon par brjod pa'o//lha de rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o//'od thaMd nas
385a3(rgyud): ma mi'i tshogs rnam par med par bya ste dpa' ldan ma ni rnam bu'o//sgo ru spre'u dang /rA dang /bum rnams yang sgo'i spyan pa ri ba yi yang //nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams
385a4(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po lA ma 'das pa yang dag par mcho de/stong phrag bzlas par bya'o//shes rab can sngags kyi rgyal po grub par 'gyuraro//rims dang gdon thams cad
385a5(rgyud): las 'byin pa dang /rtsod pa yang rnam par 'joms par byed do//rang gnasu 'jug/de nas gseng sngags 'di yang rtag tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu'am ku shas
385a6(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang //zhi ba can dang /rgyas pa can dang /mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas par brub ste/tha~Md 'joms
385a7(rgyud): pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das de
385b1(rgyud): bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad rjes gsol to//bdag gis mngon par shes pa ste de ban+ti/
385b2(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen tog la mngon sum du thos pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug gis/ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen brjes kyi
385b3(rgyud): rgyud phyi mar sems can gyi don gyi phyir dang sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang /thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gi bshad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
385b4(rgyud): skyel pa/byams pa smos shig na ma/sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ma hA pu ru ShaM ri Sha b+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra ma hA s+tha ma prAp+ta mai tre ya many+dzu shrI badz+ra pA Ni pre b+h+r-i taM b+h+yo ma hA sa twe b+h+yaHde
385b5(rgyud): rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po 'dod pa thams cad re rab tu sgrib par byed pa sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs
385b6(rgyud): pA srid pa'i lam rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod pararo bgyi'o//sat+ya the da ma haM bo d+hi sang+ga/ma hA sat+kA/he ha le/Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/pa ra ma me tri tsit+ta hi ta tsit+ta kA ru Ne kA/
385b7(rgyud): mAM ga ma bi ya ti/ma hA bi ya ti/d+hu ru d+ha ru/d+hu ru tsa len+d+ra/ba la na maste stu/sar+b+ba sitwAM/b+hU ya br-i ta/ha ri ha re ha rir+tha nor+tha pa/b+ha bA na khaM tu ru tu ru/g+hu ru b+hu ru/su ru su rI
386a1(rgyud): su pra shA si/pA ma la mUrti/Ar+ya a ba lo kaM tai shwa rA ya/kr-iSh+NA dzi na/dza TA m+ba ku TA ba la mu tA lA mA la/ba la ma la ma la/ka lA ka lA/na la/
386a2(rgyud): ha la ha la/hu lu hu lu/he bo d+hi sid+d+ha/pri ya bo d+hi satwA/me tA bo d+hi satwA na ma ta ru/ku ru ku ru/hr-i da yau/mi nu sma ra/i daM tsa me/kAr+yaM ku ru swAhA/'di ni bcom ldan 'dra
386a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ta la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nA bco ldan 'das kyi dkyi
386a4(rgyud): byas te dri dang /me tog la sogs pa mngon par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o//de nas nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed/zla ba drug kho nir byas pas ji ltar 'ded
386a5(rgyud): po bzhin du yid kyi shing rta yongasu rdzogs par byed//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/gal te mtshams med pa byas
386a6(rgyud): pas kyang ma grub pa na de'i tshe mtshams med pa byas pa dang /bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig zhes//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa/
386a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu skyes pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rtogs pa chen
386b1(rgyud): bo'i rgyud phyi mar 'jig pa thams cad kyi rig pa sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par gzigs par gyur pa/rtog par//
386b2(rgyud): bzhir skyes pa/thu'i gzugs can/na mkha' la 'gro ba/sa 'og dang mi snang ba dang /ro langs dang /'thob rtsod dang /rkang pas rab tu bgrod pa dang /rgyas pa can dang /mngon spyod

387a2(rgyud): shwa rA ya/oM a dzi te snA hA/mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o//nAn mo a mi tA b+hU ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/oM a pa ra dzi te s+yA hA//gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes
387a3(rgyud): bya ba'o//zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzha'o//lnga pa ming po ni/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/tad+ya thAM/ar+ha te/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/au ki ni ki ni sarba ta thA ga tA

388a1(rgyud): chub sems dpar phyag na rdo rje dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glazho nu'i spun lnga po rnams la logaso zhes bka' stsal/

392b7(rgyud): 'jug par byed//khu tshur gyis gdon rnams 'thabs par byed//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ra sh+tsat+tha badz+ra pA Na yaM/mahA yak+Sha se nA paM tA ye/na ma sh+tsa ti srit+taM b+ha gi nI nA~M/naman+ta/

393a2(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/nig pa'i brgyad pa nas bajoms te ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du'o//gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par
393a3(rgyud): byed/'dis kyang khros pas rgya yo po'i pho brang rab tu bsgrubs par bya ste kun tu rgyu rab tu zhugs nas de la sol bas mngon par zis te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong
393a4(rgyud): phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de nas phyi ga rgya rab 'chad byed//dge ba'i lag pa las kun la//las gang cung zad bya ba de//
393a5(rgyud): kun la log pa g.yon sbyor bya//mthe bong can la bzung ba yi//phyag rgya lho yi ra yongasu bsgrags//bsdigs mdzub can ni gnod sbyin pa//dri za la ni gung mo ste//'byung/

393b6(rgyud): nad mang bar 'gyur ro//gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du 'pho bA dang /gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang /sbyin sreg dang bral bas bzlas pa byed
393b7(rgyud): pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang /grogs nyams par yang 'gyuraro//gang zhig slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa rang gi rig pa la brnyes po byed pa dang /lha la spyod par byed pa ni log par
394a1(rgyud): 'dren pa dang skrag par byed//rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyuraro//rtag tu yongasu brnyas par 'gyuraro//rtag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas
394a2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis mcho/

394a5(rgyud): pa dang /zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /dam tshig med par khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang /'thor bar byed pa dang /dam chog med pa sho ba mthong nas 'gro
394a6(rgyud): bar mi byed pa dang /dam tshig med pa dang /dkyil 'khor du ma gzhugs pa la phyag rgya dang /sngags sbyin par byed pa dang /de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang
394a7(rgyud): pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dong /lha gzhan rnams la yang dri med nyid kyis
394b1(rgyud): 'pham par byed pa dang /dam tshig med par dung dang /'khor lo dang /rtse gsum kha gdangs dang /btsan dang /mdung dang /rdo rje dang /phub dang /gzhu dang /gshol dang

395a1(rgyud): tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/bcom ldan 'das mu 'bags ma sgrol ma'o reg pa'i yi gro rnams thabs dang

395b1(rgyud): zhin du rtags par bya bar 'gyur//yang 'drir rnam grangs kyi gto 'dir de dag cig tu reg pa de dran par byed//de nas gshed byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi
395b2(rgyud): shing gi mi rab tu sbar te dar chen pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyes shig/nyi me bdun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga ro tsan+da gyi greshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas lidra

396a1(rgyud): brgya rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par bya'o//rims las grolo//mgo bo zug rngus 'dzin par 'dod na ba byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu la stong

396b3(rgyud): spyo can rdzogaso//ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung ste so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o//ma blangs par bza' bo rnyed//brgyad brgyar bzlas nas mgro bo la byug+sa

397a5(rgyud): swA hA/gozi brjid dang phung por rnam bshad/'dob ma chung ngu'i rgyab du gnas par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gi shigs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyung chu nga las bris pa 'dab ma so sor
397a6(rgyud): la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/gzhonu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la ros byed du bcug nas sam/yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa ste ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tsha rma bcad pa sku
397a7(rgyud): dang bral ba la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba min pas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'phrul 'khor la bzhag ste de'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub se
397b1(rgyud): la sogs po thams cad dang khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar byas nas de nas Arga'i shing busnga me rab tu sbyar nas yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis

397b3(rgyud): de nas chos grangs dang byed pa dang rgyu skar dang yud tsam dge ba la snod sar par bzhag pa kha dog ma 'dres pa shin tu so sor btags pa'i kha dog kyi chus sbyar nas ba lang gi spu'i par

397b6(rgyud): snang bzhin pa'i lus/gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po gser gyi kha dog can 'phro ba/pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa 'driraro gzhug par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yon gyi
397b7(rgyud): gzhugasu dkar po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyi stod g.yogs bgos pa/phyag na rnga ya ba thogs pa'o//gzhan du rgyu skar me bzhi la 'phags pa dri ma med
398a1(rgyud): pa 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'drir bzhug par bya ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogasu thams cad dkar po//gser gyi rgan gyi
398a2(rgyud): brgyan pa/ral pa'i tshogs dang phyag na rol po spyi blugs dang /dbyu gu'i shing bsnamaso pa/mchod phyir thogs 'phrag pa la 'ophyang ba/gos dkar po babs pa/mchog tu
398a3(rgyud): skyes pa/sgrub pa ba steng du phyag brkyang ba phyag bzhi pa/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba cung zad mngon par lhags pa'o//btsas
398a4(rgyud): yos cung zad dman pa'i 'phags pa spyan raso gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o//de'i g.yas kyi gzhog su pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/gser dang rin po ches rab
398a5(rgyud): tu gsal bar byed pa'i lus can ced pan gyis rgyan pa/rnam par bkra bo'i gos bgos pa/rin po che'i stod g.yogs can/lus cung zad 'dud pa/bcom ldan 'dra
398a6(rgyud): lag pa kha sbyor byas pas ud pa la sngon po yongasu gzung ba phyag mchog tu skyes pa dang por bcom ldan 'das la rtog par byed bzhin pa'i sgrol ma 'drar gzhug par bya'o//
398a7(rgyud): de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o//de nas rtse ba'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yos phyogasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o//g.yon du 'phags pa dri mo med
398b1(rgyud): byar 'gro ba'o//gzhan du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g.ya su klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas mgo ba bdun pa/phyag na pad+ma'i sdong po bsnams pa/thams cad dkar ba rnam par bkra ba

398b3(rgyud): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogasu rtsa dang nye bar dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/rIn paM che'i stod g.yogs can rin po che dang /tsang+ga Taka phyag na
398b4(rgyud): bsnams pa/pus mo sa la btsugs pa'i lha mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das me sgrol mi'i g.yas kyi gzhog su rtsa ba dang nye bar 'khod pa'i thams cad dkar mo
398b5(rgyud): gzho nu'i gzugs can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/thal mo kha sbyar du byas pa/bau ts+ras ma dang bcos la nges par rtog bzhin pa'i bde ldan 'drir gzhug par bya'o
398b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du sgrub pa po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lta bar gyur pa gos dkar po'i stod g.yogs dang /slong g.yogs canau//
398b7(rgyud): dbyibs dang rnam pa'i khyad par ji 'dra ba pus mo gnyis btsugs pa lag pa spog phor thogs pa bya'o//lha'i bu rnga bo che brdung bar byed bzhin pa bya'o//sprin las blog dang
399a1(rgyud): banas pa byur//phyogs bzhi dang phyogs bral du yang bya'o//g.yas ras ris kyi steng du gnas gtsang ma'i sa kyi lnga'o bu me tog 'khor bar byang dran/
399a2(rgyud): pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o//steng du zlo ba dang nyo ma rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'dir gi thug par bya'o//steng du dung dang /d+hU ba che dag ga/'phags pa spyan ngas gi
399a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi graya su nag mo gsus pa 'phyang ba rgyan thams cad pa mche ba gtsigs pa/stag gi lpags pa'i shram thabs can/go zhes bya ba'i lhags pas dkris pa gtsug
399a4(rgyud): bud la thad pa'i phreng ba 'phyang ba/rdo ba la rab tu bzhugs pa/sbrul gyi mchod phyir thog saM pa can/phyag bzhi pa g.yas kyi phyag gis dog sta yongasu bsnams pa/phyag
399a5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i dang pos khrag gis yengasu gang ba'i snod dang /phyogs dang ldan pa'i lus la smin ma dang skur ldan pa/bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba byis pa/sen mo
399a6(rgyud): chen mo ring po can/glang po che'i lpags pas sgyid g.yogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i chen po'i bka' rab tu nad par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phagos mA sgrol ma'i
399a7(rgyud): srin mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o//de ltar ras ris 'drar bcug nas go tsang ma'i phyogasu dag pa dang skyong ba dang /tshad ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par spangs pa/rin po che dang
399b1(rgyud): chu klung gi 'gram mam/gzhan du yang rung ste/gtsang ma'i gan du'o//de nas du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed//gang thabs gcig gsang sngags byed pa de'o//lha thams cad
399b2(rgyud): gsal bar byed par 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa yang rung ste/las brtsams par bya'o//gtsang ma'i sA'i phyogasu gzhu'i tshad kyis thang la yongs byug par bya ste/de'i dbu su/
399b3(rgyud): so phrag bzhug par bya'o//phyugs bzhi rnam su sa las byung ba'i rtsa ba dang /nag po mod pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhi lo brgyad brgyur bsngags pa bzhag par bya'o//bzhi nu mas bka
399b4(rgyud): pa'i srang bu chen sna lnga las legs par dkris pa'o//dri zhim po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor byas phyogs bzhir chung dong sha med pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o//dri bzang po'i
399b5(rgyud): me tog ge mchod pa bya'o//gu gul gyi dadug pa dbu'o//zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhan nas 'bram gyi phye ma rnams la nye bar gnas par bzhog par bya'o//shar
399b6(rgyud): du mngon par phyogs posnga phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor du ral pa cig ma la mchod pa dang /gra to ru ma dbul bar bya'o//de nas ku sha ljang ku blangs nas gos dkar po cig 'chang bar
399b7(rgyud): byas te ji srid rkang pa gnyis kyi bar de srid du bya bas par bya'o//de nas mar gyi snod kyi steng du ku sha desaM dor bar bya'o//de nas mer chung ngu de la gal te dri ma dang sen mo dang /
400a1(rgyud): su mthong na pa dang gang cig tu bya'o//ji srid du rang 'dod pa dang sba ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o//de nas bum pa rar blangs te zlos bzhin pas
400a2(rgyud): bzhag par b+ha'o//sbyangs pa'i snod nges par gnas pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'o thams cad la drug byed du gzhu go 'di la yang 'di'i sku mnyi sbyin
400a3(rgyud): bar bya'o//pri yang ku dang /ni ga ge sar dang /sbrang rtsi can dang /du ru ka rnams cig tu byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te bsku bar bya'o//bai'i mar dang bsres/

400a6(rgyud): bsngags pa gyad kyi lus la bcing bar bya ste/g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyuraro//khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/bac+do~M sa ma la dri bzang

400b1(rgyud): bsngags pa'i sra rtsi pog gi bsregs blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de'i nad yun ring por nye bar zhi bar byed//bgegs
400b2(rgyud): thams cad nye bor zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'grom cig gis blangs nas rnam pa sna chags pa'i seng ge dang /stag gi mdog can gyi bgegs rnams
400b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o//de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du spyad par gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyogasu khrag sgrub par byed pa nye bar thogs te las badz+ra
400b4(rgyud): bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhir rgya skyegs kyi lo ma la 'dug pa'i bgegs rnams ban ga par bya'o//bgegs rnams kyis dbus su bgegs chen po log par 'dren pa
400b5(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o//la nA cig mngon par bsngags pa'i chon sna lnga'i phye ma de rnams kyis thob mar dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o//me tog dmar po dang dri dmar pos mngon par mchod
400b6(rgyud): par bya'o//phyogs bzhir mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o//rgya skyegs kyi khu ba phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags
400b7(rgyud): pa'am brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i srad bu dmar pos bgegs thams cad la g.yas bskor du dbri bar bya'o//de nas bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po btso nges par bya ste/de
401a1(rgyud): rnams u su su dam par smra gis mo g+h+ra tu sbyad nas bgegs brjid bar gyur//zhes brjod nas swAts+tsha yo gros po'u b+h+yo bo la nA dang /
401a2(rgyud): sbrang rta dang mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan mo stong phyug brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig de nas sgrub pa po de'i bgegs dong ldog par 'dren pa thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro//sha ba da/
401a3(rgyud): sgrub par byed bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyuraro//de rnams ni de rnams kyis bya bas bri log par 'dren pa chen po cig tu bzhag nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog rje

401a5(rgyud): mchod yon dbu lo//log par 'dren pa dang bcas pa la bu gul dang mer bskyes pas mchod yin debu'o//de nas lte ba'i tshad du dong brko bar bya'o//deng so sa so sor bcuganas
401a6(rgyud): slar yangs pa'i sar bya'o//de ltar rig pa 'dzin pa'i bgrogs thams cad med par 'gyur//ri basnrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du so la mu ltung ba'i 'byung gis dzA
401a7(rgyud): 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas u dum bai ri'i yaM shing gis me rab tu sbar te tshangs pa'i ye shing gis thun gi sum du sbyin

401b3(rgyud): bsregs blugs gyis shig/rje rigs dbang du 'gyuraro//nas kyi bsregs blugs gyis shig dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur//thams cad du bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i don du nyi ma brgya
401b4(rgyud): phrag cig/dgra la bltas nas bzlas par bya ste rengs par 'gyuraro//mA sha ka'i yaM shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa rnams thun ga sum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg

401b7(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya ste/grol bar byed//nad pa la bcing bar bya ste/gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyuraro//thal ba la len bdun bzlas pas

402b3(rgyud): ba rnams la grong ngam grong khyer gyi dbusu mtshan mo byed nas pa long gi lhogs pa'i tshad kyi thang lnga nye byug pa bya ste/dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin+da nas dri dang me tog lag pa'i ga

404a6(rgyud): pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad pa'i chad byas nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa gdon gyi gnasu gdab par bya ste gdon 'bros par byed//me tog drong dri

404b3(rgyud): sbyin pa sreg bya'o//bar skabs 'dir rA ris rab tu 'bul bor byed pa dang /mar me'i rtse mo 'phel bar byed pa dang /na mkha' la lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra sgrog pa dang /dri zhim po'i

405a6(rgyud): zhes pa de lta bu khA nas kun tu rtogs par bya'o zhes pa sgrub pa chen po dang po'i cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rtsi ba dang po las btus pa rdzog so////ras oM zhal shar du skye
405a7(rgyud): par bzhag nas de nas tshe 'phrul gyi phyod bye /do brgyad pa'im/cho 'phrul gyi phyogs bcu pa la las brtsams par bya ste/lo ma dang /nas zan dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /tsau rung
405b1(rgyud): 'dum pa dang /zho dang /'o ma dang /phye dang /dri za'i bza' ba'am slongs mo blangs pa'i bza' bas kyang rung ste gso sbyong can gyi byams pa dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pas byang chub mchog tu sems
405b2(rgyud): bskyed/sems can rnams kyi don rje su bsams nas nyi ma so sor 'phral bzhin pa'i mchod pa byed cing ku sha baM ting ba'i mal stan la khrus lan gsum byed cing gos lan gsum du rjes te/

405b4(rgyud): bcu drug bzlas par bya'o//da ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas dkar po'i brgyad pa 'am bcu bzhi pa la sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dra ba rnams kyis btsal bar bya'o//
405b5(rgyud): de nas ras res kyi phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba bum pa rtsa ba dang nag po med pa bzhi bcu dang bcas pa/a mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa sa bon tha~Md kyis yongasu bkang ba'i bum pa

405b7(rgyud): shing gis spras pa dag pa'i chus yongasu gang ba smra ba thams cad dang /sman zad dang /ro dang /dri dang /rin po che'i stong pa me tog gis bon pos kha btab pa du gu la'i ras ma nyams
406a1(rgyud): pas mgrin pa bcings pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa bzhag par bya'o//ras ris kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab tu
406a2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin ma bzhag par bya'o//de nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcu drug ras res la dngul bar bya'o//mdun du dri bzang po'i n+dan gyi chus yongasu bkang ba dang /'o mas bkod/
406a3(rgyud): ba'i brgyad po de rnamaso//ba'i mar gyis mer me brgyad dbul bar bya'o//ce ru dang 'o mthug dang /til gyi thug pa dang /zan dron dang /paN+Da ka dang /bca' bar bya ba rnams kyis khaM
406a4(rgyud): phor bkong nas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o//thams cad du ras ris la bris pa'i lha rnams la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang /lha bshos dang /phyi rol tu gtor ma
406a5(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o//de nas 'bru thams cad dang /'bras bu thams cad ji ltar rnyed pas ras ris kye phyogs bzhir gto ma dbulo//a ga ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o//
406a6(rgyud): de nas ku shrI'i khres lnga nye bar 'dug ste yid rtse cig pas phyogasu lngas brtsam par bya'o//'o mo can gyi shing gi yaM shing gris me rab tu sbar nas a ga ru nag po'i yaM shing
406a7(rgyud): zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/sems can thams cad kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de yang
406b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin las langs nus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams la lha'i spyan gyis kun du gtogs nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la smras
406b2(rgyud): par rigs kyi bu nyon cig/rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo mi bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'gyur ba rjesu dran pa c+doMm gyis bdag nyid srung ba la lan cig brjod pas gtsug phyung bcing
406b3(rgyud): pa/gnyis bzlas pas srung ba chen mo dang /gsum bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba/bzhi bzlas pas mchubacing ba dang /lnga bzlas pas rkang gnyis pa dang /rkang bzhi pa sru
406b4(rgyud): zhing dbang du byed pa dang /drug bzlas pas dur khrod du 'jug pa dang /bdun bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed//zhi ba byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar
406b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du A riSh+Ta dang /'o mtshan gyi shi shi yam shing gi me rab tu sbyar nas 'bras yos kyi bsregs blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shikr-i/
406b6(rgyud): nyi ma gsum la cig gi dang bdun gyis skye bo chen po dang /phyogs kyi grong dang /grong khyer gyi dang /zla bas yul 'khor chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro//rgyas par 'dod nas ras ris
406b7(rgyud): sman sngar lom can gyi ye shing gis mer bi hu sbar nas 'ablo dang /'dres drug pa che'i thun gsum du sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sred gyis shog/nyi ma bdun phrag gsuM
407a1(rgyud): gyis rgyas par 'gyur//nyi m+bu bdun gyis rgyas pa cheR+sha ber 'gyur//a m+ba ya shing gi me rab tu sbyar nas ngur ba myu gu stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/smra ba rnam
407a2(rgyud): la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyuraro//nyi ma shwa ra ba nas ji srid nub kyi bar du arga'i shing gi me la ming nas smos te lag pa g.yon pas lan bdun du phub ma'i sbyin sreg kyis shig/dbang

407b1(rgyud): shong gi me rab tu sbar nas nA ga ga sar la mar b+h+yas btags pa thun gsum du spyong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/nyi ma so sor 'phel bzhin mchod pa bya ste nyi ma 'dun na/

407b3(rgyud): bsregs blugs stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg byas shig/nyi ma gsum la rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed//gang smras pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do//'dod pas nye bar

407b7(rgyud): khyim med par kun tu snang ba'i ched du rtogs par bya'o//de'i mdun du khu tshur dgrol bar bya ste zhing nyid dbang du 'gyuraro//de ltar nyi ma bdun la 'bangs nyid kyis nye bar gnas/

408b1(rgyud): pa bya'o//nyi ma brgyad pa la lag pa g.yas pa'i mang med kyi sor mos dkrugs te ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//de nas btung bar bya ste go cha

413a5(rgyud): mkho na gzhan du rig pa sgrub par byed pa'i dus ni sa ga'i zla ba'i bco lnga nya'am dpyo'am/chu spyod dam/sprin drug gi dkar po'i bcwo lnga la rnam par gang du yang rlung
413a6(rgyud): ste/gang zhig drag po sgrub par byed par 'dod pa de rnam par 'dis nag po'i phyogs kyi tshe sna cig nas nye bar blangs te nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la sngags 'dis so//na mo rut+na

413b1(rgyud): dur khrod du ba lung gi lpags pa'i rnam par sbyor skya'i ba byung gis nye bar byugs pa byas nas de bzhinu kho nar gtor ma'i tshogs 'byung po gzhan rnams la gtor mya sna tshogs
413b2(rgyud): bya'o//yongasu spyod par byed pa po bzhis mtshon tshe dang bcas pas yam shing sreg tu gzhug par bya'o//srad bu la mdud pa brgyad pargyu byas nas bdag nyid srung ba'i don du

413b5(rgyud): te rang bsgrub par bya bar 'gyuraro//kun+da ru'am a ga ru nag po'i bdug pa srog cing kha~M shar du phyogs pas lan bcur brjod par bya'o//'di skad ces kyang brjod par

443a1(rgyud): par dad pa'o//rdul pa gyen pardzas kyi rgyud phyi mar rta mgrin rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'o//slar yang dus de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi cha nas mngon par dga' ba'i dga' thor/

443a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs kyis skad cig gcigs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gsang sngags thob pa gang du de
443a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di nyid du 'ongs nas ji ltar byung ba'i pad+ma'i gang na laM gaR+Sha
443a5(rgyud): ba de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'phel ba'i sto bra sgrub pa pad+ma'i gdan de la bzhug so//dri lta bu la sogs pa gzhal du med cing grangs med
443a6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis gli bzhi pa bar ma'i
443a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'o//de nas mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan 'das sman ras gzig
443b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gis sngags kyis spyod pa la so sor rje su yi rang ba'i tshod dang /srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i ched dang /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zang ba'i ched dang /bcom ldan
443b2(rgyud): 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dngos grub kyi tshe du bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrubaso pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mA a kl-i b+h+ya
443b3(rgyud): ya ta thA ga tA ya/ad+ha te/samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/kaM ke nI kaM ka ni/ro tsa ni ri tsa ni/tro Ta ni troT ni/trA sa ni tA sa ni/pra ti h+ya na pra ti ha na/sarbi kar+m+ma pa raM pA rA Ni swA hAM/
443b4(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA ma shUN+Da sUr+yA yA/ta thA ga tAM ye/ar+ha te/sa myakr-i bud+d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/tsan+te ma ti/tsin+te ka ra Ne/mI lA mo lA/bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta/si la si la/d+hirmA
443b5(rgyud): a d+hISh+Ti te/ki li ki li/saM g+ha o d+hiSh+Thi ta swA hA//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu rgyun mi
443b6(rgyud): 'chid pa bskal par brjod de yid la byed par 'gyur ba de rtag tu bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur 'tsho bar byed//skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa thob
443b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na maHpuSh+pa ke ta baM/ta thA ga tA ya/aR+Sha te/sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/puSh+paM puSh+pe puSh+paM puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe swAhA//gzungs 'di'i me
444a1(rgyud): tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te cho ga ji lta ba dang /'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gtan
444a2(rgyud): bar bya'o//de'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro//na mo rat+ne tru yA ya/na mAHsar+b+ba ni ba raN/biSh+paM b+hI ne
444a3(rgyud): thA ga tA yaM/Ar+yA twe/samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/tar+ya thA/s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/s+phu Ta nU me/sar+b+ba pA pA ni/sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sa trU na/d+har+m+ma sa t+ye ni/saM g+he sa t+ye na/in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ba ru Na sa d+yaM na/
444a4(rgyud): yaM lo kA sa t+ye na/bI ra Na sa t+ye naHsa t+ye na/sa t+ya sa tsan na s+phu Tan+tu/sar+b+ba pA pA ni sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+NI ne na swA hU~M//mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis las thams cad zad par
444a5(rgyud): byed do//nyin mo dang mtshan mo gsum byas nas drug tu rab tu sbyor bas mtshams med pa nges par zad par byed de/ra mo rat+na tA yA ya/na mo bai ro tsa nA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/
444a6(rgyud): an+ta te/sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/na ma A kA she gan+d+ha ya/bo d+hi saMtwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/mat+ta kA ru Ni kA yA/kA la~M ka la/ki lI ki li/tu ru hu ru/bai ran+do na/rasl-i sats+tshi daM daM/
444a7(rgyud): A ga ts+tsha Ar+ya A kA sha gar+d+ha ma hA kA ru Ni ka/pU ra ya/shrI ba darga/ya~M bud+d+ha bi ma~M tsi tsi gr-i ts+yai tsi ri swA hA//'don rnam par snang mdzod kyi snying po zhes
444b1(rgyud): gzungs bklags pa 'grub pa ste/skrag pa dang /rgyan po dang /dug dang //dug brtan pa dang /byad snyam dang /rgyal po dang /chom rkun la sogs pa rnams banon par byedo//gla
444b2(rgyud): du bris pa gnas pa 'am/mgo dang log pas bcang bar byed pa de la nye bar 'tshe ba dang /nad mgo ba thams cad mi 'byung //'di rtag tu bzlas pas dri ma med pa'i ting 'dzin
444b3(rgyud): so sor d+he do//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/na mo bai ro tsa nA ya/ta thA gau tA ya/na ma A kA shaM gar+b+ha ya/do d+hi satwa ya/ma hA satwA yA/ma hA kA rA Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/badz+ram+bu badz+ram+bu/badz+ra
444b4(rgyud): d+h+wa dze/shUn+na tA prA daM she/bai ro tsa na gar+b+he sany+tsA in+d+ra ya sho d+ha ne swA hA//che ga ni rtag tu bzlas pas 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas so sor rnyed//bdud thams
444b5(rgyud): cad dang /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /dgra thams cad dang /bgegs dang /log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis thub dka' bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du gang bris nas lag tu bcang
444b6(rgyud): bar byed pa daM yang ston 'di rnamaso//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/na maHsar+b+ba durga tI pA ri shro d+ha ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ad+ha te/sa mya k+saM bud+d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/sar+b+ba pA paM bi
444b7(rgyud): sho d+ha na shud+de bi shud+d+he sarba karma a ba ra Ni bi shud+d+he swA hA//gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad 'gro bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi byin
445a1(rgyud): oM brlabs pas skyo ba bskor skyo ba dran par 'gyur// sring byung chub kyi snying po la mthar thug glo bar du dag ba'i rtsa bA yong su zad par 'a bA m-i 'gyu
445a2(rgyud): na ma rat+na tra yA ya/na mo b+hA ga wa ti Ar+yA pradz+nyA pa ra mi twA ye/oM shri ti/smr-i ti bi dze ye swA hA/'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar 'gyuraro//'di
445a3(rgyud): ga ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs paM bzhugs nas de'i mdun dus la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'a khon nye bar byugs te nyin mtshan//
445a4(rgyud): du sbyang bar gnas pas gnas der mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas pa'i mar gyis mar mi phul te bya ba yid la dran par gyur pas gdon par bya'o//de nyid du ku sha bting nas
445a5(rgyud): gsor gyi kha dogi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong //de 'di la yang dag par lta ba bzhin ston par byed//tho rangs sam mtshan mo nyi du yong rung ste/tshig tu gdon par bya'o///
445a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rje su dran par bsgom par bya'o//ne mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA rA ya/bo d+hi satwa yA/ma hA satwa ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/dzaM ya
445a7(rgyud): dza ye maM hA dza yaM/dza ya bA hA ni/dza la ut+tar/ki la ka ra/ma la ma la/tsa la tsa la/hu lu hu lu/N+Dik+ShA Ni/sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba rA d+hI naM/me be sho d+hi ya/b+ha ga ba
445b1(rgyud): te/sa ha sra/A brta/sar+b+ba bud d+ha a ba lo ki tAM/tsak+Shu/shra tra/g+ha Na/dzi hwA/kA ya/mA nA ba dz+nyA na/sho d+ha ni/su ru su ru/pra su ra pra su ra/sar+b+ba bud d+ha/a d+hi ShiHswA hA
445b2(rgyud): d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he sU hAM/a b+hA ba/sar+b+ba d+harma a pi b+he da ni swA hA//gzungs 'di'i cha ga ni 'di yin te mtshan mo tig tu dran par byasa? nas rtag tu bzlas pas bskal paM s+ya
445b3(rgyud): du bsogs pa'i sgrib pa yid zad par 'gyuraro//sangs rgya stang gi nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyuraro//bskal pa stong gi 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed do//
445b4(rgyud): skye ba rjes te lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur//mi'i rgyal srid dam yang su drag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu skye bar 'gyur//nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i
445b5(rgyud): rmi lam mthong bar byed//'di ni snod 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te phan yon chen po byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo bklags par bya/rtag tu yid
445b6(rgyud): la bya'o//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/na mo bud+d+ho ya/na me d+hor+m+ma ya/na maHsaM b+ha ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba li ki te shA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sad+ha ya/sa twA ya/swo tA b+ha dzA ya/dA
445b7(rgyud): da sha b+hU dzA ya/ai hi e hi/b+ha ga wa naM/Ar+ya a ba~M lo ki te shwa ra ya/bud+d+ha bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/Ar+ya ma nu smA ra/bud+d+ha ma nu s+pha ra/d+harma swaHmad s+phA ra/sa~M b+ha saHma nu s+phar/tad+yan+tu
446a1(rgyud): no tu na tu/ka Ni ki NaM/tu ru tu ru/b+h+yo b+h+yo/ku ru ku ru/sar+b+ba saR+Wa me sA d+ha yi hI ri mi ri Ti Ti/ni ni/ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya/si d+h+yAn+ma/man+t+ra pa dA swA hA//de nas de bzhin ga sheg/
446a2(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med kyis gzungs 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rig/
446a3(rgyud): pa'i gzungs 'di ni bklags pas grub pa/ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams 'byung ba ste/zla ba nya la gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas yang rung //spyan ras gziDa dbang
446a4(rgyud): phyugi sman sngar byang chub kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar nas til nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyes shig/de bzhon du nyi ma bdun du lan re'o mthun gsum du byas no rgyal po 'am rgyal
446a5(rgyud): pa'i blon po dbang du 'gyur ro//mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/phyogs sum zla bar yul gyi dron du grog mkhar bdun
446a6(rgyud): gyi rtse mo song nas re re 'dzegs te/nyi ma snga dro nas ji srid phyi dro'i bar bzlas par bya'o//mtshams med pa grol bar bye'o//bu 'dod na 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/mtshan thams cad
446a7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khye'u 'byung //gzungs 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba dang /gnod pra gdon 'bros par byed pa lo byabs pas sam/rdza su bcings pas kyang rung //yang na chom rkun
446b1(rgyud): thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro//rtag par rgyun du zlos bzhin pa ni nor nye bar bsags par 'gyur zhing /dgra rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyuraro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis slar yang //
446b2(rgyud): ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshigs rnams gsungs pa/na mo bud+d+ha ya/na mo d+harmA ya/na maHsaM g+ha ya/tad+ya thA/hu lu hu lu khi ma le/nir ma le sho d+ha mi/kA tse ti/
446b3(rgyud): mi ra pa Ta la/sar+b+ba ni ra~M gAHbi na shra nr-i d+hA nI/ts+tshe da ni/b+hA ta sa mut+ti tAM 'bal ta sa mu tiSh+Tha taM/sh+laSh+ma/sin+d+ra pA t+ya sa mut+ti taM sar+b+ba nA sha ni/Ar+ya a ba laM ki te shwa ra s+ya/te dza nan sAn+ti/a/

446b5(rgyud): byab par bya'o//long pas kyang mig so sor rnye do//zla ba drug gi rtag tu dran por byed na/mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan
446b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang gru 'dzin na gnas pa'i 'khor chen po la legs par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu grub pa'i gzungs kyi sdigs

447a1(rgyud): slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma chos gos kyi rna ba 'am/gos kyi mtha' la mdud pa bya'o//gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub par byed pa des
447a2(rgyud): lan cig brjod nas gsum gyi gos la bgos pas dgra dbang du nye bar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /gdug pa thams cad rengs par 'dod pa dang /dngos grub thams cad rtog par 'dod pa dang /don
447a3(rgyud): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pa dang /mi mdza' ba rnam par 'joms par 'dod pa de ci'i rgyu dang /de bzhin du byang chub
447a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i rigs can don thams cad bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa 'dzin par byed//de la yid la grub pa'i gzungs kyis sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo aM mi

447a6(rgyud): mr-it+san+da maH/s+yA mi b+h+r-i ma ne/bi shA tsi par+t+ti nai wA ri/par+t+ti sha wA ri/pi shwA tsa/b+ha ga ba ti/pA shi hasta/paR+YA d+hA ra Ni/yI ne/kA naM/tshA ta/b+ha ya ni/ut+saM t+yan+ti/yak+Sha sh+tsa/

447b1(rgyud): sad+g+ha staM/sarba te/bA la tA d+ha na/ut+sa d+yar+d+he na/paN+Di tA/a na nA/sa d+h+ye nA/sAd+h+ya bA ke nA/a baHpad+b+ha ta/A d+hiSh+Ta tirman+d+ha pa rerma ma rak+Shi ku ru dA rI tra Ni ku ru/pa ri gra hi ku ru pa 'i gra ha ku ru/
447b2(rgyud): pa ri pA la na ku ru/sUstI ya naM ku mu dar+t+ti pa ri ha ri/ku ru baM Sha pa ri hA raM ku ru/bi Shang+gu ShA Ni ku ru/bi Sha na sha NaM ku ru/tad+ya thAM/a mr-ita a s+t+ra tarbA mA/ma ra ma ra sa ma/pr-i sa
447b3(rgyud): ma/u pi sa ma/rta nu khi tu nu/tu le tu mu le/ma ma sarba satwa nAny+dza rAk+ShaM ku ru swA hA//'di ni raM khrod l-I ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te bzlas pa dang /sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad dang /
447b4(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed//'dri lte ste mi rnams la yams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba la shing sha mi'i ye shing gi me rab tu sbar nas gang ba'i bsregs
447b5(rgyud): blugs stong phrag brgyad thun gsum du ji ltar nus pas sbyin sreg gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas ri khrod lo ma can la yang
447b6(rgyud): bya'o//de bzhin las byas pas nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed//ba lang gi nye bar 'tshe ba la ba lang gi spu dang rus pas sbyin bsrug bya ste zhi bar 'gyuraro//ma he'i nad thams cad
447b7(rgyud): la skra dang rus pas nyi ma bdun du sbyin bsreg bya ste/zhi bar 'gyuraro//rgyu skar gyis gnod pa la nyi ma bdun du 'o ma'i sbyin bsreg bya'o//dngos grub thams cad rtog par 'dod pas
448a1(rgyud): nyi ma bdun du nye bar 'tsho ba la song ljang gi phye ma'i sbyin sreg/mgo bo nu ba la dri bzang po'i me tog la yongasu bzlas nas bsnams nas mar gzhug par bya'o//
448a2(rgyud): rang gi gnasu 'gyuraro//rims la srad bu bcing bar bya ste/rang gi gan su 'gyuraro//za ba dang sbyin bsreg kyang bya'o//gdon la bag zan las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la len
448a3(rgyud): bdun bzlas te nyi ma bdun nas grol bar 'gyur ro//mig na ba la mig sman gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/nyi ma bdun gyis gro lo//zhi bar 'dod par dur b+ha'i sbyin bsrog gyis shig/
448a4(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyuraro//rgyas par 'dod pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/rgyas par 'gyur ro//rgyal ba la shu dag gi sbyin sreg gyis shig/rgyal bar 'gyuraro//lan tshwa las
448a5(rgyud): byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sbyin sreg gyis shig/dbang du 'gyuraro//sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa la yul 'dab kyo la so//sbrul las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun la dbang
448a6(rgyud): du byed do//'byung po dang shi za'i rgyas btab pa la lan nyi shur bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnan par byas te rang gi gnasu 'gro'o//rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thams cad
448a7(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyuraro//rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdong la yongasu bzlas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro//sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la nyi ma
448b1(rgyud): bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o//mdor na nye bar 'tsho ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur//snga mu'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gis las thams cad bye'o//las thams cad la dang por gang ba'i bsregs/
448b2(rgyud): blugs skyon sreg gyis shig/lus thams cad la yang las 'di nyid gyis shig ces bya'o//gso sbyong can gyis bya ba'o//sems dpa' thams cad la sems kyis dmigs pas
448b3(rgyud): sa las byung ba'i ka pa la dang /sel+la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas gzho nu mas mdud pa brgyad brgya bya'o//de nas de dri'i chus bkrus nas shing la
448b4(rgyud): bzhag ste/de yi mgo la bcing bar bya'o//de bzhin du ma he rnams dang /ra rnams dang /phyag rnams la chom rkun gyis nye bar 'tshe ba la rwa la bcing bar bya'o//bum pa chus
448b5(rgyud): gang ba byas nas gtsang mas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas te nad pa'i skyed pa la btsod par bya'o//rang gi gnasu 'gyuraro//khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang /sha zas nye
448b6(rgyud): bar 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin sreg gyis shig/ji ltar nus pa'i gtor ma bya'o//zhes te 'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs ral pa gyen brdzas kyi rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa
448b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo sde yi //slar yang dus de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
449a1(rgyud): smyon ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor phyag g.yas pa rab tu btang nas nyug par mdzad 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu ran chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
449a2(rgyud): yod 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rje su yi ring bas gsung so//rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i tshad dang /
449a3(rgyud): ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub byed pa rtag tu bye du gzhugo/blo gros dang ldan pas gang dge ba'i tshes grangs
449a4(rgyud): la bris naso//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngags kyi tshig rnams bka' stsal to//na mau bud+d+hA ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/na mo s+yAM g+hA ye/na maHsap+tA nAM/sa myak+saM bud+d+ha
449a5(rgyud): ka TI nAM nA mo mai tAM ya/pra mu khA nAM/sarba bud+d+ha bI d+hi satwA nAM/na maHsam+b+haH tA nAM/na maHsa myak+Sha ti pan+d+ha nAM/na mo ar+d+ha tAM/na mo nA gA mI nAM/na moHsa kri dA gi mAM nAM/na moHshe
449a6(rgyud): tA bin+d+ha nAM/na mo ar+yA ta/mar+d+ha tu/a pa ri dzi ti hr-i da yaM/mAM bar+N+Na yiSh+Tha mis myek+saM bud+d+ha/b+hiSha taM/ma nu mai daM taM/daM ba ga Ne swer+b+ba kar+m+ma ka raM/bu r+N+Na/pa bi trany+tsathA/maM gai l+yaM/d+haH
449a7(rgyud): shrI Sh+yA ka ra~M/shud+d+he s+t+wa~M/b+h+yas rbas twA nAM/de sdus par dzi hr-id yo/ma baN+Di ma~Msad+d+hi pA pa/pra sha mA~M nA~M/sarba an s+yA d+ha nAM/d+ha naM/sarbag haM bin+da shanA~M/niHdza la/1
449b1(rgyud): shAHsgrub u par dzad+hA paSh+Ta kr-it+ta/na shrAn+ta g+hu/rAH/am+l-i rI prAn+na shAn+ta krad+d+haHr+dz+dza/d+h+r-isa?/swar+tha po ASh+Ta s+yAta nA dag d+hA na byA//r+tharmA yaSh+Tag+nasau/TA ka
449b2(rgyud): man gyis m+b+ha/kleHrAd+hid+hI ya/ gI dzi kuHd+h+r-i ts+tshak+Sheken pa yeSh+matrUM au s+yASh+TarASh+TaH
449b3(rgyud): hau yin+ta ya s+ya dA kA raM ka ra/rAt+na mU l-i a~M yai twedz+dzak+Shi prA mA ma ba ha ti/dza yaM man+te/kA mau la pa taR+She/shrI kI mo l+yA b+hU he shrI yaM/birbi tA/ra Na/saMgrAhAM/k+ShI pr-i mAts+tsha
449b4(rgyud): twedza bau/atra bi d+h+waM/pra bak+She mI/rat+na mA li tI/bai pru taM/tA ba tA lo ka nA \u0f7f hri dr-iSh+Ta satwA nu pa dru taM te d+yA thA/oM d+ha n+sa ka rI bi pu la ka ri ya sha ka ri/bid+d+ha ka raM a yun+ta
449b5(rgyud): d+hI a lak+Shi pra sa mya ni d+hi na n+yA n+yA bi r+d+ha ni ba shri ka rI/sarba gra h+na/naik+Sha ta/pa sha/pAr+d+ha naM mai/d+hu dza ni naM/su tA dza niri pa ri bA rAd+hA ni/A yan+da ni/pre tI kA ri/dzam+b+ha
449b6(rgyud): ni/stam+b+ha nI/a mo ha shak+ti kAny+dzA nA/mA lA grA hA sau mya/ka ra Ni sar+b+baM kA li kA lA hA bi gr-i ha/bi bA da pra sha mi na/pa raHtre/ni dA ra Ni pa ra me staM b+hU ni tsit+ta na
449b7(rgyud): lI ka ra~M Ni/sar+b+ba pA pa pr-i sha ma~M ni sarba kim+b+hi Sha nA sha ni swAh+ma/tsu Tu ts+yai Tu/tu Tu tuT+Ta/mu Tu mu Tu/sa~Mt+ma/sar+b+ba de ba a nu d+h+ye te swAhU/sarba nA ga sa ra~Mk+Shi taM swAhA/
450a1(rgyud): na ri Ta h+yA na ta nA ban+tha/drAr+t+tid hwA phaT/pa tsapyA tsA paT/yoSh+Ta pi d+hASh+Tan+mA biM sha ma d+hA yAn+ta/tAt+ma nAM/kA kha~M kArbAn+tau/ka ra ya?H/kr-It+sar+d+ha A b+hU yU nA ma
450a2(rgyud): da neR+sha ba phaT swA hU/Ag+ni stam+b+ha yA maM bi ShaM shas+t+ra u da ka tsau ri sarba duSh+Ta sarba byA d+hi taM/tsan traM dze na sU mi hUM hUM phaT phiT swA hAM//gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mis
450a3(rgyud): khrus byas te rin po che'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu srung ba byed pa'o//de bzhini nyid yang gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris pa 'am gang du 'am
450a4(rgyud): drir yang rung ste la la'i bgegs srung ba dang /bsod nams mchog dang /sdig pa dang dri ma 'joms pa dang /g.yul du 'am/rtsod pa 'am/thams cad du rgyal ba
450a5(rgyud): sbyin zhing dge bya'o//gang 'di 'dzin pa la rig pa zhi ba bris pa dang /skyes pas rtag tu klog pa de la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//klog pa dang 'dzin pa thams cad rtag
450a6(rgyud): tu srung bar byed//gsang ba rnams kyis yongasu skyong bar byeda'o//cho ga'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ni ji ltar rin po ches spras pa'i phreng ba steng du rnam par 'bar ba'i
450a7(rgyud): dpal gang yin pa de rig pa 'dzin par bye'o//'od las gdon de rnam par nyams par byedo//nad rnams kyang mi 'byung //bu tsha bo rnams kyang 'phel lo//'khor bzang
450b1(rgyud): po can rnam par gnas//rig pa 'ang ni thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang /byis pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba
450b2(rgyud): ched do//lha dang rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de yang phyogs bcu rnams kun nas gzigs par mdzad do//dge ba'i
450b3(rgyud): don rnams de 'phel ba dang /sdig pa thams cad kun nas zad par 'gro ba dang /rmi lam dran pa rnams dang /nyes par byas pa rnams lus kyang grol te/'dir the tshom
450b4(rgyud): med do//ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzungs//de nas 'di las rgyud 'drir byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbade phyug gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungaso///
450b5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/gtsug phud dang /go cha dang /ra ba dang /snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po dang /zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o//rdza bra'i rig pa la ni drag bcur bshad//don thams/
450b6(rgyud): cad sgrub pa de wa dang por ri shig ra bi ta dang /pi Ni ka dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnams//mthe chung khab kyi rnam pas nges par btsing pa'i gung mo dang /
450b7(rgyud): mthe bong dag tu bshado//'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang ba'i phyag rgya'o//zhes rnam par grags te don thams cad sgrub pa'o//rig pa tshim par byed pa la maH
451a1(rgyud): /chung gAN+Dis ba sman pAr+yA byA s+t+wa~M/rnam+b+ha pAr tshim+b+ha pUr ShAgyur//lkug par gnas pa ni ma'i bod g+hA sa ka khyab kyi rnam pa skye sor ga yo byA byAm+b+ha/sbyang
451a2(rgyud): po rnam par shes par bya'o//bsto pa kho nam med kri so//nye ba'i snying po la mdzo bong gnyis 'di lta ste/nad kho nany+tsi khu tshur ro//man bong lcags sgron po che'i
451a3(rgyud): dang /bsdigs mdzub kha bye ba kheb du byas pa 'drin go cha'i mtshan nyid//rtag tu bdag nyid la rab tu sbyar bya'o//bri sdigs mdzub gnyis nges par bu mar nas
451a4(rgyud): gung mo bkris tAM khab kyi rnam pas bsdigs pa 'di ni gtsug phud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste/bdag nyid kyi gtsug phud bci nges pa'i dus rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//slar
451a5(rgyud): yang khu tshur bcings nus/bsdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab kyi rnam pa ste/'di ni bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid//de lta bu kho nA yongasu gyur pas bsdigs mdzub
451a6(rgyud): khab kyi rnam pas ra ba'i phyag rgya bye'o//khu tshur btsongs nas bsdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa ste/mtshan ma 'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'o//
451a7(rgyud): rkang pa mi nyams pa la g.yas po'i rkang pa rab tu bzhag nas gar gyi sbyor bas yongasu bskor bar bya ste/gzhan du bskur nas lag pa gnyis kos rtsa ba'i phyag
451b1(rgyud): rgyu'o las sbyar//dpral bar yung lngas thams cad kyi dam tshig phyug rgyur 'gyuraro//de nas phyag rgya brnying pa dang /bzlas pa'i dus dang /nyal ba'i dus dang /rnam pa gzhan du
451b2(rgyud): yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//gdon gyi las drang las thams cad lo rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyor bar bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das ngu bzhin gshegasla ba shAkya thub pas ral
451b3(rgyud): pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar spyan rasra gzigs dbang phyug la rjesu brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du phyag rgya bcing ba gsung so//de la 'di
451b4(rgyud): rma sa ng+ge m+b+hi b+h+yo/ ni da mdzes pa blag sa g+hu/ klu la nga rdzun snang byag N+Di ni// nims sa phyu /
451b5(rgyud): po'i sor mo'i tshigs la tshigs kyis rtse mo kun//phyag rgya nyid ni rdosu bcing bAr gyis shig dang //rtag tu gsol ba 'debs la gtsang mu gsol ba 'debs pa'i//phyag rgya
451b6(rgyud): bzhin kho nar g.yas pa sor mo ste//tshigs rnams tshig su byas nas rje su yi rang bya//mchod pa thams cad kho na gtsang mas rtag tu ni//mchod pa rtag tu rjes yi rang byed pa
451b7(rgyud): dang //so mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan//tshigs kyi rtse mo mthe bong snying por yang dag ldan//'di rnams rgyal ba yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur//sor mi'i rtse mo
452a1(rgyud): yang dag sbyar ba gung mo dang //mthe bong gnyis kar gang du mi 'gyur phyug rgyu yis//bzlas pas mchog sbyin yid kyis bzlas pas phyag rgya'o//de nas yang
452a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de rnams thoms cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slar bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma mdzadado//de nas
452a3(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sa dang /nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /sems rab du 'gul ba dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'dirang 'bul bas skrag cing me tog gi char
452a4(rgyud): 'bab pa dang /ber snang las spyod pa'i 'byung po bye bas thams cad 'gro ba'i gdug pa rab tu btulo//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis de bzhin
452a5(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yong su zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ches kyi rnam grangs 'dri'i ming ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu des na/
452a6(rgyud): ral pa gyen brje saM zhes bya bar yang zing shig/rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig/spyan ras gzigs dbang phye gi zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/reg pa dang /
452a7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zung shig/rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'u ra ba'i byam zhes bya bar yang zung shig/thangs kyi spyod pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/
452b1(rgyud): dos byung na ba sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rna badzi tsam gyis de rnams yang dag par ldan par 'gyur rjes du zhigs lhag par gnas pa
452b2(rgyud): legaso byams pa/des dang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /lha dang /kye dang /gnod sbyin dang/dr-i za dang /lto 'phye chen po
452b3(rgyud): po dang /na mkha' lding dang /ma'am ci dang /yi dwags la sogs pa rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang /gzungs mnyam po'i sems zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/
452b4(rgyud): ba dang /dge ba'i chos las kun tu gnas pa'i sa ji srid 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /bris nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /glegs bam du 'gyur ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /
452b5(rgyud): tsho nga nad med pa dang /dbang phyug dang /bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /bde 'gror 'gro bya ste/phan yon mang po nyid dang /phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs drang
452b6(rgyud): sgra dang bcas pas byin gyis darlabs pa/rig pa dang /sngags chen po 'dus pa 'khor de'i pha rol tu song ba/bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyu skar dang /mtshan mo dang /na
452b7(rgyud): mau dang /zla ba dang lo bde ba'i ched du mtho risu skye bar 'gyuraro//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang grags pa 'phel zhing yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//ral pa gyen brjes 'a
453a1(rgyud): nga //ma du zhag pa dang /ra tu /rnams lda////nas gyu stsal pa d+ma/maldan/sa nga thams du na//
453a2(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lha dang /me dang /lha mo yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//ral pa byin brjes
453a3(rgyud): kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzog so////'dri ni jo bo chen po a ti sha'i phyag dpe/rwa sgreng nas dka' thub chen pos gdan drangs nas/shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub
453a4(rgyud): kyis 'phar ba'i lo cho 'phrul chen po d+hA'i zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni/ljo ts+tsha ba chen po 'di nyid kyi zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa/
453a5(rgyud): shAkya'i dge slong bsod nams grub kyis bgyiso///paN+Di ta la ma gtugs shing /dpe dbang 'grel pa ma rnyed pas//sgra don
453a6(rgyud): log par gyur srid na//mkhas pa rnams kyis bcos par gsol///sarba mang+ga laM//
